item.text: @# @#// rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya bo d+hi sa tA kI ti garlu tsakra da
sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skadadu/ 'dus pa chen po las
'phags pa byang chub sims dang 'a sa'i snying po 'khor lebacu
bla @#// pa zhes bya ba/ theg pa chen po'i mdo/// bam po dang po//
sas rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag
gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ru kha la te ya zhes bya ba na/ drang srong thub pa
mang po'i spyod yul gyi gnas na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po tshad med gras mod po dang
thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po sha stag go/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po// tshad med nga drung thabs cig pa thams cad kyang/ byang chub sems dang 'i dge 'dun chen po sha stag ste/ zla ba'i snying/
bo zhes bya ba bshad ma thag tu/ de'i tshe lho phyogs nas bsung gi sprin chen po 'dus pa las/ bsung gi char chen po rab tu 'bab bo//
ma tog gi sprin chen po 'dus pa las/ me tog gi char chen po rab tu 'bab bo// rin po che'i lha rdzas kyi rgyan gyi sprin chen po 'dus pa las/
rin po che lha rdzas kyi rgyan gyi char chen po rab tu 'bab bo// lha rdzas kyi gos kyi sprin chen po 'dus pa las/ lha rdzas kyi gos kyi char chen po ba
tu 'bab bo// de lta bu'i sprin dang/ char chen pos drang srong thub pa mang po'i spyod yul gyi gnas kyi ra de la khyab bar gyur to//
bsung dang ma tog dang/ rin po che'i rgyan dang/ gos de dag las rin po cha'i sgra dbyangs rnam pa sna tshogs brgya stong snyad grags bar gyur pa ni/ 'di lta
ste dkon mchog gsum la skya bas su 'gro ba'i sgra dang/ bslab pa'i gnas 'dzin pa'i sgra dang/ ngang des shing bzed pa can gyi sgra dang/ brtson
'grus rtsom pa'i sgra dang/ bdud bzhi btul ba'i sgra dang/ shes rab la gzhol zhing 'jug pa'i sgra dang/ grags ba chen pos 'jig rten gsum
du rgya cher grags pa'i sgra dang/ dran pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ gzungs kyi khyad par la nan tan nga 'i sgra dang/ stong ba nyid dang/ mtshanam mad pa
dang/ smon pa med pa'i sgra dang/ 'dod chags kyis yongs su skyo ba'i sgra dang/ gzugs ni chu'i lbu ba lta bu 'o zhes bya ba'i sgra dang/ tshor ba ni chu bur/

lta bu 'o zhes bya ba' sgra dang/ 'du shes na smig rgyu lta bu 'o zhes bya ba'i sgra dang bdu byed na shing lta bu 'o zhes bya ba'i sgra dang/ rnam par shes pa na sgyu ma lta bu 'o zhes bya ba'i sgra dang/ mi
rtag pa'i sgra dang/ sdug bsngal ba'i sgra dang/ bdag med pa 'i sgra dang/ stong pa'i sgra dang/ 'dzim pa dang/ ngotsha bar ldan pa'i sgra dang/ kun spyong ba'i sgra dang/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i
sgra dang/ byams pa dang/ snying rje dang/ dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms kyi sgra dang/ chos kun chud pa'i sgra dang/ mtho ris su skye ba nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgra dang/ theg pa gsum las
'bab pa'i sgra dang/ chos chen po 'a 'khor lo bskor ba'-i sgra dang/ chos chen po'i char rab tu 'bebs pa'i sgra dang/ sems can yongs su sman par bya ba'i sgra dang/ ngan song gsum las yongs su
sgrol ba'i sgra dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par nan tan bya ba'i sgra dang/ thabs mkhas pas sgra dang/ sa bcul 'bab pa'i sgra dang/ mngon par shes pas rnam par rol pa'i

dang/ bla named pa'i theg pa chen po rnam par dag pa la rnam par rol pa'i sgra dang/ sa las phyir ma ldog pa'i sgra dang/ ma skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa 'i sgra dang/ spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i sgra dang/

sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgya mtsho chun po la 'jug pa'i sgra'i nga rogrags nga ra gyur to// de'atsho 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po de dag thams cad kyis de lta bu'i spyani dang/ chen po rnam pa sna tshogs/
dbya@#// mthong zhing/ de ltar chos kyi sgra'i nga ro yang thos par gyur nas/ de dag ga so so ba yod pa la mos pa bzhin du so so'i lus la rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bsung dang/ me tog dang

[>>ni bo tsha'i rgyan dang/ lha rdzas kyi gos dam pas yongs su brgyan pa mthong ngo// yang so so'i 'a ga ma tha'i gnyis na/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che thogs shing/ yadabazhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i dag
re las kyang/ rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs char bzhin du 'bab par mthong ngo// gzhan yang nor bu rin po che de dag las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs byung ste// 'od zer de dag gi dbang gis sems can

de dag so so nas/ phyogs pa su'i chu klung gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyisangs rgyas kyi zhing yang mthong ngo// yang 'od zer de dag bag dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re la yang 'khor
mang po tshad med pas bsti stang dang bcas te yi ngos su bskor bar mthong ngo// gzhan yang 'od zer de'i dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sems can gang nad kyis gzir ba thams cad kyang/
'od zer de dag gis reg ma thag tu nad kyi sdug bsngal dang bral bar gyur to// gang bsad pa la thug pa dang/ btson du bzung zhing btsanges pa dag kyang 'od zer de dag gis reg ma thag tu de las yongs

su thar bar gyur to// gang lus dang/ nga dang/ yadi ma dge bar spyod pa ba gnas ngan len lca ba dag kyang 'od de'i dbang gis shin tu yang zhing rnam par dag bar gyur to// gang bkres shing skom pa dag kyang

tha'adrangs shang ngoms par gyur to// gang bsad pa dang/ chad pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis nyon mongs par gyur pa dag kyang/ 'od bar kyis reg ma thag tu sdug bsngal ba dang bral bar gyur to// gang bgo ba dang/ rin po

che'i rgyan dang ! dbyig dang/ nor rdzas kyis brel cang phongs pa dag kyang bsams pa bzhin du 'byor cing ldan par gyur to// sems can gang srog gcod pa la dga' zhing mos pa nas/ log par lta ba'i bar du/

dga' zhing mos pa dag kyang/ 'od zer des reg ma thag tu srog gcod pa yongs su spong ba la dga' zhing mos nas log par lta ba'i bar du yongs su sbyong ba la dga' zhing mos par gyur to// sems can gang dag

'dod pa ma red pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sdug bsngal bar gyur pa dag kyang 'od zer des rig ma thag tu ya sa kha pa sa ba sa dza lta'i ba bzhin du rnyed bar gyur to// gzhanayang 'od zer de'i dbang gis sangs

rgyus kyi zhing thams cad kyi sems can gang sdug bsngal gyis gdungs ba dag/ thams cad zhi nas rab tu zhi zhing/ bde ba dang ldan to/ thams cad bde ba dang ldan bar mthong ngo// gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi
zhing de dag thams cad du 'od kyis snang bar byas pas/ sbyin dang/ rdul dang/ na bun dang/ rlung dang/ char dang/ bkra ma shis pa'i sgra dang/ dril zhi pa dang/ kha ba dang/ tshab la sogs pa'i
ro ngan pa dang/ yid dun 'ong ba'i rig bya dang/ 'jigs skrag pa dang/ gnod pa mang po' rnams med par gyur to/ gzhand lag na ba dang/ log pa'i ngeg dang/ log pa ba bsam pa dang/ log
par phyogs pa dang yongs su bul te/ lhag par ma grong pa dang/ lhag par ma tshab dang/ rab tu na zhing bde ba dang/ sa gzhi lag mthal ltar mnyam ba dang/ bde ba'i yo byad dam pa

po thams cad kyis yongs su gang bar gyur to// de'i tshon 'khor mang po rnams kyi so so'i lus kyi sa'i khams lhag par lca zhing mthig pa tsam du gyur to// ltas ba da lta bu r gyur pa mthong nas thams cad kyang dngangs

te/ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis ltas 'di lta bu r gyur snyam du rtog pa skyes so// de'i tsho'akhor gyi dkyil 'khor deb nang na brgya byin lha'i dbang po dri ma med par skyes zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dang tacang yang m ring ba
zhig na 'dug pa las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na pa logs su thal mo sbyar nas/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di skadaces gsol to/

bden par gsung yang bden gzigs pa// bden la rab gnas thub pa khyod// 'dus pa 'a 'khor mang thams cad la// mthar phyin bdenaba'i chos gsungs shig/ so so'i skye bo mang po dag/ sdug bsngal rgyu dang sdug
bsngal sel// ci yi slad du 'khor 'dar na/ sbyin dang char rnams gdab bar gyur// 'khor rnams rab tu dga' rangs nas/ shan tu dad pa'i bsam pa skyes// theg pa chen por thams cad gzhol// yaMng dag lha

som nyi rgyal// 'khor mang lha dang mi yi lus// lhag par sa la khams lci bas// rang gam thig gyur pa 'di// ci yi rkyen gyis ltas 'ad byung// lag mthil gnyis kyi nor bu las// rin chen char ba bab 'od kyang

'gyed/ phyogs bcur snang byas sdig pa bas la// sdug bsngal zhi nas bde ba thob// 'dren pas gsungs shig ci ya rkyen// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la// spos dang phreng ba sna tshogs kyis// so so'i lus

la brgyan pa gda'// lha dang ma kun the tshom skyes// ca yi rgyudang tsa lo rkyen// su zhig gang nas 'dor mchin// rdzu 'phrul mthu 'di ston par gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' 'am// 'on te tshangs pa
'am bdud lags sam// brgya byin lags som su mchib// 'dren pa chen blo bshad du gsol de 'i tshabcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin dri ma med bar skyes pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
to khyod kyis 'di ltar shes par byos shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying bo zhes bya ba zhig yodade/ sngon bskal pa chen po tshad med grangs med pa'i bar du rtog lta ba mi/ sangs

rgyas mi bzhugs pa'i 'jage rten gyi khams su sems na longs su smin par byed pa de/ da ltar 'khor byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag brgyad cu dang bcas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir nga
la phyag 'tshal ba dang/ bsnyen bkur ba dang/ mchod pa bya ba dang/ gzhanayang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams la lta ba dang/ rjes su yi rang ba skyed pa'i phu'i 'khor dang bcas te/ dge sbyong gi gzugs

kyis 'dir 'ong bas/ mngon pa 'anyis pa bamathus cho 'phrul 'di dag bstan to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po sab snying po zhes bya ba de/ tshad med grangs med bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i yon tan gyi khyad
pha gyas yo bsu brgyan pas nyanatses dang/ rangasangs rgyas dang/ 'jig rten du bcas pa thams cad kyis dpog nus pa mad do// byang chub sems dpa' de na yon tan phul du gyur pa thams

[>>cad kyi gter tu gyur ba'o// rnam par grol ba bzhin bo che'i 'byung gnas la no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mag yongs su dag par byed pa'o// mya ngan las 'da' ba 'a 'gro ba'i dod dpon du gyur pa'o// yid

bzhin gyi zhin du rani po che ltar rin po che thams cad cha bzhin du 'bab pas/ ji ltara'i zhing 'dod ba thams cad yongs su tsham par byed ba'o// tshong pa mang po'i rin po che'i gling lta bu 'o// dag ba'i rtsa ba 'phel zhing skye

yA ba'i phyir zhang gshan pa lta bu 'o// rnam par grol ba'i bde ba la 'jog pa'i phyir snod lta bu go/ ni bo che dam pa 'byung gnas su gyur pa'i phyi'i yon tan gyi bum ba bzang po lta bu 'o// dge ba'i nan tan tsan la snang bar

byed pa'i phyir nyi ma gsal ba lta bu 'o// lam stor ba rnams la snang bar byed pa'aphyi'i sgron ma lta bu 'o// nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba sel ba'i phyi'i zla ba ltarasal ba lta bu 'o// rkang pa med pa la theg par gyur pa lta bu 'o//

lam rang bor 'gro ba la tshogs kyi stegs lta bu 'o// 'brog bslad pa la lam ston pa lta bu 'o// skyosashade 'khrug pa la sman dam pa lta bu 'o// nad kyis gzir ba la sman pa mkhas ba dang phrad pa lta bu 'o// gsashang

gabogs pa la rten dang 'khar ba lta bu 'o// ngal ba dang dub pa la khri snyan lta bu 'o// chu bo bzhi rgol ba la zam ba lta bu 'o// pha rol tu 'gro pa'i glu dang gzangs lta bu 'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam gsum gyi 'bras bu'i khyad

par can smin par byed pa 'o// dge ba rnam gsum gyi gzha' dren cing rgyun tu 'bebs pa 'o// sbyin pa gtong ba brgyun mi 'chad pa ba kho ra ltar 'jug pa'o// tshul khrims bsrung ba brtan pas ra'ib lhun po lta bu 'o// brtson

'khrus gzhig par dka' ban rdo rje rin po chalta bu 'o// bzod pa mi g.yo ba nas chen po lta bu 'o// bsam gtan zab pa na gtor la sad pa lta bu 'o// mnyam par 'jog pas mdzes pa mi tog gi 'phreng ba dam pa lta bu go

shes rab zab cing sangs pa na rgya mtsho chen po lta bu 'o// casi kyang mchags bananam mkha' lta bu 'o// 'bras bu dam pa'i rgyu dang nye ban me tog rgyas pa lta bu 'o// mu stegs can 'dul ba la sang geb rgyal bo lta bu 'o// lha'i

bdud yongs su 'dzoms pa na klu 'am/ glang bo che lta bu 'o// nyon mongs pa'i dgra thams cad gcod pa ni lha'i ral gri lta bu'i// 'du 'dzis nga pos skyo ba ning sangs rgyas kyi theg pa da lta bu 'o// nyon mongs pa 'a drin 'khru ba ni

chudang ba lta bu 'o// ma gtsang ba'i nyal la se la pan rlung drag po lta bu 'o// kun nas nyon mongs pas klags pa gcod pan/ mtshon snon po lta bu 'o// 'jigs pa dang bag tshab kun ' sa srung ban snyin nam 'dza'o lta bu 'o// bas

kyi rgol pa'i dgra las slob ban 'obs sam/ ma bar lta bu 'o// nyam nga ba thams cad 'as grol bar byed pas pha ma lta bu 'o// zhan cing nyam chung ba rnams sbedab nanags stug po lta bu 'o// dbyar lam ring por 'gro ba la bsal

grib kyi shang chen po lta bu 'o// tshab dang skom gyis gdungs pa rnams la chu grang lta bu 'o// bkres pa rnams la 'bras bu zhan po lta bu 'o// gcer pu rnams bgo ba'i gos byed pa'o// tshabs nyen pa rnams sprin stug por gyur pa'o/ 3

dbul bos ba la yade bzhin gyi nor bu 'an po tshar gyur pa go 'jigs skrag ba dag la skyabs dang gnas su gyur pa 'o// 'thogarnamasa'achar bar gyur pa'o// chu rtog pa can rnams la nor buchu'adang du gyur/

[>pa'o/ sams can mang po'i dgakha'i rtsa ba mi 'god du byed pas/ spyod yul dam pa ston cing 'khor sa pa dang tshim par byed pa 'o// sems can rnams lhag ba'i 'dzin pa dang ngo tsha ba sku la zhang 'dzud pa'o// bsod nams dang ye

shes kyi tshogs bsog pa la de'i rgyan dang ldan par byed ba/ na mongs ba longs su sel ba la skyug pa dang/ 'khrug pa'i sman lta bu r gyur pa sems 'khrugs pa sdud pa ni mnyam par 'jog pa'i spyod yul lta bu r gyurab/

spobs pa thogs pa med pa ni zo chunargyud ma'i ri bor lo lta bu // dmagis nga la sems sdud pa ni gzugs bzang bo la rtog pa lta bu 'o// bzod pa brtan pa ni ri rab lhun po lta bu 'o// gzugs zab cing rgyache ba na rgya mtsho

chen bo lta bu 'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa thogs pa med pa ninamamakha ba lta bu 'o// sgrib pa'i bag chags thams cad yongs su sol ba ni/ ji ltar nyin tshabs 'khyag cam tsam bzhu ba lta bu 'o// rtag tu bsam gtanadang/

gzugs med pa dang/ yang dag pa ba lam la rolatsang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rin po che dam pa'i gling lta bu r gyur par ched du ma bsams kyang/ chos chen po'i 'khor 'dorab tu skor ro// gas kyi bu de ltar

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po de ni da lta bu'i yon tan gyi khyadabar tshadamadagras mod bsam gyis ma khyab pa dang ldan pa de/ 'khor dang bcas te gnas 'dir yun tu nye bas/ 'od las 'di lta bu'i cho[H]

'phrul dang/ ltas sngar bstan pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po'i yon tanamang bo bshad ma thag tu/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i sAng po// 'khor byang

chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu dang bcas te/ rdzu 'phrul gyis thus dge sbyong gi gzugs su ston cing/ lho phyogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags te/ 'khor nang ro dang/ bcom

ldan 'adas kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos gtugs te phyag 'tshal nas/ lanagasum bskor ba byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar thal mo sbyar nas/ 'greng bzhin du tshigs su bcad pa 'di deg gas mngon par

bstod do// rnam par 'dren pa rkang gnyis mchog/ byams pa'i thugs kyis kun la skyob// sa chen ltar na shan tu bzod// zhe sdang khro bo 'o sems kun bsal// mtshan dang dpe khyad mchog ldan pas// sangs rgyas

kun gyi zhing rab rgyan// bden pa'i byams dang snying rje yis// rgyal ba'i zhing kun rab tu 'gengs// srid pa'i dra ba kun bcad nas// yang dag ci bzhin bde bar gnas// yongs su dag pa'i zhing spangs nas// rtog pa can gyi

sems can sgrol// rtog pa'i zhing 'dir dam bcas te// ngan 'gro sems can smin par mdzad// yang dag brtan pa'i rtsol ba yis// ring mo zhig nas dka' thub spyad// yun radzes dka' thub spyadad dag/ thos na/

'jigs pa'i sems kyang skye// sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod pa dang// brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab spyad// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang// tshad med nyan thos bsnyen bkur mchod// gzhan yang skye bo/
mang po dag/ bkres skom na 'chi kun las bsgral// so so'i skye bogazhan gyi phyi'i// lus srog ma chagasamad du btang// yang dag dad pa 'tshos tshol phyir// sha dang nus pa 'ang mang du btang//

bdag ga bde ba kun batang nas// skye bo rnams la thugs brtson dgos// so so'i skye bo mang po'i phyir// the tshom dra ba gcod la brtson// dbang bo drug rnams rab bsdams nas// 'dod pa thams cad rang du sbangs// 'dus

byas ma rtag sdug bsngal te// bdag med stong pa nyid du rtogs// sdug bsngal las kun skye ba la// rgyuna'adodachags da pa'o// daphyir dbang po drug pas sngar// 'dod chags yongs su gcad par bya// sems can gnas ba'i/

khams kun tu// rtag par thugs rje chen po gnas// byang chub mchog tu sangs rgyas kyang// sngon gyi smon lam kun mgatong// sems canagang zhig sdug bsngal gyis// rnam par gzir ba dag zags nas// shin tu 'bad/

pa brtson 'grus kyis// de las sgrol phyi'i rab tu brtson// sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus// bsam gtan shes rab kun bsgoms nas// ji ltar man bu gcig la// byams pa'i sems kyi gso ba bzhin// sngonayang

sems can sa kun la// rtag tu byams pa'i thugs bskyed pas// de phyi'i rgyun du sangs rgyas nas// tshad med pa la 'khor rnams sgrol// jatsam byang chub spyod bsgoms la// semasacan don du ma bsngos yod// de bas sems

can thams cad la// bar la phyin pa drug ma gtong// rtag tu dus ngan tha ma tsha/ bla med byang chub bsgrubs pas na// de yang dus ngan tha ma'i tshe// bla med byang chub mngon sa pas rgyas// ngan bar lta ba'i lha klu ma// gnod sbyin

dag kun btul te// the tshom gcod cing bder bkod nga// rdo rje lta bu'i lam la'o// tshadamed pa la skye bo dag/ byang chub mchog tu lung yang ston// mchod 'os 'drenang ba gtsor gyur te// mchog ga bsod nams zhad du

gyur// dpe zla med pa'i bcom ldan 'das// byams pas 'gro ba kun la skyob// tshad med grags pa chen po yas// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten yongs su khyab// dbas bya chub sems dpa' rnams // bdag gi don tu bsgrub

ba'i phyir// kun nas lhan cig 'di'i 'dus nas// thub pa chen po'i spyan sngar lhags// dam pa'i chos rnams thos nas ni// rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes te// lhag bar yang dag brtson bskyed nas// byang chub spyod

lanan tan bgyid// rnam par 'dren pa'i chos kyi mthus// thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya bas// de bas deng 'di'i 'dren khyod kyis// bsdus pa'i 'khor na sngon ma byung// gnod sbyin khri phrag bcu gsum sud//
rtag tu sha za khrag 'thung ba// thams cad sdig pa'i las btang nas// byang chub chen por 'bab cing gzhol// kha cig khyad par gzugs chog dang// bzod pa'i ting nge 'dzin yang thob// khacag zag pa kun
zad nas// 'jig rten mchog gi dgra bcom gyur// kha cag tshad med bzhi bsgoms shing// kha cig bslu ba bzhal gnas// kha cig yang dag rigs bzha thob// kha cig 'thunaba'i bgrod la gnas// kha cig
dba' 'gro'i ting 'dzin thob// kha cig shes rab mag dang ldan// kha cig ma skyi bzod la gnas// de kun 'drenang sa byin gyis brlabs// bcom ldan gzi brjid chen po'i mthus// bdud kyi 'khor rnams bcom/
[>cad rgyal ba'i spyan sngar lhags// nad dang mtshon gyis brlags pa dang
mu ges 'jigs pa'ang dang bdun bcu'i// sems canamadongs shade 'thom ba dang// yang dag 'a nan stor ba bstsal// nyon mongs myosangashang 'khrugs/

nga dag/ thams cad zhi ba'alam la bkod// bdag gis bya ba kun spangs te// lhags nas bcom ldan zhabs la thug/ dpag med ba la zhi rnamasan// bcom ldan da lta'abazhugs pa'i rnams // thams cad khyod la kun

bsngags pas// thos nas thams cad 'di ru lhags// thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgya mtshaya// ya nga dag yon tan tshad ma mchis// sems can mang po'i don mdzad nga// chos pa'i sems kyis phyag 'tshal lo// tshad med

rgyu bsod nams rdzogs bgyis pa sa// bcom ldan zhabs la phyag 'tshal gyur// tshad med bskal pa'i bar duyang// mchod ba mang pos mchod bangashog/ bdag kyang bcom ldan ji bzhin du// de lta bu la yid dam bcas//
rtog pa can gyi 'jig rten 'dir// blamed byang chub thob par shog/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dang ba chen po sa'i sAng bos tshigs su bcad pa dam pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon bar

stodanas/ 'khor dang bcas te gzhan yang lha rdzas kyi bsung dang/ mi tog dang/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyi ri bo che'i rgyan tshad medab snyad kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor nas/ stong gi bar snang la 'a po tshe'i gdug

su gyur te/ dam pa'i chos mnyanaba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ci yang mi smra bar 'dug go/ de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der 'dus pa' 'khor thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa ba sems dpa' chen po sa 'gang
bo mthong nas mtshar rmad du gyur te/ so so'anas rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lha rdzas kyi spos dang/ ma tog dang/ rin po che'i rgyan dang/ nabaza' dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ gdugs la sogs pa

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la mchod pa byas nas bdaskadaces smras so// bdag gas rnyed pa rab tu red do// bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis mngon sum du skyes bu chen po khyod mthong nas

bsti stang dang bcas te mchod pa byas par gyur to zhes smra'o// de nas 'a khor gyi dkyil 'khor de'i nangan byang chub sems dpa' sems dang ba chen po thogs par the tshom 'dri zhes bya ba zhacig 'dug pa las

langasanas/ gos tshags bcos te phrag pa g.yas pa phyung nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo

spyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skadaces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu bde ga nga nas mchis ) gnas pa'i sa sa rgyas kyi zhing de 'danas ji srid cagi na mchis/ yon tan dang dge ba'i rtsa ba ji tsam zhig dang

ldan n/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bstod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bsngags la/ phyi'i dang bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan gyi rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par bstod par gyur/ bdag cag gas sngon ma mthong bas ngo mtshar
dugyuran : bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi ba thong zhig/ skyes buchen po 'di'i yin tan dang dge ba'i rtsa ba jog pa de 'jig

[） ]rten du bcas pa// lha dang mi'i 'khor thams cad kyis rtogs bar nus pa ma yan no// gal te de bzhin gshegs pas skye bu chen po de'i yon tan dang dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyas par bshad na/ 'jayi rten du bcas pa lta dang ma thams
cad mgo rmongs te sad ma ches par 'gyur ro/// de nas byang chub sems dpa' gis par the tsom 'dra bas yang gasol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du gsol// bcom ldan
'dus kyis bka' stsal pa// legs par shin tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang/ ngas khyed la phyogs tsam zhig bshad par bya'o/// 'di ltar skyes bu chen po de'i yon tan gyi khyad por tshad med bsam

gyi mi khyab pa dang ldano// 'di lta ste ) dbab bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyadapar la bde bar gnas pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul yang shani tu rtogs pas 'jug pa'o// ma skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa' khyad

tshe par yang thob pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang du gyur pa'o// thams cad mkhyenang 'a yi shes rgyas la bzod pa thob pa'o// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgyamatsho'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// sang gi rab tu

bsgyings pa'i rgyal mtshanagyi ting nge 'dzin la yang shanatu gnas pa'o// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi ri 'i yang rab tu 'tshogs pa'o// mu stegs can dang ) phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shAtu choms pa ste/ sems can/

thams cad yongs su smani bar bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed pa thams cad du du gnas par byed do// skyes bu chen po de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du gnas te/ gang ting nge 'dzin/

rnams kyisatshad med pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par skyed par gyur pas gdul ba'i sems can tshad med pa dag yongs su snyan pa byedado// skyes bu chen po dra ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te

gal te ye shes mngon bar bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyom par zhugs na/ ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sas rgyas kyi zhing don gnas pa'asims can thams cad ba thun bar ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi spyod yul kun mthong bar

'gyur ro// de ji ltar gnas par bzhan du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang dbazhan du 'gyur te/ gal te dpag tu med pa'i yishes dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ ting nge ba ni de ba na thus

sas rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa sems can thams cad ci nus ba bzhin du/ tshad med pa' na chodapa' yo byad dam pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod par 'gyur ro// ji ltar gnas pa

bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te// gal te rnam par dag pa'i yi shes phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs n/ ting nge 'dzin de'amathus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dgan gnas

pa'i sems can thams cad kyis 'thun par 'dod pa'i spyod yul gyi nyis pa'i skyo tshad med pa mthong nas sems rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te re la

ba dang tshag dang ldan pa 'a yi shes zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs zha/ ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sas rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas ba'i sems can thams cad lhag pa'i 'dzin pa dang/ ngo tshab dang

ldan zhing sdig pa ma dge ba'i chos dang yosasukhral nas/ bsam pamanyenas par 'gyur ro// da lta'aganas ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te theg pa thams cad dang ldan pa gsal ba zhes bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs n/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad thabs mkhas pa 'phrul gyizhig mngon par shes pa dang/ sngon gyi gnas dran pa'i mngon par shes pa dang/

'chi'apho dang/ skye ba mngon par shes pa dang/ 'jig rten bad dang/ bag rten pha rol gyi rgyudang 'bras bu mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ro// daji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur

te/ gal te chu nganamed pa'i mngon par shes pas rig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nga ba yin la snyoms par zhugs n/ ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'asims can thams cad mya nganadang/ ya

tsho mug pa dang/ rmugs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin dus ngas rgyas kyang de bzhi du 'gyur te/ gal te mngon par shes pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i tidi de 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/

sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad thabasam khas pa'i mngon par shes pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te 'jig rten

kun tu snang gzhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs n/ ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mun ng dang bral te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa thams cad kyang phyogs

bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro// dedzaltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhinga rnams kyang dbazhin du 'gyur te/ gal te sangs rgyasakyi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms da)

zhugs na/ ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i si mas can thams cad 'gaba' lta ba yongs su spas nas/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de ji ltar gnas ba bzhinadu

sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te rdo rje 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs n/ ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi ra khor yug dang/ khor yug chen po dang//

rarab lhun po dang dem pa nang 'a'i gzhan dang/ lung pa dang/ lung phran dang/ gcong rong dang/ gsog ma dang/ gyo mo dang/ tshiramadang/ rtswa dang/ shing nganang thams cad ma snang ngo// sas rgyas kyi zhing de na
tshimadungan bar gdags pa dug dang/ byad stems dang/ gcan gzan ma rungs pa dang/ ma 'grog dang/ glo khur dang/ ramisand dang/ yul ngan dang/ nam rgyus pa dang/ rdul dang/ dran dang/ mi gtsang ba'i

nyal nyal thams cad kyang sha zhing med par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sa gzhal nga lag mtha'i bzhin dum nyam zhang bkra shis pa rnam pa sna tshogs rang 'byung ba dang/ rnam par 'gyur ba dang/ phul du 'gyur
ba dang/ ngan par 'gyur ba dang/ mtshan bzang bodunas yongs su brgyan par 'gyur// de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhinganams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te ye shes kyi

pho stobs gdul dka' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs n/ ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa'abadud kyirgyal po 'khor dang bcas te thams cad 'jags skrag nas/ dkonamchog

gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te glog gi 'od zer zhesakhyaba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs n/ ting nga/

'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi 'ang de dag na gnas pa'asims na thams cad 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'jigs pa dang bral zhang/ chos kyis spro bar 'gyur ro// de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing

rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te mchog dam pa'i ro dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa bzhugs n/ ting nga ba na de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa' sems can thams cad bsams nga

bzhan du zas dang skom gyis tshim par 'gyur// de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin dus sa rgyasakyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhinadu 'gyur/ gal te mchog gi mdangs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs n/ ting nga

'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad gang yang lhag pa'i mthu stobs dang ldan pa med de/ nad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs

rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te mchog dam pa'i yo byad ces byang gi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs n/ ting nge 'dzin deb mthug sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can tham sa cad ni

la mos pa bzhin du khri stan dang/ gding ba dang/ gos dang/ rin po che'i rgyan dang/ tsan gyi 'tsho ba'i yo byad dugatogs pa de dag thams cad kyis brel cing phongs pa medade/ radatums pa shAn tu dadu 'ong ba dang

ldan par 'gyur ro// de dziltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te rtsod pa med pa'i yi shes zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ ting nge 'dzin de 'amathus
sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad lus dang sems zo mdog bde zhing yang ba dang/ dgra sdang ba dang 'ab thams cad dang bral ba dang/ 'dum zhing dga' ba dang/ slob dang/
sbyin pa dang/ tshul khrims dang/ badrodapa dang/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang/ sems ma 'khrug pa dang/ shes rab yongs su rdzogs pa la dga' zhing mosar ra 'gyur ro// de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin

du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te phul du gyur pa'i spro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ ting nge 'dzin des thus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa'i

sems can thams cad khyad par can gyi rab tu dga' ba tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te 'jig rtenapalim gyi
0/ @#/ bod ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzi la snyoms par zhugs n/ ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa'i sems can thams rtsod la thogs pa med pa' ye shas thob cing rnam par

dag pa'i las rnam pa sna tshogs sbyong bar 'gyur ro// de ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te ) gal te rgyal ba'i rdordza la shani tuganas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs na/ ting nge 'dzin pa'amathus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad dbang po kun dang ldan zhing/ dbang po ma nyams pa dang/ rtag tu yang dag par 'byung ba byung ba'i lam la mos

shang sems rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te lhag pa'i rgyal mtshan rtog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ ting

nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dgan gnas pa'i sems can thams cad bdag sdug pa ma dag pa'i chos la shanatu skyo zhing ma 'dod pa dang/ thams cad kyang dge ba bsrung ba dang/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi 'a na

tshigyis mtho ris kyi lhar skye bar 'gyur ro// de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te byams pa dang/ sAng rjer ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
na: ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang/ snying rje'i sems dang/ gnod pa 'am 'tshopa med pa'i sems dang/ kun la snyoms
pa' sems dang/ gcig la gcig phan pa dang bad bar byed pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ro// de ltar gnas pa bzhin du gangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te bsod nams thams cad shan tu

sdud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs n/ ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad 'thab pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ nad dang/ mu ge dang yongs su

bral te/ dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang/ char pa dang/ kha ba dang/ tshab dang/ sdug bsngal 'dogs pa'i reg bya'i yul la de du ma 'ong ba thams cad yongs su zhi bar 'gyur ro// de ltar skyes bu chen po de gal ta

rgyamatsho glog 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms nga ra zhugs n/ ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag ga sa chen po thams cad 'an de tsha rnam pa sna tshogs 'thus byas par 'gyur zhing nyes pa'i skyon thams cad/

dang yongs su bral te ! rnam ra sna tshogs kyi nan po che' shing dang/ gos kyi shang dang/ snod kyi shang dang/ rgyan gyi shang dang 3 nyatog gshang dang/ 'bras bu'aTishang dang/ rol mo sna tshogs kyiseshing la sogs

te: 'tsho ba'i yo byad dam pa tshad med pa snyed kyis yongs su brgyan pa ra gyur ro// de bzhin du mdor na rigs kyi bu de ni sems can mang po longs su sman par bya ba'i phyir/ nyin re zhing snga dro'i dus su ting nge 'gang+ga/

kyang g bye ma snyed dag gtang nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug/ ting nge 'dzin de las langasanas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun na gdul ba'i sems can thams cad la ca deng mas 'dul ba bzhin du phan pa
dang bde ba'i don de dang de dag gas yongs su snyan bar byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di ni sngon bskal pa chen po tshad med dpag tu med pa'i bar du rtog pa ldab tsho/ de bzhin gshegs pa me bzhugs//

pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sems can yos su sminapar byed do// phyis ma 'ongs ba'adus su 'jig rten gyi khams la lar gal te mtshon gyis 'jigs pa byung ste/ sems can dag yongs su gdungs bar gyur pa na/ rigs

kyi bu 'di de lta bu dag mthong nas/ snga dro'i dus kyi tsha ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi mthus mtshonaga'i 'jigs pa de dag yongs su btsal nas/ senas can rnams gcig la gcig byams pa'i sems kyis snying brtse bar byed do/

'jig rten gyi khams 'galand kyis 'jigs pa byung ste/ sems can kha 'dag nga na 'gas kyi bu 'di da lta bu dag mthong nas ! snga dro'i dus kyi tshe ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi mthus nad kyis 'jigs pa yongs su bal nas sams/

can rnams rab tu bde ba thob par byed do// 'jig rten gyi khams la lar gal te mu ges 'jigs pa 'byung ste/ sems can kha 'dag pa na rigs kyi bu 'dis de lta bu dag/na tho nas/ snga dro'i dus kyis tsha ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus
mu ge'i 'jigs pa yongs su bcil te/ sems can rnams kha zas kyis tshim par byed do// rigs kyi bu 'dis de ltar tang nga 'dzin mang po'i shugs kyis de lta bu la sogs pa tshad med dpag tumad bsam gyis mi

khyab pa'i phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyis sems can gyi dbugs 'byin to// bges kyi bu 'din de ltar nan tan gyi khyad par tshad med grangs med pa bsam gyis ma khyab pa dang ldan pas/ sems can thams cad la

phan pa dang bde bar byed pa 'i don la rab tu brtson pa'o// sngon 'das pa'i dus na skye bo mang po la phan pa dang/ bde ba dang/ yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshademed pa ba ma/

snyad las zad ma shes ba 'a ya dem chen po bcas te/ snying rje chen po dang ma 'phrogs pa'i brtson 'grus chen po rab tu bskyed do// de ltar snying rje chen po dang ma 'phrogs pa'i brtson 'grus bskyod de/ zadam shes pa'i la dam

bcas pas/ gong nas gong du 'phags ra ba shugs kyis nyin zhag gcig gam/ skad cig thang cig tsam gyis kyang so so'i skye bo tshad med pa bye ba khrag khrig btul te/ sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs las bsgral nas thams cad

ci dang ci 'dod pa de dang de dag gis re ba yongs su rdzogs par byed do// gnas gang dag 'dod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sdug bsngal te/ 'dod pas yongasasu gdungs par gyur pa dag sems rtsa gcig tu ! byang chub sems

dpa' sems dang 'chen po sa'i snying po'amtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsdu stang dang bcas pas mchod pa byas n/ ci dang ci 'dod pa thams cad 'thob cing sdug bsngal dang bral te/ skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du

mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro// gnas gang dganasems can gang bza' ba dang btung bas 'phongs par gyur pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu/ byang chub sems dpa'

sams dpa' chen po sa'i sAng po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas te mchod pa byas na ci dang ci 'dod pa thams cad 'thob cing/ bzub ba dang btung ba dang ldan te/ mtho'os kyi ltar skya ba nas/
mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro// gnas gang dag nasems can gangabago ba 'am/ rin po che'i rgyanam/ nad kyi rkyen smananam/ gding ba 'am/ khri 'am/ 'tsho ba'i yo byad

[j]kyis brel cange 'phongs bar gyur pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu/ byang chub sems dang ba sems dpa' chen po sabasnying bo'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bas stong dang bcas pas mchod pa byas n/ cad ng ca'i dod/

pa redatsang bgo ba dang/ rin po che'i rgyan dang/ nad kyi rkyen sman dang/ gding ba dang/ khri dang/ 'tsho ba'i yo byad thams cad 'byor cing/ skal pa ji lta ba bzhin mtho si kyi lhar skye ba nas/ mya ngan las 'da'

[« ]ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro// gnas gang dag gnasems can gang dag byanas sdug pa dang bral te/ dgra sdang ba dang phrad par gyur pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i

snying bo'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pa sa bstastang dang bcas te mchod ba byas n/byanas sdug pa dang phrad cing/ dgra sdang ba dang bral te skal pa ji lta ba bzhin dumathorasi kyi lhar skye ba nas mya ngan 'as 'dab
ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro// gnas gang dag na sems can gang dag lus dang sems nad dang sdug bsngal mang pos gzir bar gyur pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

sa'i snying po'amtshan nas brjod cing dmags pas bas stong dang bcas pas mchod pa byas na/ de kun lus dang sems bde zhing nad thams cad dang bral te/ skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du mtho si kyi lhar skye ba nas// nu

0 na'as 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro// gnas gang dag na sems can gang 'thab cing rtsod par gyur pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu/ byang chub sems dang 'dims dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshananas
brjod cing dmags ra sa bas stang dang bcas te mchod pa byas na/ zhe 'gras pa'i sems dang bral te/ gcig la gcig dga' ba dang/ bzod ba dang/ gcig la gcig byams pa'i simasakya'i 'gyod cing 'chags pa/

'gyur te/ ska la blta ba bzhani dum tho ris kyi lhar skya banas/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro// gnas gang dag na sems can gang btson du bzung ste/ btson rar bcug gam lcags dang/ khong sprul
dang/ shangag gdos kyis bcinges sam/ yan lag bcangs te sdug bsngal bar gyur pa dag gas sams rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenapo sa'i snying po 'i mtshan nas brjod rung dmags pas bste

stang dang bcas pas mchod pa byas na/ de kun btson ra dang lcags dang/ khong sgril dang lcags sgrog las thar te bag yongs su gyur nas dga' bo dang skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba na//
mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro// gnas gang dag na sems can gang dag btson du bzung nas gzhub 'am/ 'tshog pa 'am/ nal bar ba dang/ gsad pa la thug pa dag gis sems rtse gcig

tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i sAng po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsta stang dang bcas pas mchod pa byas na/ de kun btson du bzung ba dang gzhu btsog pa dang/ nan la bor ba las thams
cad thar ti/ skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye banas/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro// gnas gang dgan sems can gangadag lus dang sems dub pa dang/ mthu

[>stobs dang ma ldan zhing nyam chung ba dag gis sems rtse gcig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa' snying po'i mtshanas brjod cing dgas pas bas stang dang bcas pas mchodang bsan/ de kun lus/

dung sems yang zhing bde ba dang mthu stobs skyes te/ cis 'dul ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi ltar skye ba nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro// gnas gang raganasems canagang dbang po nyams pa dang

tsi tshang bar gyur pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la sang bo'i mtshanas brjodatsang dmigs bas pas stangadang bcas pas mchod pa byas na/ de kun dbang po ma tshang ba med cing

dbang po dang ldan te/ skal ba ngalta ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro// gnas gang dganasems can gang dag smyos shing sems 'khrugs ma/ 'byung po'i gdon

a kyis brlams pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa la snying pob mtshan nas brjod cing dmagos pas bas stang dngabacas te mchod pa byas na/ de kun skyesashang 'khrugs pa dang

bul te/ rab tu bde ba dang skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du mtho risakyi lhar skye ba nas/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro// gnas gang dag na sems can gang dag 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug

'a dang/ khong khro ba dang/ phrag dog dang/ nga rgyal dang/ ngan par lta ba dang/ gnyid dang/ bag med pa dang/ the tsom la sogs pas lus dang sems gdungs te/ ma bde bar gyur pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu byang chub

sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po 'i mtshananas brjod cing dmigs pas bsdu stang dang bcas te mchod pa byas na/ de kun 'dod chags la sogs pa dang bral te/ lus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang/ skal pa

jalta ba bzhin du mtho rasi kyi lhar skye ba nas/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro// gnas gang dag na sems can gang dag mes tshig par gyur pa 'am/ chus khyer ba 'am: rlung gis khyer ba 'am

chab tu lcangang 'ag/ 'ashang ka'am// khang thog nas lhungate/ sanas dngas 8shang ba kham par gyur pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa' snying po'i mitshan nas brjod tsang

dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa byas na/ de kun m bad ba'i bgags dang g.yangs de dag thams cad las sa te/ skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du mthoras kyi lhar skye ba nas/ mya ngana'as 'dab ba'i bar du 'thob
par 'gyur ro// gnas gang dag na sems can gang dag sbrul gdug pa 'am/ gcan zan gdug pas zin tan/ dug rnam pa sna tshogs kyis phog par gyur pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po sa ba snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsta stang dang bcas pas mchod pa byas na/ de kun 'tsho zhi gnod pa thams cad dang bral te/ skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du mtho si kyi lhar skye ba nas/ mya ngan
dalas 'dab pa'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro// gnas gang dgan sems can gang 'byung bo'i gdon gyis btab ste/ rtag pa'i rims dang/ zhag gcig pa dang/ zhag gnyis pa dang/ zhag gsum pa/

dang/ zhag bzhi pa dang/ smos nas lus dang sems 'dar zhing 'khrugs te/ dran pa nyams shing shes pa med par gyur pa dag bas sems rtse gcig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang ba chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod

cing dmags pas bsti stangadang bcas pas mchod pa byas na/ de kun 'jigs pa las rnam par grol te/ lus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang mtho rasi kyi lhar skye ba nas/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro// gnas

gang dag na sems can gang gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ 'byung po dang/ sha za dang// srul po dang/ lus srul po dang/ grul bum dang/ mdangs za ba dang/ de ma yin pa gzhan yang seng ge dang/ stag dang/ spungaka

sogs pa gcan gzan gdug pas nyin pa dang/ sngags dang// byad dang/ g.yul ngor lhags pa dang/ gzhan yang 'jigs par gyur pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis dkragashang rlags taM/ lus dang sems rab tu dngangs pa' gyur nas/

sha bas 'jigs shing 'tsho bar 'dod pa dang/ bde ba tshol zhing sdug bsngal ma 'dod pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang

dang bcas te mchod pa byas na/ de kun 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral te/ lus dang srog la ma dma' ba dang/ skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du mtho si kyi lhar skye ba nas/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro/
ba gnas gang dag na sems can gang mang du thos par 'dod pa 'am/ mos pa dag par 'dod pa 'am/ tshul khrims dag par 'dod pa 'am/ bsam gtan bsgrub par 'dod pa 'am/ mngon par shes pa 'dod pa kham/ shes
rab 'dod pa 'am/ rnam par grol ba 'dod pa 'am/ gzugs dan pa 'dod pa 'am/ sgra sAnd 'dod pa ban/ dri zhim po 'dod pa 'am/ ro zhimi po 'dod pa 'am/ reg bya mchog 'dod pa khan/ khe dang red pa
'dod pa 'am/ grags pa 'dod pa 'am/ bsod nams 'a dod pa 'am/ bzos 'tsho bar 'dod pa 'am/ me tog dang 'bras bu 'dod pa 'am skyed mos tshal 'dod pa 'am/ khri stan 'dod pa 'am/ gdang ba 'dod
pa 'am/ ul rgyu bar 'dod pa 'an/ nor dang 'bru 'dod pa kham/ nad kyi rkyen sman 'dod pa 'am/ khang khyim 'dod pa 'an/ bran khol 'dod pa 'am tshon rtsi 'dod pa kham/ chab 'dod pa 'am/ chu'adod pa
kham le tog 'dod pa 'am/ pasal yab 'dod pa 'am/ rlung bsal ba 'dod ba 'am/ mi 'dod pa 'am/ theg pa 'dod pa 'am/ bu pho dang bu mo 'dod pa ma/ thabs mkhas par 'dod pa las/ bsod nams bya bar
'dod pa 'am/ drobar 'dod pa 'am/ bsal bar 'dod pa 'am/ yid gzhungs par 'dod pa 'am/ dan yan ba 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das ba' don gyi dngos po rnam pa sna tshogs 'dod pa'i phyi/ 'onamod/

shing sdug bsngal gyis gdungs par 'gyur ba dag gis sems rtse gcig chu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenaposab snying po' mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas te mchod pa byas na/ rigs kyi

dbu de'i ting nge 'dzin dam pa'i yon tan dngagabri brjid kyi shugs kyis de dag thams cad sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa dang bral te/ rib thams cad yongs su rdzogs nas/ skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du mtho si/

kyi lha raskye banas/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyuraraM// gnas gang dag na sems can gang dag zhing gshin pa 'am/ zhing ma gshan pa la sa bon btab nas/ gal te nanatan byas kyang rung/ nan tan ma byas kyang/

rung ste/ sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'amtshan nas brjod cing dmags pas bsko stang dang bcas te mchod pa bsan/ rigs kyi bu de'i ting nge 'dzin dam pa'i yon tan dang/
mthu dang/ gzi brjid kyi shugs kyis de dag gis lo tog thams cad legs shing 'bras bu sman cing legs bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di na sngon bskal pa chen po tshad med grangs med

pa'i bar du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med grangs med pa dag la brtson 'grus chen po'i sbyor ba dang/ brtanab 'i yi dam bcas pa'i smon lam gyi nga nga gas sems can yongs su snyan par bya ba'i phyi'i/ rtagayus

chen po thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa dang/ rtagatus bon gyi tshogs thams cad yongs su 'dzicing/ rtag tu sems can thams cad kyi lad bzhane spyod par byed do// bags kyi bu de'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus sachen de 'di las/

skye ba'i rtsa dang/ shing gi rtsa ba dang/ yal ga dang/ myu gu dang/ len dang/ sdongang dang/ 'dab ma dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu la sogs pa thams cad rgyas par skye zhing/ rtsarigang dang/ lo tog la sogs pa'i mi/

tog dang 'bras bu dang snyan cing gung ba dang/ dngar ba dang/ snam pa dang/ drizhis par byed do// gnas gang dag na sems can gang dag 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug la sogs pa drag la rno bas srog gcod pa

dang : ma byin par len pa dang/ 'dodapas leg par g.yem pa dang/ rdzun du smra ba dang/ ngag rtsub por skya ba dang/ phran byed pa dang/ tshig bkyal par smra ba dang/ 'dod chags can dang/ zhe sdang can dang

'ag par lta ba dang/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam mngonadu spyod pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po mtshan nas brjod cing dam gas pas bsta stang dang bcas te

mchod pa byas na/ nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi zhing ma dge ba bcu dang yongs su bral te/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan zhing/ sems can thams cad la byams pa dang/ snying rje ba dang/ phan pa dang/

bad ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur ro// de ltar rigs kyi bu 'dan de lta bu'i yon tan dam pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ mthu dang/ gzi brjid kyi shugs dang/ shin tu brtson pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis skad cig thang

cig tu sangs rgyas kyi shing tshad med grangs med par phun cang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de re rer yang skad cig gis sems can stod du gyur pa tshad med grungs med pa gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed sdug bsngal las bsgral nas

bde ba thob par byas te/ skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro// de ltar rigs kyi bu de ni de lta bu'i yon tan dang 3 smon 'dam brtan pa//
zaka/ @#// dang/ shan tu 'bad pa ba brtson 'grus bsam gyis ma khyab pa dang ldan te/ sems canayongs su sman par bya ba'i yu/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su kha cig la ni tshangs

pa chen po'i rgyal po'i nyes su ston te/ sems can rnams kyis 'dul ba'achos ston to// kha cig la ni dbang phyug chen po'i lta ba'i sa su ston to// kha cig 'a ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi gzhan 'phrul dbang byed gnas

kyi lhag lus su ston to// kha cig la ni 'phrul dgab gnam gyi lha'i lus su ston to// kha cig la ni dga' ldan gaunam gyi lha'i lus su ston to// kha cig la ni rab mtshe ma gnam gyi lha 'alus su ston to// kha cig

la ni sun cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lha'i lus su ston to// kha cig lan rgyal chen bzhi'i lha'i lugs su ston to// kha cig la nasangs rgyas kyi skur ston to// kha cig la na byang chub sems dpa'i lus su ston to//

kha cig la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi lus su ston to// kha cig la na nyan thos kyi lus su ston to// kha cag la na 'khor 'khos sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i lus su ston to// kha cig la ni rgyal rigs kyi lus su ston to// kha cig

la na bram ze'i rigs kyi lus su ston to// kha cig la ni dmangs rigs kyi lus su ston to// khacig la ni rdzi'u rigs kyi lus su ston to// kha cig la na skyes pa'i lus su ston to// kha cig la ni bud med kyi/

lus su ston to// kha cig la ni gzhon nu'i lus su ston to// kha cig la na bu mo'i lus su ston to// kha cig la ni dri khra'i lus su ston to// kha cig la na lham yan gyi lus su ston to// kha cig la ni ma 'am rub cus

su ston to// kha cig la na lto 'phye chenapo' lus su ston to// kha cig ni klub lus su ston to// kha cig la na gnod sbyin gyi lus su ston to// kha cig la na srin po'i lus su ston to// kha cig lan grul bum gyi lus//
su ston to// kha cig la na sha bra' lus su ston to// kha cig lanaya dgas kyi lus su ston to// kha cig la ni sul po'i lus su ston to// kha cig la ni lus srul po'i lus su ston to// kha cig la na gnon

po'i lus su ston to// kha cig la ni seng ge'i lus su ston to// kha cig lan spos kyi ba glang ga lus su ston to// kha cig la ni lta'i lus su ston to// kha cig la na khyu mchog gi lus su ston to// kha cig

la ni gcan gzan sna tshogs kyi lus su ston to// kha cig la nag shan rdza' lus su ston to// kha cig lan sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma'i lus su ston to// kha cig la ni sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can gyi lus

su ston to// de dag la sogs pa tshad med grangs med pa'i rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lus su ston to// skye bo mang po skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston pa'i/ thig ba gsum las phyir mi ldog pab sa la 'dzud do// rigs

kyi bu skyes bu chen po de ni de ltar de lta bu'i bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i yin tan gyi khyad par dang ldan te/ don yon tanamchog tu gyur pa/ phul du gyur pa'i gter yin no// rnam par grol ba'in po chathanas cad 'byud

ba'i 'byung gnas yano// byang chub sems dpa' mang po ba mig yongs su dag pa yin no// mya ngan las 'da' ba'i grong khyer chen por 'gro ba'i ded dpon yin no// de ltar ched du ma byas par gong du rgyas par bshad
pa'i yon tan chen pos chos kyi 'a khor lo chen po rab tu bskor ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi bu gal te 'ga' zhig gis byams pa 'am/ 'jam dpal lam/ kun tu

spyan ras gzigs sam/ kun tu bzang po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dang ba chen po gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyad la/ bskal ba brgya'i bar du sems rtse gcig tu skyabs su song nas/ de dag gi mtshan nas
brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas te mchod cing/ phyag 'tshal ba dang/ 'dod pa re ba' phyir smon lam btab pa bas/ 'ga' zhig gis skad cig thang cig yud tsam sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems

ts+tshA dang 'a bams dang ba chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas mchod pa dang phyag byas n/ ri ba'i smon lam thams cad myur du 'grub cing rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhen/ byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po ga'i snying po 'di sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir/ sems can rnams kyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni/ dang ra na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po cha' gter dang

'dra'o// de ltar skyes bu chen po 'di na sems can yongs su snyan par bya ba'i phyir/ yun ring po nas smon lam chen po shin tu brtan pa dang/ snying rje chen po dang/ shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus bsgoms pa'i phur/
byang chub sems dang 'a kun bas 'phags pa yin pas/ khyed kyis bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod par bya'o/// de nas phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang/
ma/ nyanathos dang/ lha dang/ ma dang/ gnod sbyin dang dri ba la sogs pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'dug pa las lasanas/ mnus su so sonas gser dang/ dngul dang/ ban po chu sna tshogs kyi me tog

dang spos kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dang ba chen po sa'i snying po la mchod pa'i phyir mngon par gtor to// de g.yan pa gzhan yang lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang/ nor bu dang/ nor bu rin po che dang/ mu tig gi 'phreng
ba dang/ mu tig gi se mo do dang/ gser dang/ dngul dang/ rin po che'i 'phreng ba dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba don dang/ gdugs la sogs pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po

la mchod pa'i phyir phul lo// gzhan yang tshad med pa'i lha rdzas kyi rol mo snyan pa dang/ tshigs su bcad pa'i bstod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la pas stong dang
bcas pas mchod pa byas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying pos rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mchod pa'i yo byad de dag slar bcom ldan 'das 'a phul nas tshigs su bcad pa/
'di dag smras so// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin ma rnams dang/ phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa rnams // yon tan chen po 'jig rten gtso la 'bul// mchog mchod pa 'di dag bzhes su gsol// denA
brtan pa'i blo dang rnam dag sems bskyed nas// sems can tshad med pa yi sdug bsngal bcil// rin chen dag ltag kun la bde bar mthong// rdo rdzobazhin du bye
tsami dra ba gcod// snying rjechon po'i blo can brtson 'grus kyis// mchod pa dam pa bcom ldan 'das la 'bul// rgyamatsho'i ye shes sems can sdug bsngal sgrol// 'jigs pa med pas srid
ba'i pha rol phyin/ de nas byang chub sems dba' sems dpa' chen po sa'i stung ba 'dug pa las las nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
'das bdag gis chu bo bzhi las sgrol ba'i bcom ldan 'das kyi nye gnas dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dad/ dge bsnyen dang/ dag bsnyen ma la sogs pa dran pa 'phel ba dang/ bsrung ba'i
dran pa 'phel ba dang/ 'tsho ba 'phel ba dang/ lus bde ba 'phel ba dang/ nad ma mchis pa 'phel ba dang/ gzugs dang stobs 'phel ba dang/ grags pa 'phel ba dang/ 'tsho ba'i
byad 'phel ba dang/ gnyen bshes 'phel ba dang/ slob ma 'phel ba dang/ tshul khrims 'phel ba dang/ mang du thos pa 'phel ba dang/ sbyin ba 'phel ba dang/ ting nge 'dzin 'phel ba dang
badrodo ba 'phel ba dang/ thabs mkhas pa kha la kha dad/ byang chub kyi yan lag dag dang 'phags pa'i bden pa 'phel ba dang/ theg pa chen po yang dag pa'i lam la gzhol ba 'phel ba dang/
blta chos kyi sgron ma 'khel ba dang/ sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba 'ba' ba dad/ byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po 'phel ba dang/ rnam par dkar ba'i chos 'phel pa dang//
khams gsum du grags pa ba phel ba dang/ khams gsum du chos kyi char 'phel ba dang/ sa chen po thams cad kyi'i bro ba 'phel ba dang/ sems can thams cad kyi mdangs dang dag ba'i
las 'phel ba dang/ chos kyi dga' ba dang dge ba'i spyod pa 'phel ba dang/ shes rab kyi 'od 'phel ba dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug 'phel ba dang/ spyan snga ba'aphel ba dang/ dbang
bsu ba 'thob ba dang/ lhag skye ba dang mya ngan las 'da' ba 'phel ba la sogs pa thob ba byed pa nas/ 'di lta ste/ me dang chung ldan pa dang/ bkra shis 'od snang dang/ thos pa
'dzin pa'i po ga sngags chen po dang/ gzungs kyi tshig 'di bdag gis 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chu klung gang+ga'i bye ma snyed la bsnyen bkur bgyis nas gzungs 'di thos te/ gzungs
'dis ni rnam par dkar ba'i chos thams cad 'phel zhing skye ba dang/ sa bon gyi tshogs dang/ rtsa ba dang/ myu gu dngo/ yal ga dang/ sdong po dang/ lo ma dang/ 'dab ma dang/
me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ rishing dang/ lo gog gi bro ba dang bsu 'phel zhing skye ba dang/ char chudang ldan pa dang/ phan par 'gyur ba'i sa deng/ chudang/ me dang/ rlung 'phel nang
skye ba dang/ dga' ba dang/ bde ba 'phel zhing skye ba dang/ rin po chodang mo rdzas 'phel zhing skye ba dang/ mthu stobs 'phel zhing skye ba dang/ 'tsho ba'i yo byad thams
cad 'phel zhing skye bar 'gyur ro// gang gzungs 'dis sa bab skye bas nyon mongs pa'i dag yang yongs su bcom par 'gyur ba'i sngagasal/ 'di lta ste/ tshim b+ho/ tshim b+ho/ tshim
[“]b+ho/ A kAshatshom b+ho/ bka' tshim b+ho/ a ma bra tshim b+ho/ b.ratshim b+ho/ bi tsar tshim b+ho/ ag tshom b+he/ rda rmatshame b+he/ sa de ba tshim b+ho/ sa ti ha la tshim b+ho/ bi ba
kasha ba tshig b+ho/ u pa sha ma tshis b+ho/ na yan tshom b+he/ pradzasam ma na red na mtsham b+ho/ ka na tshame b+ho/ bisha ma ba ra yA tshim b+he/ shAsI ta
lam b+ha tshom b+ho/ gi a d+ha so dram hol/ dam de lam pa/ tsa kA ye/ tsa kA bse la kA li/ yil/ kar b+ha bA ra/ ba rA ti se 'a ba rwa ba/ pa ri tsanA/ ban dA na/ a dAn/ phun
na tsatsatsa/ hile ma le/ a kha ta thA go khe/ thag tIl/ b+hare sgyur/ mi le ma de/ nan te/ kul mi le/ ang ku tsita b+he/ Ar gyi ri/ bar gyi ri/ ku ta sha mam le/
don gyi na gyi/ don gru le/ du hu/ huru/ kul sdomi le/ me rI tome te/ ban d+ha ta/ ha kha mang/ hu/ hopon/ srid pa'i dri ma sbyong ba dge bar gsungs// 'thab rtsod/
ba bskal ba zhi ba' nga dge bar gsungs// mi dag bsam pa spyod ba dge bar gsungs// 'byung ba chen po sbyong ba'ang dgu bar gsungs// na par 'gro ba sbyong ba'ang dge bar gsungs//
sdig pa'i bag chags sbyo ba'ang dag bar gsus// re ba rdzogs bar byed pa'ang dag par gsus// lo tog smin bar byed pa'ang dag bad gsungs// sangs rgyas kun gyis dge ba
gsungs pa 'di// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis byin brlabs pa// dag bar gsus 'dis byang chub sems bab rnams // byin gyis rlob mdzad rjes su yi rang ngo// bcom
ldan 'das de ltar me dang chu dang ldan pa dang/ bkra shis kyi 'od snang ba dang/ thos pa 'dzin ba ra ga sngags chen po gzungs kyi ga 'di ni bdag gis 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/
chu klung gang+ga'i bye ma snyed la bsnyen bkur bgyis pas thos so// gzungs 'di ni rnam par dkar ba'i chos thams cad 'phel zhing skye bar bgyid pa nas/ de bzhin du rgyas pa longs spyod pa yo byad
thams cad kyi bar du 'phel zhing skye bar bgyid do// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzungs 'dis na chu bo ngan las sgrol bar bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyi 'ganas su gyur ba dge slong dang/ dge slong ma
dang [u0f10 ]dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyen mal sogs pa'i dmigs pa 'phel bar bgyid ba nas/ de bzhin du rgyas pa'atshoba'i yo byad thams cad kyi bar du 'phel zhing skyo bar bgyid do// gzus 'di ni bcom
@#/ ldan 'das kyis bags pa'i gsung rab bdud rtsi lta bu yongs su rgyas pa dang/ gun du gnas shing khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du 'gyur ro//
le/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying pos thos pa 'dzin pa'i ri gi sngags chen po dang/ gzus kyi tshig 'di smras pa na/ ri kha la de ba rab dugayos nas/ lha'i rol mo bye ba

khrag khrig kyang ma dgrol bar rang bakhrol te/ lha'i las dang/ me bo dang/ ni po che tshad med pa sna tshogs char bzhin du babs nas/ de'i tsho ba bo'o ma pa thams cad kyang ngo mtshar rmad du gyur to//
de'i tshon la bod kyi dkyil la khod de lha mo bkra shis chen mo dang/ dba' ldan lha mo chen mo dang/ mchod dbyangs lha mo chen mo dang/ brtan pa lha mo chon mo dang/ chu can lha me chen mo dad 'od
chen lha mo chen mo la sogs pa/ lhamo 'byung ba chen po ba'i 'a dbang du gyur pa stong brag bco brgyad bdug pa las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi pes phyag 'tshal te/ thal mo sbyar nas
bsti stang dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// ngo mtshar che'o// bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar cher// bde bar gshags ba bdag cag gis 'byung ba chen po
bzhi dag la dbang sgyur mod kyi/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i thog ma dang/ bar ma dang/ thama'i skye ba dang/ 'gag pa dang/ 'thun pa dang/ mi mthun pa'i phyogs mi 'tshal te/ skyes bu chen pa
tsha ]bden shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa phra ba shin du zab mo thob pas 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i thog ma dad/ bar ma dang/ tha ma'i mtshan nyid dang/ skye ba dang/ 'gag pa dang/ 'thun pa dang/
mi mthun pa'i phyogs la shin du mkhas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ 'gas kyi bu 'dizhi shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa phra ba shin du/
zab mo thab pas/ 'byung ba chen po bzheb thog ma dang/ bar ma dang/ tha ma'i mtshan nyid skye ba dang/ 'gag pa dad/ 'thusha bad/mi mthun pa'i phyogs 'du shin dumakhas so// lha mo 'ad ltar
shes par bya'o// 'di lta ste/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin pa chen yon tan mang po dang ldan pas/ rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs char bzhin du 'bab ste/ sems can mang po la sbyin pa byed/
de/ rigs kyi bu 'di dang de bzhin du byang chub kyi yan lag gi rin po chernam pa sna tshogs char bzhin du 'angebs te/ sems can la sbyin par byed do// 'dilta ste/ rin po che'i glinge ltar rin pa

che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu 'di yang byang chub kyi yan lag gi rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs dang/ 'di lta ste/ lha rdzasakyishing pa ri dza dra la bsung dang me dag gis
mdzes pa bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu 'di yang sasargyas kyi ban po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rab dumadzes so// 'di lta ste/ seng ge'i rgyal po ni ro degs thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non cing mi skrag pa
byabyad/ bzhin du/ gas kyi bu 'di dang sems can thams cad kyis khag tshab ma/ zil gyisazhon pa med do// 'di lta ste/ ji ltar nyim gsal bas 'jig rten gyi mun pa thams
[>cad yongs su sel ba bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu 'di yang sems can thams cad kyi ngan par lta ba'i ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad sel to// 'dil ste/ gnam tha ba'i zla ba ni mtshan mo'i dus su lam stor ba/
sems can thams cad la bde ba'i lam ston to// gar 'gro bar dga' bzhin du phyin par 'gyur ba ltar/ rigs kyi bu 'di yang ma rig pa'i mtshan mo theg pa gsum las 'brog bslad de/ 'khor ba'i 'brog
dgon bar 'khyam pa'i sems can thams cad la theg pa gsum gyis yang dag pa'i lam ston cing/ skal ba dzilta ba bzhin du thabs kyis yang dag par 'byung ba byung ba'i lam la 'god par byed do//
'di lta ste/ sa chen po la ni sa bon gyi tshogs thams cad dang/ rtsingashing dang/ lo go dang/ sa'i khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur ba lta/ gas kyi bu 'di la yang byang chub
kyi yan lag khyad par can gyi chos thams cad rten 'ganasaso// 'di ltaste/ rin po chachen po 'a rab ra 'o rgyal po na shin du brtan nange ma god ma nyams ba bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu 'di sangs rgyas
kyim 'dres pa'i chos thams cad la shin du gnas ngang/ sems can thams cad mi gtong ba'i phyir mi nyams pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la gtong ba'i phyi'i ka yod pa'o// 'di lta ste/
@# ma mkha' la sems can thams cad spyod pa bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu 'di yang sems can thams cad de la longs spyod do// rigs kyi bu 'di ni de ltar yon tan tshad med dpag tu med pa dang ldan no//
deb tsho'akhor mang po rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po yin tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa stod pa shes nas ngo mtshar rmad du gyur te/ bkur sti dang rim gro
byas nas ra ba du dga' bas sems rtse gcig du byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po la mig mi 'dzums par lta'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyi'i tshigs su bcad de
bka' stsal ba/ skyes bu mang dag sa gsung pa ni// yon tan mang po phun sum tshogs par ldan// dge sbyong tshalugs 'dzin cing ston byed pa// ston pa chen pa la ni phyag 'tshal lhags// sems can kun la
bde ba rab tu byin// srid pa gsum gyi sdug gasngal kun las sgrol// tshad med rnam pa sna tshogs char phab nas// ston bachen bal ni mchod pa byed// brgya byi'i drim med par skyes pa des// phyogs bzhi
kun du bltas shing brtags nas su// thalaMm sbyar nas bsti stang rab bcas te// ston pa chen po la ni bsngags shing bstod// bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor mthong ba// nor bu rin po che yi 'od/
zer ltar// sangs rgyas mang po'i zhing kun snang byas te// thams cad gsal bar ma gyur gang yang med// mngon shes drug gis 'jig rten snang bar byed// deng ba dir 'dus shing lhags par 'gyur ba ni//
shin du dpa' ba sa yi snying po ste// rab tu 'byung ba'i spyod lamaman bar ston// 'phags bab bdun 'byung ba'i gde yin te// 'jigs pa med pa'i sangs rgyas no
dbyas// byang chub sems dab 'a mang ba rgyal mtshan de// sems can mang ba 'dren pa'i go bgo/ rnam par grol ba'i don chen 'byung khung ste// brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsod
nams rgya mtsho la ni// byams ba'i blo gros snying dzabartse la mes// sdug bsngal kha ya sams can mang po spel// 'jigs pa bsrung ba'i 'bas dngam khag yin te// nam mkha' dang ba'i zla
klobazhin lam yang ston/ sa ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad skyed// rdo rje ltar na the tsom yongs su gsod// rnam par grol ba'i rin chen kun la gdong// chultar sgrib pa thams cad 'dag par byed/
nyon mongs tshabs gdungs ba'i gdugs su 'gyur// sman pa ltar zhind kun 'tsho bar byed// zhag gcigs yi snying po'i ming brjod pa'i// grags pa chen potso bsod nams thob pa ni// bskal pa bye ba khrag
khrig par du la// blocan gzhan gyi mi nas brjod bas lhag/ so so skye bo grol par byed bzhi// nyon mongs thams cad rnam par 'ching ba la'o// dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin mthar
phyin cing// ting 'dzin gzhan dag gi yang pha rol phyin// rkyen ma btsugasum po yang rnam dag pas/ mang po kun la yo shes nam mkha' bzhin// dang ga dumed pa'i sangs rgyas zhing rnams
kyi skye bo mang po'i chun bu'i tshogs kyang bcom// zhing rnams jibazhin ting 'dzin der 'jug cing// bsam gtan bzhi de la yang rgyan du 'jug/ ting 'dzin du zhugs nas sems can gyi//
nyon mongs pa yi gdung pa rab tu sel// so so'i skye de sngon gyi sdig pa'i las// mtshon dang nad dang mu ges 'jigs pa dang/ rnam pa mod pas 'tsho zhing gsod gyur ba// de dag kun las
rnam par grol bar byed// sems can rtabar len pa'i phung po lnga// sdug bsngal mang pos 'tshashing gdungs gyur pa// sa yi snying pa dal skyabs gsolan// srid pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad
zhi bar 'gyur// sems can sdug bsngal ba kher las rab bskor te/ gcig gis gcig la 'tshe zhing gnod gyur pa// sa yi snying po de la skyabs gsolan// bzod cing byams pa'i sems 'ganas
bar gyis// bcu gsum rkyen gyis rab tu 'jigs skrag cing// tshol ba ni red rkyen gyis sdug ba dag/ sa yi snying bo de la skyabs gsol na// 'jigs pa med la bde bar gnas par 'gyur//
bsod nams byed la mos shing dran pa dang// tshul khrims mang thos shes rab 'dod pa dag/ so yi snying po de la skyabs gsolan// ra babazhin du thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur// yon tan so
sor smos pa'i bzo rtsal dang// sman dang sa bon tshogs la mos pa dag/ sa yi snying po de 'a skyabs gsol na// re ba kun dang ldan zhing rdzogs par 'gyur// le tog rtsi shing legs par 'dod
) bya// ba dang// khye'u dang bu mo ges dang bun khog phyir// sa yi snying po la skyabs gsol na// re ba bzhin du thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur// len tan mang pa kun dang ldan
e pasan// sa chen 'di yang mi gtoda'ab du badzin// de yi rkyen gyis sman dang lo tog rnams // snum zhing 'jam la ro dang ldan par 'gyur// nyon mongs mang po skyob par gyur nas su//
mi dge bcu pa las la mos pa dag/ sa yi snyid bo dal skyabs gsol na// mi dag nyon mongs thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// rnam pa snatshogs kun gyi lus ston cing// skye bo mang po dag la
chos kyang ston// sbyin pa'i yon tan thams cad rab rdzogs pas// sems cad kun la snying rjes brtse bar gyur// gal te bskal pa mang po brgya la bar// de yi yon tan bsngags shing rab bstod kyang/
mthar phyin rdzogs par 'gyur ba shin tu dka'// debs kun gyi bsti stangabacas pas mchod// 'dus pa chen po las/ byang chub sems dba' sa'i snying po 'khor la banub zhes bya ba las gleng gzhi' la' ste/
dang po'o// ka'adus pa chen po las/ byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po 'khor la bcupa zhes bya ba theg ba chen po'i mdo////bam po gnyis pa//
de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen pa sa'i snying po stan lAl nas bla gos phyogs gcig tu byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos gtugs nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i
lha dang sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar ba bdud nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// yon tan tshad med rgya mtsho can// bcom ldan 'das la zhu gsol ba// the tshom nem nur ci
mchis pa// bdag la rgyas par bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu yang dag pa khyod ni chos thams cad ye shes kyis mthong ba la thogs pa med de/ 'on kyang sems can la phan
pa dang bde ba 'dod pa'i phyi/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyad kyisems ras bar bya'o/
de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa sa'i snying pos tshags su bcad de gsol pa/ bdag sngon bskal ba b.rugasum du// spyod pa dka' ba shin tu spyad// sose'o skya ba kun na du//
'jigs pa gsum dang rnyog lnga bsal// sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig la// tshad ma mchis pa'i mchod bgyis pas// bsam pa dag pa'i 'khor 'di dang// tshogs chen 'dus pa'ang sngon byed de//
blo can brtson 'grus rtsol ba dge/ thams cad 'dus shing tshogs 'dir lhags// shin du skyon med 'khor 'di dag/ mthong bar gyur pa ngo mtshar rmad// cisnyadasangs rgyas zhing 'di kun// sdig pas dge
ba nyams bgyis shing// blo can dag gis spangs pa yi// ngan pas spyod kun lhan cig gnas// mtshams med sdig pa bgyid dadang// yang dag dam pa'i chos la skul// 'ashags paskyed cing log lta
bas rtag dang chad pa'i gtsug lag 'chad// sdig pa banu yi las bgyid cing// 'jig rten phyi masami 'jigs pa// theg pa rnam gsum rim sbas shing//
sdig can ngan 'gro dag la gzhol// ma 'bad pas ni bgribs pa'i mgo// 'dod chags phrag dog sgyus 'tsho ba// sangs rgyas 'khor la dpa bskor te// sems can 'di dag sgrol bar mdzad// jiltar
nying mtshams sbyor ba ni// nyon mongs rdo rje lta bu gcad// jilta bu r na gzugs dga' the'o// de bzhin bzod pa'ang nges par 'gyur// bdag gis 'drenapa tshogs chen dag/ mthong bar gyur pa de ni/
che// 'di 'dra'i yon tan kun tshogs pa// phyogs gzhan dag na ma mthong ngo// yon tan ma dkun ldan zhing// byang chub lam la rab brtson pas// jaltar byas pa'i 'khan dag la// sangs
rgyas 'a khag la bskon pa mdzad// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs so'i gas so/ ba/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sngon 'angs pa'i dusan yang chu klung gdub bye ma snyed kyisangs

gargyas dag gi nang na rog pa lta'i tshe/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mukrung gda'i byam steng la sngon 'di lta bu'i don dag zhu ba zhus so// khyod kyis dris pa'i don 'di dag la sngon yang nan tan du byas pas//
shin du rtogs shing khong du chud de// spyod ba mang po phun sum tshogs pa pha rol tu phyin pas shin du thabs mkhas pa'i shes rab dang ldan te/ sems can thams cad yongs su smi'i par bya ba dang/
ca/ phan pa dang bde ba'i don thob par bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad thabs ma las pas/ 'phags pa skyid pa'i gdon sbyin pa la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis/

sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i spyodaba'i khyad par dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su rdzo gas bar bya ba dang/ rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i
rgyal ba spyod pa mi dge ba la gnas pa thams cad na song gsum las bzlog cing mi ltung bar bya ba dang/ zhing 'di'i dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung ni du rgyas shing yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ 'di
lta bu'i don dris pa legs so// shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung zhig dang daso bstan par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de lta bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das la slar nyan to/
[” ]/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snyid pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon gyi smob lam gyi shugs kyis

sangs rgyas kyi 'khor la rnam pa bcu dang ldan te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rtog pa lnga can gyi sems can thams cad rnam par dkar ba'i chos thams cad las phyi'i ldog pa dang 'phags pa'i nim bzhi pa chobadun

gyis brel ba dang/ mkhas pa dag dang ring du gyur ba chad pa dang rtag pa'i dra bas kun nas klogs pa dang/ ngan song du 'gro bshing rta la sbe zhing dga' ba dang/ skye ba phyi ma'i sdug bsngal la 'jigs bar oM/
lta ba dang/ mag pa'i mun nag thibs po la gnas pa la dad pa dang/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rdzogs par byed pa dang/ mtshams med pa lnga byed pa dang/ dam pa'i chos

pho la skur mid btags pa la dbad pA paM/ dge ba'i chos thams cad ring du spong zhing/ mi dge ba'i chos rdzo gas par byed pa'i gnas na bzhugs so// de lta bu b sdug sngal rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i
zhing na bzhugs kyang rab du bde bar bzhugs te/ bag tshab med pa dang/ 'jigs skrag pa med pas drang srong chen po'i gnas su phyin te/ sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/ lha dang bdud dang/
tshubs pa'i mu stegs can log par smra ba thams cad btul nas/ soso'i skye ba thams cad kyi rogs la nyon mongs bzhin du sra ba rdo rje lta bu dag bsal nas/ ci la mos pa bzhin dus sor bkod/
do// mthu dang ldan ba'i sems can dag ni theg pa gsum las phyir mi ldog par yang mdzad do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ yul kha cig du srid med par 'gyur ba na/ de na gnas pa'i mi thams cad
bdag gis dmag dang gzhan gyi dmag gyis yongs su gces shing/ nyon mongs pa dang sdug bsngal bar gyur te/ de na gnas pa'i mi mang po yod mi bde bas 'thab pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ gcig la
gcig snod pa tshad med pa snyed 'byung ste/ brdzun du smra ba dang/ g.yo sgyu dang/ tshig rtsub por smra ba dang/ skur brlang 'debs shing 'khrug pa dang/ dmus long dang/ ling tog can du 'gyur
ba dad/ nad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gzir ba dang/ grang ba dang/ tshaba'i nad ma lus pa dang/ rims rnam pa mang po dad/ skye ba dad/ skem byed dang/ kha zas mi 'ju ba dang/ sems
'khrug cing myos pa dang/ dbad po ma tshang ba de yan lag dang nying la nyams pa dang/ bgo ba dang/ bza' ba dang/ 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'bongs shing brel te/ bdog pa thams cad du

mi 'od pa dang/ skye bo thams cad mu stegs can dang/ 'jig rten gyi lha la skyabs su song zhing lta ba ngan pa dang/ bsam pa ngan pa dang/ mos pa yongs su rgyas te/ yang dag pa'i lam stor nas ngan song du
ltung bar 'gyur ba na/ de'i tshe yul de na gnas pa'i rgan po blo dang ldan zhing yid gzhungs pa mang du thos pa drang dkan pa dag 'dus grosasu bgros te/ yul dang grong gi mi kun bsdus nas/ thams
cad kyis 'thun par rgyal bu gcig btus pa/ sngon sbyin pa rab du byas pa/ tshul khrims shin du bsus pa/ brtson 'grus la brtan pa/ shin du dka' ba spyod pa dang ldan pa/ mchog du gyur pa'i
bsod nams kyi mtshan dang ldan ba/ dbang po yongs su rdzogs shing yan lag ma nyams pa/ lus kyang che chung ran pa/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa/ phul du gyur pa'i mdog dam ba dang ldan/
pa/ thams cad kyis bkur sti dang mo ge byed pa// tshul de na gnas pa'i mi thams cad kyi yid du 'ong zhing lta 'dod pa/ rang bzhin gyis drang ni de brtan pa/ byams pa dang snying rjer ldan pa// mang
byabya// du thos pa rtsal thams cad dang ldan pa// dang des pa'i bzod pas sems rab tu brgyan pa/ btsun mo dam pa'i sras thu bor gyur pa/ spos dam pa rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par
dag pa'i chus lus bkrus nas/ rin po ches brgyan ba'i gos dam pa spos kyis bdugs pa rnam pa sna tshogs gyon cinge/ nor bu rin pa chospyi bo'i gtsug pu la btags pa/ rin po che'i me tog gi 'dzer
bas brgyan pa gser gyi rtsed pan mgo la thogs ba/ rab tu yid la 'jam pa'i don gyis bcings pa/ gzhan yang nor bu rin po chadang/ mu tig dang/ gser dang/ dngul la sogs pa rin po marnam/

pa sna tshogs las byas pa'i rna cha dang/ sa mo do dang/ dpung rgyan dang/ gdu bu la sogs pa thogs ba/ rin po tshornam ba sna tshogs las byas pa'i lham gyis rkang pa bcig pa// rini ba tsharnam pa sna tshogs

zla las byas ba'i gdugs kyis steng ga bla res bres pa/ sngon lha dang drang srong thams cad kyis bsrung zhing 'dzin ba'i khri bshams pa/ brgya byin la sogs pa thams cad kyis bsrung zhing skyob pa/ bzo shin tu

mkhas pas las su byas pa'i gzhal med khang chen par sngon rgyal po snga ma 'dug ba'i khri la bzhag nas rgyal bar bcug go/ rgyal sar zhugs nas lha'i dbang po dang/ klu'i dbang po dang/ gnod sbyin gyi dpang
pa dang/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang/ grul bum gyi dbang pas bsrung zhing 'dzin pa'i dril dang jachen pa brdungs nas/ 'i sgras yul khams kun du grags par gyur to rgyal rigs la sogs pa
0 ]rigs chen po bzhi la gtogs pa'i mi tshad med pa du lus dag par bkrus nas gos gtsang ma gyon te/ lag na rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rini ba che'i gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba 2
dang nor bu rin po chadang/ mu tig dang/ gser dang/ dngu'u dad/ dung dang/ shel dang/ phyi ru dung/ bi zur la sogs pa tshad med pa seng thogs de rgyal po de la phul lo//
gzhan yang rigs mtho zhing btsun pa/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thos pa dang ldan zhing shos ba che ba'i bram ze thams cad kyis kyang tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa dang/ rgyu dang/ dbyangs dam pa
tshad med pa snyed kyis rgyal po do la bstod pa byas so// legs par 'gyur ba rnam pa sna tshogs thob bar gyur cig ces smon lam yang btab bo// bgashis pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rgyal po'i spyi hUM/
gton te// rgyal pa snga ma'i blon pa'i rigs la gtogs pa thos pa dang ldan zhing shes pa che ba/ drang ba/ g.yo med ga 'dzangs pa dag kyang pa'i gis su blon po rim par phye ste bzhug
nas: rgyal bo'i las byed pas sngon yul de na badrag dang gzhan gyi dmag thams cad kyis gtse bar 'gyur ba dang/ phyir rgol ba dang/ grogs pa ngan pa thams cad med par byas nas/
phas rgol ba'i dgra dang gnod pa thams cad zhi bar gyur nas/ nag po'i phyogs thams cad byang zhing rnam par dkar ba'i phyogs thams cad skyes te 'phel bar gyur to// rigs kyi
)bya@#// bu rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po'i 'khor lo gcig dang ldan na/ 'khor lo de'i dbang gis bdag gis rgyal srid rab tu che zhing pas rgol ba'i dgra

ethams cad shin du thul bas tshe yang ring bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du reg pa lta'i 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i sangs rgyas mi bzhugs pa'i tshe/ de na gnas pa'i sems can
thams cad rang gi sems kyi bag la nyal ba'i nyon mos pas yongs su bcis nas/ nang gi dag dang phyi rol gyi dgas rnam par gtses te/ kun nas nyon mongs pas ston mongs nas gti mug gis mdangos te mi bde

bar gyur pas/ rtag dang chad pa la rnam par zhen cing chags pa tshad med pa bskyed nas phan tshun du rtsod cing 'gal bar byed de/ gcig la gcig dbang za zhing skyed pas/ 'dod chags dang/ zhe sngad dang/ gtimug skyed de/

g.yo dang sgyu'i tshul du smra zhing mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rdzogs par byed ba dang/ rnam par zhen cing chags pa'i skye bo dag/ nyon mongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i rnam pa sna tshogs kyi nyon mongs pa'i 'od kyis

gzir ba dang ldan pas yang dag pa'i chos kyi mig mdongs te/ zhe sdang dang/ khong khro bas gdungs shing 'khrugs kyang yang dag par bden pa'i ches cung zad kyang yid la mi byed de/ gang dag pa'i chos kyi

ro yosasu btang nas dge ba byed pa la dbang za zhing skyod do// de ltar bde zhing skyid pa ni brel cing yodas par gyur gyi/ rtag du nyon mongs pa'i dra ba rnam pa mang pas dkris shing sgrugs nas/ mu stegs can gyi sten
0 ga rnam pa drug ba la skyabs su song ste/ 'phags pa'i lam las phyir ldog nyid ngan song gsum la gzhol bar gyur to// deb tshazhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngonasas

rgyas tshad med pa snyed la mchod cing bsnyen bkur byas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi rgya mtshor zhugs pa/ snga ma 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul la gnas pa thams cad 'dus shig tshogs nas nga'i spyan sngan

lhags te tshig 'thun par 'di skad zer ro// khyod sngon 'das pa'i dus na sbyin pa tshad med pa la nan tan byas pa dang/ tshul khrims rab tu bsrung ba dang/ shin du 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus kyis shin du spyad
dka' ba spyad de/ thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bsgoms so// de lta bu'i bsod nams dang/ ye shes kyi tshogs dang/ shes rab dang thabs mkhas pa dang/ snying rje chen po la sogs pas
gos su brgyan pas yon tan chen po'i gter du gyur pa/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang gzungs rnams la rab tu bzod pa/ sa'i yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgya mtshor gyur pa'o//

g.yo dang skya med cing lus byad shin tu ring la/ mtshan dang dpe byad phun sum tshogs par gyur pa dang nges pa'i bzod pa dang ldan zhing shin du mdzes pa'i/ gzhan gyi dring la mi 'brang bas byang chub
kyi lam bsgom par ye shes kyi rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa/ phul du gyur pa'i mdeg mchog dam pa dang ldan par gyur pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ston
ba chen por gyur ba// 'bar bas 'jigs skrag ba'i sems can thams cad kyi dpung gnyen du gyur pa/ byams pa dang snying rje chen po la sogs pa yin don tshad med pas yongs su brgyan
co ma ldan 'das log par dad sel dang/ gser thub dang/ 'od srungs la sogs pa'i sras yang dag ba bskal pa bzang po 'di'i mngon bar 'tshang rgya ba byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi nang na gtso bo

gyur pa// yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs kyi ses can/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong ga yongs su dag pas khrus byas nga khrel ba dang 'dzem pa'i gos gyon pa/ rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyangs gtsug gi nor bu/

thogs pa// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul rgya chen pa'i me tog gi 'brel ba'i nyid pan thogs pa/ rnam par grol ba'i srad pus bcings pa// gzhan yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang/ mi skye
