rtsa ba'i sngag byas pa dang/ brdzun chen pa pas nas rtsa ba'i sdig byas ba ste/ dge slong gang zhig rtsa ba'i sdig rnam pa 'di bzhi las 'ga' zhag byas n/ dge slong gis las bya ba'i nad
du mi chud de/ longs sbyod thams cad dung/ phyogs bzhi'i dag 'dun gyi nor la spyod ngo mi dbang mod kyi/ de la yang dbyig pa dang lcag gis brdeg cing gzhu ba dang/
btson bar gzhug pa dang/ skye nga gsha b.rang/ lus kyi yan lag gdub pa dad [” ]'tsho ba'i dbang po dang bral ba la sogs pa thams cad byed du ma gnang ngo/ du
dag ni rang bzhin gyi sdig gi nang na rtsa ba'i sdig lci ba ste/ mi gnas pa dang mi bya ba zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir de la rtsa ba'i sdig nyes she na/ gang zag gang gis chos rnam pa da ngazhi
khyus nas/ tshe 'phos ma thag tu ngan song du ltud bar 'gyur te/ ngan song du 'gro ba'i rtso ba yin pas na rtsa ba'i sdig ces bya'o// de la ci'i phyir mtshams med pa dad/ mtshams
med kha la nye ba dang/ rtsa ba'i sdig la ma gnas pa dang ma bya dgi panamatho ba chen po'i las nang zhes gsungs zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ lcags kyi thu lum mtsha/ renyi'i
gang bu ni steng gi nam mkha' la bon cung zad kyang mi sdod par/ dem thag du phyir yang sa la ltung ngo// mtshams med pa lnga dang/ mtshams med pa la shu ba dang/ cu ba'i sdig bzhi/
dang/ ma 'chos la skur pa dang/ dkon mchog gsum laze tsom zub dang/ gang zag sdig pa can rnam pa gnyis po yang de dang 'dra ste/ gang zag gang gsi sdig pa rnam pa gcig po de/
'ga' 'azhigang san/ tsha'aphos ma thag tu thogs pamed par mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal bachen por gdonam ze bar skye zhing/ sdug nga sngal chen po myong bar 'gyur te/ de bsan

mi gnas pa dang mi bya pa'i kha na ma thub chen po'i 'os ngan pa zhes bya'o// mi gnas pa dang mi bya ba'i kha na ma tho ba chen po'i sa na pa 'di dag byas pa'i gong brag ni lus 'di nyide la nyon mongs pa zad par byed
mnus su nges te/ ting nge 'dzin yang mi 'grub na/ yang dag ba ga 'gyur ba la zhugs pa thob pa lta ci smos te/ tshe 'phos ma thag shugadon ma bro bar sems can dmyal bar skye zhing/ sdug bsngal
chen po myong bar 'gyur ro// tshangs pa chen po gzhan yang rigs kyi bu bal ) rigs kyi bu mo gang gabasam pa dag pas nga'i bstan pa la dad nas/ nyan thos kyi thig pa 'a zhugs sam/ rang saMs rgyas
kyi theg pa la zhugs sam/ theg pa chen po la zhugs te/ sa bstan pa la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ bstan par rdzogs nas bslab pa'i gnas mang po la ni tu bkur sti dang/
rtsa ba'i sdig pa bzhi bsrungad la shin tu 'thad pa'i brtson 'grus chen po brtsam par bya'o// gang brag de la ni rtag tu lha dang/ mi dang/ mi ma yin pa la sogs pa rjes su 'byung

we zhing srung ste/ de ni lha dang me la sogs pa'i mchod pa mang chud ma za'o// theg pa gsum gang la spro zhing dga' ba pan/ de ma thag tu mtha' gnas byed par 'gyur ro/ de bas na yang dag par mya ngan 29

'da' bar 'dod pa dag lus dang srog ster kyang ba'i/ tshes rnam pa de bzhines par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyi'i zhin/ so so'i skye bo dag na rgya rnam pa 'di gsum gyis mya ngan las 'dul ba'i bde ba thob par
'gyur ba'i phyir ro// gsum gang zhen/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bsten pa'i rgyu dang/ 'bags pas bstan pa la bsten ba'i rgyu dang/ pa'i nye gnas la brten pa'i rgya ge gsum mo// so so'i skye bo dag rgya
rnam pa 'di gsum la bsten te/ brtson 'grus su na tan byas na mya ngan las 'da' ba 'bade ba thob par 'gyur ro// gang zag kang gis chos rnam pa de bzhin nyalasan pa yang de'i ston pa ma yin la/ de yang

nga'i nyan thos ma yin no// gang khrag gang gis chos rnam pa de bzhinesan de ni ngasabastan ba'ishin tu zab pa rgya che ba'i mi rtag pa dang/ sdug bsngalab dang steng pa nyid dang bdag med pa dang ldan pa//
sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du 'gyur bar bstanapa so sor thar pa las 'gal ba'o// gal te ngas bstan pa'i so sor thar pa las 'gal nad ni bsam gtanadad ting nge 'dzin thams cad
'a ldengos shing 'thom par gyurata/ gzhol zhi'ajug ma nus pa dang/ nyon mongs pa dang mdapos dkris shing klags te/ theg pa gsum gyi tshes kyi snodakyang m min bas/nasong du lhung zhing sdug/
bsngal chen po myo ngo bar 'gyug/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gongs bstan pa'i so sor thar ba las rtsa ba bzhim nyams te/ yongs su dganangam ngang ba ston pa yin la/ de yang nganyen thos
mun bas/ gsung gi rjes su 'brang ba/ nga'i ngos 'a bde bar gnas pa/ bya ba thams cad kyi mthar phyin pa yin pas/ gang khrag de ni tshul khrims kyi phung po la shin tu gnas pas na/ dag
ba'i tshes thams cad la legs par gnas pa yin// nyan thos kyi theg pa phun sum tshogs pa la gnas pa yin no// rangs sa rgyas kyi theg pa phun sum tshogs pa la gnas pa yin no/ 'thag pa

chen po phun sum tshogs pa la gnas pa yin no// dpa'i phyir zhen/ gal te rang bzhin gyi sdig pa cu ba rnam pa bzhi po de bsrungasan/ de ni khri pa dang bcas pa dang/ brag pa mang pa'i dge ba'i chos thams

cad kyi rgyu mchog dam pa rnam par gzhag pa yin no// de bas na chos rnam pa 'bazhi srung ba// dag pa'i chos thams cad kyirtsa ba zhes bya'o// 'di lta ste/ sachen po la brten nas rtsingashing dang/ le tog dang/

shing gel ba dang/ nags tshal la sogs pa thams cad skye'o// de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba bzhi po 'di bsrung ba la brten nas/ dge ba'i chos thams cad 'phel zhing skye bar 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste
sa chen po la brten nas ra thamasaud dang/ ri khor yug dang/ ri khor yug chen bo dang/ ri rab kyi rgyal bo la sogs pa thams cad bde bar gnas so// bzhin du khrigs/
kyicul pa'i po bsus pa la brtan nas/ nyan thos kyi theg ba dang/ rangasas rgyas kyi theg pa dang/ bla med pa/'a theg pa chen po bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste// sa chen po la brten na

'jig rten gyi bloba'i mchog thams cad rtsa la gyis rnyed de// de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba bzhi bo bsrung ba la brten/ dran pa dang/ ting nge 'dzani dang/ gzungs dang/ ngad des pa'i ba da nga/
klu 'gags pa lam thams cad dang/ banamedab yang dag pa rdzogs par byang chub kyi bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro/ 'di lta ste/ sachen po ni gtsang ba dang mi gtsang ba thams cad snyoms par 'dzin te//

tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba ni tu srung ba'i rogs kyi bu dang/ rigs kyi bu mo dag kyang de bzhin du chos kyi snod du gyur pa dang/ chos kyi snod du ma gyur pa la sems na ma bar gzhag ste/ de la mi brnyas
mi spyod/ bdagami bsted/ mibasnyems/ bcomi ni/ ga ba'i chos thams cad skye ba'i gonas su 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ sachen po 'di'an sums can thams cad las spyodatsang
bde bar 'tsho'o// de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba bzhin du sruba'i rigs kyi bu dang/ rigs kyi bu mo dag drung zhin gshegs pasakhostan pa yang dag pa'achos shin tu spro ba dang ) mchog
dam pa/lusum pa dag pas semasanyanathams cad labye brag gi 'du shes med par bsdu ba rnam bzhi'i chos kyi so mnyam par bsdus te/ sems canathams cad chos kyi dga' ba la longs spyod cing bad bar/
'tsho bar byed do// de nas tshodang ldan pa ut+pa las/ bcom ldan 'os kyis gsungs pa 'di dag thos nas/ 'dug pa las langs te/ gosatshags btsog pas/ bcom ldan
'das kyis zhabs la spyi bos btugs te/ bla gos phyogs gtsigs tu byas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugasanas thal mo sbyar ba btudad/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
bcom ldan las kyis gsungs pa ltar tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba bzhashinatusrung ba'i rigs kyi bu dang/ rigs kyis bu mo dag chos kyi snod du gyur pa dang/ chos kyi snod du ma gyur pa kun la sems
mnyam par gzhag ste/ ma banas/ ma smad/ bdag mi bstod/ masnyems/ glo bur du nyes pa'i gleng ngo// zhes gsus na/ de ltar na de ma mchis pa'i dusan/ dge slong tshul
khrims nyams shim dgab sbyod pa/ dge sbyongam lags pa dag sbyong du khas che// tshangs par spyod pa ma lags par tshangs par spyod par khas 'che ba dag la/ dag slong ga dege 'dun gyis ji
lta bu'i thabs kyis gleng zhing dgar bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das sa/ tshe dang ldan pa u'al bka' stsal pa// samu stagasacanadang ma pa rnams kyis dge slong gi
[r]@#/ nyes ba gleng nagenang ba'i skabs med do// ga slong gi dag yun gyis kyang tshes bzhi'i ma yin pa dang/ martogs par tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong gnyis ba gleng
ma gnan/ gang ba'am bskyed pa lhan skyes/ sa bzhi ma yin pa dang/ ma rtogs par tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong gis ba glus sam/ gal teb skudan khazhag thoban po'i tsagi pa thob
bo/ u pa la 'di ltar shes par bya ste/ chos bzhinam bzhi pa dang/ ma rtogs pa rnam pa 'ad decus tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong gi nyes pa glen/ nganamasdeba'i sdig pa chen po thob par 'gyur gyis/

mkhas pa dag gis ni de lta mi bya'o// bu gang zhe na/ dga' dunam dad pa rgyal po'i spyan snga ma rtogs bzhin du tshul khrims nyams pa'i deg slongags pa gleng ba dang/ dge 'dunam dad par kun tu rgyu bzhi na du

sgra tshul khrims mas pa'i dge slob nyis pa gleng ba dang/ dge 'dunam dad pa blon po'i mdun du tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong gnyis pa gleng ba dang/ dge 'dunam dad par tshong dpon dang ma bdag gi 'dun du

tshul khrims nyams pa'i deg slong gnyis pa gleng ba dang/ budam mang po'i mdun du tshul khrims nyams pa'i degaslong gnyis pa gleng ba dang/ skyes pamang po'i mdun du tshul khrims nyams pa'i rig slob gnyes pa

gleng ba dang/ rung bar byed pa dang bo'i mdun tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong gnyis pa gleng ba dang/ dge slong dang/ dge slong ma mang po'i mdun du tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong gnyis pa gleng ba dang/ khen

bod pa'i mdun du tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong gzhes pa gleng ba dang/ dgra bo zhi 'gras da rimadun dum rtogs bzhin du tshul khrims nyams pa'i rig slong gnyis pa glengaba'o// 'di dag ni chos ma yin pa dang//

ma rtogs par tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong gi nyes pa glengasan/ gnam the ba'i sdig pa chen po thob par 'gyur ba bcu zhes bya'o// gal te bden yang dag ba la brtan te glesan yang nyes par 'gyur na bden
ba yin pa la brten tagleng ba lta smos te/ kha na ma tho ba'i sdig pa chen po thob par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang som yan pa rnam pa 'di bas tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong gi nyes pa glesan/ khan
ma tho ba chen po'i sdige thob par 'gyur gyis/ mkhas pa dag gis de ltaram bya'o// bcu gang zhen/ mu stegs can dag gis dge slong gi nyes pa gleng ba dang/ tshul brinas chad pa khyim pa dag gas ga
slong gnyis pa gleng ba dang/ dam pa'i chos la skur pa dag gis dge slong gnyis pa gleng ba dang/ 'phags pa rnams la smod pa dag bse bslong ba nyis ba gleng ba dang/ glan bsems 'khrugs pa dag

gis rig slong gi nyes pa gleng ba dang/ nad kyis yongs su gzir ba dag gis dge slong gi nyes pa rlung ba dang/ phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun rung bar byed pa bas dug slong gi nyes pa gleng ba dang/ bza' shadi//
girang srung bdag gis dge slong gnyis pa glang po dang/ dge slong chadapa pag gis dge slong gnyis pa glod ba ste/ chos ma yin pa rnam pa 'dobanus dge slong tshul khrims nyams pa'i nyis pa ngag
khan ma the ba'i sdig pa chen po thob par 'gyur ro// jis ban pa yang dag pa la brten glesan mang nyes bar 'gyur// ban pa ma yin par gleng da lta'i skyes te/ khamago
sa ba'i sdig pa chen po theb par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang u pal gal te dge slong tshul khrims nyams pa dag dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi nang na dge 'dun dang lhan cig gnasanA/ gaslo deban na tshul bzhin
du byed pa spyod lam dang ldan pa/ yon tan lnga phrugs dang ldan pa gcig 'dug pa las las te/ gosatshags chos la bsti stang dang bcas pas dag slong gi dege 'dun gyi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal//
da nas tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong gi mdun du song la nyes pa gleng ngo zhes gsol ba thob cig/ tshodang ldan pa dgongs shig/ bdag dang tshadang ldan pa khyod kyi nyes pa gling// bden
brdzun ma yin pa// dus la bab pa/ dusumu 'ad ba/ 'dzum bzhin du sgrub// mi brlang ba'i tshig gis byams pa'i sems dang/ zhe sdang med pa dang/ na pa dang bde ba'i gnod pas yin pa dang/
dbazhin gshegs pa'i rjes kyi mig dang/ chos kyi sgron ma yun du gnas par bya ba'i phyir gleng bo/ tshodang ldan pa khyod kyi nyes pa bdag gis tshes bzhinaglengang nas gsol ba thob cig/ gang zag des
gleng du gnangan ni chos bzhin du gling bar bya'o// gal te gleng du ma gnang na phyir yang gnas brtan dang/ dag 'dun gyi nang pa la phyag 'tshal te/ bsti stang dang bcas pas 'disad ces gsol cig/ dge
slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba sa nyes pa 'di lta bu zhig bgyis te/ bdag gis chos lnga la bsten te gleng bar 'tshal lo zhes gsol ga/ de nas dge 'dun gyi nanage slong gnas brtan gyis shin tu rtog/
la ngang bas grang ba dang/ nyes pa ni byas pa dang/ banam/ brdzunag/ lci'am/ yang ba brtagasal/ 'dul ba mdo sdel brtan te/ bsdigs pa dang bzho ba'i thabs snatshogs

kyis zhing gleng bcu'o// bdun shin tu zhi bar du babs kyis gang dang gang du 'thun pa de dang de'i chos kyis zhi bar bya'o// gal te nyes pa chen po byas na yang chad pachen bos gcad do// nyis pa 'bring
byas na yang chad pa 'bring gis ba/nadad/ nyes pa chung du byas na yang tshad pa chung ngus gtsadad/ khrel ba dang ngo tshabs nyes pa 'brel du gzhug go/ denas u pa 'dis yang/ bcom ldan
'jug la 'di skad ces gsol to// nyes pa yang dag par byung ba sdug pa bgyis pa 'dige slong dag gal te khyim ba'i mthu las bsnyems sam/ mang du thos pa'i mi bu dang/ sma bshags kyi mthu dang/ slob

ma'im thu la bsnyems te/ mthu rnam pa de lta bu s mdzangesdoms te dge 'dun gyi ngag mi nyan la// dge slong gnas brtan mdo sde dang/ 'dul bdang/ ma mo 'dzin dmatshes bzhin du khastan cingabacos kyang nyan tu mi
btub pa'i dge slong de la jiltarachad pas gcad par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gnas brtan sde snodagasum 'dzin bas/ dge 'dun la da pa dris te rgyal bo dang blon pon po la
mthu rtsa ba'i pho nya thengal/ gdod chos bzhin du chad pas tshod cig/ upa lis yang gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das gal te sdig pa bgyid pa'i dge slong de nor dbyig gi mthu dang/
[“ ]mang du thos pa'i mthu dang/ smra bshags kyi mthu dang/ thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rgyal po dang blon pa yang dga' bar bgyis te/ thams cad tshes ma 'gas pa bgyid ba/ tshul khrims nyams pa'i
dge slong gi grogs bgyid de/ tshul khrims na ba can gi dge slong de dag sdig par nyam ras su bgyid du rtsa lanas/ tshes bzhin du da pas gcad du mu steran/ de'i tshod la dge 'dun gyis ji ltar bgyi
bcom ldan 'das kyis/ u pa la bka' stsal pa// gal te ngag slong du ma gnas/pad mi bya ba la brten te/ dge 'dun gyi nang duganas nas sdig pa chen po mngon sum dum snangan de'i tshodage 'dun gyis skad

cig gzhag go/ gal te dge slong de mi gnas pa dang ma bya ba'i sdig pa chen po mngon sum du snang bzhin du/ dge 'dun gyi nang na gnas na/ de'i tshe dge 'dun dag dang pa dris te/ tshes bzhin du bslad de

sangs rgyas kyi tshesalas phyir dbyung ngo// u pa la 'di lta ste/ nas kyi zhing gnang nas la gnod pa skyes pa yang myu gu dang/ sdong bu dang/ tshigs nas dang 'dra'ang nas khrang po b.rabyed de/ nas la gnod

pa de snyen ma byung ba na// nas kyi bdag pos skad cig 'jog ge/ snyem byung ma thag dun nas kyi bdag pos nas nas bzung po skye bar byed do snyam bsams nas rtsal thon du phyung ste zhing de'i phyi rol du 'dor ro
deb ni dag gnas pa'i bya ba'i dag slong tshul khrims nyams pa de khyim pa dang mthunamabamang po snyanas te/ gu'adun gyin na gnas ba spyod lam dang/ ma lugs dang/ dge 'dunang/ 'drang
dga' rnam par dag pa skye bar byad/ srung ma'i lhasam glas kyi b.radudaga'adon gyin naganas te sdig pa chen po mngon sum dumi snangan/ nga tsho dge 'dun gyis skad cig zhog cig/ gal telha srung

mas kyang ba skul la// dge 'dun gyisanang na nyes pa chen po yang mngon sum du snang bar gyuran/ batshadage 'dun dad pa sa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir skyod suge dgu pa la 'di lta ste/ rgya na
dang ro zhaga'anabar mi 'jog go/ dang zhin dung ban thos kyi dge 'dun gyi slob ma yang tshul khrims nyams pa/ sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong red 'dug dang lhan cig ma 'grogs so// u pa
'as yang gsol da// bcom ldan 'das gal te tshul khrims nyams pa/ sdig pa byed pa'i dge slong de dga' n dud pa dris dbargyadakyang/ nor zhi tsho'i mthu dang ) mang du thos pa 'am dang/ sna ba shag/

kyi mthu dang/ thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rgyal po dang blon po chen po dga' bar bgyis te/ thams cad tshul khrims dran pa can gyi grogs su gyur na/ mthu chenas nan gyis lhan cig tu gzhags/ tshul khri/
nyams pa'i dge slong dang/ dga' nalhan cig tu gnasan deb tshodag 'dun gyis 'dzarab gyi/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i tsho dge 'dun gyi nangan 'dzom pa dang nga tsho bar ldan pa dang
bya@#// tshul khrims dang ldan pa'adeg slong dag tshul khrims bsrung ba'i phyir/ tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong de la zhe sdang mi skyed pa dang/ rgyal po dang blon po chen po la gnod pa ma
phepe gyur par gsol ba thob ste/ gnas de spong la gnas gzhan du song zhig// 'as pa chen po las byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying bo 'khor la bcu pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen
po'i mdo bam bo bzhi pa// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sagus dada' chen po sa'i snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/tshudapabcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing
rtog palngacangabazhin gshegs pa mi bzhugs pa na/ de'i tsho de na gnas pa'i sems la dganyonamos pas ga re te/ ma dag ba spyod cing gyen pa'i rang bzhin du gyur nas/ ani tu gdul dka' ba rgyal
zla rigs gdol pa canadang/ blon po gidel pa canadang/ khyim bdag gdol pa na dang/ tshong dbon gdol pa dang/ bram thagade'o ba can de dag la sogs pa gaba'i rtsa ba chung ba/ dad pa'i sems
mkhas pa/ gso dang skyes 'ab/ glen pa dag ngashes pa bsten sashang/ 'jig rten phyi ma'i sdug bsngalagyi 'bras bus ma 'jigs pa dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen slong ba/ mtshams med ba'i
sems can dmyal ba la 'dzugazhung 'bab pa de dag khe dngared pa'i phyi'i tshul khrims nyams pa sdig pa baspyod pa'i dge slong dang bstan cing/ chosam yin pa'i grogs su gyur nas/ thams cad gnam babakag
med pasems tunakya'ab la 'jug rung 'bab pa'i gnas de gdubadagamachis/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sa ga can de dag la phan pa dang/ bde ba dang/ dbugs dbyung ba'i slad du na med pa'i
bdag bdud rtsi lta bu'i dam partsis thabs kyis bstan cing drangs te/ dal spyod dugazhug pa dang/ rgyal gsagadol pa can nas/ bram ze gdol pa can gyi bar du mtshams medaba'i sems can dmyal bar ltung
ba las rnam par bzlog par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po 'a'adi skad ces bka'asul to// rigs kyi bu khyod phyi ma ma 'od
pa 'i sa na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sems can dag nyon mos pas yongs su gdungs nas/ sdig pa spyodacing byis ba gti mug can gdul dka' bar gyur pa gang/ rgyal rigs gdol pa can dang/ blon
bgadol pa can dang/ khyim bdagagadol pa can dang/ tshong dpon gdong ba can dang/ dge sbyong gal pa can dang/ bram bre gdol pa can la sogs pa dge ba'i rtse ba chung ba/ dad pa 'i sems med pa gso dang
sa 'tshob/ gtinug can/ shes pa sems pa can/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen sbyob/ phreng ba'i tshig bden pa med ba/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bstan pa las 'jug pa dang b.rasashing dbang wa

[I]tho tshig ldan pas rnam par thang ba/ dam pa'i chos la the tshom za zhing log par lta ba/ 'jig rten phyi ma'i sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu la mi 'jigs ba/ rtag tu ngang tshul ngan pa can dag dang snyan par dga'
[@]/ khu/ srog gcod pa nas log par lta ba'i bar du spyod la dga' zhing/ g.yo dang sgyus 'jig rten pa skub dang/ bdag dang gzhan la gnod pa byed ba'i rgyal rigs gdol pa can nas

pa bram ze gdog ha gyi bar du nga'i sa 'jigs par byedapa/ nga'i bstan pa la rab du byungan ma tshul khrims nyams shing/ 'jig rten gyi khe dub dzi'i las byed la sreb la rgyal rigs dang/ bram ze la sog/

pas bsti stang dang de nus pas mchod pa dang/ kho la brkam pas nor tshol ba'i phyir tshig tsam du smra zhing/ spyod pa dang ma ldan pa// phan tshun du phyin cing yi ge skyel ba la dga' ba dang/ tshong dang khe
tshu spogs byad cing/ 'jis rten rgyang 'phan pa'i gtsug lag slob pa dang/ zhing sloba'i las la dga' ba dang/ nor rin po chab sogs shinge phyed pa dang/ khang khyim dang/ ngam dang/ bu smad srung ba
dang/ 'jig rten gyi sngags dang phyag rgyas 'byung po 'khel ba dang/ ltas bzang ngan lta ba dang/ sman sbyar cing nad gsos pa'i nor gyi sa 'tshob dang/ bza' ba dang/ btung ba dang/ bgo ba dang/ ni
! bo'i rgyan la chags shing/ khyim pa'i 'khyid pa la dga' ba dang/ tshul khrims 'dral zhing sdig pa spyod pa dang/ dungugs la khyi'i spyod pa dang ldan// dge sbyong ma yin par dge sbyong du khas 'che
ba dang/ tshas ba spyod pag yin patshangs par spyod pa ba'ang yod/rgyal rigagadong pa canas bram zeg rtog dmachibar du de dge la bas na bkur byed cing/ ste bstang dang bas pasamachod byed de

0/de dgug ga kyang nyanato// tshul khrims nyams pa de dag kyang rgyal rigs ga dol pa nyananas/ bram ze gdol pa na gyi bar du de dag la bsten par dag la zhing/ bkur sti dang rim gro byed de/ de'i bstan to//

gal te gang zag 'ga' zhig nga'i snyan pa larab tu byung nas/ tshul khrims dang yon tan duldan pa slob pa dang mi slob pa lan nabyed panas/ 'bras bu mthar phyin gyi bar tugyural/ rgyal rigs gdol pa can/
nas blam 'og la ba can gyi bar du de dag gsodi la phrag dog byedade/ bsnyen bkur dang/ ba stangadang/ rim gro dang/ mchod pa mi byedatsa/ sarag nyan par yang makhyid do/ rigs
kyi bu 'di lta ste ( la la zhig ni pom klong du phyin pa las/ rin bo in+d+rinAl nga/ mahAnI la dang/ gsar dang/ dngul dang/ mu tig dang/ pad+ma dwagadang/ banadang/ rin thang med pa'i rin po che
rnam pa sna tshogs ber sa/ nor bumaching du lan ba ltar/ dbazhin du ma 'os ba'i dus// sas rgyas kyi zhing 'di rgyal rigs gal pa canas/ bram khre ga la pa can gyi bar du'ang de dang 'dra ste

sabastan pa'adzem pa'i chos kyi rin po che'i gling du phyin nas/ tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa/ nadam pa la dga' ba/ 'dzom pa dang ngo tshangar ldan b/ slob pa dang sa slog pa bong khrag dang/ phalo
dun pa drug la nan tan byed pa la brtson pas 'o skye'o dag pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa/ 'bags pa ba la bar spangs nas tshul khrims nyams pa/ sdig pa mang bo spyod ba/ ngotshabamed pa dang 'dzin pa
bya/ med pa// tshig bablang zhing cu ba pa/ lus dang sems nga rgyal gyis dregs pa// rnam par dkar ba'akhyog dang bral ba/ byams ba'i semasamed pa// snying med pa// sdig

a pa'i dge slong dag la nga sod nams kyi zhing du 'dzadi nying bkur sti dang/ rim gro dad/ mchod pa byed de/ de'i ngag nyan to// de ltar sdig pa na de dag ni slob dpon dang slob mar bcas te// gdonami khro ba mtshal
med pa'isi nas can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kya bu sdug pa'i 'khor lo rnam pa ba yod de/ ma 'os pa'i dus na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'diri rgyal rigs ga dol ba dang/ rje'u rigs gdol pa
na dang/ khyim pa dag gdel pa tsan dang/ tshong dbon gdol pa can dang/ ge sbyong gdol pa can dang/ bram ze gdol pa na dag sdig pa'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu po las ka' zhage dang ldan nam/ gal te/
kun dang ldan n/ sngon bsags pa'i deg pa'i ma da thams cad kyang tshig ste thal ba bzhin du 'gyur la/ ris bo ma thogs par lus kyi don lag kyang dum bur 'chad pa dang/ nyin mtshan dumar lce ldib nyi
sna'i nus pa dang/ mi bzad pa'i sdug bsngal chen po myong ba dang/ tsha'athos nas kyang gdon mi za bar mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur ro// bcugang zhe na/
'di lta ste/ de ltar tshul khrims nyams pa sdig pa spyod pa 'i dege slong dag gis kha bar lta bzhi/ rgyal rigs dang/ bon po la sogs pas bzedal/ sar de bas mthar gnas pa'i dge slong yongs su dag

pa'athon de la 'di skad zer ro// kye skyes bu dag 'di ltar dge slong 'di de ni glen pagatamugan tshul tshes shing 'jig rten slu ba yin te/ kha zas dang/ btung ba dang/ bgob dang/ khe dang/ rlud pa dang/
grags pa 'ded pa'i phyir bdagan bestod/ gzhan smod dang phrag dog gis dkrugasam byed do// khe dang grags pa la skyo zhing tsheg mingashes pa yin pas bslad par 'os pa dngag gi tshig kya a na par u'o/
dge slong de dag ni brdzun 'ba' zhig sna zhing/ bden pa'i rjes dang dra la bas 'bras bu thob pa yang med/ 'dod pa dang bral zhing brag dgongs su zad pa yang lanel/ kho dang/ grags pa dang/ mchod
pa tsam 'dod pa'i phyir/ bsamathar gnas shing yon tan na du ston pa dag la mchod pa dang/ bsnyen bkur dang/ bste stangs byed le// da ni g.yo dang sgyus 'tshob yin gyi/ bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag
ba 'am/ lam la nan tan byed pa ni ma yin zhes skur to// denas rgyal gyis gdol pa cunas/ bram bregadol pa can gyi b.radu thams cad kyis bas mthar gnas pa'i dag slong 'os
su dag pa la du ba'i semasam/ dkon pa'i 'du shes mi 'byungaste 3 bstastong bya ba'i sems med do// de lamachod pa dang bsnyen bkur byed pa la mi mos shing/ ji skad du bstan kyang de'i tshig me to
de 'banas shing smod do/ de ltarabs mthar gnas pa'i dge slong yis su dag pa la bsashing smod pa nyid/ tshesalamigi dang/ komchog gsum gyi gdung la brnyas shing smod pa yin pas
0/ @#// de'i tshe yul de na ba/sa pa lho dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ lha la sogs pa dkon mchogagasum la bsam pa dag pa dud pa mi byed pa dag/ rgyalarigs gdol pa
e nas bram rje gdo'i da nyan gyi bar du gdol pa na de dag thams cad la khros te/ zhesdangag sems skyesanas (gcig la gcig 'di skad zer ro// kye skyes bu dag ltas ! rgyal rigs gdol pa nag
rje'u rigs dang/ khyim bdag dang/ tshong dpon dang/ gasbyong dang/ bram za ba/dol pa can 'di dag chos kyi mige dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung 'tshob ba thams cad ' bas shing dab brngas sa

ts+tso dge ba'i rtsa ba yang gdang ra byas ta/ mi dgaba'i doshes gnyen gyi debudad gyur bas sdig pa 'a las kyis na song du ltung bar 'gyur gyis/ bdag cag ded na chad de dag giskyobs bya// rgyu la rigs
gdol pan la sogs pa de dag gnas dang/ yul dang/ grong khyer dang/ srid kyang mi srung ngo zhus zer te/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod spyin dang/ lhal sogs pa thams cad de dag 'amaskyid

spyi ma 'ge ste 3 5la bar gtong ngo// debasan rgyal rigs gdol pa can la sogs pa la dang grong khyeranaganasapa' de dag ba'i chos kyi snod du 'gyurab dang/ yang dag pa bsod namakyi zhing du 'gyur ba thams cad lu ma/
de nas byung ste 'do/ ji ltar 'dug ba yig yodanama'i dodong gtong ba'i bsam pa skyes pas bskyabang bsrung ba sems med de// de ltar lha dang/ klu dang/ gnadasbyin dang ! lha lasogs pa dang
05'dag par chos kyi snod gyur pa dang/ bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur thams cad kyis rgyal sag la panadang/ 'i sridang/ lul dang grong khyeramakhasrung zhing bskyab pa'i sems med de/ bsrung

zhing bskyab pa'i semasamad bas/ 'tshon su la de'i gde la nang gi budang/ phyi'i graganyisikastong ste/ srid 'breg pa'aphyi'i gag la gzhi 'dzazhing gsod pa dang/ nad dang/ tshul la sogs pa yang de ni/
dbang gis 'byung// de nas rgyalags g dol pan nas/ gasbyong dang bram 'agalo pa can gyi bar du gal pa can dadag thumasamadang/ chul na gnas paN+Dams cad kyang dga' zhing
ba'i sems med/ sngon gyi yid du go ba dang sdug pams cad dang yung khra 'khas/ gnyen bshes dang/ mdza' bo dang/ grogs kyang gcig gis gcig yod phyung zhing phran 'dod pa dang/ byams

kha dang snying rjemed de/ phrag dog dang ser sna byad cing sdig pamang gos byed par 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ grogagacod panas nabar ltaba'i bar du kun spyodacing ngo tshabo dang 'dzam ba med par 'jig rten gyi nor
dang dge 'dun gyi galaspyodatsathab la 'gyod pa'i semasamed do// rgyal rigs gdol pa na demadzas shing drang po lan sdangal/ gcamasgyunyan lani doga' bas blon dang mas gcig la gcig gnod/
ba byedacing/ 'khon dngasha gnyeganas 'thab cing rtsod pa dang/ lo bo'i dgra dang g.yu la spyod na yang 'og ma sems simathunapa'aphying g.yulo yang nyes par 'gyuyo// rgya riges gdol pacan dang
zho po dang/ khyim bgadang/ tshong dpon dang/ dge sbyong dang/ bram ze la sogs pa gdol pa can de dag thams cad ring pom thogs par lus kyi yan lag nyanas shang/ nyin man/
dmar lce lhugs par 'gyur ba dang/ shAni dum ba dpa' ni ba dang tshaba'asdug bsngal chen po myong ba dang 'chi'athos nas kyang gdonami za bar mtshams med pa' sems nadamyal bar lhung ngo// rigs kyi bu
gzhan yang rgyal rigs godol pa na dang/ blon bo dang/ khyim bdag dang/ tshong dpon dang/ dge sbyong dang/ bram bre la sogs ba'i gdol pa can sdig pa'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su snyedub dag
sa pa'i ma brlung ba/ g.yo dang skyas 'de/ gyenapa btumug can shes pa sems pa// dkon tshig gsum la bsam pa dag pa'i sems med pa// 'jig rten phyi ma'i sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu la
'jigs pa mi lta ba dag/ de la kho sun nyen byes kyi breg ba la chung thad dad kyang yang dag par glen pa'i reng bzhin can du gyur pas 'jisnyam du dag las shes shing mkhas pa med snyam nas/

pa[/]ngas bstan pa'i re sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i tshes dang/ theg pa chen po'i chos la brnyas smod de 'phya zhing sku nas/ sems can gzhan dag kyang tshigs su bcad pa tsam gyi bar du'achang zhing 'dzin pa dang/ glog cing

don du langs ster ro// de la kha cig ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la dad pa cung zad thob kyang/ dang dag par gyen ba'i rang bzhin can du gyur pas/ 'disnyam du bdagalas shes shing mkhas pa med do snyam
nas sa bstan pa'i nyen thos kyi theg pa'i chos dang/ theg pa chen po'i ris la brnyas smod de 'azhing skuldan s/ sems can gzhan dag tshigs su gcad pa gcig tsam kyang radu 'chang ma/ 'dzin dag/

klog gam/ 'an du nang ma ster ro// de la kha cig ni theg pa chen po'i chos la dad pa cung khyadatsam thob myong/ yang dag ba glen ba'i rang bzhin can du gyur pas/ 'di snyam du bdag las shes shing mkhas pa

med do snyam nas/ sa bstan pa'i nyin rjes kyi thig babs dang/ rangasas rgyas kyi theg pa'atshos la brnyas smod de 'bru zhing skuranas/ sems can gzhan dag gos su bcad ng gcigatsa[&]gyi bar du yang 'chad
ning 'dzini ta// klog 'don du yang mi ster ro// gang zag de dag sangs rgyas kyi dam pa'i chos 'kharas skur pa dang/ sa gsum gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'as la dbang za ba dang/ dus gsum gyi

sas rgyas kyi chos kyi sdesnod thams cad bshisog nas bsregs te thal ba bzhin du 'jig par byedab/ 'phags pa'i lam gyi gan lag brgyadang thamasacad pa/ tshadached pa'isims can gyi chos kyi mig 'ojar bzhes

bya'og rgyal rigs gdol pa canas/ dge sbyong dang bram ze gdol pa can gyi bar du de dag gis ( sangs rgyasakyis bstan pa'i nyan thos kyi theg pa 3tshes dang/ rangasas rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos dang/ theg pa

chen po'i chos bcangs te bar chad byas nas tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam gyi bar du med par byas na/ gang zag de ni chos kyi tshig dang dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung 'tshob pa thams cad la ma gus pa ste/ de'i rgyu dang/
bya@#// de'i rkyen gyis yul de srung ba'i lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ lha la sogs pa dkonamchog gsum la bsam pa dag cing dad ba ma byed pa dag/ rgyalagis gdel pa cananas/ bram

ze gdol pa can gyi bar du gdol pa can de dag thams cad la khro zhing zhe sdang gi sems skye ba nas/ gzhung de bzhin durgyas par rgyal riges gdol bcanadang/ glen pa dang/ mi bdag dang/ tshong dpon dang/ ge sbyong dang

bram ze la sogs pa gdol pa can thams cad rang ngo mi thogs par lus kyi yan lag nyams shing mtshan du mar lce lkugs par 'gyur ba dang/ shin dum bzadapa' ni ba dang tsho ba'i sdug bsngal chenapo myong ba dang/

'chi'i phos nas kyang gdon mi khro bar mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por ltungabo/ gas kyi bu gzhan yang rgyal rigs gangol ba canadang/ blon po dang/ khyim bdag dang/ tshong dpon dang/ dag spyod

dang bram ze la sogs pa'i gdol pa can rnams tshul khrims nyams pa sdig pa spyod pa'i dege slong gi rjes su zhugs pa nas/ gzhung de bzhin du rgyas par yul de'i snod du gyur pa yang dag pa'i bsod namasakyi zhing
pagyur pa thams cad rgyal rigs gdol pa na la sogs pa la srongaba'i sems skyed de/ bskyab pa'aa/ bsrung ba ma byed do// brgya la yul de na gnas su bas kyang chos la rten gyi/ khyim pa 'daga'
zhing gnas par mi byed pa dang/ sbyin badagagi khyim du yang dang yang du 'gro bar ma byed pa dang gal taskad cig tsam yin yang tshig srung zhig ba dang/ ji ste sna na yang brdzun gyi bag byedad//

khyim pa'am rkun du tshul khrims nyams pa dag la 'thu ba 'am bas par mi byed pa dang/ tshul khrims nyams ba sdug pa spyod pa'i dge slong de dag gi nyis pa mi brjod cing mi gleng ba dang/ rtag tu bsod nams kyi

zhing la bsten gyi so/ tshul nas nyams da dos su spong// tshul khrims nyams pa sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong de dag ni phyi'i tshul khrims srung// dge ba'i yon tan dang ldan pa dag la bro ba dang zhe sdang

gi sems bskyed de brnyas sodapa dang/ rgyal rigasagadol pa can dang/ sbyong du bram bre gdol pa can gyi bar du khyim pa 'dres pa dang bud med kyimadun du gcam pa dang/ sgyu sna tshogs kyis brdzun khreng
tshul khrims srung ba de dag la 'phya zhing skur pa dang/ tshags na pa sna tshegs 'degs te/ rgyal rigs gdol pa nyan nas/ bram ze gdol pa nun gyi bar du de dag thams cad nga'i slob ma 'a dodapa nyung

zhi chog shes pa/ tshul khrims srung ba/ mang du thos pa/ spobs pa dang ldan pa'i rig slongal zhe sdang ba dang gro ba'i sems khaskyed cing/ ga rtsub parnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'phya zhing skur du bcuganas/
lus dang sems mi bde bar byed do// gzhan yang ches shes dang/ lhung bzed dang/ 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyang 'phrog tu bcug nas 'tsho bas brel bar byed do// gzhan yang phyogs bzhi'i thog 'dun
tshanir 'brog tu bcug pas spyod du ma ster ba dang/ la'ani btson rar bcug nas lcags dang/ khong sgrol dang/ shig gdes 'gogs pa nanal bor re// la' lus kyi yan lag gang
la la mgo gcod du bcug go/ rigs kyi bu khyod ltos gi de ltar rgyal rigs gdol pa nyanas/ dge sbyong dang bram ze gdol pa'i bar dugadol ba na de dag tshul khrims
e tams pa/ sdus pa spyod pa'i dog slong bstan nas/ de lta bu'i kha na ma tho ba chen po'i sdig pa sna tshogs byed de// mtshamasamed pa'isigs can dmyal ba'i 'du ltung bar 'gyur ro// sems can gang gis
mtshamasamudapa lnga byas sam/ tshul khrims kyi tsapagabashig gam/ mtshams med pa la nyiba'i sdig byas sam/ rangabazhin gyi sdigagag/ bcas pa sngog gdu byas pa ni/ rgyal rigs ga del dan
sa/ ge sbyong dang bram ze ga la pa can gyi bar du tshul khrims nyams pa chos las 'gal bar byed pa la brten pa sa sdig pa yang de 'gas kyi du de lta tshul khrims nyams pa sdig pa spyod pa'i rig slong

gde ltar chos las 'gal ba'i sog pa chen po byas mod kyi/ 'on kyang nga'i bstan pa la gnas shing/ skra dang kha spu bregs te dur smrig bgos nas/ spyod lam dang cha 'gas 'phags pa rnams dang 'thun te/ dal
rgyal po dang/ blon pochen pa dang/ khyim pa rnams kyis khyim pa'i sa nyid dngayang sbyo dum gnangan/ gzhub dang/ 'tshog pa dang/ nan la bor ba dang/ btson rar gzhug pa dang/ gshazhing spyob
dang/ lus kyi yan lagagatub pa dang/ 'ba'i dbang po dang phral ba/ chos ma yin pa byed pa lta ci sa/rgyal po 'am/ blon bo 'am/ khyim pa rnams kyis gal te de ltar byas na bsam blo ba'i sdig
za pachen po thob par 'gyur te/ gdonami za bar mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal bar skye'o// de ltar tshul khrims nyams pa spyod pa'i dge slong la yang chud pas gtse dus na'/ tshul khrims dang ldan

pa dge ba spyod pa la ltatsosmos/ rigs kyi bu dge slongagang gis tshul khrims kyi rtse ba sdig las gagatams ba yang tshul khrims nyams shirje sdig pa spyod pa'i deg slong zhes byamod kyi/ bstan pa bzhi du dad pa/

dag 'dazhagyiso las byas pa'i sdim pa rgyun chad pa yod do// bsang ba dang/ tshul khrims kyi bar du btang yang rnam par dkar ba'i so skye bsung ba tsam yod kyis/ de la yang rgyal dang/ blon po dang/ i

pa dang/ sdom pa med pa rnams kyis khengs smod ma/ chad pas bcad du ma gnang ngo// de ltar dag slong de chos kyi snyed ma yin te/ 'phags pa'i tshos nyams su dge 'dun skye bar byed cing/ dge sbyong gi las su bya
ba'i las thams cad mi rung bar byed pa yin te/ phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi les spyod la spyod du mi dbang mod kyi/ 'on kyang yid 'thun pa 'a dege 'dun las bsnyen par rdzogs te/ sdom pa thob pa mgang
bas khyen pa sku le thams cad pas mchog ge/ rtsa ba'i sdig nyams kyang bu sa nan/ ma yin pa bcas pa'asdege bragazhan nyams lta ci smos te/ dbas na rgyal bo dang/ blon po dang/ khyim pa rnams
kyis bangs pa 'am spyod dbyed ma/ chad pas gcodadum dbangango// deci'i phyir zhe na// rigs kyi bu blon bsapa'i dusan/ tshul ka la zhes bya dan/ rgyal bo tshangs pas bya ba zhig yod
de sa gdol pa lngal 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyod dang lari kha ba can gyi drungan glang po ga ba drug dang ldan pa// u ba 'a'i mige ces bya ba yod kyis/ khyos pa'i/

e mchab lung 'a 'on cig/ gal te khyed kyis ma theb na gsonangum re zhig ces bsgo'o// nga'i gdol pa can de dag lus dang srog gi phyir mda' gzhu phyogs nas gsatsho can gyon te/ dge sbyong gi tshul ltar bcos nas/

ri ba btsan gyi drung du klung po ma'i rgyal po gang na bar song ngo// der phyin pa dang/ de'aglang po tshamo zhig sngar mthengab dang/ mda' gzhu thogs pa des sngangs nas/ glang po che'i rgyal po'i gon du brgyugs te phyin nas
'di skad ces smras so// lhachen bom gzigs sam/ mi kha cig mda' gzhu thogs te dal gyis 'jab cing mchin/ ci bdag cag tshong ber chad du ma 'byung grang/ glang po che'i rgyal pos na gob ga ste bsdus/

na/ skra dang kha spu bregs nas/ ges tshon cun gyon pa dag cig 'doban thong nas/ glang po che mol tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas gats+tsha'i klong gtse snyed kyi// rgyal mtshan ches des gyon
dadegani// sdig pa thams cad yongs su sdadapas na/ nges par sems can dag la gnod ma byed// de nas glang po che chos kyang tshogo sasu bcad nasalan btab pa/ chos gos gyon pa ltar ni byed med//
thams cad la na mda' gzhuthogs pas na// 'di ni snying rje med cing ma rus pa// sdig pa byed la mos pa'i gdel pa min// de nas glang po che'i rgyal bos yang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ ches gos tshul/

0 bu rgyun bar snang bas na// byams dang snying rje'i rtsa ba de nyid yin// sems can kun la byams dang snying rtse 'a phyi'i// sas rgyas lan 'ad deg skyabs song nges// khyedacag 'di la the tshom ma za bar// myur
sams de rjes su gzunganamadzes// chos gos tshon can gyonab 'di dag na// 'khor bar skyon tsholas na sgrol mdzad pa'o// de nas de'i tshogadrol pa na de dag gas/ mda'i dug can gyis glang bo'i rgyal
po la 'phasazhas gabras pa bzhin du snying 'kha phog ge/ nas glang po che ma skad chen po phyung ste dus nas skad kyis brnangs bzhin dutshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces smras so// sa gos gyon pa de
gni// sangs rgyus la skyabs song snyam// cha lugs shin tu zhi'i snang yang// gdug pa sogs sems ni khong ni bsral// lha yasku la mda' 'phan pa'i// dgra de ni tu brlag pa'i phyir// myur du lus
kun brjes nas su// 'tsho ba'i dbang dang bral bar bya// denasagang po tshe rgyal pos tshogs su bcad de snus pa/ 'tshong 'asreg dang bral byang ba'i// sdig pa'i sems ni bskyed ma riges// 'di dag

bslu ba'i sems yod kyang// cha lugs sas rgyas slob ma 'dra// mkhas pa'i sems ni rnam dag pa// srog la phyir ni ma yin te// skye bo mang po bsgral ba'i phyir// rtag tu byang chub spyad pa spyod// de'i tshe glang po/

tsha'i rgyal po hUMbartse ba sems skyes nas/ mi de dag la 'di skad cesasmras so// khyedang 'a ru 'do/ de dag gis smras pa/ khyod kyi mche 'dod do// glang po che'i rgyal po shin tu dga' nas/ mchab phyung ste

dadas la byinanas/ tshigs su bcad de snus pa/ bre'i 'phasang sam pa med bzhi// khyed la da yi mche ba dkar po 'di// sbyin pa'i bsod nams mnopa' sangs rgyas nas// skye ba 'anyamosanadanamasazhi byedazhig

rogos kyi bu sngon 'das pa' dusan dalta'abAngabamanargya ra gosakyi bu sngon 'das pa'i dus na de ltar glang po ma'i rgyal po byol song gi skye gnas su gyur pa de la nga/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub 'dod pa'i phyi'o/ lus dang srog la ma chags par gtang nas/ tshes gos gyon pa de la rim gro dang bsti stang bya'i phyir/ sa dgrar byas kyang lan ma ldan pa la ltos/ ma 'ongos padusan/ rgyal

rigs ga la ba canadang/ blono bo dang/ khyim bdag dang ! tshong dpon dang/ dge sbyong dang/ bram bragadol ba dag gang dag bar glen pa'i reng bzhin gzhi kyang/ cung zad tsam gyis shes ba bsems te/ g.yo

zla dang smras 'tsho zhing 'jig rten dag paslus nas// gajig rten phyi ma'i sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu la 'jigs par ma lta ba'i/ nga'i bstan pa la skyabs su song zhing/ rab tu byung ba tshes kyi snod du gyur ba dang/ chos kyi snod

dum gyur pa kun la 'tshe zhing gnod bo byed de/ ga shing spyob dang/ 'tshog pa dang/ gzhu ba dang/ btson rar gzhug pa dang/ 'tsho ba'i dbang bo dang phal ba'i bar du byed do// de na'edas pa dang/ ma 'ongs
ba dang/ da lta zhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi dam tshig las 'gal ba'i da namathob rinapo byed pa ste/ gdonamakho bar mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por lhung ngo/ dge ba'i

0 ba yos su bsregs te rgyun da tsad ba/ mkhas pa thams cad kyis longs su sbubs bu go/ de dag gis de ltar kha na ma tho ba'i sdig pa chen po byas kyang g.yo dang sgyus 'tshoste/ nga rgyal gyi dbang du grub nas
'jig rten dag du sku bzhi'o/ de dag kyang so so nas bdas/ cig kyang bran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa yin te/ bdag cagazhathig pa chen pos mno par 'tshang rgya'ozhes zer/
'di lta ste/ dper na ma zhig bdag gi khe phyung nas long bar gyur pa/ phareg gzhan gyi lam mtshon pa'i phyir chen po la 'phrog pa ni gnas med do// de bzhin du byisom 'os pa'i dus na/ rgyal
rigs gdel pa can dang/ blon bo dang/ khyim bdogadang/ tshong dpon dang/ ga sbyong dang/ bram ze gdalo ngan dag kyang de dang 'dra ste/ nga'i bstan pa la skyas su song zhing rab tu byung ba/ chos

kyi snod du gyur pa las/ tshesakyi snod ma yin pa yang rung ba'i slob ma rnamA la'atsho zhing gnodopar byed// ga she zhing spyob dang/ brdeg pa dang/ btson ra bzhug pa dang/ 'tshobs dbang po dang bral ba'i
bar du byed do/ sa 'das pa dang/ ma 'os pa dang/ da lta rgyu sangs rgyas thamasacad kyi dom tshig 'das 'ga'aba'i khanam blo ba chen po byas pas/ dag pa'i rtseb thams cad bsregs shing rgyun bcad
bas/ gdonami khra bar mtshams med pa'i sems can rgyal bachen bo lhung ngo// de bas na mkhas pa rnams kyis spang bar bya'o// des de ltar khan ma tho ba chen po byas kyang/ g.yo dang sgyu tsho'i/
nga rgyal gyi dbang du gyur pa// 'jig rten bsu ba'i phyir bdag cagan blon med pa/ 'i byang chub tshol pa yin te/ bdag cag kyang theg pa chen pos mngon par 'tshang rgya'o zhes zer ro// de

dug gis de ltar rab tu byung gal 'tshazhing gnod pa byed bas rabs thama'i lus kyang mi thob na/ theg pa rnam pa gnyis kyi byang chub bam/ bla na med pa'i theg pa ma thob pa lta ci smos te/ skal ba chad pa
yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang sngon 'das pa'i sa na/ yul pan tsal zhes bya ba na rgyal po dag las rgyu la bzhes bya ba yod de/ su la da'i srid 'dzin cing dbang byed do// den dur
zhi chen po la lam pa zhes bya ba'an tu 'jigasang gi gnas shig yod de/ gnod sbyin dang srin po yang de namang du gsaso// de dag tuphyinan 'jigs shing ba spu ldang ngo// yul ngan nyes pa byas pa gsar
bzhage yodan/ rgyal po'i khrims kyis gsad pa de btung ba lngas brtsis nas/ kha 'bab zhes bya ba'i dus su chen po der skyel te/ srin po dang 'byung po rnams b.rang nyug// gsadapa gcig cage
brog gi phyir skra dang kha spu bregs te/ chos gos kyi tshul bu zhage redapa mgul du btags so// btson rjes khrod de rgyal po'i khrims bzhin du btung ba lngas bcuso sa/ dur phas chen dur bskyal to//
skye ma phyir log nas de'i nub mo srin mo mtshon cha'i mig ces bya ba 'khor lnga stong dang bcas te/ dur khrod der lhags so// mi sa rgyang nas mthong nas rab tu 'jigs skrag gi deb tshosrin mo des
mi bcing ba las btus pa/ sgra dang kha spu bregs pa// chos gos kyis tshal bu rtagul du btags pa mthong nas/ g.yas nas bskor te/ bsti stang dngabacas pas phyag byas te thal mo sbyar nas/ tshigs//
su bcad pas 'di skad ces smras so// skyes bu khyod mi bsnyengs bde bar bzhugs// khyod la bdag cag gnod pa mi bgyid do// skra bregs chos gos gyon pa khyodamathong bas// bdag cag sangasas rjes
su dran par gyur// de tshoson mo'i bu rnams kyis/ ma la 'di skadaces smras so// bdag cagashin bkres skom pas// lus dang sems ni rnam pa ga'i// lus dang sems dab ba'i phyir//
mum gyis ma de btsal du gnang// nas srin mo// bu rnams la 'disnyadaces sasaso// sangs u0fb1sagad+hA'i klung gi bye snyedakyi// rnam par grol ba'i rgyanamchog gos gyon pa// 'di lam dege sdig pa'i
sems bskye dan// nges par mtshams mdasams can dmyal bar lhung/ des nas gnemo'i bu dang 'khor du bcas pas bskor te/ bag stong dang bcas pas phyag byas te thal mo sbyar nas/ gis su bcad
'disangasmras so// tshon canagyon pa khyod la so sor 'chags// bdag cag ji ste pha dang ma dag la// lus dang ngag yid mi bde byas ba yi// khyod la namadu'ang gnod par mi bgyid do// rinas yang srin mo

na po bong chung duzhes bya ba 'khor lnga stong dang bcas te/ dur khrod der lhags so// srin mo des kyang bacingab lngas bcings pa// ny+tsadang kha spu bregs pa/ tshes gis gyi tshal bu mgul du btags pa'i mi de mthong
nas bskor te/ bsta stang dang bcas pas phyag byas nas/ thal mo sbyar nasatshigs su bcad pas 'di skad ces sas so// skyes bu bdag gis ma bsnyes bde bar bzhugs//
khyod kyi mgul du btags pa'atshol bu 'di// drang srong chen po'i rgyal mtshanan babrar 'a/gas/ de la mchodacing bdag cag phyag 'tshal 'a// nas srin mo'i bu rnams kyis/ mal 'di skad ces smras
so// ma soTisha dang khrag 'as zhim pa med// lus dang sems stobs skye zhing 'phel 'gyur ba// shin tu dpa' la tshul bod 'jigs med pa// yum gyis de la bdag gcuga'atshal du gnang// de nas srin
chos/ bu rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// lha mi'i longs spyod ldan pa thams cad kyang// rab tu byung bdag la na tshod pa'i phyir// chos gos gyon pa 'di la mchod pa na// bde pa tshad med pa yang
'thob par 'gyur// danasasrin mi bu rnams 'khor dang bcas pas bgeganas/ ban+tistang dang bcas pas phyag byas te/ thal mo sbyar nas tshigs bcad de smas pa// skra bregs tshe gos gyon pa'i skyes
bu la// bdag cagashin tugus pa phyag 'tshal pa// bdag cagashAn gus par phyag byas pas// rtag dum 'ongs pa yi dus kun tu// sangs rgyas mthong zhing dad pa skye bar shog/ de'i tshe yang srin mo

chen mo khro gnyer 'phral sku can zhes bya ba 'khor lnga stong dang bcas te/ dur khrod der lhagasaso// srin mo des kyang bcing ba lnga sa bcis/ rgyadang ba su bregs pa// chos gos kyi tshol bu mgul du btags pa'i
mi mthong nas/ g.yas nas bskor te bstistang dang bcas pas phyag byas nas thalamo sbyar te tshigs su bcad pa 'di skye smras so// drang srong chen po'i rgyal mtshan bza'ad/ mkhas pa thams cad shAn

dung stod cingebasngag/ gang zhig 'di la chod pa byed pan// srid pa 'batunges pa kun las nges par 'gro la// de'i tshesAnemo de'abu rnams kyis/ ma la 'di skad ces smras so// ma 'di'i lus kyi sha dang khrag
kun n// rgyal po chen pos bdag cag rnams 'khasngos// bdag cag 'di'i za zhing 'thung du gnang/ mthu dang ldan nasam 'a ga dog kyang bgyi// de nas srin mos/ bu rnams la 'di skad ces smras
so tshes gos brtags pa gyon pa 'di degan/ khyed kyise bza' ba'i rigs pa ma yin gyiso// 'di la go dag sdig pa'i sems bskyed na// sdug bsngal chenapo'isnod du gyur ta re// de nas srin

bu rnams 'khor dang bcas pa bskor nas/ bsti stang dang bcas pas phyag btsal to/ thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad de smyos pa/ khyod ni drang srong chen po'i gos gyon te// shin tu bsod nams zhing du gyur pa

in de bas bdag cag khyed la mchod pas na// srid pa'i bcings pa las thar par shog/ de'i tshon yang srin mo chen mo mtshon cha'agodong zhes bya ba yang 'a bor lnga stong dang bcas te// dur khrod der lhags
so srin mo des kyang ma de brdung ba las btus pa/ skra dang kha spu bregs pa/ chos gos kyi tshil bu mgul du btags pa mthong nas bskor te/ bsti stang dang bcas pas phyag 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te/
tshigs su bcad pas 'di skad smras so// khyod ni brtags pa'i chos gos gyen pasan// mya ngan 'da' ba'i bde ba thob tu nges// debs khyed la bdag skyag gnod byin// sangs
rgyas kun gyis smos kyis nged rnams dogs// denas srin mo debu rnams kyis/ ma 'a'adi skad ces smras so// bdag cag rtag tu mi yi mangs 'khrog cing// de bzhin shadang khrag kyang ba 'thung bas//
gzugs dang mthun yongs 'phel ba'i phyir/ bdag cag 'di de'i nubedir 'tshul du gnang// de nas srinam sa/ bu rnams la 'dusnyed ces smras so// ji ste sgra dang kha snga bregs pa yi// chos gos gyon
da 'di'i gnod pas na// nges par mtshams med sems can dmyal bar lhung// yun ring sdug bsngal chen po'i snod du 'gyur// de nas srin mo bu rnams dang 'khor dung cog pas bsgyur nas/ bsti stang
dang ba nus pas phyag 'tshal te/ thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag sbas so// bdog nyug sems can dma' bas rab 'jigs te/ de bas khyed kyi srog la gnod mi bde// btunges pa
'di yang bkrel te khyod gdung gis// dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal kun las thar b.rashog/ de'i tshesngon mo ma smad 'khor dang bcas pa su de rjes sems bskyed nas/ mde btungesapa bkrel/

bshags pa dang slob bskyed pa byas nas phyir gtango// mde phyis nyin sngar rab tu rgyal po'i drud du'ongs nas/ dngos po de dag rgyus kyisazhib tugasol to// de'i tshe rgyal po dga' rgyal ba 'khor dang/
[}]bcas pas de skadathos nas sngas te/ mtshar rmad du gyur nas khrems su bcas te// yul gyi mi rnams la bkar btags pa// dang phyin chad nga'i yul na gnas pa sangs rgyas kyis slob ma tshul khrims
srung ngum/ tshul khrims nyams sam/ chung na tshul khrims med par skra dang kha spu bregs to/ du smuge gyon pa 'asu zhig kyal ka 'am/ gnod pa byas na thams cad gsad do zhes khrims su bcas so//
de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis mang po yang bsod nams la dga' bas thams cad bags kyis bstan pa la phyogs nas/ 'dzam bu gling na rgyu la bo dadabangaba'i mthems cad bsam pa nges par dkon mchog
gsum la skyabs sugasol to// rigs kyi bu de ltar 'jus pa'i dus na/ srimo yi dogasakyi rgyudadu skyes pa/ mdangs 'phrog pa// gdung bragazab/ sdig pa la brkam pa// snying rjemed pa
yang/ de lta bu tshul khrimasumadapa/ skra dang kha spu bregs pa/ tshes gsakyi tshil bu btags pa de lo bskor ba dang/ bsti stang dang/ mi grodong/ phyag khyab dang/ mchod pa dang/ tshogasasu
ba cad das bstod// gnod pa byed pa'i semasaman/ zhe 'os pa'idusan/ rgyal rigs gdol pa can dang/ blono bo dang/ bdag dang/ tshong dpon dang/ dge sbyong dang/ maze gdol
pa can la sogs pa gdug pa'i sems 'chang zhing snying rje med pa// gnod sbyin dang/ srin bobs thubar sdig pa byed de/ glen zhing ba/tig can dag ba'irtse ba yongs su gcod pa dang bstan pa la rab tu/
'a[©]// byung ba/ chos kyi snodadu gyur pa dang/ chos kyi snod du gyur pa yang rung/ skadang ba spu bregs togos ngur smig gyon pa'i slob ma la dad pa dang/ bkur sti ma byed de/ dol/
gnod pa dang/ gshe zhing brdeg pa dang/ na la' der zhing btson rar gzhug pa dang/ 'tsho ba'i debad po dang phral ba'i bar du byed pa de dag 'das pa dang ma 'os pa dang/ de ltar gyi sangs rgyas btseg
ldan 'das thams cad kyis bstan pa 'kha ma thob chen po dang 'gal bar byed pa ste dgeba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsregs nas rgyun bcad ngasagadon mi bra bar mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por
ltung bar 'gyur bas/ mkhas pas yongs su spang bar byago/ yang rigs kyi bu sngon rgyal po bsod nams chen pozhes bya ba zhig yod de/ rgyal bo de snying rje che bas nyes pa byas pas gsad pa la thug
pa dag kyang gsod du mi dga' 'o// de'i tshablon po blo dang ldan pa gcig gis// rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// rgyal po thugs nganam mdzad cig/ rgyal pos kyang srog gcod pa'i sde go pa ma thob
pa dang/ gshed mas kyang dgum ma 'a tshul ba'am de 'gum pa'i thebs ma chis so zhes gsol nas// blon po chen po des gsad pa la thug pa'i mo de ba gling sa pa ma lung pa'i mdun du gzhag go/ de nas
ba gling rmis pa desam de snas gzung ste/ 5ra btogs nas sa la brdab pa las/ mi deges dmar po gyon pa mthong nas/ tshes ges yinane snyam ste/ bsam pa dag pa'i dad pa skyesanas dal gyis
sa la gzhag cung/ de 'gyedanas sa la btud de/ mi de'i rkang pa la snas 'azhung bsti stang dang bcas pasazhig mi 'dzum par ma dol lta'o// blon po des de lta bu r gyur pamathong nas brgyugs te/
rgyal po de la de bzhin dugasol te/ rgyal pas de skad ces thos nas sngangs/ mtshar dadu gyur nas/ mi yongs sum thong la de phyin chadadakon mchog gsum la bcu stegyis shig par
bkar btags so// de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyi srog gcad pa yang spangs te/ 'dzam bu gling la dbang byed po gyur to// zhes rigs kyi bu de ltar 'das pajus na/ ba gang rmis pa byol song gi gnas
su gyur pa yang/ chos gos lo gus pas sdig pa mi byed na/ ma 'os pa'i dus na/ rgyal rigs gangol pa can dang/ blon po dang/ khyim bdag dang/ tshong dpon dang/ dge sbyong dang/ bram khre gdol
pa can la sogs pa sams gdug pa can/ snying rje'i sems med// ba glang sa pa bas thu bu'i sdog pa'i las byed// byis pa glen pan de dag nga' bstan pa la rab tu byungob/ chos kyi stod du/
gyur pa 'am/ chos kyi snyed ma yin pa yang rung/ skra dang kha spu bregs te/ gos ngur smig gyon pa la dad pa dang gus par mi byed de/ dal gnod pa dang/ gshe zhing ba dang gzhu zhing 'tshog pa
dang/ datson rar gzhug pa dang/ 'tsho ba'i dbang po dang bral ba'i ber du byed pa las 'des pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis bstan
pa'i kha na ma thob chen po dang 'ga' bar byed pas ) de dge ba'i rtswa pa bsregs nas rgyun gcad pas gdonami za b.ramatshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur//
bas[u0f10 ]mkhas pa rnams kyis spang bar bya'o// gal te rgyal rigs gdo' pa canas/ dge sbyong dang bram bre gdol pa can gyi bar dusdug pa'i 'khor logasum po 'ding ldan pas/ ba rgyu de'i rkyen
gyis yul srung ba'i lho dang/ klu dang/ gnod spyinel sogs pa dkon mchog gsum la bsam ba dag ning dad pa chu phyedapa thams cad rgyal rigs gdol pa cananas/ dge spyong dang bram za gdol

pa can gyi bar du gdol pa de dag la khro zhing zhe sdang ba'i sems skya bas/ gzhung de bzhin du rgyas par rgyal rigs gdol pa can dang/ blon po dang/ khyim bdag dang/ tshong dpon dang/ dge sbyong dang/ bram
bre la sogs pa gdol pa can de thams cad ring po ma thogs par lus kyi yon lag dum bur chad chung/ zhag mang du lce sdeb pa dang/ rAhun dum bzad pa'i re ba dang tsha ba'i sdug bsngal chen po meng bar
'gyur ba dang/ 'chi 'phos nas kyang mtshams med pa'i sems can ngamyal ba chen por lhung bar 'gyur// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang phyi ma ma 'os pa'adzesan/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i rgyal rig
gdol pa can dang/ blon po dang/ khyim bdag dang/ tshong dpon dang/ gasbyong dang/ bram ze gdol pa can la sogs pa sdig pa'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa// gaba'i ba chung ba zhan pa nas/ de bzhin

[//]ngargyas par 'jig rten phyi ma'i sdug bsngal ma mthong ba dag/ phyogs bzhi'i rtege 'dun gyi nor dang/ gtsug lag khang gser dang/ gtsug lag khang du bsngos pa'i nor dang/ skyed shang gi ra ba dang/ skyed shang
gi re bar bsdus pa'i nor dang/ zhing 'brogazung/ zhinge'abrog tu bsdus pa'i nor dang gtsug lag khang so so rung bar byed par gtogs pa'i skyes pa dang/ bud med gas pa nor phyugs phrogs pa dang/

gos dang bsod snyoms phrogs pa dang/ gding ba dang khri stan phrogs pa dang nad kyi rkyenasman phrogs pa dang/ de ma yin pa'i 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs la 'phrog pa ste/ de ltar phyogs bzhi'i de'i
'dun la phul ba'i nor de nitshul khrims dang ldan pa// yon tan dang ldan pa la/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa// slob pa dang ma bu pa la nan tan du byed pa nas/ mtha'aganas byas pa'i 'bras bu thob pa'i bar
gyi ge slong yongs su dag pa spyodang gnang bar bdan/ rgyal drages gdol pa cananas/ dge sbyong dang bram bre gdol pa can gyi bar du gdol pad dgagasemathu dang dpung bsems te/ nanas phugs nas

dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa yongs su dag pan sred du a stel gyi/ tshul khrims nyams pa sdig pa spyod pa'i dege srung mi na gnas shing byis pa'i las byed ba dag la byin nas/ 'duge nithun mong du spyod/

kha cigon khyed par yang spyod de/ tshul khrims nyams pa'i dege slong dag gis de dag thob nas kyang kha cig thun mong du byed/ kha cig ni khud par yang spyod ( kha gon khyim pa lakhyen nas// do dang yang thun
mongang spyod do// pa'i rgyu da'irgyan gyis yul srung ba'alha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyinil sogs pa dkon mchog gsum la bsam pa dag cing dad pa ma phyed pa dag/ rgyal riges

so gdol pa na nas/ dge sbyong dang bram ze gdel po can gyi dor du gdol pa can de dag la khre ste/ zhe sdang gi soms skye ba nas/ de bzhin du rgyas par rgyal rigs gdol pa can dang/ bon po dang/ khyi'i bdag dang
tshong dbon dang/ dge sbyong dang/ bram ze la sogs pa gdol pa de dag ring po mi thegs par lus kyi yan lag dum bur chad pa dang/ zhagamang du ldab pa dang/ shinatum bzad pa'i na ba dang tsha ba'i
sdug bsngal chen po myongazhinge/ 'chi 'phos nas kyang gdonami bra bgamatshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por ltang bar 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu gzhan langam 'ongs pa'i dusan/ sangs rgyas
kyi zhing 'di'i rgyalariges gdol pa canadang/ blon bo dang khyim bdag dang/ tshong dpon dang/ ga sbyong dang bram zego'o pa can la sogs pa'i sdig pa'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa/ dge ba'i rtse kha

chung zhing zhan pa nas/ de bzhin du rgyas par 'jig rten phyi ma'i sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bum mthong ba dag gis nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba/ shes rab rno ba/ mang du thos pa// tshig dang don rdzogs par smra ba dang

ldan pa// nyan thos kyi theg btis ston nus pa 'am/ rangasaMs rgyas kyi theg pa'i rtsis chud cing ston nus pa'5/ blanamed pa'i theg pa'i tshes ston nus shing/ rgyas par sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i

don stonus par chos sna ba la spro zhingegashe ba dang/ snang ba dang/ 'phrazhing skur pa dang/ dbang za ba dang/ gnod pa byedade/ tshes stenapa'ab dad byedado// de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis yul srung ba
lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod spyin la sogs pa dkon mchog gsum la bsam bdago cing dad pas phyed pa dag/ rgyal rigs gdolapa cananas/ dge sbyongadang bram ze gdol po can gyi bar gdol po na
de dag la bros te/ zhe sdang gi sems skye ba nas/ gzhung de bzhin rgyas bar rgyal rigasagadol pa na dang ! blon po dang ! khyim bdag dang/ dge sbyong dang/ bram ze la sogs pa gdol pa can

nga dag thams cad ring po ma thogs par badag gi lus dum bur chad pa dang/ zhag mang dulce ldib pa dang/ shin tu mi bzadapazin ba dang tsha ba'i sdug bsngal chen po myong zhing/ 'chi'i sa nas kyang gdon
mi za bar mtshamasamed pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po ltung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang phyi mos 'os pa'i dusan/ sangs u0fb1sa kyi zhing 'di'i rgyab 'gas g.yo ba can dang/ blon po dang
khyim bdag dang/ tshong dpon dang/ dram ze la sogs pa'i gol pa can sdig pa'i bas gnyen la nga ston pa/ dge ba'i rtsa bzhatsang chung ba nas/ de bzhin du rgyas par 'jig rten phyi ma'i sdug bsngal gyi
'bras bu la 'jigs dang mi lta ba des phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la phul ba'i nor dang/ gtsug lag khang zhing 'dre gdang/ nor phyugs dang/ rin po che dang/ me tog gi dang/ 'bras bu'i shing sa
kha dog gi shing dang/ bsil grib dang/ bsrung dang/ sman gyi shing la sogs pa dang/ dam yin pa'i 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs la 'phrog nga/ ngab slob ma tshul khrim/
dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa/ slob pa dang slobo pa la nan tan byas nas/ mthu'aganas byas pa'i 'bras bu'i bar du thob tu nye ba'i dge slong yongs su dag pa 'da' zhig gis
spyod du dbang bar zad na rgyal rigs gdol pa na dang/ dge sbyong dang bram ze gdol pa can la sogs pa mthu dang dngungabasnyems te/ nan gyis phyogs sam/ gzhan 'phrog tu bcug gam/ bag spyod la
gzhan spyod bcug kyang rung/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis yul srung ba'i lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin la sogs pa dkon mchog gsum la bsam pa dag cing dad pa ma byed pa dag/ rgyal rigs gdol pa cin
dang dge sbyong nga 3 bram ze gdo'i pa can la sogs pa la khros te/ zhes sdang gi sems skyo ba nas/ de bzhin du rgyas par rgyal rigs gdol pa can dang/ blon po dang ) khyim bdag dang/ tshong dpon dang/
dag sde dang bram ze gdol pa can la sogs pa de dag thams cad ring po ma thogs par lus kyi yan lag dum bur chad pa dang/ zhag mad du lce ldib pa dang/ shani mi bzad dkane ba dang tshab
sdug bsngal chen po myod ba dang/ 'am 'phos nas kyang gdon mi za bar mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen bor ltung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ sangs
00/ rgyas kyi zhi 'di'i la rigs gdol pa can dang/ blon po dang/ khyim bdag dang/ tshong dpon dang/ ge sbyong dang bram ze gangal can la sogs pa sdig pa'i leshes gnyen la bsten pa// ga
ba'i rtse ba chung zhing zhanang/ bsam pa ma dag pa// g.yo dang sgyis 'tsho ba ! glen pa gti mug can cung zad kyi shes pa tsam bsnyems pa/ tshig la bden pa med pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen
slong ba/ sdig pa ni grogs po la bsten cing ma dge ba dang// 'phags pa'i tshes la the tsomaza ba 'jig rten phyi ma'i sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu la 'jigs pa ma lta bo dag sdig pa'i sdom pa srung bar
ga ba/ srogs gcod pa nas/ ngan par lta ba'i bar du nos pa// nga rgyal gyisamangon par zin pa/ 'jig rten pa dag le slab/ bdag ni tshul khrims kyi sprim pa la gnas pa'o zhes khas 'chab 'i rgyal
rigs gdol pa nun dang/ dge sbyong dang bram ze gdol pa can la sogs pa rtag thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis nga'i bstan pa 'jig par byed cing/ par bastan pa la btubyung ba dag laspu lde[W]nga
gshe ba dang/ sbo zhing skyod pa dang/ nan la de ba dang/ btson rar gzhug pa dang/ lus kyi yalag gtub pa dang/ 'tsho ba'i debang po dang phral ba'i bar du byed de/ ngas bostan pa'as la yang yis
pas mchod rten 'jig pa/ gtsug lag khang 'jig pa/ dge slong dag khyim par 'bebs pa/ skra dang kha spu 'dreg cingegs dus smig gyon pa'i bar chad byed pa/ las rnam pa sna tshogs byed du 'jug
rung 'khel ba ste/ 'a rgyu de skyen gyis yul srung ba'i lce dang klu dang/ gnod sbyin la sogs pa// dkon mchog gsum la bsam pa dag cing dad pa ma phyed pa dag rgyal rigs/
po gdol pa can dang/ ge sbyong dang bram zugadol po cana' khros te/ zhe sdang gi sems bskyang nas/ dbazhin du rgyus par rgyal rigs gdul pa can dang/ blon po dang/ khyim bdag dang/ tshong dpon dang
dag sbyang dang/ bram dre la sogs pa gdol pa can de dag ring po mi thegs par lus kyi yan lag kun dum bur chadapa dang/ zhag mang du lce ldib pa dang/ shin tum bab pa na ba dang tsha ba'i sdug bsngal/
chen po myong ba dang/ 'chi 'phos nas kyang gdon mi za bar mtshams med pa'isems canangamyal bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu rgyal rigs gangel pa can dang/ blon po dang/ khyim bdag dang/ tshong dpon dang/

dge sbyong dang/ bram ze la sogs pa 'di reg sdug pa'i 'khor 2rnam pa bcu po gsus pa 'dug las 'ga'azhig dang ldan na yang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba sngar bsags pa thams cad thal ba bzhin du tshig ste med par 'gyu/

ring po mi thogs par lus kyi yan lag dum bur bcad pa dang/ zhag mang du lu ldib pa dang/ shin tum bzad pa'i na ba dang tsha da'i sdug bsngal chen po myong ba dang/ gshis kyang mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba

na bor ltung bar 'gyur ro// rgyal rigs gdol pa can dang/ blon po dang/ khyim bdag dang/ tshong dpon dang/ dge sbyong dang/ bram ze'asogs pa gdol pa can 'di dag ma 'os pa'i rtenan ma ma rabs thama'i lus kyang

0 2theb par dga' n/ theg pa rnam gsekyi byang chub bam/ blan med pa'i byang chub 'thob pa lta cis+ses te/ skal ba med pa yane no// sdig pa can de theg pa chen po'i ming yang shes par dka' na/ bla med par mkhyen/
par 'tshang rgya ba'i 'bras bu thub pa lta nusnyes te/ gang zagangen yen bdag kyang m rungul gzhan yungs rung bar byas pas sangs rgyas thams rud kyis kyang bskyab mi nus so// rigs

kyi bu 'dilta ste/ 'bru' mer 'tshir ba'i las byed pa ni 'bru re re las srin bu re rer gyur de ! btsari nas mar 'byung ngo// khyod ltos shigamar 'tsho ba'i las byed pa nga ni cig la sems can ji snyed cig gsong

par 'gyur/ gal te mir 'tshong ris rnam pa bcu dus nas/ nyin zhag gcig la gnas de re rer yang 'bru khal stong steng rgyun mi 'chad par stong tshang bar 'tshangan/ gang zag des srog ga skyod pa'i kha na ma tho
bar 'os rang dumang ba min nam ma/ byang chub sems dba' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying pos gsol// rab tu mang ngo// bcom ldan 'das rab tu mang ngo// bde bgashegs pa gang brag
des srog gcad pa yang tshad ma mas dpag tu ma mchis la/ kha na ma tho ba'i las kyang gzhal bar ma/ brtse bar ram/ bgrang bar ram/ dparayang ma bzod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyag gcig gi
mkhyen gyi/ gzhanas 'tshal ba ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sul pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ gal ma la zhig gso ner dang khye'i phyir smad 'tshong ma'i gnas rnam pa bcu bcas te
gnas de ba/nyig tu ya nga bung mang smad 'tshong ma stong stong gzhabs/ bud med de dgaso so nas rgyas rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan te/ skye babasus nas 'dod chags kyi 'os rgyun mi 'chadu ]

par le stong gibar du byed du bcug na/ gang khrag de'i banam thang 'a sdig pa yang gzhal du medad/ brtse bas sam/ bgrang bas sam/ dper yang mi babadod// 'bru mar 'tshar ba'i gnas bcu pa'osdig pa de ni

smang ra sa'i gnas gcige bskus pa'asreg dang mnyam mo// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ gang khrag la la zhig nor dang la'i phyir cha 'tshe ba'i gnasapa shasdus te/ gnas de so sor rnam pa sna tshogs kyi smyan

gyis shin tu brgyan nas// gnas de re rer yang thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis chang dang che ba'i mo steng stong bad/chang blang nas mtshan du rgyun mi 'chad par lo stong gi b.rangu rtse na/ gang brag pa'i sdig pa yang dang ga tu
med// nga u0f7abas sam/ bgrang bas sam/ dper na ngami bzod do// gang du gshad pa'i smad 'tshong ma'iganas bcu po'i sdegaM pa dachang 'tshong ba'i gnas btus pa'i sdig gcig dang mnyamam

rigs kyi bu gzhan na nga 'di lta ste/ gang zag la la zhig nor dang khe'i phyong shan pa 'i gnas rnam pa bcu bcas te/ gnas de re rer yang nyin zhag cige la ba glang dang/ lug dang/ rngamo dang/ bsha ba dang/ bya ngang
phagastengasong rgyun ma 'chad par 'astong gi bar du bsad na/ gang zag de 'badum bu ba'i sdeg kyang gzhal du med de/ brtse bas sam/ bgrang bas ma/ dper yang mi brjod do// de ltar sngar bshad pa'i
[/]chang 'tshong bar bcu der sreg deshan pa'i gnas gcig bcas pa'i sdige dang ma'am mo// 'di lta shan pa'i gnas bcu po de sngog de rgyal rigs gdol pa nyananas/ dag sbyong dang bram ze la sogs pa gde
nga can de dag sdig pa'i 'o 'or 'o bcu pa las 'ga' zhig dang ldan/ nyin zhag gcigeg kha na ma tho ba' sdoge kyang snga na dengamanyamamo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs su bcad de bka'

sul pa/ mara'atshir gnas sdig bcu po dag// smad 'tshong gnas sngag gcig dang mnyam// smad 'tshong gnas sdig bcu po dag/ chang 'tshong gnas sdig gcig dang mnyam// chang 'tshong gnas sdig bcu po dag/ gal
pa'i gnas sdig gcig dang mnyam// gshanapar gnas ni bcu bcas pa// rgyal po gdol can sdigagacig mnyam// 'phags pa byang chub sems dang/ sa'i snying po'i 'khor le bcu pa zhes bya ba/
rjeg pa chen po'i mdo bam po lnga pa/ na sa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te rgyal/

rigs dge ba 'am/ blun po dge ba dang/ khyim bdag dge ba dang/ tshong dpon ge ba dang/ dge sbyong dang bram ze dag ba dag bdag shin tu skyong zhing/ gzhan dag kyang shin du sbyong ba la/ 'jig rten phyi
mas kyang 'dzem pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la gnas pa/ rab tu byung ba chos kyi snod du gyur pa 'am/ chos kyi snyed ma gyur pa 'am/ chung na tshul khrims pa yang rung ste/ skra dang kha spu bregs/
[Iss/ ]shu/ gos ngur smig 'tshal ba shin du bas snang dang bcas te/ rim gro dang mchod pa bgyid do// gzhan yang nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos dang
[>>theg pa chen po'i chos la bsti stang dang bcas nga mchod pa// nyanar/ dad pa/ gzungs su 'dzin pa// maNod pa byed pa// theg pa chen po la gnas shing/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang
ldan ng// brtson 'grus rtsom zhing nan tan du bgyid pa nas/ 'bras bu la gnas pa'i bar gyi gang brag rjes su srung zhing mthustobs bstang ba dang/ zhu zhing 'dri ba dang/ nyan cing 'dzin pa dang/ dga'

bzhin du gtam zer zhing gleng ba dang/ tshul khrims mas pa sdig pa spyod pa dge slong ring du slong ba dang/ phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi nor la pha rol po gzhan chud gson dum gzhug cing shin dusrung ba
dang/ phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi nor dang/ mchod rten gyi nang la bdag kyang mi sku gzhan yang rku mi 'dzud pa dang/ bangag mi srid/ gzhanaang srong du mi 'phrod pa dang/ theg pa rnam pa gsum

gyi rgyus smra ba la bsti stang dang bcas pa sa mchad cing mthu btang ba dang/ pha rol bo gzhan dag 'phya zhingaskarapa dang smod dus 'dzud pa dang/ de la ma gro bgyid cing smra ba skyong ba dang/ gang rab tu
byung ba dag dang/ sa ngas rgyas kyi bstan pa'i chos la dad pas srung zhing rjes su 'dzi pa dang/ mchod rtatshe mi 'jig ngab dang dge 'dun gyi gnas dang/ gtsug lag khang yang shin du srung ba dang/

ba skra dang kha spu bregs te/ gos ngur smig gyonang 'i rab dubyung ba'i gang brag lami b.rasa'i snodapa dang/ sdig pa'i 'khor lernam pa banu la bdag mi spyod/ pha rolagazhan sdig pa'i 'khor le bcu las
nga du gyur cing rgyal po snga ma'i tshig dang lugs kyis rgyal po'isrid 'tsho ba dang/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung 'tshob cing dadatsang rgyas par byed pa dang/ rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyon la
bstan cing/ byams pa'i sems kyis mi yongs la skyong ba dang/ thams cad la cad ng rtsis 'dul ba bzhin du/ de dngad richos kyis 'dul zhing ston te ! ngan pa'i lta ba spangs nas// yang dag
pa'i chos la nan tan byadangu'ajug nga ri rgyal ri gas drag banas/ bram drag ba'i bar du dge ba dngag bsad nams ji snyed cig thobang/ sdig nga je snyad cig 'byung bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gal te gang zag mthu chen po dang ldan pa gcig 'jig rten du mngon par byung ste snga dro'i dus su yang rin po chesna bdun gyis 'dzamabu'i gling yongs su nga kang nas/ sangs rgyas dang

dge 'dun la 'bul ba dang arigung la yang rin po che sna bdun gyis 'dzam bu'i gling yongs su bkang ste/ sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun la 'bulab dang/ phyi dro'i dus su yang rin po chesna bdun gyis 'dzam bu'i
gling yongs su bkangs// sas rgyas dang dag 'dun la 'bul bde bzhin du/ nyin rerar yang rgyun mi rachad par 'bargya stong gi bar du sbyin pa byinan/ gang bgange'i bsod nams kyi gsaramang ba yin//
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rman pa sa'i snying pos gsal ba/ shin tu'ang nga// bcom ldan 'das shin tu mang ngo// bdeb gshegs pa gang zag de thegonganams kyi tshogs
pe tshad ma bsu dpag dum mchis te/ brjod par ram brtsibs sam/ bgrang ba bam/ dparayang mi bzung// sangs rgyas nyag gcig gis mkhyen gyi/ gzhan gyis ni ma lags s// bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu de dbazhinan// da de bzhin te/ khyod kyis smras pa bzhinate/ gal te rgyal rigs dge ba nas/ bram ze dag b.ribaradu gang zhig sdig pa'i 'khor le rnam pa bcubadag

kyang mi spyod la/ pha rol bo gzhan spyod pa dag// sdig pa'i 'khor lo bsu spang bar yang gzhan la ston pa'i bsod namasakyi phung po ni/ bsod nams kyi phung po sdam bas tshad med dpag tu mad de/ brjod bang nam
brtsi pas sam dbagrangabs sam/ dper yang mi bzod pa cher// gas kyi bu gzhan yang 'daltaste/ gang dragam chen po dang ldan pa gcig 'jig rtenadusungon par byas/ phyogs bzhi'i dga' dun

gyi phyir gtsug lag khang dang/ gnas khangashin tubaphra zhing yangs pa gling bzhi dang mnyam pa brtsigs nas/ gnas dedag kun du khri stan dang nabaza' dang/ bsod snyamis dang/ bstan gyi rkyen sman dang
'tsho ba'i yo byad thams cad dang ldan par bshams te/ dbazhin gshegs pa dang/ nyan thos dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i nyi gnas chen po'i 'khor masacad den bzhugs ra brtson 'grus su dge

ba'i phyogs rnam pa sna tshogs la nan tan byed cing nyin mtshan le 'amed par le bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi b.radu mchod pa dngabasanabakur rgyun mi rasmad par byedan/ gang brag de'i bsod nams kyi phung pa shinamang/
ba yinanam/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa 'a chen po sa resnying pos gsal pa/ shin ngumangango// bcom ldan 'das shin tu mang ngo// bde bar gshegs pa gang zag de ri bsod nams kyi'ang po ni
tshadam mchis dpag dum mchis te/ brjod par 'aA/ brtsi bas sam bgrang bas sam/ dpar yang m bzod de/ sangs rgyas nyag gcig gis mkhyen gyi/ gzhan gyisam lags so// ngacam
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dud bzhin no// dedabazhin te/ khyod kyis smras pa bzhin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan pa nga rang lta ste/ gang thug mthu chen po dang ldan pa gcig 'jig rten du'angon bar
byung ste/ phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi phyir gtsug lag khang dang/ gnas khangah+phun babrangal yangs pa glingabazhi pa bcu dang mnyam pa brtsigs te/ gnas dedag kun tukhri stan dang na bra'adang/ bsod
snyams dang/ gsos sman dang/ 'tshong re yo byad thams cad dang ldan par bshams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ la thus dang/ byang nub sa nas dpa'i dge 'dun chen po'i nye gnas thams cad de na

bzhugs pa la brtson 'grus su dag ba'i phyogs rnam pa sna tshogs la nan tan byed cinge/ nyin mtshan la 'dzemed par lo brgya stong bya ba khrag khrog gi b.radumachod pa dang ra sAn bkur rgyun rachad par byed
@#/ na gang brag de'i bsod nams kyi phung po shin tu mang ba yane nam/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos snyingapos gsol pa/ shin tu mang ngo// bcom ldan 'das/
shin tumang ngo/ bde ba gsheg pa gang brag de'i bsod nams kyi phung ponatshad mams dang ga dumams te brjod parum/ brtsi bsasam/ bgrang bas sam/ dbor yang mibabrad// sangs rgyas
nyag gcig gis mkhyenatsang/ gzhan gyis ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhinano// da de bzhinata/ jiltarakhyod kyis snus babazhin// rigasakyi bu

k+Sha gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ gang brag mthu chen po dang ldan pa gcig 'jig rtan dumangon par byung sta/ sangs rgyas kyi ring bsrel gyi phyir mchong rten shin tu mdzes ba/mtha zhing la ngas ba/ stangagasum gyi steng na/
po ri'ajig rten gyi khams dngamanyam pa brtsigs la/sngar bshad pa bzhinaphyogs bzhi'i dge 'dunagyi phyir gtsug lag khang dang gnas khang brtsigs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po bas/ sas

rgyas kyi ring bsrel gyi phyiramachod rten brtsigs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po che// brgya'i char yang nye bar 'gro ba nas/ stongagi char yang ba mi 'gro'o// brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//
khrag khri ba gi rayang rarami 'gro'o// grangs kyi char ram ) rtsis kyi char ma/ dbag parimar rin/ dpo'i chararam/ rgyuritshar ya nganye b.rami 'gro'o// rigs kyi bu gzhanayang 'di lta sta/ gal to

pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa rnam par grol bang rgyad dang ldan pa/bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pa'i dgra bcom pa chen po la stag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i rajig rten gyi khams 'dir yongs su gang
ni 'dit+taste/ 'bras kyi ljang du a/ ti'i lam/ 'od a ma/'dam bu ram/ bum gyi shing gi tshul lta bu r gyur la/ de dag thams cad bacing ba lngas bcisazhas/ la brgya stong sAd len pa 'ag/
mthu chenupo dang ldan pa'i gang zag gcig 'jig rten du mngon parubyungs/bsod namasa'adadapariphyir de dag gi bcings pa thams cad ng kro'anas// dgrab con pa de dag thams cadra spos chus bkrus
te chos gos dang lhung bzed bo brgya stong gi bar duphul nas/ gnas bang dang/ khri stan dad/ gos dang/ bsod snyoms dang/ nad kyi gsos sman dang/ 'tshong ra yo byad cha na nga sna tshogs kyang yid
bzhin du byin la/ dgra bcom pa de dgamya ngan las 'das nas kyang machod pa byas tebasrags nas dedag gi ring bsral bsdus te/ na pa tshesna bdun gyi na tshod rtan gyi nang du bcug go/ gzhan
yang rin po charilam tshan dang/ gdan dang/ gdugs dang/ spos dang/ ma tog dang/ rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa ribasodanams kyi phung pa gas/sangs rgyas kyi nga bsal gyi phyiramachod rten
brtsigs pa bsod nams kyi phung po mang/ dgra bcom ra ribacings pa bkrol te/ mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams kyis brgya'ichar yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// stong gi char yang nye bar mi ragur// brgya stong gi
charayang dbarami 'gro'o// bye ba ring yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ khrag khrig gi ngayang bar mi 'gro ba nas/rtsis kyi char ram/ grangasakyicharam/da pag pa'i char ram/dba'i
po chararan/ rgyu dperayang nye ba'agro'o// rigs kyi bu gal targyal rigs dge pa nas/ bram bu dag pa'i bar du gang gis sdig pa'i 'khor le bcu po dag kyang mi byed la/ gzhan dag kyang sdig pa'i
'bor le bcu po ma spyod cig par gros 'dabs na/ de'i bsod nams kyi phungapa ni bsod nams kyi phung po snga ma gang bas kyang tshadamed dang ga chumad/ brjod du med par chejisnyad kyibasodanam

skyes pa de skyed kyi sdig kyang yongs su byang bar 'gyuraro// gas kyi bu gal te rgyal rigs dag pa ram/ jonapo dge ba 'am/ khyim bdag gam/ tsheng dponanam/ dgaspong ngam/ bram ze dag ba la/nga zhigam/

khongs pa'i dus lnga brgya'i tha ma la dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig rtu'u ban ngas bstan pa'i chos kyi mig shin tu srung zhing bdag kyang n jusdom la/ ral po gzhan yang srung ba// 'jig rten phyi ma ring ba/

byed ba nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i slob ma chos kyi snod du gyur pa 'am/ chos kyi snod du ma gyur pa yang rung/ mtha' tshul khrims mad pa yang rung ste/ sgra dang la spu brags nus gos ngur smig gyon pa la
shin dubag byed cing/ bsti stang du bcas pas mchod deganod pa mi byedadag/ gzhan yang theg pa gsum gyi dam pa'i chosashin tusrung zhing nyan te/ 'dzin pa dang/ 2 shes kyi chos la bsti stang byed pa//

rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i tshes dang/ theg pa chen po'i sa la ma rang mi sla ba dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang/ theg pa chen la phrag dog mi skye ba dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos la rim/

gro byad de/ nyan cing 'dzin pa na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang/ theg pa chen po'i sa la mi 'a mi skang/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang/ theg ba chen po la phrag dog miskyed pa dang/ theg pa chanapo'i chos la rimasra byed

nyan cing 'dzin nga na/1rjes kyi theg pa dang/ rungasangs rgyas kyi theg nga 'a rjesalami bcas mi skur cing/ nyan thos kyi theg pa ba dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa la phrag dog mi skyad la/nyan thas kyi theg

pa dang rang sangs rgyasakyi theg pa'i chos mngon du byed de// theg pa chen po'i chos yang dag pa zhing mngon du byed pa dang ! theg pa napo la gnas pas tshul khrims dang ldan pa// yon tan dang ldan pa/brtson
'grus rtsom pa nas 'bras bu la gnas pa'i bar dunan tan byed pa'i gang zag la rtag tu bstan bkur byed cing/ g.yog dang mchod pa dang/ dad pa'i sems kyis bkur sti byed da/ 'dri bangang/ 3na ba dang/
'di par byed pa dang/ tshul khrims nyams pa sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong dgaring du spong ba dang/ dad pas phul ba'i phyogs bzhi'i dag 'dun nor la chos ma yin pas chud gson dum gzhug pa dang/ phyogs

bzhi'i dge 'dunagyizher dang/ mchod rten dang/ dge 'dun gyi khud pa'i nor la bdag kyang thugs thub mi byed cing/ pha rol po gzhan yang thugs thub tu spyod dum 'dzud pa dang/ theg pa gsum gyi chos spruba'i

gang grug la shinatu bstesang dang bcas pas ma chod cing ma thu nga lta ba dang/ phal po gzhan dag 'phya zhing skur pa dang/ sbyong du mi gzhug pa dang/ rab tu byung ba'i gang zag kha shin tu/ gang phrug la 'du totil
dudangs spro ba ngaskyed pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i 'phags pa'i bka' la drad cing 'dzin pa dang/ mchod rten 'jig pa dang/ phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi gzhasu gtsug lag khang

skyong ba dang/ nga rebastan pa la rab tu byung ba'i slob ma dag la dbang mi bra zhingaphyir yang khyim pa mi 'babs pa dang/ grwa pa'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu po la bdag kyang mi spyod ngo/ b.rol pa gzhan yang
sngag pa ri' kharale rnam pa bcu pa yongs su spyongs shig par gros 'debs pa dang/ rgyal po snga ma ri chos lugs dang srid kyis 'tsho zhing/dag bab tu las kyi lam gyis 'jig rten mang po yongs
su sdug cing snyanang dang/ rtag tudag dra'id shes gnyen la bstan pa dang/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung 'tshob cing shin tu rgyas par byed pa dang/ chos kyi rnaganam du yang mi nub par srung ba'i
rgyal rigs dag ba nas/ bram bra dge ba'i bar du dedag de lta bu yon tan dang ldan ngs na/ de dag 'tshogs spyod pa chud bu bar mi 'gyur budang/ lha dang/ mi dang gnadasbyin dang/ yi dgos dang/
lus srul po la sogs pa thams cad kyang dga' sku/ byams pa risams kyis srung zhing skyabang// chos kyi snod du gyurer bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa thams cad kyang dga' zhing snying rje'i
xxx
thams cad kyang bka' 3na dom thab par rang 'du ba dang/ da'i dbang gis dge ba'i phyogasal phyir zhing brtson te/ mdage ba'i rgyud yongs su skams pa dang/ lhudang mi la sogs pa yos sa rgyus shing
kun tshu bsrung ba'i phyir/ rje shin tu ring bar 'gyur ba dang/ bdag gi nyon mongs pa yang yongs su 'dzoms shing pha rol po'i nyin mongs pa yang 'jig b.rabyed// byang chub sems dpa'i lam pha
rol tu phyin pa drug phas su bzung bas/ lag bar lta ba'i lam ngan pa thams cad yo gu bcomapas 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor yun ring bar 'khor ba las ldogapasdig pa'i bshes gnyamyong zhing
dag bu'i bshes gnyen la rtag tu bstanapa dang/ gang nas gang du skyaba'i gnas thams cad du sas rgyas dang byang chubugs dang 'o dang phrad cing bsAn bkur ba dang/ mchod pa rgyun mi'am
bar byedapar 'gyur ba dang/ ring po mi thogs par bsams pa bzhin du gang nas gang dudaga' ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dadadadad du blon nang pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub tumangonong tshang
rgya par 'gyurar/ de nas de'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de'i nang nas lha'i dbang po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad nas// shagra'i dbang po 'khor dang bcas pa tham cad kyi
bar du 'dug pa las las sa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos gtugs nas pha lamosbyar nas ba sti stang dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te//

nga tsun pa bcom ldan 'dasamamatshos ra 'i dus lnga brgya ri zhal sas rgyusakyi zhing 'dir dam pa'i rab tu rnam par 'jig du nye ba na/ gal te rgyal rigs dge bas/ bram ze dge ba'i bar du gang sdig pa'i 'go
lo rnam pa bcu bdag kyang yongs su sbas la/ gzhan yang yongs su ljongs shig par gros 'debs pa dang/ bdag dang gzhanasrung ba lagabs ra// 'jig rtenaglang ma'i bag bgyid pa la mkhas pa/dam pa'i tshes
srung/ dkanamchog gsum gyi gdung 'tshob cing rgyun mi 'chad bar rgyas par bgyid pa nas/ mdoran bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ltar/ gang zag dengag la sogs pa theg pa gsum gyi chos lA pa ste stong
dang bcas pasan cing 'dzin te/ nam du yang mi'atshab pa dang/ theg pa gsum la gnas pa'i gang thaga'angashin tu srung zhing gad ra bgyid de/ gnod pa mi bgyid pa dang/ dkon mchog gsum gyi nor rdzas la
shin tusrung zhing gdaparami bgyid pa'i rgyal rigs dag dranas/ bram bra dge ba'i bar du ded la 'budag cag 'khor dang bcas pas bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang chos rnam pa 'di bcu yang skye zhing 'phel

bar bgyi'o// bcu gang zhe na/ tshe ring bar 'gyur ba dang/ bgegs med pa skye zhing 'phel ba dang/ nad med pa sku zhing 'phel ba dang/ 'khor skye zhing 'phar ba dang/ nor dang rin po sku zhing 'phags pa dang/'tsho ba'i mi'i

byad skye zhing 'phal ba dang/ go 'phang sku zhing 'phal ba dang/ grags pa skya zhingarephal ba dang/ dge ba'i grogs po skye zhinga' phal ba dang shes rab skye zhing 'phel ba dang/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te rgyal rigs
