dge ba dang/ bram bre dag ba'i bar du sdig pa'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu pa yongs su spong zhing pha yul po gzhan yang spong bar gros 'debs//yon tan sngar smos pa dang ldan/ bdag cag kyang srung zhing skyab pa dang/ sa/

rnam pa bcu po yang skye zhing 'phar bar 'gyu garo// bcom ldan 'das gzhanayang rgyal rigs dge ba nas/ bram ze dge ba'i bar dugapaskyes pa'i yon tan de dag dang ldan na/ bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pas de la

bsrung zhing bskyab pa dang/ chos rnam pa bcu po 'di dang yongs su bral bar gyi'o// bcu gang zhen )'di lta ste/ dgra zhe 'gras pa thams cad dang yongs su bral ba dang/ yid dumi 'ong ba'i gzugs dang/ sgra dang/ dri dang

'i dang 'dzeg bya'i yul dang yongs su bral ba dang/ rims dang nad thams cad dang yongs su bral bdang/ log par 'dzin cing ngan pa thams cad dad yongs su bral ba dang/ lag pa 'a skyabs su 'gro ba dang yongs

gu rul ba dang/ log pa'i ltas ngan pa thams cad dang yongs su bral ba ngang/ leg pa'alas ngan pa'i dngos po thams cad dang yongs su bral thadang/ lag pa'i bshes gnyen ngan pa thams cad dang bral ba dang/
khyim na gnas pa'i 'dam rdzab thams cad dang yongs su bral bdang/ dus ma yin pa bo bur du 'chib thams cad nang yongs su bral bas// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te shin tu dag ba'i rgyal rigs nas bram
[©]// dag pa'i bar du gang zhig yon tan sngaragasungs pa rnams dang ldan n/ bdag cag 'khor dang bcas te de la srung zhing skyob pa dang/ yongs su bral ba'i chos rnam pa bcu po 'di yang shang
[>>par bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang rgyal rigs dge bu nas/ bram bre dag nga 'i bar du gangagis sdar gsungs pa'i yo na da yongs su rdzogs pa na tan byen/ bdag cag 'khor dang bcas te bsrung
'dabaskyab par 'tshal la// rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa dang/ yul de na gnas pa'i mi thams cad kyang chos rnam pa 'ding/cu dang yongs su bral b.rab gyi'o// bcu gang zhe na/ yul pha rol gyi dgra thams
cad dang yongs su bral ba dang/ bdag gi yul gyi ragra thams cad dang bral ba dang/ bkra shis pa'i yi dgas thams cad dang yongs su bral ba dang/ than pa dang yongs su bral ba dang/ gnod par 'gyur ba'i

char chudang yas su bral ba dang/ dus ma 'a gsang re tshang dang grang ga dang/ rlung dang char drag po dang/ sad dang sar gyi gnad nga ra 'gyu rnga da 2mas cad dang yongs su bul bdang/ gzu' dang ltas ngan du gyur pa
thams cad dang yongs su bral ba dang/ mu ge'i dgon pa thams cad dang yongs su bral ba dang/ dus ma yin par nad kyis 'khor 'gyur ba dang yongs su bral ba dang/ log par 'dzin cing ngan par lta bathams

cad dang yongs su bral ba ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal tergyal rigs dge ba'i rgyal pos yon tan sngar gsungs pa de dag kun la nan tan bgyi decing yongs su rdzogs par brang na/ bdag cag 'khor dang bcas/
pas bsrung zhing bskyab par 'tshal le// rgyal po 'kher dang bcas nga dang yul de na gnas pa'i mi thams cad kyang yongs su bral ba'i chos bcu po 'di dag thob par bgyid do// de nas bcom ldan

'das kyis/ lha'i dbang po 'khor dang bcas pa nas/ shabra'i dbang po'i bar du 'khor dang bcas pa la legasaso legs so zhes bstong nas/ khyod rnams 'di ska da du yi dam bcas pa'i dngos po 'di dag khyed kyis bya ba'i

rigs pas de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis khyed la yun ring bar phan pa dang bde ba'i don du 'gyur ro// de nas tshangs pa chen po lha'i snying ngos bcom ldan 'das la yang 'di skad ces gsol to// ma mchis pa'i dus
na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir rgyal rigs dgang thams cad kyi slad du/ yul bsrung la soms phyir mi ldog pa'i gzungs chen po'i ga 'di dag 'bul lo// yul yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir/ phyir mi ldog pa'i

'khongalenyis bya ba'i gzungs sngags chen pa'i tshig 'di'i gzi brjid dang mthus ma a ches pa'i dus na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dirargyal rigs dge ba'i rgyal po thams cad la phas rgol ba'i dgra thams cad
kyis mi tshugs pa dang/ phas rgol ba thams cad zhi zhing rang ldog par 'gyur nga dang/ lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid kyi lasu shin rtsom pa dang/ mkhas pa rnams kyis bsngags shing bstod pa dang/ sdig pa'i

ches yongs su spongazhingadag nga'i chos la rtag tu nan tan bgyid pa dang/ naparalta ba dang/ ngan par phyogs pa rtag tu spong zhing theg pa chen po la shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus bon ngasanan tan bgyid ba dang
stod dugyurapa'isanas canatshadamad grangs med nga yongs su smin pa lnga bgyid pa dang/ shes rab gzhan gyi dring la 'brong b.ramakhas pa'i brtson 'grus rang bzhin can du gyur pa de bkol/

tuphyin nga drug gi rin ba cha'i gter rdzogs par nan tan bgyid pas/ khong khrog dang/ ser sna dang/ phrag dog la sogs pa kun nas 'onamongs pa'i dri ma thams cad yongs su spong ba dang/ midang min yin pa la/
sogs nga thams cad kyis bas snang dang bcas da sa skyab par 'gyu budang/ bya ba rnamanyaka' brjod mi ngasapa dang/ bsdu ba rnam pa bzhi dungs pa la dga' bas sams can mi gtong ba dad/ rtag tu

chos kyi snod bsad nams kyi zhing dugyur ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyungaro// yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i snying po la bkor rtsal nga/ khyod kyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus nasangs rgyas kyi zhinga'adir rgyal po

rgyal rigs dge ba'i tshul du srung ba'i phyir/ phyir mi ldog pa'i srung po zhes bya ba'i gzungs chenango'i tshig smyos shig/ yul yongs su bsrung ba la phyi mi ldog pa'i 'khor la'i snying bo zhes bya ba'i gzungs
chen pa'i tshig 'di'i mthu dang gzi brjid kyis/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus nasangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir rgyal rigs dge ba thams cad la phas rgol ba'i dgra thugs cad kyisazhitshugs pa nas/de bzhin du rgya
padzesangs rgyas dang/ sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi bar du thams cad dang mi 'bral bar bsrung bar 'gyurab smos shig/ denas tshangs pa chen po lha'isnying pos yul yongs su srung ba la
phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor leb sdong po zhes bya ba'i gzungs chen po'i tshig 'di dag smras so// tad+yathAmunimar/ mun garab+ha/ mu gale rgyu yo/ muni drag gitsale/nun ha/la te/muni gam/ shu glapake
pa shapake ]gril paka/ so'u ris kyi tre/ toraNakri tshule/ba DA la ga sha krite/ ku kul mr-i te ! a pas ra/ adahakyileb mun b bA bAsAhA/ tshangs pa chen po lha'i snying pos gathungs 'asmras
nas bcom ldan 'das la yang 'adi skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'khor mang po dang bcas bdag gis bshad pa'i gzungs chen po 'di la rjes su yi rang bar mdzad du gsol/
bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so legs so zhes bka' stsal to// 'khor mang po thams cad kyis kyang legs so legs so zhes smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/
de'i tshen/ tshodang ldan pa mo'u 'gal ya na chen po dang/ byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad cag bka' stsal to// rigs kyibu khyod kyis tshangs pa chen po lhang ngos
phul ba yul yongs su bsrung ba la phyir ldog pa'i 'khor lo'i sdong po zhes bya ba'i gzungs chenapo'i tshig 'di dag gzungs su zung zhig/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i rgyal
rigs dge ba'i rgyal po thams cad la yang rgyas pa la ston cig/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis na rgyal rigs dge ba'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dang/ yul de na gnas pa'i mi thams cad
[9] ]/la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du 'gyur te/ rtag tu chos kyi 'khor skor ba dang 1kashin tu grags pa che ba dang/ gzi brjid che bar 'gyur ba dang/ [–]na par lta ba'ajoms shing yang dag

po pa'i lta ba ra dzugs pa dang/ chos kyi mig srungazhing dkon mag gsum gyi gdung rgyunami 'chad par 'tshob pa dang/ sems can tshad mdangangag tu med pa yongs su ston par byed pa dang/ theg pa chen po/
la dadang ngashin du brtan nga dang/ yun ring ponas pha rol du phyin pa drug sgom pa la gnas shing bsgribs pa nas cad batud nas myur du mtha'i gnas byed par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar pa brus pa'i phyiretshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// detshungs chen3(yi snying pas// rkang gnyis mchog la 'di skad zhus so// dbang po rna ba'i skya bo
dugani 3 ting 'dzin sgom zhing bsad nams byedamos/ rgyal pon ra sa pas tshes 'dugs byas pa// shin tu 'khyam pa 'dag cing bsgral phyir/ stod ba'i dngos po gsum po 'di la// gang dag thatsam
sel cing ma ldag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skadabaka' stsal// gal te mi gnas mi bya de byas// blo gros che shing shes rab rnayang// mtshams med sams can dmyal bar lhung 'gyur//
mkhas pa yang dog pa dag ma yin// sdig pa banuyi 'khor lo spyodamos// dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bcad pas// myur du sams can dmyal bar lhung 'gyur/ de ring ngo 'dzin ninyon mongs kun
gcod// nyan pa'i bsod nams tsam gyis ma yin// de bsamya ngan 'da' bar 'dod pa// rtag tu bsam gtan la ni nyam gzhas// mkhas pas shin tu brtson 'grus rtsom pa// nga yi yang dag
chos ni srung 'dzin// durasIg gyon la dad cing gus pas// nyon mo des rgya mtsho las ni gra'i 'gyur// shin tu dben ba'i bsamathar gnas te/ mtshams med byed pa rnam par rung spangs// tshul
khrims 'dzin cing ting 'dzin sgom la// dad pas srid ra ri rgyamatsho sgro' 'gyur// thug ba rnam gsum kun la dadang// du yi yad dag chos ni rgyas byed/ durasmig gyul mchod pa byas n// yon
tanam nga 'i rgyumatshor des 'gyur// gdul dka'i sems canu[é]na tu btul te// dug slong rnams kyi nyes pa mi gleng// chog shes 'phags pa'i rogs 'tshob pa ni// rkang gnyis dam
pa'i mchog du des 'gyur/ dag slong sdig can dang ni spangs te// 'phags pas sngo da pa'i gnas la bsten bya// dge 'dunanoral mi spyod mi za// myur du byang chub chen po thob 'gyur//
khams gsum kun na bad shing skyid pa// de yang dkon mchog sum las byung bas// dngas bde zhing skyid pa 'dod ba// rtag du dkon mchog gsum lamatshod byas// gdal nga 'a rgyal po dag la
sa gas pa// dge slang sdig ra spyod pa'i grags dag/ dkon mchog gsum la nyes pa bskyad pas// mtshams med sems can dmyal bar lhung 'gyur// 'brumar ratshor ba panuya sdag pa// smad

gi sdig dang de nam// gzhan nga gnas ni bcu ya sdeb dag/ rgyal pod gcig gi sdig dang de mnyam// yang dag dge ba'i rgyal po dag ni// nga yi yang dag chos kun rgyas byed// brag pa rnam
gsum kun la mchod pas/// yon tan rnam pa'i rgya mo des 'gyur// rin chen sna bdun 'dzam gling bkang ste// sangs rgyas dge 'dun rnams la phul ba'i// bsod nams phung po thob pa desani//
sangs rgyas chos srung can du mi phod// sangs rgyas dag 'dunu ngazhags nga re gnas dag/ gling bzhi bcu dang mnyam nga byas pa'i// bsod nams phung po thob pa des kyang// sangs rgyas/
chos srung tsam ni ma yod:/ sangs rgyas dug gi mchod rten brtsigs pa// stong gsum khams dang mnyam pa byas pa'i// bsod nams phung pa thob pa des kyang// sangs rgyas chos srung tsam niu0f00
yod (dgra bcom pa yi bcings pa bkral nas// mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kun bas// sa kyi bar chadam byas pa yi// bsadanams des ni dngas mchog 'gyur// bskal pa bye ba stong
gi bar du// mkhas pas ting radzin bsgoms pa yin// khyad par can gyi blo skyes gang bas// chos srung ba yi bsod nams de// shin tu dge ba'i rgyal po gang dag/ sog pa bcu yi 'bol
rlangs te// ngas yang dag chos 'di skyabs sam// ngur smig gyon pa dag kyang bsrangs na/ des gsungs pa yi thug pa gsum dang// gang zag dag 'phyaskur mi byed// kun kyang nyan cingaman
pa byed la// chos sma nga yi skyabs dang mgonabyed// dkon mchog gsum nor chudami gatren cing/ du sa gos gyon pa'i bar chad mi byed// god dang stod ma yin pa kun la// gus na de yi bsod nams
dpamed// ji ltarim lnga po sharan// rgyamatsho'i na po kun ni skams te// de bzhin nga yi sa srung ba de// nyon mongs pa rgya mtshoskums 'gyur// ji ltar rlung gis 'jig pa byung tshe// ra rnams thamang
cad 'jig pa bzhin du/ nga yi skyes la srung pa de yang// kun nas nyon mongs thams cad 'dzams 'gyur// ji ltar yis 'jig pa byung tshe// sa chen yis g.yengs te 'jig 'gyur// de bzhin nga yi ches
srung ba yang// yid dumi rongs dras bu 'dzems 'gyur// ji ltar rin chenayid bzhin nor bus// 'dod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs byang// dbazhin thag pa gsum gyi tshos kyang// sems can kun gyi sman
pa rdzogs byang/ gang gis bum pa bzang po redan// dbul dang bral tebad skyid thob 'gyur// dbazhin sangs rgyasazhes dang phradang// btsem chod cing byang chub thob 'gyur// ji ltar bco lnga'i blang na
red kyis namamakhar thams cad kun snang// de bzhin chos srung ba ya gang brag/ shes rab kyis ni chos dbyings kun khyab// jiltar nam ma ba'i kun mnyam 'a// rdzas kyang med cing mtshe'amamad pa/

de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dang nga chen po rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de'i nang na 'dug pa las 'das te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos gtugs nas/ bla gos gcig phyags/

min nga yi sras ma yin zhes gsungs// dge sbyong chos nyid spangasangashang thol ba 'dra ba dag/ nga yi rnam dag 'dro 'dir gnas pa mdzes pa min// dri ma gsum gyis bskos shing 'gog dad
lam star ba'i// khyad par can gyi mchod pa gang yang des mi'u// phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun dbang bar bsngos pa nor dag lta// chashas nyung zad tsam yang spyod du ngas ma gnang// tshul khrims rtsa
ba gzhi las gcig tsam nyams pa dag/ dge 'dun 'khor du mi chud rgyamatsho'i ro dang mtshungs// ci'i slad du deng 'dir dge slong sdig can la// snying rjes dang du blangs te spyod ngos ma gcod par//

[n/ ]phyir yang de la mchod pa byes shes bskul mdzad cing// brtse la snying rje can gyis ngan mas yongs spongs la// de la bsti stang bcas bstan pa'i chos mnyan na// bsod nams ye shes tshogs thob snying rje/

nga'ilamadesongs shes gsungs// ci'i slad du deng 'dir theg pa gsum bshad de// kun gyis de'anyan cingaachod pa bgyi bar bskul// dbang bo skabs dang byang chub dgesbyong 'bras bu yang/ mdo
sde 'di gzhan du gsungs pa mad// dang mda'aphags lam yan lag brgyad pa 'dir// theg pa rnam gsum kun kyang lam der 'jugamed de// rnam par grol la 'dod pas brtson 'grus rab bskyed
nas// ga gor ba bzhin du byang chub thob b.ra'agyur// 'gro ba kun gyi gtsobos 'di dag rnam dbya ba// snga phyir bstan pa 'di dgumi 'ga' bstan pa na// lha dang me dang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor
thams cad// yang dag bden pa rtogs shing rnam grol dga' babaskyod// theg pa chen po bshad nga sa gang la phan 'gyur dang// theg pa chen po bshad pas gang la gnod par 'gyur// nyan thos
theg pas rnam par grol ba dachu bo yis// bshad pa thos nas gang la gnod dang phan par 'gyur// gang zhig chos 'di thos pas gong nas gong du 'phar// gang zhig chos 'dothos pas phyi
zhing ltung bar 'gyur// ji ltar 'dus byas kun gyisan gyis skyongs nas// rgya dang 'chi ba'i rgya mtsho myur du snyanas par 'gyur// khyimtshanadage ba rnams la shin tu brtson

dang bde pa'i don gyi phyir/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin la sogs pa'i don chen po'i phyir/ deng zhenagashegs pa'ashin du brab mo'i don 'di dag zhus pa legs so// shin du legs par 'og la

shin du yid la zung zhig dang/ ngas khyod la rnam pa phra su bshad da zhes bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dang 'a rdo rje'i snying du bcom ldan 'das las slar nyan to// bcom ldan 'das kyisaraka'astsal
pa rigegs kyi dugang zag rnam pa bcu po 'di dgan 'khor zhing ma'i lus shin tu rnyed par dka' 'o// gang thug rnam pa bcu pa gang shun/ 'di la// dge ba'i rtsa bam spyad pa dang/ bsod nams
kyi las mi byed pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs par nying mtshams sbyor ba dang/ grogs po sdig pa'i rjes su spyod pa dang/ 'jig rten phyi ma'i sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu la 'jigs par mi lta ba dang/
'dod chags bde bar gyur pa dang/ zhe sdang bde bar gyur pa dang/ gtilug bab gyur pa dang/ sems mas shing 'khrug pa dang/ leg par lta ba'i sdig pa can dam du 'dzin pasdu/ gnas shing mi bya bar

bya ba'i rnam pa bcu po radi'i rgyus sems can dag tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba 'jig cing/ tshul khrims nyams par byed pas ngan song dultung bar 'gyur ro// gnas shing spyad par mi bya ba rnam pabatsugang zhan/
'di lta ste/ nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba dag/ la la ni lhag pa'i spyod pa nyams la mos pa ma nyams pa yang yod/lal mos pa nyams laMlhag pa'i spyod pa ma nyams pa yang yod/la'ani
lcag pa'i spyod pa dang mos pa gnyis ka nyams pa yang yod do// la lo nitshul khrims nyams la lta pa nyams pa yang yod la lani lta ba nyams la tshul khrims mashums pa yang yod: la lanatshul
khrims dang lto ba gnyisakams pa yang yod do// la la ni lhag pa'i spyod pa dang mos pa dang tshul khrims dang lta ba nyams kyang sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang du gyur te gnas shing spyad par mi byub dge
byed pa yod/lal ningag pa'i bshes gnyen la bstan pa'i dbang du gyur kyang thunapa'irang bzhin can lug bzhin du lhugs pa/ las kyi dngas pa'i bye brag kyang ma phyid la/ dgaba'i bshes gnyen gyis

dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos bstan pa thos kyang mi ge/ mi 'dzin/ mishis te// de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis gnas shing spyad par mi bya ba dag byed de// nor dang/ rin po che dang/'tsho ba'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs
kyis mi skyo bar kun tu tshol ba'i rgyus sems 'khrugs pas gnas shing spyadapar mi bya ba dag byed pa'i 'dus byas kyi nad mang pos gzi cing gdungs pa'i phyir/ 'jig rtagapa lha rjodang dang/

stod do// 'din rang sangs rgyas kyi thig pa dang ldan pa'o// gang zag gang lhag pa'i spyod pa dang dmas pa gnyis nyams na/ da theg pa gang gi chos kyi snyad du yang mi 'gyur med kyi/ de bzhin gshegs

bshad do// chad par lta ba ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos kyi sngags la 'dado// rtog bar lta ba la khams gsum gyi srid pa'i rgyun 'di dago nas shi 'phosan/ gzhan du skyes de/ rdza mkhan gyi 'khon
lo ltarargyunam 'bad par 'khor ba dang/ mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i chos radado// gas kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas ji skad du ming ded brda dang/ yi ge dang/tshig dang sgra ska da kyis bstan pa thams cad
'bras bu skad cing domadab ma yin te/ kun kyang sams can yongs su smin paru buba'i dan tu mkhastan pa med do// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos la 'phya zhing skuran/ sems can/
rnams kyi yang dag pa'ichos kyi mig bcar ba'i sdig pa yin bas/ mtshams med pa las 'das pa 'am/mtshams med pa dang 'dra ba'i kha na ma tho bsdig pa tshad med pa thob par 'gyur ro//

chen po la brten te gsungs pa gang la yang rung/ 'phya zhing skur pa 'am/ bar chod dang bgegs byas sam/ chung dun tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam 'chab pa'i las byas na/ deni dam ba'i sa
la skur pa yin par rigaparang ska raphags pa'i lam gyi yan lag brgyadamad par byed pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dem pa'i chos kyi mig nyams par byedapa yin nga sa/gang brag de'id lta'abadag

chos la 'ju zhing skur pa 'debs pa'o zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang dge slong rnam pabazhi yodade/ bzhigang zhe na/ don dam ra'i dge slong dad/ kun rdzob kyi dge slongadang 'galkugs
ba lta bu'i dge slong dang/ khrel ba dngango tshamed bdag slong ngo// de la ji ltanadon dam pa'i dge slong gang zhen/ 'dilta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sam/byang chub sems

ga songamishes/ lci ram mang ba yang mi shes/ nyes pa phra mo rnam pa sna tshogs byas kyang 'gyod cing 'grolami shes/nyes pa byas ba la slakhyad cing/ sdig pa phramo lami lta/ mi 'jigs/mkhas pa'i skyes
du'ami rtan/ skabs skabs su mang du thos pa shes rab dang ldan pa la bstan bkur dang g.yog kyang mi byed/ bsti stang dang bcas te zhuzhing 'drib yang mi shes/ dge ba gang mi dge ba ni gang/ sdig
pa nigang/ sdige pa med pa ni gang dwagang byas na legs/gangangs nam legs pa yang zhu ba dang/ 'dri bar mi byedapa gang thug de dag ni lug lkugs pa lta bu'i dge slong du bsdu ste/lug lkugs pa lta

yan lag gi'akhor thams cad dang ring du gyur ba'i phyir/ 'phags pa'i lam las rgyal ba zhes bya'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dang 'u dge 'dun gzhan gyi drung lami'ajog par chos thams cad la ye she
kyis thogs ba med dar gzigs shing/ sems can thams cad la phan ba dang bde ba'i don gyis sdud pa yang las las rgyal ba'idag spyang gi nang du bsdu'o// don dam pa'i dge slong dang/ kun rdzob kyi

dag slong la bcig gi lam ston pa'i dge sbyong gi nang du bsdu'o// gang so sor thar ba'i tshul khrin sa dang ldan zhing yang dag pa'i dge ba'i skya bo nas/ 'jig rten gyi yang dug bar lta bu dud ldan pa'i shes pa brda

sprod ba la brten te/ cho'aphrul gyi mthus gzhan la 'bags pa'i lam gyis rnam par phye ste ston cing 'chad pa'i gang zag de ni lam ston pa'i dge sbyong tham ste/ lam ston pa'i dag sbyong zhes bya'o/ rgyun tu
zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa'i gang bu ni gnyis pa zhes bya'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa'i gang zag de gsum pa zhes bya'o// phyir mi 'ong ba ri'abrasabu thob pa'i gang zagaden bzhi pa
zhes bya'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ri dge 'dun ni lnga pa zhes bya'o// sa dang po la gnas pa nas/ sa bcu dang srid pa tha ma lus la gnas ba de yang lam ston pa'i

dag sdong gi nang dung snga'o// gangaso so thar pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan zhing spyod lam rnamapar dam pa dang ldan pa dag ni lam gyis 'tshe ba'i dag srung gi nang du bsdu ste/ lam gyis srog 'dzin pa'i phyir/
lag gyos 'tsho ba'i dug sbyongazhes bya'o// gzhan yang byang rlub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po gangasams can thams cad la bdu dad bod ba'i don du sdod cing/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la tani
byed pa dang ldan pa de yang lam gyis 'tshob zhes bya'o// de ltar lam las rgyal ba dang/ lumaston pa dang/ lam gyis 'tsho ba'i dag sbyong rnam pa gsum po 'di ni 'jig rten ba'i bsod zhams
kyi zhing yang dag pa zhes bya'o// de las gzhan pa'i dag sdong dag ni lam sun 'byin pa zhes bya ba sta/ yang dag pa ma yin mod kyi/ de yang bsod nams kyi zhing grangs su 'gro'o// gang
'dzum pa dang ngo tshab med pa'i dge 'dun la gnas shing brtson pa'i gangabrag dran/ ngas yang dag par bstan pa'i'adul ba'i chos las mi lta bu 'o zhes gsungs te yos su dag pa'i
dge 'dun gyi rgya mtsholas byung b.rabya 'chos kyi snod ma yin pas na/ gangabrag del nga ni ston pa chenab yin nozhasami gosung la/gang bgade yang nga'i nyan thos ma yin no// ngo bamadara'i dag
slong chos kyi snod du gyur pa dag nga la ston par 'dzin cing nga'i ring bsral dang nga sku'i gzugasakhan shin tu dad pa dang/ ngaris dang/ dge 'dun dang/ 'phags
pa'i tshul khrims la yang shin tu dad pas/ bdag kyang zla ba dran par mi 'dzin la/ pha rol po gzhwan yang lta ba nganeb la chags par mi byed pa dang/ ngas bstan pa'icos rgyas bar ston/ shin tu

wa bsngags shing bstod pa byedakyi/de la 'phya ba'am skur pa mi 'debs pa dang/ rtag tu yang dag pa'i smonalam 'debs pa dang/ sdig pa byas mthag tu yang dang yang 'tholatsadi 'byed de spron/'as kyisgrib pa mang
po zhi bar 'gyurd/ de lta gung thag de dkon mchog gsum dang/ 'phags pa'i tshul khrims la dad pa'i shugs kyis/ mu sdugs can dgu bcu rtsa lnga bas brgya stong skud kyis lhag go/ myur du mya ngan las
'darab 'e grong khyer du phyin pa nam yin modakyi/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos kyang mi bsgrunan/ dem yin pa skye bo gzhan lta smos kyang cingagos/ de bas na du btin gshegs pas semasacon thams cad

kyi las dang myong ba'i chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam pa tha dadang mkhyen cingagabrigs pa'i phyir/gang 'di skad du nga'i bstan pa'i chos la dad nas skra dang kha spu bregs te/gos ngur smig gyon pa la/ rgyal rigs la

sogs pa gshe zhing smra ba dang/ chad pas gcod ngami dbang ngo zhes gsungs te/ gang gis banas sad dam/ rab tu byung ba thams cad la gshe zhing spyasasam/mdangs gde na kha na ma tho ba'i 'bras bu smin pa/

ni ji ltar rgyas par bashadar bzhin// gzhan yang nga'i bstan pa la khyim nas khyim ma yin par rab tu byung ste/ skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smig gyonan/ de la ni 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang/ da
ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis thugs rjes rjes su 'dzin te// spyod lam dang/ lugs dang/ chos gos gyon pa la yang 'dus pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ daltarab zhugs/

pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang thugs rjes rjes su 'dzin to// de bas na skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smig gyon pa'i rab du byung ba la bltos smadan/ ngani 'das pa dang/ ma byed pa dang/ daltar
bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shums cad la brnyes song ba yin no// de rgyu de'i rkyenagyis mkhas pa blo nan sreg bsngal gyis skyo zhing 'jigs pa/ lha dang mi dang mya ngan las 'da' ba'i

bde ba 'dod pa ngag khyim nas khyim ma yin par rngab tu byung ste/ skra dang kha spu bregs nasogos ngur smig gyon pa la brnyas pa dang snodapa mi bya'o// gang thug ngo tshab med pa'i dag sbyong tshul khrims

mas pa thag pa gsum gyi 'phags pa'i chos kyi snod dus rgyur ba/ bangag nyidi lta ba ngan pa'i sdig pa la mngon par zhon du/ gzhan yang lta ba ngan ba'i sdig pa la chags par byed pa de la rgyal rigs dge

ga dang/ dag sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/ blon po dang/ khyim bdag dang/ tshong dpon dang/ rje'u rigs dang/ dmangs rigs dang/ skyes ba dang/ budachod dag ma da de zhes smra kho dang/ gzhan yang 'jig rten na dza/
[99/ ]]yang med/ ma yang med pa nas/dge ba dang mi dge ba dang/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yang mad ]'phags ba'i lam gyi 'bras bu thob pa yang med do zhes smra ba dang/ chos thams
[>cad rgyu las rgyas pa ma yin no zhes smra ba dang/ gzhan yang gzugs yod pa'i khams ni rtag pa yin gyi'ajig ra richos ma yin par 'dzin pa dang/ gang gzugs med pa'i khams ni rtog pa yin te/'jig
pa'i 'os ma yin pa'adzin pa dang/ la la nimu stags can gyi brtul zhugs kyis mthar phyin pa'i ma bar dag pa thob par 'dzin to// la lanishan thos kyi thog ba 'ba' zhig gisamathar phyin
pa'i rnam par dag pa thob kyi deradusangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang/ theg pa chen pos ma yin par 'dzin te/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la dad cing yid Nes nas/ bsngags shing bstod pa dang 'drud cing ston gyi/

rangasangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang/ theg pa chen po la 'phya zhing skur pa 'debs po dang/ spyod cing bar chadabyed la/ bgegs byad de ston dum phyur ba yang yod do// la la nirang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'ba'
zhig gis mthar phyin b.rinam par dag pa thub kyi/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang/ theg pa chen pos ma yin par 'dzin te/rangasangs rgyas kyi thug pa la dad cing yid chas de bstod cing bsngags pa dang

'byedacinge ston gyi nyan thos kyi thog pa dang/ theg pa chen po la raphya zhing skur pa 'debs pa dang/ spyod cing bar chad byed la bgags byed de ston du mi ster ba yang yod do// lal ni thog ba chenapo

'ba' zhig gis mthar phyin pa'i rnam par dag pa thab kyi/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyis theg nga sa ma yin par 'dzin te/ thag pa sman pa ladad cing yid ches ngas/ gzhan yang dad cing
yid ches bar byed/bdag rim gro dang bkurwa sti byedu bas/ gzhan yang ma gro dang bkur sta byed du'adzud/ bdag de la bstod cing bsngags pas/ gzhan yang bstod cing bsngags su bcug/ bdag/
glegs bam du 'dri bus/ gzhan yang glegs bam du'adrer bcug/ bdag krug cing 'don pas/ gzhan yang klog cinga'adon du bcug/ bdaganyen cing 'dzin pas/ gzhan yang nA cing 'dzin du
bunug bdag sems shing yid la byed pas/ gzhan yang semasangashingayid la byed du 'jug ste/ skya bo chos kyi snod du gyur pa 'am/ snad ngum gyur pa yang rung thams cad la theg pa napo'i
don dam pa shin tu brab pa phra ba rnam par 'byed lung ston te/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang rangasangs rgyas kyi theg pa la rupha zhing skur pa 'dabs pa dang smad cing bgegs dang badrachad byed de/
stonu dum ster ba dang nga dgam dad pas/ gzhan dad pa skya ba'i bgegs byed pa dang/ bdag rim ga mi byed pas/ gzhan rim gro byed pa'i bgegs byed pa dang/ bdag mi bstod pas/gzhanabastod pa'i
bgegs byed ba dang/ bdag glegs bam mi 'dri bas/ gzhan glegs bam du 'dri ba'i bgegs byad pa dang/ bdag klog pa dang/ 'don pa dang/ nyan pa dang 'dzin pa dang/ shes pa dang/
yid lami byedangs Da gzhan klog pa dang/ 'dren pa dang/ nyan pa dang/ 'a ba dang/ sems pa dang/ yid la byed pa'i bgegs byed da/ thug pa gnyis kyi chosami ston pa yang yod/
po da// la la ni sbyin pa 'ba' zhig lus pas mtha'aphyin pa'i ma par dag pa thob kyi/ tshul khrims kyis ma yin/ bzod pas ma yin pa nas/ shes rab kyi bar dumayin par 'dzin to// lawani tshul khrims 'ba'

[+ ]zhig gis mthar phyin par rnam pa rnga dag pa thob kyi/ sbyin pa dang bzed pas ma yin pa nas/ shes rab kyi bar dum yin par 'dzin to// la ni bsred pa 'ba' zhig gis mthar phyin pa'i rnam par dag pa thob/

k+Sha kyi srin pa dang tshul khrims kyis ma yin pa nas// shes rab kyi bar dum yinepar 'dzin to// lal nibaco na 'grus 'ba' zhig gis masharaphyin nga 'i rnam par dgapa 'thob kyi/ sbyin pa dang tshul khrims kyis
ma yin pa nas shes rab kyi bar dum yin par 'dzin to/ la la ni bsam gtana'aba' zhig gis mthar phyin pa ri rnam rar dag pa 'thob kyi/ sbyin pa dang tshul khrims kyis ma yin pa nas shes rab kyi bar
dum yin par 'dzin to// lanishes rab 'ba' zhig gis mthar phyin pa'i rnam bar dag pa 'thob kyi/ spyin pa dang tshul khrims kyis ma yin pa nas/ bsam gtan gyi bar du ma yin par 'dzin to// lalani

'jig rten gyi bzo rtsal rnam pa sna rdzogs sbyangs shing shes bas mthar phyin pa'i rnam par dag pa thob par 'dzi to// la la ni brag lasamathong ba dang/ ma mamur dumachod ba rang/ sbyang ba la sogs ba'i brtul

zhugs rnam pa mang nges mthar phyin parim par dag pa thobapar 'dzin te ston to// rigs kyi bu de lta tshul khrims 2mas pa sdig pa spyod pa'i dag slong chos kyi snadam yin pa des/ brdzun rnam pa sA tshogasakyig

yang dag nga 'i sa kyi snod kun bsdus te/ skye bo mang po lta ba ngan pa la lta gtsud do// de ltar de dag phyin ci log tungan par lta ba'i dbang gis rgyal rigs/dge ba nas rje'u rigs dang/ dmangs rigs dang//
susang dang/ budamad re sogs pa'i dad pa yongs su dag pa dgamaradu 'dus nas/ tshul khrims dang/ thus pa dang/ sbyin pa dang/ shes thub kyang nyams par byas te// rgyal rigs gangel pa can nas
rje'u rigs gdol pa can gyi bar du/ thams cad gdol pa can du bsgyur bas de dag ni chos kyi snodam yin te/ tshul khrimos nyams pa'i dag slong dang/ rgyal rigs gdol pa can la sogs pa dang/ slob
mar bcas 'dug pa'i rtsa ba bcad pas mtshamasamed pa'i sams can dmyal ba'i bar du ltung bar 'gyuraro// gis kyi bu ji ltaram bam pas rdul nyung zhig pa la 'gro ba thams cad kyis yid dum 'ong zhing
sna'amanam pa ngegayathag du radzag pa dang nyi 'am/ 'bags namanam pa bzhin du rgyal rigs dag banas/ dmangs rigs dag bar bar du tshul khrims nyams pa/ sdig pa spyadang/ chos kyi snodam yin pa de la
bsnyen dam/ 'grogs sam/ lhan cig gnas sam las lhan cig byed// de ma thag dungan par lta ba'i brtsog cing mnam pa gas par 'gyur ro// de ltar de bzhin du rgyal riges dge ba nas/ dmangs ]
rigs dgu ba'i bar du dod ba dang/ tshul khrims dang/ thos ba dang/ sbyin pa dang/ shes rab kun nyags dgadel pa can gyur pas/ de ni ston pa dngasabamar bcas te/ dgaba'i
babacud pasan)mtshamasamed pa'i[“]mas can dmyal ba'i bar du ltung bar 'gyuraro/// 'dus ba chen polas byibachub sems dang bu sa' u0f7cnga bo'i 'khor lo bcupa zhes
bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdabam po drug pa ri gas kyi bu daltarargyal rigs la sogs ba skyabatshademad pa tshul khrimes nyams pa/ sdig pa spyodab/ chos kyi snod ma yin pa'i dge slonga' bskon bas
dge ba'i chos thams cad mas da nas/ mats+tshamasamed pa'i sems can dmyal ba b.radu ltangab 'gyur ba la ltos/ de bas na mtho ris kyi ltar skyab nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bdaba'i bar du 'dod
pa dag lam las rgyal ba'i dag sbyong la bsAn bkur dang/ mchod pa dang/ bkur ba byas te/ theg pa gsum gyi chos kyimadomanyanapar gsol ba gdab bo// gzhan yang lam ston pa dang )
lam gyis 'tsho ba'idag srong btsal bar bya'o// lam de gsumal gnas pa'i dag sbyongamadan yang lam sun 'byin pa'i dge sbyong btsal bar bya'o// tshul khrims nyams mod kyi/ yang dgar ralta ba
dang/ mos pa dang/ lhag pa'i spyod pa dang ldan bas/ de la nibasnyen bkur dngagadab dag byos la/ theg pa gsum gyi rten dribang bya'i/ lhag pa'i spyod pa dang/ mos pa dang/ lta ba kun nyams pa lani

bsnyen bkur dang mchod pa bya ba ma yin no// tshul khrims nyams pa dag tshul khrims nyams mod kyi/ leg par mi lta bamos pa dang/ lhag pa'i spyod pa dang/ lta bar ldan pas na/ dedang de gang na ba songs/
kun thosakyi theg pa'i chos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos dang/ thag pa chen por chos kun ng man par bya'i/ b.ras ngashangesmad par mi bya'o// theg pa gsum las gang yang rung ba gcig la
dadade smon lam 'debs shing brtson 'grus rtsomazhing rjes su slob kyang/ theg pa gzhan la yang brnyasapa dang smad par mi bya'o// gang gis thug ba gsum las theg pa gang yang rung lta gcig gi tshogs
su bcad pa gcig tsam la b.ras smod na/ de la nibasnyen bkur mi bya/ mi bsAn/ mi 'grogs/ lhan cig tu mi gnasalas 'thun par mi bya'o// gang gos de la bsnyanubakur byed cing bstenatam//
'grogs sam lhan cig duganas sam/ las lhan cig byed na/ gdonam bre bar mtshams med pa'i sams can dmyal bar lhung ngo// rigs kyi bu du bsan theg pa gsum las gang yang rung
ba gcig la gnas te/ 'khor ba las 'da' zhing rab tu bde bu la mos te/ sdug bsngal gyis skyo ba dag/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i dam pa'i chos nyan thos kyi thog bral
brten te gsungs pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la brten te gsungs pa dang theg pa chen po la brtan te gsungs pa kun la dad cing shin tu bkur sti bya'i/ da' 'phya zhing skurang 'debs/
sa dang bar chud dang/ bgags dang chung dum tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam gyi bgags kyang ma byed cig/ rtag tu bsti stang dang bcas taklog pa dang/ 'don pa dang/ nyan/
[>>pa la shin tu brtan pa'iyar dam bcas te rtogs par bya'o// theg pa gsum las gang yang rung ba chos gcig la 'phya zhing skurand dang lhan cig dumoganas/chudangun zhag gcig tsam yang bstanabakur

khatshe dang chos nyan par mi bya'o// sems can gang zhig theg pa gsum las thegapa gcig tsam la 'phya zhing skuratam/ theg pa gsum la 'phrazhing skur pa'i gang zag la brten te/ 'dri ba dang nyan pabyas n/ de'irgyu
de'i rkyen gyis mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por lhung zhing sdug bsngal napo myong bar 'gyur/ rab tu thar par dka'o// datsi ri zhen/ rigs kyi bu sngon nga'adas ra'i

u0fc4 dusan byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing bla mdapa yongoshes tshelab la brtson pas nan tan byedapan/ bar b.raninyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i a'adod pa'i phyir/ chung ngun tshigs su
bcad pa gcig tsam gyi phyir yang lus kyi yan lag lag pa dang/ rkang pa dang/sha dang/ khrag dang/ pagasapadang/ rus pa dang/ mgodang/ mig dang/ rkangadang/ kladapa'i bar du yongs su gtong ngo/ bar

badzani rang sangs rgyas kyi thig pa la brten te gsungs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dod pa'i phyir/ chung ngunatshigs subacad pa gcig tsam gyi phyiremada'us kyiyan lagalag pa dang/ rkang pa dang/ sha dang/ khrag dang k]
pags pa dang/ sa pa dang/ mag dang/ mig dang/ rkang dang klad pa'i bar du yongs su gtong// brnab ni theg pa chen po la brten te gsungs pa'i dam pa ri chos 'dod pa'i phyir/ chung ngun tshigs su bcar/

pagacig tsam gyi phyir yang lus kyi yan lag lag pa dang/ rkang pa dang/ sha dad khragadang/ drags pa dang/ rus pa dang/ mgo dang/ mig dang/ rkang dang/ klad pa'i bar du yongs su gtang ngo// deltadzadaka' ba

spyad de sa theg pa gsum la rlungang natshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam rnyed shin du dga' rangs te/ bsta stang dang bcas pas rwarung zhing gzungs su 'dzinal/ ji skad dugasungs pa bzhin du spyod da/ nyung brad kyang
mi gtong bas bskal pa da med pa'i bar du shin du spyad dka' ba thams cad sad pas/ gdo'amatha'aganas byas pa'ibanamad nga 'i yang shas kyi 'bras bu thob par gyur to// gzhan yangs mgacan thams

chad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir/ theg pa gsumakyi dam pa'i chos rnam par bya lta bshad do// de lta bas na de la'ang shing skur pa dang/ bar da dang/ bgags dang chung ngu na tshigs su bcad pa
gcig tsam yang 'chab par mi bya'o// de la rtag du bkur sti dang bcas pas klog pa dang/ 'don pa dang/ nyan pa shin tubortan pa'is dem bca' 'o// rigs kyi bu 'diltar theg pa gsum de 'i dam
pa'ices 'jig 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ daltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'angs klung gang+ga'i bye ma dang mnyam pa thams cad kyis 'thun par gasungs to/ byinagyi rlabs kyi thams cad
byin gyis brlabs so// sems can thams cad 'akhor ba'i sdug bsngal na las gdon cing bsgral ba dang/ dkonamag gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chadapar bya ba'i phyir yongs su
[>brdung ba na no// de bas na thegab gsum gyi dam pa'i chos la thams cad kyis dad cing bkur ste phyur/ bAl 'bya zhing skur pa 'debs pa dang/ bar dang/ bgegs mi bya ste/ theg pa gsum gyi dag
tshapa'i chos las tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam med par basan/ gdon mi za bar mtshams med pa'i sems can demal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yangs 'ongs ba'i dus na sag
rgyus kyi zhing 'dir rgyal rigs gdol pa can dang/ bram ze gdol pa can dang/ blon po gdal pa can dang/ khyim bdag gdolaM can dang/ dgasbyong gdol pa can dang/ tshong dpon gdol pa can
rgyu dang ji'u rigs dang dmangs rigs gdol pa can gyi skyes pa 'am budamod de dag g.yo dang skyas 'tsho zhing glen pa ) gtimug can/ cung zad tsamagyoreshes pa snyams pa/ rang bzhin gyis
gtum pa/ khro ba spro thung ba/ brlangab/ 'jig rten phyi ma'i sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu la 'jus por me lta ba/ srog gcod la dga' banaso/ log par lta ba dang/ ser sna dang/ phrag dogadang
'jungs pa dang/ 'dod nyegasakyi bar dudaga' zhing/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rgyab kyis phyogs nas/ sdig pa'i gshes gnyen la bstan pa/theg pa gsum gyi'aphags pa'i chos kyi snom yin pa dag

nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos nung zad thos pas/ sangs rgyas kun gyis yongs su babyung ba'i rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos dang/ bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po'i chos la 'phyashing skurab 'debs pa dang/
smod pa dang )bar chud dang bgegs byed de/yongs su rgyas paru mubyed do// la la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i sa cung brad thes nas/ sangs rgyas kun gyis yongs su bzungaba'i nyan thos kyi thegs/
chos dad/ dran med pa'i theg pa'i chos 'a'aphya zhing skur pa 'debs pa dang/smad pa dang/ bar de dad bgegs byed du/ yongs su rgyus bar mi byed do// la' nib mad pa'athag pa nangaris
cung bdathos nus/ sangs rgyas kun gyis yongs su bzung ba'inyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos dang/ rang sangs rgyasakyi theg pa'icos la 'phya ba dang/ skur 'debs pa dang/ spyod pa ngang bar/
chadadang/ bgegs byedad/ yongasasu rgyas par mi byed la (]khe dang grags pa'i phyir 'di skad du/ bdag ni thag pa chenab la yin// theg pachenapo rigrogs su gyur pa/ theg pa chen po 'ba' zhig nyin
dang 'chang ba dang/ gathus su 'dzin la dga'i/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i sa lami dga'/ theg pa gnyis de la stanabar mi 'dodadazhas b.rar// delta'athag pa chen po pa
yin no zhes brdzun sder ba de dag gtimug gis mngon par zin tu ngo rgyal gyi dbang du gyur pas/ de ltatheg pa gsumagyi yang dag pa'i sa la 'phya zhing skur bar 'dabs pa dang/ b.rachad dang bgags
byed de yongs su rgyas par yang mi byedade// theg pa gsum pa slob pa'i gang bug la yang 'phya zhing skur nas smod demathu med par byed do// rigs kyi bu 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs
ngadang/ da ltarab zhugs r 'isangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang/ byang bsamasadapa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad sems can thams cad l phanar dbang ba'i don gyi phyir/ thugs rjen po'i
shugs kyis dngos po rnamar 'di gnyis yongs su bzungang// gang zhe na dkonamchog gsum gyi gdung rgyunami'achad par byedapa/khyimanasakhyimam yin par rab du byung// skra dang kha spu bregasanas
gos ngur smig gyonapa dang/ theg pa gsum las byung ba 'phags pa'ibaden pa bzhi la sags pa dam pa'i 'os dang ldan pa'o// dngos po rnam pa gnyis po 'dinasangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dad/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ba' zhig gis yongs su 'thung ba mdzad kyi nyan thos dngarang sangs rgyus lasogs pas ma yin no/ gzhan yang dung khrag khrig brgya stong snyad kyi ngas

pa'i dbang pa chen po dang/ brgya na lha'i dbang po dang/ gling bzhi la dbang ba'akhor los sgyurab 'i rgyal po la sogs pas yongs su bzungabam yin no/ma 'ongs pa'i dus nasangs rgyas kyi zhing 'diri rgyal

rigs gdol pa can dag nga'i bstan pa la rab tubyungaste/ skra dang ba spu bregasazhes/ gso ngur smrig gyon ba la thabs kyis nyes pa'i skyon dang kun ka tshol de/ rkyenarnam pa mang pos gshe zhing skyo ba dang//
spyod cing sma phab pa dang gzhu ba dang 1'tshog pa dang/ btson 'jagazhug pa dang/ 'tsho ba'i yo byad 'phrog pa dang/ tshes gog 'phrag pa nas/ khyim pa phab ste// khyim pa'i lasarnam pa sna tshogs/
byed du bcug pa dang/ nan gyis 'khol zhing dang sa gcod pa dang/ slong pa dang/ babra' bdang/ bangab gcodapa dang/ 'tsho ba'idabangapo dngaphral ba'ib dpyadang// rgyal po rgyal rigs gangol pa can

de de ltar glen zhing gti mug gi rang bzhin tsan dugyur pas/ ngargyal gyi dbang gis mngon par brin pa da/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i thugs rje'i mthug yongs su bsrung ba'i slobam rnamA lasmang
pa dang sna 'debs pa dang/ nan gyis chad pas gcod pa sogs pa byedad// sangs rgyas dang byang bsamasadapa' thams cad kyis thugs rje chen po'i shugs kyis yangs su gzung ba'i
chos shin tu brab la 'aprazhing skung tam rung bar byed de// dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dung/ byang chub sams dpa' thams cad kyis yongs su bsrung ba'i theg pa rnam pa gsum
gyi dam ba'i chos kyi bar chad dang bgegs dag byed de/ yongs su rgyas par mi byed do// de lta rgyal rigs gdol pa cananas/ rje'u rigs dang dmangs rigs gdol pa can gyi bar duglun zhing gtilug

gi rang bzhin can/ nga rgyal gyis mngon par branapa/ ngani thogapan nge lozhig khas 'chab de dag/ nyan thos dngarangasas rgyas kyi theg pa'is kyistsod duyang gyuran/ bshamed pa theg pachenaba'i rtsisakyi
bya// snod du'agyur ltatsas te// khe dang/ grags pa dang/ bkusnyidang/ mchodar 'dudapa'i phyir/ 'jig rtenapa glen zhing gtin ga can thams cud bsus nas/ bdag thog/
po panang pa'o zhesazer te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thig pa gnyis kyi dam pa'i ngos la 'phya zhi skur 'debs so// de ltadragang brag glen zhingagato mug nagamadangaskyos 'ashing ngargyal
kha gyis mngonapar brinang//ser sna dang/ phyagadog dang/ 'dodachags kyis kun nas blugs pas/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis nga'is kyi migam rungapadang/ mu 'dumadapar byas so// des ni dus
tsa gsum gyisangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi dam tshig las 'gal ba'ikhan mtho ba chen po byed pa yin no// dus gsum gyi byang gi mas dang 'o thams cad kyi dam tshig 'as 'gal
b.likhakam tho ba chen po byas pa yin no// dus gsum gyi nyan thos thams cad kyi dam tshig las 'ga' b.likha ma tho ba nipo'i sog pa byed pa yin te/ ring po mi thogs par 'us kyiyan lug kun
zhig pa dang/ nad ma rungs pa rgyunapa rnam pa mang pos btab par 'gyur ro// rgyal rigs gdol pa canas/ ji'u rigs dang/ dmangs rigs dang/ gdol pa can gyi skyes pa 'am ( budamadu de dag
sdig pa'i las byedacing/ phyin ci log tu lhaba'i dbang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bcad pas gal tadus gzhan du sbyin pa'i bsod nams mang du byas su zin kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus ni yi
0 dgas sam/ byolasongagi khams su skya ste/ phyug pa'i bde ba myong bar mi 'gyur ro// lus de'ud kyis gzugs dang gzugasamed pa'i khams su skye ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nyung ngu yang bskyad menus/

nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ ban modang 'o thig ba chen po lhan gyis grub pa rnam pa thamasacad makhyen pa'i ye shes kyi dag pa'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyod pa lta ci smos/ gtan yang de'i lce la rtag tu
nan gyis gnod par 'gyur zhing nyin zhag dumar lce skugs shing: mi lus pa dang/ shin dum bzad pa'i na ba dang ba'i sdug bsngal chen po slong ba dang/ 'chi'aphos nas kyang mtshams med pa'i
sems canadamyal bang ltung bar 'gyur ro// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pas rgyal rigs dge ba nas/ rje'u rigs dang/ dmangs rigs la sogs pa'i skyes pa kham bud med du dag la yun ring por

ngan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir yang dang yang bsad du gsungs te/ byad kyis ngaribastan pa la skra dang ba spu bregs te/ ngur smig gi tshal bu gyon zhing rab du byung ba la gnod pa dang gshe zhi spro ba 'asogs
pa la byed cig/ sa bstan pa'i theg pa gsum gyi dam pa'itses la 'phrazhing skur pa 'debs pa dang smadapa dang/ bar chad dang/ bgegasam byed ces gsungs so/ ngas bstan pa las chod du'aga' ba

byas/ sdig pa rnam par smin pa ji ltar rgyas par bshad pa bzhin no// deci'i phyir zhe na/ nga'i bstan pa la skyabs su song ste ! skra dang ba spu bregs nas ) gos ngur smig gyon cing/ rab tu byung ba'i cha lugs
[7gc] ]/tsan de la 'ad sa pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis thugs rje chen po'i byin gyi rlabs

bye kyis yongs su babung ba'o// skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngus skyeg gyon cing rab tu byung ba'i srod lam na de ni 'phags pa rnams kyi rnam par grol ba'i rgya la sman yin no// nyan thos thams cad kyi rnam

tsha padra gralabs lengs spyod pa'i chos kyi ra'i rgyal mtshan yin no// rang sangs rgyas kyi thog pa pa thams cad kyi rnam par grol bas res spyod pa'i chos kyi ra'i rgyal mtshan yin no// theg pa chen pa pa thams
cad kyi rnam par grol bas longs spyod pa'is kyi ri rgyal mtshan yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa sa gsungs pa'i theg pa gsum gyi rim pa'i sa yanano// dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub
sems dpa' thams cad kyi thugs rje u0f7ana po'i byin gyi brlabs kyis yongs su bzung bar yonan// 'phags pa rnams kyi rnam pa dgrol ba'i gnas yin// nyan thos kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyi rnams
ki kyi rnam par grol bas lengs spyod pa'i chos kyi gnas yin no// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ba thams cad kyi rnam par gral bas lengs spyod pa'i byes kyi re'i gnas yin// theg pa na po pa thams/
rud kyis rnam par gral bas longs spyod pa'i byings kyi ri gnas yin no// rigs kyi bu de lta bas na ma par grol ba tshol ba dag nga'i bstan pa la skyabs su song ba skra dang kha spu bregs te/ gos ngur
smig gyon pa/ rab tu byung ba'i gang zag la bsnyanabakur dang/ mchod pa dang/ bsti stang bya'o// bdag gis snga nyan thos kyi theg pa'i sa la dad de bdag nyan cing gzungs su 'dzin nA ]gzhan yang
nyen cing 'dzin du gzhug go/ bdug klog cing kha ton byed na/ gzhan yang klog cade 'don du gzhugag/ bdag glegs bam du 'drin/ gzhan yang glegs bam du 'drir gzhugago/ bdag sbyin pa byed na/
gzhan yang sbyin pa byed du gzhug go/ bdag ston cing 2dngan/ gzhan yang ston cing 'chad pa dang yid la bya ba dang/ nan tan bya ba dang/ rgya char sprul du gzhug go ji ltar rang sangs rgyas kyi theg

pa'i sa la dad cing ya de skyes te/bdag nyan cing gzungasu 'dzinan/gzhan yang nyan cing 'dzin du ba zhug go/bdag klog cing kha ton byed na/ gzhan yang klog cing 'don du gzhug go/ bdag glegs bam du 'a drin/ gzhan
yang glegs bamadu dri'i gzhug go/ bdag srin pa byed na/ gzhan yang sbyin pa byed du gzhug go/ bdag sten ci'achadan ! gzhan yang ston cing chad pa dang yid la bya ba dang/ nyon tan bya ba dang
rgya cher spel du gzhug go/ 'di ltar theg pa chen po la dad cing yod ces te/ bdag na cing gzungs su rongonan/ gzhanayang nyan cing 'dzin du gzhug gu/ bdag klog cingeb tan bdun/ gzhan
yang klog cing 'don du gzhug go/ bdag glegs bam du 'drin/ gzhan yang glegs bam du 'drirnga gzhug go/ bdag sbyin pa byed na/ gzhan yong sbyin pa byed du gzhug go/ bdag ston rung
('chad// gzhan yang ston nyiba'achad pa dang/ yid la bya ba dang/ nan tan bya ba dang/ rgya ra sel du gzhug go/ gal ta snod dum gyuran/ bdag kyang mi nyan/ gzhan
@#po yang na dum gzhug panas/ gzhung de bzhin du rgyag bar bshad pa bzhinan// sdig pa'i tshes thams cad kyang ring du spang ba dang// sdig pa'i grogs po sngang ba dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bstan
pa dngapha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson zhing nan tan byedapa dang/ mi dge ba'i las thams cad yang dang yang 'gyod cing 'thol ba dang/ ci la mos pa bzhin du yang dgapa'i smon lam gdab par bya'o//
gang da ltar byed pa ni lus 'di nyid kyis nyan thos kyi theg pa'i stodadu 'ang 'gyur la/ rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs las kyang m ldag/ theg pa chen po'i rigs las kyang phyirami ldeg pa'i gnas
'o yod do// debs na theg pa gsum char la yang bsub cing nan tan bya'i/ nga rgyal gyis theg pa chen pa pa'i zhas(khas rang zhing/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi thug pa'i chos
la 'phya zhing skur pa mi bya'o// ngas sngon theg pa chen po'i chos kyi snod du gyurapa brtan par spyod pa 'ba' zhig la de skad du/ theg ba chen po bsgom pa 'ba' zhig gis bas mtha'aganas byed
b.ra'agyur ro zhes bshad pa dang 'di'i 'gal ba med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs/
0 so 2 bor gyi dkyil 'khor chenaporimangonasum// rdo rjesang pos da la zhus pa/ tshul khrims nyams pa dge slong dag la ci phyi markyang pa gyis shig ces bskul// spangs pa'i
yon tan kun kyang nyams nas// glen zhing ngan par lta ba 'dzin pa// chos kyi snod min lam sun 'byin la/ spro ma chad pas gcod dmiganang// dra las theg pa gsum gyi dam chos// yang dag
pa yi rnam par grol ba// sman thang lta bu bshad pa thosaMn// zhi ba'i mya ngan 'das 'gyur zhes gsungs// ci yi phyir namade snga gzhan las// theg pa chen po gcig gis grol 'gyur// theg pa
gnyis kyi rjes 'a srongayangs/ yang 'dir theg pa gsum bshadaci phyir// sems can kun la thugs brtse can gyis// ngan par lha b.ris kun spangs te/ phan pa dang nibade ba'i
don phyir// rnam par grol zhing the tsom bcad gsol/ rgyal rigs rgyal po dag la phan pa// rje'u rogs dmangs rdzogs rab dubad phyir// drag slong dag laganod byang mi gnas// kha na
mtho chen porisdig 'gyur// kha yi spu bregs ngur smrig gos gyon// sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi lam na// rnam par grol ba'i lam gyi mig yin// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs/
pa/ spyod lam mang po yongs su nyams kyang// rnam par grol ba yongs su spangasamin// ngan par lta ba'i sdig pa spangs pas// myur du mya ngan 'das pa thob 'gyur// ji ltar sman rab 'khus par
'gyur kyang// nad rnams kun la shin du pha'agyur// de bzhin spyod lam nyams pa re yang// pharo'aphru gu bsngalazhib byed 'gyur/ zhuba'i las dang gsosmin dag tu
[>>dge slong de nidira'adis gnang// gzhana' dam pa'i chos ston dbang ste// gany+dzis kas bsod nams nApo thob 'gyur// da kin mchog gsum la dad cing phyogasate// nga lan pa chen po
'kho'adzin pa// mi dge sdig pa'angapo song 'gyur// mu stagasamang pa gang bas demchog/ ji ltasrin po gling du 'byams pa'i// 'jigs shing skrag nga 'i tshong pa dadag kun gyis rta spu
re bzung bas// rgya mtsho las rgul 'gags dang bral ba// de ltaratshul khrims nyams pa de ni/ mi dge ngan par lta ba spangs te// dud pa gcig gi rgyu yimathus ni// zhe songs pa yi srid/
las thar 'gyur// rnam par grol ba'i rgyal mtshan bsrungs te// sangs rgyas mang pos byin gyis parlabs pa'i// tshul khrims ms pa gnod ma byedan khan ma tho'i sdig lca spong 'gyur//
ba bsod nams chen po la ni mos shing// yang dag rnam par grol la dga' ng/ snod dang snodaman kun 2 mnyam srung// sa nirnam grol thob pa yid kal/ gyen pa nga rgyal theg pa chen por//
khas chade ni shes pa'amathumed// theg pa gnyis kyi chas la'angarmongasan// theg pa rjen por rig 'gyur ci smos// dper na mig gi 'bras bu nyams na// kha dog rnam pa mthong bar mi'agyur/
de bzhin dad pa nyams shing mdan// theg pa chen pongashas par mi nus// chuphrag 'thung da rim thu yang medun// rgyamatsho chen po gra la brngub nus// theg pa gnyis kyang goms minus na//
theg pa chen po ga la slobazhus// theg pa gnyis kyi ngos la dad pas// theg pa chenapo lanodad 'gyur// theg chenangos la dad pa med par tshig tu smra bas don du mi'agyur:/ gong gi yang
dag da par lta zhing// theg pa chen po can zhes khas 'che// mi dag gsum gyi lasami srung// nga yid m ces ma rung 'jig byed// gang thag dano tshi 'apos gyuranas// mtshams med
sems canadamyal bar lhung nges// de bas dbang po brtag cung bshad bya'i snod du ma gyur pa lam yin// byams pa'i sems med du rgyal dregs shing// gtum zhing b.rung ba dbang po zhanang/
dand par lta ba yin par// mkhas pa rnams kyis de dag shes bya// nyan thos dang norung rgyal ba dang// thegapa chenakho'isnod ma yin no// sangs rgyas kun la smad cing skur pas// nges par
mtshams med dmyal bar lhung 'gyur/ 'du'adzi la dga' tshul khrims srung zhing// slob dpon 'chagatsang sdug bsngal 'jigs pa// mkhas pa dag gis shes par gyis shig/ dAnan
thos theg pa yin no// sbyin la dga' zhing skya 'gog rtogs pa// bsamathare gnas la dga' ba dag ni// rangargyal ba yi theg pa yin ngor/mkhas pa dag gis shes par gyis shig
duge ba'i rtsa ba kun dang ldan zhing// byams pa dang na snying rje'asams kyis// rtag tu phan pa'i don lu dga' ba// de ni thog ba chen po yin no// tshul khrims srung phyir/
'akasrog spong zhing// sems can dag 'ai'atshomi gnod// stong ba nyid kyis la brtson pa// theg pa chenapo yin par shes bya// thams cad sa lasems kyis bzod cing/ skya ba'i
tsha tshig 'jam 'jungs pa med pa// chos la rtag tu dga' zhing spro ba// de yang theg pa chen po yin no// chos kyi snod dang snod men kun la// bsam pamanyam pas phan pa'i don byed// 'jig rten chos
pa: kyis ma gos ba dag/ de yang theg chen yin par shes bya// de bas mkhas pa blo can dag ni// theg pa gsum la shin tu dad bskyed/ dge 'dun dag la gnod mi byedan// myur du blumad byang chub
'grub 'gyur// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang rgyal rigs dgu nga dang/ bram ze dge ba dang/ thon po dge ba dang/ khyim bdag dge ba dang/ tshong dpon dge ba dang/ dug sbyong dge ba dang/ jo'u
'gus dang/ dmangs rigs la sogs pa'i skyes pa 'am/ budamed de dag gnas pa dang/ sbrad par bya ba'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu dang ldan n[） ]lus 'di'id kyis nyan thos kyi theg pa'i rigs las

ldog cing nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang tshe 'di nyid lanyan thos kyi theg pa'i 'phags pa'i chos kyi snadod 'gyur te rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang/ thegapa chen po'i snodadunim yin no// bcugang zhen/

'di lta ste/bsam pa yongs su dag pa'idang bsadag b.rang/ mi dge ba'i las kyi 'bras bu yod par yid ches pa dang/ khrel yod pa dang/ nga tshabar ldan ngs ma dag ba'i grags dang/ nganapar blta ba thams cad

yongs su spong ba dang/ sdom pa la shin tuganas tesrog gcod pa yongs su srong banas// bgamang par gyur ba'i khu ba 'thung ba'i bar du yongs su ngab dang/ byams pa'i sems la gnas te zhe sdang dang khro ba sha stag
cad yongs su song ba dang/ snying rje'i sems la gnas te sems can nyam thag pa thams cad sgrol ba dang/ dag ba'i sams bad bar gnas te/ ngag gis mi dag ba bzhi yongs su sbyong ba dang/ btang sums
kyi sems la gnas te/ 'dod chags dang/ sar dang/ phrag dog shams nadu yos su spong ba dang yang dug ba la phyogs ta slu ba'i ltas bsrung ngan kun spong zhing log pamu stegs can la mi snyan dang/
shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan te/ dge ba'i chos kun la zhan na byed pa dang/ rtag tu gnas dgon pa la dga' zhing chos kyi don tshol ba la mi skyo bar sngo ba'i// rigs kyi bu rgyal rigs dge
ba nas rje'u rigs dang/ dmangs rigs 'asogs ba'i skyes pa dang budamedadadag gnas pa dang/ spyad par byaba'i 'khor lo bcu po 'di dang ldan/ tshe 'di dol nyan thos kyi theg pa'i rigs las ldog cing

mas par mi 'gyur ba dang/ tsha'adinyid la nyan thos kyi theg pare'apags pa'i chos mngonangu 'gyur ba dang/ nyan thos kyi 'phags pa'i chos kyi snong bu'agyur te/ radasangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang/ thag pachen po'i
'phags pa'i chos mngon du'agyur ba dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang/ theg pa chen pa'i snod du 'gyur ba ni ma yin no// gzhung des rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang/ theg pa chen po ye shes

[>par bya'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar gnas pa dang)spradapar ldan pa'i rakhor le bcu po dngagani/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi thumong du
yod pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang gnas pa dang/ spyad par bya ba'i 'khor rnam pa bcu/ nyan thos dang thun mong ba ma yin pa/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ gangasargyas

[% ]bcom ldan 'das dang thunamong ba yod do// gang rgyalarigs dge ba nas/ rje'u rigs dang/ dmangs rigs la sogs pa'i skyes pa dang bumod de dag gnas pa dad spang ba dragruba'i 'khorale bcu po 'di dag dang ldan

tsha 'de nyid kyis drangasas rgyas kyi theg pa'i rdzogs las kyang nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang/ mi ldeg pa dang/ lus 'di nyid la rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i raphags pa'i chos rigs pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi

'phags pa'i rjes kyi snod du 'gyur ro// bcu gaban na/ 'di lta ste/lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid kyi las rnam par dag par sbyong pa dang/ brel yod pa dang/ nga tshab dang ldan te/ bdag gi lus kyis skyo ba dang/ nye bar len

ra riphung po lnga lashin tu 'jigs pa skyod pa dang ( 'khor b.re'adod pa las shin tu rgal dka' bar ltab dang/ rtag tu dben pa'i gnas la dga' zhing/ 'du 'dzi yongs su spong ba dang/ bsamatha radagon pa la//

dga' zhing/ gzhan gyi skyon mi gleng ba dang/ dbang bo rnams sdom zhing sems rtag tuzhi bas ting nge 'dzin du byang ba dang/ rten cing 'brel te byung ba'amakhas ngas rgyu dang 'bras bu la shin tu rtog pa dang/ rtag tu bsam/
gtan la mnyam par 'jog par dgar ba dang/ kun nas ldang ba'i chos yongs su 'gog pa la mkhas pa'o// rigs kyi bu rgyal rigs dag nas/ rje'u rigs dang/ mangs rigs la sogs pa'i skyes pa dang bud

gad de dag gnas pa dang/ spyad par bya ba'i 'khoralo panupa 'di dang ldan pas/ tshe 'dinyid kyis rang gangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i rigs las phyir mi ldog cing/ nyams pa yod pa mi 'gyur ba dang/ cho 'di nyidakyi
rangasangs rgyas kyi theg pa'iraphags pa'i sa mngon du 'gyur ba dang/ rangagangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i 'phags pa chos kyi snodadu 'gyuro// rigs kyi bu 'di dagazhinyan thos dang rangasangs rgyas thams
cad kyi gnas pa dang/ rgyud b.rubya ba'i 'khor lo zhes bsta/ nyan thos dang/ rangasangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'khor lo 'di la gnas na )myur dusrid pa gsum gyi rgya mtshos rgal te/ mya ngan
las 'darab 'i grang bar rkyen bor phyin par 'gyur ro// rigs kyibu gnas pa dang/ spyad par bya ba'i 'khor lo nas bya ba'i tshig gi don gangalagos sha/ de la gnas pa zhes bya ba ni 'dzin pa dang
bcas ba/ bdag gi ba'i gnas su bcas pa/ sdud par byed pa dang bcas ba/ 'bral bar byed pa dang bcas pa'o// de laspyang ba zhes bya ba'i phung bo spyod pa dang/ khams spyod pa dang/ skye mched
bya// spyod pa dang 'brel ba dang bcas ra 'i spyad pa'o// 'khorngalezhes bya bani bslab dra dang dumatshig gi ra bor len// dang rana'akhor les sgyur ba'i rgyal po nishing rta'i kho/
po 'a'an 'khele de gtso bo spyad do// dengazhinangu nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad 'khor lo 'di la brten nas/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i las tshol te/ debisan rnam pa 'di gnyis gi thog

'a pa chen pa'i snod ma yin no// de ci'i phyore zhen/ de dag na myong pa dma' zhing zhan pa 2 brten pas theg pa chen po'i snod ma yin no// bdag phung po rnams skyed pa la 'dzinapar byed pa dang bcas pa
la skye zhing 'jigs te/ bag 'ba' zhig sdug bsngal thams cad las rnam par grol ba tshol gyi/ sems can thams cad rnam da ra grol ba'i phyir/ na rten byed pa ma yin pas thag pa skyen pa'i
snod ma yinan dbadag khams rnams spyod po la gnas su bcas pas skyo zhing rajigs twA/ bdag sdug bsngal thams cad las rnam par grol ba tshol gyi/ sems nyan thams cad ma bar
grol ba'i phyir/ nan tan byed pa ma yin ngasan/ thug pa na ba'i snadam yin no// bdag ma dmangon pa'adu bya ba rnams spyod pa pa sdud bar byed pa dngabacas pas skyo zhing 'jigs te/
bdag sdugabasngal thams cad las rnam parngagrol ba tshol gyi/ sems can thams cad rnam par grol ba'i phyir/nan tan byed po ma yin pas/ theg pa chen po 'i snod ma yin no/ dadag 'brel ba dang bcas

[28f]pa'i spyod pa la 'brel ba'idabangags gnas shingabartaganas gnas shing brtenabamangond/ 'du byedad/sems can thams cad sdud pa'ami dga' zhing/ byams pa dang snying rjemad de 'bul ba dang bcas pa'i phyir/
theg pa chenang 'ang ma yin no// gzhan dag sdug bsngalamangapo myong ba'athong yang yal bar btang ste/mi skyo ngal bdag 'ba' zhig rnam ba grol b.rol ba'i phyir/ theg pa chen po'i snodam yin no/
de dag bdag gi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mgo bcudanas/sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa 'amago gcod pa las spro bas/ theg pa chen po'astod ma yin// dngag thag pachen po'i 'bor
les byang rgyud la 'bab nga ma yin pas na/theg pachen po'i snodam yin no// de dag 'od napo'i 'khor las byang chub la 'bab pa ma yin pas na/theg pa rin po'i snodam yin no// de dag gcig pu
zlamed pangam las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'gro ba la dga' zhing nAn tan byed pas na/ thag pachenapa'i snod ma yin no// rigs kyi bu sems can gang nyan thas kyi thag pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi thog

pa'i chos la nan tan ma byas pa/ brtson 'gras ma brtsams pa dag ni dbang po yongs sum smin te/ dbang ngo zhan pa/ brtson 'grus ngab dragal/ gal te shin tu thabu ma thag ru chan nga 'i dam nga 'i ches bstan na/

bshad pa dang de nyan pa gnyis ka ban ma tho ba ni po'i sdig thob par 'gyur te/donesangs rgyas thams cad la 'khus ba yin no// de'i phyirezhen/ sems can gang nyan thosakyi theg pa dang/ rang sangs kyi thig
pa'i chos la nan tan ma byas shing/ brtson 'grusal brtsams te/ dbang pagasmin pa/ dbang po zhan pa/ brtson 'grus chung ba dag shin tu zab pa thag nga tshan pa'i dam pa'i chos
[>>mnyanan sems can de ni yang dag par glen ba gdimug pa yin te/denibadag shes bar khas 'cheyang chud pa'i mthu dang/ lag pa'i 'dushas su 'gyur bdang/ rgya med par smra zhing las kyi 'bras bu

'a7 rnams 'chad par 'dzin pas/ dge ba byas pa dang sdig pa byas pa thams cad lamed par 'dzin pa dang/ theg pa chenapa la bdu dusmazhing/ nga'i dag pa ri chos ma drang bar byed pa// chos ma yin pa 'anas
yin par 'chad pa// chos la sam yin par rangadang// dag sbyong ma yin pa lan dag sbyang yin par 'ad+mad pa// dag sbyong yang dag pa lan dag sbyong ma yin par 'dud pa// 'dul ba ma yin ba 'a 'dul
ba 'char nga/ 'dul ba yang dag pa lan 'dulang ma yin par 'ad+mad de/ glen pa gtimug gi rang bzhin can/ nga rgyal gyisamangon par zin pa/ phrag dog dang ser sna yangs su btsun ba/theg pa chen po'o

la sa 'a stong cing srung ba dang/ kun tu rgyas par byed kyang nyan thos kyi theg pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyitheg pa'i chos la 'phya zhing skur nas rgyas pa ma byed do// nyan thos kyi thag pa dang/ rang sangs/

rgyas kyi theg pa dang/ thun med pa'i theg pa la bstan te/ khyim nas khyim ma yin par rab tu byunganas/ bsen par rdzogs kyang dgeslong nyid du 'gyur bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mishes pa dang/ dag

ba'i chos thams cad mngon par sdu ba'i rgyu yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin dumi shes pas/ nga'i slobam chos kyi snod du gyur pa dang/ a kyi snod dum gyur pa dang// slob pa dang mi slob pa la nan tan byed pa dang mtha'i

gnas byas ba'i 'bras bu thob pa dang/ dag pa'i skya bo tshul khrims srung ba dang/ tshulakhrims 'gas pa dang/ tshul khrims med pa dag la rnam pa sna tshogs kyis snga zhinge gshe ba dang/ gnod pa byedang dang/ chos

gos dang lhung badred 'phrog pa dang/ 'tsho ba'iyo byad la spyod du mi stor ba dang/ bzung zhing bcing nga yang byed do// de ltar rgyu dang 'bras bu thams cad med par lta zhingad pasma ba dag ni/marenangan gnas/
kyang de ni yang dag par srin ngo zhes bya ste/ma 'ongs paredusan bskal pa na po grangs med pa'i bar du 'angami'i lus thob par dka'o// sems can dmyal babatsadamed pa'i sdug bsngal myong yang bla'i/
ma'i nang na chad par lta ba ni ma yin no// de ltar gung brag glen pa don rede po mi thogs par lus kyiyan lag a burd cing/ nyin zhag dugar lce lkug cing smaminus pa dang shin tu mi bzad pa'i na

ba dang tshapa'esdug bsngal chenapo myong ba dang/ tshe'aphosanas gdon mi za ba'aatsamasamud pa sams can dmyal bar lhung zhing/ nganasong kun tu 'khor lo bzhin du 'khoral/sdug bsngal mang po 'al te thur
pa'i dusamad do// bskal pa brgya stongagibar du yang mi'i lus thob par dka' 'o// gal tebaskal patshadamed grangasamed po 'das nas lus thob na yang/ sangs rgyas mi bshugs pa rtog pa lta'i 'jig rten
gyi khams su skye ste/ dmus long du 'gyu rab dang/ na pa dang/ lkugs pa dang/ lcemad pa dang/ nad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gzir ba dang/ lusu thung zhing mi sdug pas/
sangs kun gyi yid du mi 'ong ba dang/ snamimakhas shing tshig rku mi 'ong ba dang/ sems rtag tu myos shing ci yang mi shes ba dang/ dbul phongs pa'i rigs su skyes sa du yang mi nad pa dang/ dag pa'i
'tsha bshes gnyen dang mi phrad pa dang/ sdig pa'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su sdig pa'i las byed pa la dga' ba dang/ ngan par lta bal chags shing mtshanas med nga 'isams can dmu'abar lhung
bar 'gyur te/ ngan song las shin tuthar pa dka'a'o// de ltar glen pa gti mug mun pa dang 'gug par smra ba des/ nga'i dam pa'i sam rung bar byas nas/nga'i slob ma tshul khrims M

srung ba dang/ tshul khrims nyams pa dang/ tshul khrims med pa la nan gyis chad pas gcod cing/ dag pa'i phyogs la b.robar spyod dume ster tedi'i rgyu de rkyen gyis bskal pa brgya stong gi bar du ngan song du

lhung nas/mun pa nas mun par rgyu ste/thar pa'i dus med do// de ltarasams can de'i sdig pa rnam par smin pa ni nyan thos dang/ rasangs rgyas kyatheg pa'i sa ma nyan pa'azhan tanam byis par shin tu grub/
pa theg pa chen po'i dam pa'i chog mnyan cinganan tan byed la rtsel ba'i phyir ro// de ltar glen pa gtilug canachad par ba de/ me marabs thama'i lus kyang thob par dkaran/ 'phags pa'i chos
kyi snod du 'gyur ba lta ci smos/nyan thos dang/ rad sangs rgyas kyi myan las 'darab yang mi thon/ shin tu thub pa bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa byang chub thob pa lta ci smos te/ sems can des/
nyes pa ni nyan thos kyi thig pa re sa dang/ rang sa sa rgyas kyi theg pa ris ma bslabs par theg ba chen po ris la zhugs par gyur pa'iphyir ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ rdza rtsom btang ba'i nang du

mar dang 'om thugasan thams cad 'thungs nas/ snod dang bcud gnyis kam rung bar byed do// de ci'i phyir zhen/ snod la skyonayodapa'i phyir ro// de bzhin du sems can dag kyang nyan thos kyi theg pa dang//

rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos la shin tu zhan tan ma byas pa/ yang dag pa'i brtson 'grusam btsums pa// dbang po yongs su ma smin pa dbang po zhan pa/ brtson 'gras chung ba dag la gang gis shin tu
thub pa theg pa chen pa dam pa'i chos bshadan/ shadapa dang nyan pa gnyis ka kha ma tho ba chen po'i sdig thob par 'gyur taM sangs rgyus nyams cad l 'khyos ba'i skyon du 'gyur ba gang durgyasapa/
bshadang bzhinano// yang 'di ltaste/ 'jig rten pa'i bang mdzod thag pa zhig ral can gyi nang du nor bu rin po acugan/ du bros shing sgyur bar 'gyur ro// dbazhin du sems can gang theg pa gnyis

kyi sa la 'phya zhing skurati/ ma dad panan tan dumi slob pa dag la theg pa chen po bshad na yang dagapa ji lta ba bzhin dumangashas taM/ de'i dbang gis sdig byed cing 'khongaba'amathathad mi shes bar 'gyur ro/
lubya// 'di ltaste/ gru brag pa bug ja' nyan skyod pa dang/ 'deg paminus pa zhan ta/ rgya mtsho'i nga du 'jug pa da bzhin du/ sams can gang serdzasna dang phrag dog gi dbang du gyur ba theg

[>>raganyis kyi chos la nan tanam byas par/bgani theg pa chen po pa yin no zhes bas che ba dazhi chad par lta ba ngargyal can g.yo dang skyes bug pa can du gyur pa'i lus kyis thams cad mkhyen nga 'o rgya mtshor/
'dzugaminus so// 'di lta ste/gang thug mus long du gyu pa na ren po chenam ba sna tshogs bstan pa'i gnasusu mi 'gyur ro// dpozhin du nga rgyal gyi dbang ragyurapa/ bgamed pa stong par lta ba la gas
( shing theg pa gnyis mi slob pa'i[︽]shes rab kyis mig med pas/dmus long du gyur pa laniblan med pa theg pa chenapo'i yon tan rin po tsho bstan pa'i gnas sum 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ lus shin tu
na mazhingarul bar gyur pa la byug pa drizhim po rnam pa sna tshogs kyis byugs kyang dri zhim par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin dusems can na ba gti mug mun/ nga rgyal gyis mngon par byin ba thag ba gzhis/
kyi rjes btsan pa ram dung cing/ srog gcodapa ma spangs panas/lag par lta ba'i bar du ma spangs pa de dag ni bla na med pa theg pa chen po lazhan tan byed kyang shin tu brab maris shes khamu

nus so// 'di lta ste/ 'dzam khrod dus bon bzang po btab ste/ shin tulas che byas kyang 'bras bu dad la tog rnyed par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du sems can gang theg ba gnyisakyi chos la nga rgyal dang le la byed de/

phab nan tan mi byed pa dang/ 'dod pa lnga la chags te mi skyo ba dag lus de nyid la theg pa chen po'i rigs su shin tu spyad dka' ba'i brtsaka'agrus byas kyatsir yang 'grub pa'i shamado// 'di lta ste/rdza malngar dug/

gi snod byas baRin du/ phyis kha rachung zad tsam btab pas spyadadus rung ngo// de bzhin du sems can gang thog ma gnyis kyi chos la'on tan mi byed pa rgyumed par smra ba la thegar chen po bstan kyang bdag

dngagazhan la phan pa'i don dus 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/sngashakhara'isnod byas pa'i rdzama'inang du/ phyis dug chung bad brtabana'ang sbyad dumi rung ngo// de bzhin du sems can gang thug pa gnyis ngos lan
tanam byas par theg pa chen po stonanagashis ka nyams shing 'khyams par 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ dper na smyos shing sems 'khrugs pa'i mdun du la mo sna tshogs byas kyang bye brag mi phyed
pa de bzhin du/ sems can gang thig ra gnyis kyi chos la shin tu zhan nam byas pa 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang/ gtilug la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa drag pos sems bslad pas rgyu med
par 'dzin pa chad pa dang/ mdang slab dbang po ma smin pa dag la/ theg pa chen po yun ringam zhig tubashad kye shes par ma rtogs pa yinus so// 'di lta ste/ gang zhig gamadamatshon cha sI
thogs pa'i g.yul ngor song na gdon mi za bar sashing sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du sems can gang theg pa gnyis kyi chos la nan tan ma byas pa// shes rab zhan pa/ dbang po/
[91, ]dang smad du ma gyur pa dag la theg pa chen po bshangan/ gdon mi bya bar reg par 'dzin pa'i phyir sdig pa mi las kun byed pa la zad pamatha' med de// da ltar glen pa gti
mug tu da ring ba mi thogs par lus kyi yan lag dum buratshadang/ nyin zhag dumar lce lugacing mi nus pa dang/ shi'i dum bgrad pa'i na ba dang tsha ba'i sdug bsngal chenapo myong ba dang/ 'chi'aphos
tshe nas kyang g don mi za bar mtshams med pa'i sams canangamyal bar lta nganasong rnams su 'khor zhing 'jug pani ltarasdadra rgyas par bshad pa bzhinano/ rigs kyi bu de bas namakhas pa dag ni
pha rol po sems brtags te/ gdodachos bstan par bya'o// sngar byams pa'i sems dang/ snying rje'i sems dang/ dga' ba'i sems dang phan pa'i samus dang/ le 'amed pa'i sems dang/ shin tu bzod/
pa'adems dang/ nga rgyal med pa'i sems dang/ phrag dog med pa'i sams dad 'jus pamed pa'is mas dang/ mnyam par gzhag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sems bskyang nas/ gdod pha rol bo la dam
pa'is bstan par bya'i/ sems can pha rol pos thos nas 'khor bar 'khoranga'i g.yangs chen por lhung bar mi bya'o// dbas na de bzhin ga shegs pa ni sems can thams cad kyi se kyimtshan
nyid thugs su chudanas/ dris med pami len par spyod pa'i 'khor los dam pa'i chos ston te/ go chachen po bgos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams gzhan la chos ston pa yang de bzhin/

0te/byams shing brtse ba'i phyi nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su bcad pa dang/ srid pa gsum gyi rgyamatsholas bsgral ba dang/ sems can dag theg pa gsum gangal da pa'i thug pa gcig la 'dzudacing myur du rdzogs/

par bya ba'i phyir dam pa'i chos ston gyi/'khornababa'akhor ba'i g.yang sa chen por lcabaratshanams kyang mi byed// de 'dzin yan drim med par sbyodapa'i 'khor lo zhes bya na: de la dri mdapa zhesapyab ni chos ston pa'i
tshanaphung bo yod pa'i phyir ma yin/ skye mched yod pa'i phyi ma yin/ khams yodapa'aphyos yin/'dod pa khams yod pa'i phyir ma yin/ gzugs yodapalibams yodapa'i phyir ma yone/ gzugs med palibams yod/
pa'i phyig yin/ 'jig rten 'di yod pa phyi ma yin/ 'jig rten pha rol po yod pa'i phyir ma yin/'du byedayod pa'i phyi ma yin/ tshor ba yod pa'i phyom yin/ 'du shes yodapaphyir ma yin/ rtog pa yod pa'i/
phyir ma yin/ reg pa yodapa'i phyi ma yin/ yade 'a bya ba yod pa'i phyi ma yin/ marig pa yod pa'i phyir ma yin pa nas rgashi'i bar du yod pa'i phyim yin/ 'gro yodapa dang 'gro bamed pa'i phyir/ sems
na ma pa'i chos ston pam yin na// 'dit+ta ste/ phung po dang/ khams dang/ skyemanas/ 'gro ba dang 'gro ba med pa'i bgadurgyas par bshad pa kun kyang rab tu zhi bas sems skrun la dam pa'i chos na/

do// de lta bas na dri ma med pa zhes bya'o// spyod pa zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ 'dinas 'chi'apho ba dang/ pha rol tu skyabayongs su gcod pa'i phyir sems can dag la chos ston to// phung podang/ khams dang
[7/ ]@#/ skye mched yongs su bcad pa nas/ de bzhin du 'gro ba dang mi 'gro ba'i bar du rgyas par yongs su gcod pa'i phyir/ sems can rnams la ches ston pa'i spyod pa zhes bya'o// 'khoralazhes bya
[>>ba ni 'di lta ste/ zla ba lta ba'i 'od shin tusaMm zhing gsal ba/ thogs pa med par nam mkhar snang bas/ thams cad thogs pa med pa'i spyod yul du 'gyur ba bzhin du/ dbazhin ga shegs pa dang/ byang
'gaM chubs nas dpa' rnams ji snyed rdzu 'phrul dang/ mngon pa shes pa dang ! shes pa brda sprod pa dang 3 bslab par bya ba dang/ rnam par rgyal ba'i 'khor lo gsum pos mdzad pa thogs pamed par 'jig na

[% ]gyi khams kun du snod du gyurapa'i semano can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir/ sems can dag grazhan la skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ 'jig rten rgyang 'phen pa thams cad dang ma 'dres pa dang/ nyan thos dang
( rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang ma 'dres par/ sems can dag 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad bcad d/ shin dubadaba'idrang bkyi mya ngan las 'da' ba thob par byed pa ne'akhoral zhes bya'o// de ltar

na de dag ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dbara rnams kyi drim mad par spyod pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o// dal ji ltar nu ma len par spyod nga khri'akhor la zhen/ chos thams cad la thags ba mdapar ji ltar nyi ma'i dkyil

'khor kun tu snang ba bzhin du/ theg pa gsum gyi dngang po dang snyad ji lta ba bzhin du chags pa med par dam pa'i sa stan to// dbazhin gshegs pa sems can rnams la sa ston bani// ji ltanamamakha'athadad pa'i

tshan nyid med pa ltar/ tshadamadu b.ling nge 'dzin dang/ rnam par grol ba'i dubang po dang/ bkod pas yongs su zinab gags can dag la chags pa med pa dam pa'i chos ston to// gotshargyan po bags pa'i byung/
bsams dang 'gags dpa' chen po rnams pha rol chos ston pa yang dadang 'drasta/ chos ston pa ni yod pa yangs yin/ med pa yang ma yin/ gzugs nyid stong pam yin/ gathugs las gzhan pa stong
pam yin pa nas/ rnam par shes pa de kyi bar du stongapa ma yin/ rnam pangashes pa las gzhanapa stong pam yin no// miganyid stong pa ma yin/ mig la ga gzhanar stod pa ma yin panas// yid kyi
bar du stong pa ma yin/ yid las gzhan pa stong pa ma yin no// gzugs nyid stong pam yin/ gzugs las gzhan pa stong ngam yin pa nas/ che+id kyi bar du stong pa ma yin chos las
gzhan ba stod pa ma yin no// mig gi rnam pa shes pa'adastong ba ma yin/ mig gi rnam par shes palas gzhan pa stong pa ma yin pas/ yid kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi bar du stong dum
yin yid kyi rnam pa shes b.las gzhan pa stong pam yin no// 'dod pa'i bams nyid stong pa ma yin/ 'dodapa bamalas gzhan pa stong pa yin pas/namamakha'amatha' yas skya chad
stong pa nyid kyi bar du stong pa ma yin nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched stongs las gzhan pa stong pam yin no// rnam shesamatha' yas skye mched stangs nyid stong pa ma yin: rnam shesamatha' yas skye
[9f]'byu/ mchod sbyangs las gzhan pa stong pa ma yin/ chung bdamadamin skya'achadaskas nyid stong pa ma yin/ srung thad mang in skya mched stangs las gzhan pa stong pa ma yin/ 'dushesamad 'du
po shesamangamin skye mchedastangs nyid stong pa ma yin ) 'dushesayoda'adushes dmo mchod stengs las gzhan pa stong pa ma yin no// dran pa nye bar gzhag nga ba'i nyid stong par yin/ dran pa nye
bar gzhag pa bzhi las gzhan nga stong ngo ma de ra nas/ 'phags pa ri' ma yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyi bar du stong pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i 'am yan lag brgyad pa las gzhan pa stong pa ma yin
ne rten cing 'brel te byung stong pa ma yin/ rtan cing 'brel te byung ba'i chos la sa gzhan pa stongapa ma yin no// bsrung bar bya ba gsum po nyid stong pa ma yin/ bsrung bar bya ba
gsum pa las gzhan pa stong pa ma yin no// 'jigs pa med pa bzhi nyid stong pa ma yin/ 'jigs pa mdapa bzhi las gzhan pa stong pa yin no// stababacu nyid stong pa ma yin/ stabs bcu 'dus
gzhan ba stong pa ma yin no// ma 'dres pa'i sa bco brgyadi nyid stong pam yin/ ma 'dres pa'i chos bco brgyad las gzhan pa stong pa ma yin no// byams pa chen po dang/ sIng rje chen po dang dga' ba

chen po dang ) btangasnyoms chen pa nyid stong pa ma yin/ byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen bo dang/ dga' ba chen po dang/ btang snyoms chen po las gzhan pa steng ngam yin no// mya ngan 'as 'da' ba/

0 nyid stong pa ma yin/ mya ngan las 'da' ba las gzhan pa stong pa ma yin no// de dag ni de bzhin gshegs bdung/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyisags can rnams 'dam pa'i chos ston pa la dbumarinan tan zhes bya'o/

rigs kyi bu de ltarade bzhin gshegs pas sems can dag la dri med par spyod pa'i 'khorales chos ston te/ ji ltar bla banyaba'i 'od shi'i dugasal zhingaim pa dang/ thogs pa med pang namamakha' kun tu khyab pa

dang spyod yulathamasacad du thogs pamed b.rasnang banas gzhung de bzhin du rgyas par ston to// blang du len par spyod nga' 'khorales kyang dam pa'ichos ston sring/ sa thams cad 'thogs pa mad pa nidziltaranyi
ma'i 'od kun tugasal ba ltar/ theg pa gsum gyi dadad/ dbang po ji lta ba bzhin du dam pa'i chos chags pa med par ston to// de bzhin gshegs pasasams can dag la chos ston pa'i/ ji ltar nam mkha'
khamtshan nyid tha dad pa mad pa ltar/ ting nge 'dzin ched yid b.rarnam pa rol pa'i dbang dang bkod bas yongs su bzung bas sems can dag la chags pad bar dam pa'i chos ston te )theg pa gsum
las gang dang 'thunapa bzhin du 'dzud do// go chachanapo bgos pa'i byang chub sams dpasams dpa' chen pos gzhan 'chesadonub yang de bzhin te/ sems can rnams lamchog dam pa
dubrab pa'i sa thos par 'di byas te/ theg pa gsum las gang la mos pa de gcig la 'dzud cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par bya ba dang/ thag pagacig la bde bar dgod pa dang/
gang 'khodapaganasasu sdig pa mi dag ba'i las rnam pa thams cad 'phakharami byed cing/ thams cad mya ngan las 'da' b.lashin tu brtan pa dang/ phyirami ldeg par yang
po byed do// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag nisams can grangs med myong med pa'i 'khorab yongs su gcad pa'i phyi chos ston to// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas ni bdag gi
'tsharakhor ba 'ba'azhig gcod pa'i phyorepha rol 29chos ston to// byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen panasams can tshad med grangs mad pa dag chub bzhis bsgral ba'i phyir gzhan la chos
ston to// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas ni bdag chu bo bzhi las bsgral ba'i phyirogazhan la chos ston to// byungachub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenapogisams can tshad med grangs med pa nyan mongs pa'i
nad gsal ba'i phyiragazhan la chos ston to// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas ni bdag nyid kyi shamongs pa'id gsal ba'i phyiragazhanalcaston to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni
sams can thams cad kyi phung pa'i nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi rgyun lhag ma ma lus par gcod pa'i phyir gzhan la chos ston to// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas na bdag 'ba' zhig gi phung po'i

nyon mongs pa'ibag chags kyi rgyun lhag ma ma lus par gcod pa'i phyirogazhan la chos ston to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpar chen po ni snying rje chen po'i 'bras bu bsgrub pa'i phyir snying rje na bos

rgyu byas te gzhan la chos ston te// nathus dad rang sangs rgyasanisnying rje chen pa'i 'bras bu'i phyo snying rje chen pos rgyabyas te gzhan 2 tshes ston pa ma yin no// byang chub sams dang 'asams dpa' chen
zhesams can thams cad la dmigs te gzhan la chos ston to// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas ni sems can rnams la dmigs pAmad pa gzhan la chos ston to// byang chub sems dang 'a sems
dba' nang ni sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar bya ba'i phyir gzhan la chos ston to/ kun shes dang rang sangs rgyasazhibadag 'ba' zhig gi sdug bsngal zhi bar bya ba'i phyir gzhan la
chos ston to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad la chos kyi rjes khyab par bya ba'i phyiragazhan la chos ston to/ nyan thos dang rangasangs rgyas na bdag 'ba'
zhig las kyi sa khyab par bya ba'i phyirogazhan la chos ston to// byungubasams dang 'a sems dpa' chen pa ni sems can thams cad rgyal ba'ichos kyi 'od thob par bya ba'i phyir gzhan lachos
ston te// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyasazhi bdag 'ba' zhig rgyal ba'i skyes kyi 'od theb par bya ba'i phyir gzhan la chos ston to// rigs kyi bumador na byang rUbasems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni
sdom ba tshad med pas sems can thams cad kyi yarig ba'i mun pa chenang longs su bsal ba dang/ 'jigs pa dngos po chen po dang gnod par 'gyur ba thams cad yongs su bsal te/ 'od kyi snang
[/ ]/bachen po 'thob pa dang/ grags ban po 'thob pa dang/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mas cad mkhyen ba'i yo shes rtogs par bya ba'i phyir gzhan la chos ston to// nyan thos dang rang/

[>>sangs rgyas ni sngog pa/cung zad kyisabadag gi ma rig pa'i mun pa bsalab dang/ 'od snang ba chung bud 'thob pa dang/ grags ba snyung brad 'thub pa dang 3 yang dgab jilta babazhin du chos chud pa'i shas chung

'khaM/ thad rtogs par bya ba'i phyir gzhan la chos ston to// rigs kyi ba nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas gzhan la yang dag par dmigs pamad do// gzhan la yang dag par snying rje ba med do// gzhan la yang dag par

rgyu mi b.ras pa'i samasamad do// gzhan la yang dag par phan pa dang bdabar bya ba mad do// gzhan la yang dag pa snga dgrol zhing sgrolaba'i sems med do// gzhana' yang dag par 'adag pa'i semasamad do// gzhanal
yang dag par bsngags shing bstod bsams med do// pha rol la yang dag bar g.yo dang sgyu med par bstad pa ma yinan// gzhan la yang dgapar bdag gi lus lami lta zhing/ gzhan gyi phan ba dang bad bsgrub

spyi ma yin no// gzhan la yang dag par lus dang/ ngagadang/ yid kyi las[@]nyams pa ma yin no// jigs kyi bu theg pa chenapo la gnas rani ci yang bdag giradamigs pa gang yang ya ngadag par mdu panas/de bzhon
du rgyas par pha rol la 'us dang/ ngag dang/ yid kyi las kyis gzhan la gnod bskyed pa gang yang med do/ 'dus pachen pos 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sa'i sAg po'i 'khor lobacu
bas ] zhes bya batheg ba chen po'i mdo bam po bdun/// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang sems can gang rang bzhin gyis gdug pa/ ga brlang zhing rtsub pa/ yang dag par gyen pa/ gti mug gi rang/
bzhin can/ shes pa snyams pa/ srog gcod pa ma spangs pa nas/ nangar lta ba'i bar dus spangs pa gzhan dag gis kha dang/ bkuran+ti dang/ mchod pa dang/ grags pa redapa mthong na phrag dog skyedapa/
bdag rtag tu kho dang ! bkur sti dang/ mchod pa dang/ grags pa tshol bsam ngoms pa/ bdag bstod cing gzhanasnodapa bdag gi lus dang/ ngag dang yid kyi lasam sdom pa/ sdig pa thams cad spyod
partag dudaga' ba/ nangagisoms gdugab/ snying rje'asis mdo ba/ 'dzem pa med pa/ ngo tsha med pa/ gzhan la'atshob la dga' ba bsod nams kyi zhing 'bazunganadu rnam par 'byed// nga'i

bstan pa la zhugs pa rab tu byung bal skyonachol zhingaganod nga ra glags lta ba la dgarab/ skyon cung zad tsam byunganabaden nam brdzunam rtogs par 'aphya zhing skur te ga bzhingaspyob/ sems ma dul ba/ rgod ba/
