g.yangs pa 1 rab tu byung ba la 'bar dga' ba bdag gi skyol mesams shing gzhan la 'phya ba thag bachen po'i yon tan bsngags pa brjod pa thos nas tshol zhing 'jug pa'i saMms skye mod kyi du ban

ma thob sdig lci nga rtsodapa la dgung la/ rab dum zhib/ gzhan la bslu ba'i phyir theg pa chen po'i chos la bdaganyan cinge/ gzhanayang nyan dugazhug pa'i tshul ston pa dang/ bdag klog pa dang kha ton byed/
@#// gzhan yang klog cing kha tonabadadu 'jug pa'i tshul ston pa dang/ bdag bstadapa'i phyi gnyen la snyadang// theg pa chen po'i sa la bsti stang dbacas pas bstod kyang/ thag pa na
[>>ngo'i spyod yul lanan tan tum bslabs pas don khong dungud pa med parnga bdugazhi theg pa chen po pa'o zhas las 'a zhing khadang/ grags pa dang/ bdag gi 'tsho ba btsal ba'i phyir/gzhan bdag la
tsha gnas 'cha' zhing slob bar 'jugagro/ dparan tshul khrims nyams pa sdig pa spyod pa'i 'dul ba 'dzin pa lta bu / bdag tshul khrims nyams la/ sdig paspyod kyang bdang grags pa'i phyir/ gzhan dag
'dul ba'i sde snod slob par gzhan 'debs pa da ltar g.yo dang gyagyur ldan la/ sla ba'i ngang can gyi samasacand dag ni/ma' lus tha ma 'ang thob par dka'ashing/ mtho ris kyi lha dang theg pa gnyis
kyi mya ngan las 'da'ab yang nyams ma thoban/ theg pa chen po theb pa lta ci smos te/ dganas mang da// da 'tshe 'phos kyang sems can dmyal bar lhung ste 3 thar pa'i dus mdapasamakhas padagagis/

dal bstanapar mi bya'o// khrel ba dang ngo tshab med par 'khor mang po'i nang dub dang bkur sta'i phyirang ni theg pa chenapo pa'o zhes song ge'i sgra sgrogs pas/ glen pa gtimug can dag dang bstan cingagrogs su byed de/
dan dpar na bong bus sang ga'i pags pa gyon te bdag ni seng ge'o zhes bas 'du bas/ sa zhig gis rgyang nas mthong nas/ des sang gi nyid yin pa 'dzin to// danasangos sgra phyung ba//

0 dang thams cad kyis bong bu yin pa shesazhus/ kun gyis mchil mas brtab ste// sa so nas smras pa 'dig mi gtsang ba dra b.re sdig de bong buldan zhas tsheg nasna tshogs kyis smad de dang ngo// de ltarade

bzhin dungs dngashad parigangabrag mi dge ba bcu'i las gyi lam spyod pa la spob/ lha dang ma thams cad kyis bon bsregs pa yin te/ nyanathos dang rang gas rgyas kyi theg pa'i sa las kyang phyir ldog pa yinan/

theg pa chen po'i snod du 'gyur ba lta ci smos/ de ltar glen pa gti mug can nga rgyal gyis mngon par brin te/ bdug theg pa chen po pa'o zhes pha ro'asgyus brjod cing/ khe dang bkur stisdad pa de ni/ dper na

rkang 'gamad parimi glen pa zhig dgra la brgol ba'i phyire g.yul du zhugs kyang/ bdaganyomongs pa las don du 'grub pa med do// de ltar de bzhin du shug pa chenapo par spyas khas 'chagades nga 'di ltar/
dad pa'ilag pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi rkang pam tshang ba'agrang gi las dang spyad pa lami dpog cing/ zhanamongs pa legayul chen po la rgol bar chas pani/ bdag nyenayongs btson lagadon du mi 'gyur//
gang brag de sgo gsum mi sdom par sdig pa rang zhig sprod nying/ bdagani theg pa chen po pa'o zhes khas lar yang 1 theg pa gsum gyi chos kyi stod ma yin pas/ mas can thams cad kyi nyon mongs
pa'idagra shin tu mnan pa nas bar ram/ sems can thams cad la 'phags ba'il gyi yanang gi brgyad stonang ram/ 'jigs pa mad pa'i mya ngan las 'da' ba'i grong khyer dudagod pa'i gnas
med do// ci'i phyi zhen/ rigs kyi bu theg pa na bo zhas bya ba ni phul dugyur pa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag par srung ba// phu'adugyur pa'i dge ba'i mchog spyod pa ldan ng :

[>>phul du gyur pa'i brel ba dang datshadang rtan pa'o// 'jig rten phyi ma'i sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu shin tu lta zhiba'ajigs pa'o// mi dge ba'i chosadzoms cad yongs su spyong zhing/ dge ba'i ngos thams
cad zhan tan byed pa 'a spro ba'o// byams pa dngasnying rjes sems can thams cad la khyab pa'o// sems can thams cad phan pa dang bde ba'i don bya bar rtso 'ba'o gamakacan thams cad
'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las sgrol zhing 'don pa'o// bdag gi lus kyi bde ba la ma lto'i/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bdang 'dzin stobs ba/de dga'i thugag pa chen po 'du gnas pa/
zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bumtshan nyid gang dag dang ldan nanyan thos kyi theg pa zhes bgyi/ gangadagayang dag nga 'i dran pa 'gabade bar gnas shing/ tang nga'adzin la mnyam par 'jog bur mos
bas rtag dubartson pa dang ) g.yo dang sgyu spangs shing/ las kyi 'bras bu la yid ches pa dang/ 'dod pa lnga lamigs shing/ 'jig rtan gyi chos brgyad kyis mi gos pa dang/ mgo'i bod la me 'bar

nga bzhin du dge nga la shin dubartson pa dang/ phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched la shin tu rtog pa dang/ 'phags pa'i rigs la bde bar gnas par rtag tu'os pa sta/ mtshan nyid 'di dag dang ldan panin

0 thos kyi theg pa zhes bya sta/ gang zag 'di rangasangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i snod du'ang mi 'gyur na/thag bzen po'i snod du 'gyu ba lta ci smos ) rigs kyi bu mtshan nyid gang dag dang ldan pas/ rangasangs rgyas kyi

thug pa zhes bgyi/ sems can gang dag nyan thos kyis yon na de dag thams cad dang yang ldan la/ gzhan yang nye bar len pa'i phungapo lnga la yang dang yang du mi rtag par rjesasu rtog pa la gnas pa dang/

skye zhing 'gog pa la yang dang yang du rjes su rtog pa la gnas pa dang/ rten cing 'brel te byung ba'is rnams ni 'gag pa'icas can du shin tu rtog pa ste/ mtshan nyid 'di dag dang ldan/ rangasangs rgyas/
kyi theg pa zhes bya ste/ sams can de theg pa chen po'i sakyi snanganim yin no// dmas bcom ldan 'das kyis don ngadag bslus pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/ gal tadag ba
rgyal rigs rgyal po dang// rje'u rigs dmangs rigs shin dudage ba'i bar// dad la sogs pa'i 'khor le banu bsgoms na// nyan thos theg pa'isnod dud 'gyur ro// rang rgyal theg pa'i sgo gsum rnam par dag/

khrel dpa'adzem par ldan zhing phung nges 'jigs// nyes pa'i skyonashes bas mtha'i gnas la dga'// dran pas dbangabo srung shesamasakyang zhi// rten cing 'brel pa rtogs pas bsam gtan bsgom)/ phung po bam
dang skya mched rtog lamakhas// gnas dang spyod ldan 'akhorale 'dabenus gnas// theg pa mchog gi snod 'gyur srid mtsho rgal// theg ba gsumamin gnyis kyi 'khor lo yis// bdag nyid nyenayosanam bar
0 bya// grol rtso lazhing// ngag rlugs/gdongasems canamasgrol ba'i// gang thug de ni theg chen sna dam yin// byas pa dbang bo zhan ba le 'acan// theg pa gnyis 'dan tan mi byed pa// theg pa

[>na ba'i 'khebale ldan mi 'gyur// den gyi chenatheg chen snod yin// byis pa gcig bu rnam par grol tshol ba// blodang spyod pa zhan cing nas sems med// chad par lta la chags pa ngan song gzhe'o// yang dag ngos

mkhaM srong chos ma yin pa son// theg pa gnyis la skur cing sdom pa spong// bsnyen par rdzogs shi theg chen khas 'chab// nga yis 'jig sems can kun la spyi// de yi dbang gis mi lus thob par dka'// ngayi
bstan la zhugs pa'i 'phags pa dang// ngur smig gyonal 'tshe ma gnod byedadam// gshe 'am spros sam lhung barbadagos phrogs na// lha dang ma yi bdu ba yun du stor// de bas gang zhigami lus thob 'dod
cing/ 'chiba'i dus na lhags pa'i skyon spangs shing// rtag tusas rgyas kun dang phrad 'dod pa// thug gsuaches rnams kun tu srung b.rabyos// theg pa gsum las theg pamchog 'dod pa// theg
ba gsum/chos rtogs ma'os pa skyo// dga' zhing bas gzhan la rgyus ston na// nges par sangs rgyasa'agyural tha tshom spongs// tshul khrims nyams shing 'jungs pa nga rgyal can// bdag bstod gzhan sgyod
theg chen khas 'a ba// de dag spangs tan khas la brten par bya// nges par 'atshangargya khams gsuma'ada' b.ra'agyur// theg pa gsum las gangadang 'thun pa bzhin// byams dang snying rjes thag pa gsum
chos ston// mi 'chab reg yongs su rdzogs bsun// nges par 'tshang rgyur 'gyur la the tshom spongs// phung po khams dang skya mang zhi bshes// nam mkha' bzhin du ci la'ang mi gnas te/ des bstan
sanas can mang po kun yang sdud// dpagamad ye shes blo gros dam pa thob// tshul khrims nyams par dga' la sdig pa can// theg ba na po'i yon tan mchog thos nas// la dang grags phyir theg chen
bas 'chag/ khong bu sangaga'i pags pa gyon pa bzhin// denga'adire thams cad 'khoral bka' skul pa// gang zhig myur du byang chub mchog 'dod na// dge banu'ilas kyi lam la nan tan byos// nga yi

chos la mi smadangashin dubasrung// ngas sngon mdo sde gzhan dag las gsungs pa// byang chub chen po 'dod pas thagar spyod// nyan thos rang rgyal theg pa spongs shig pa// de'i rnam dag 'khora' ba nupa'i/
chos/ sungs rgyas tshad med bya ba mchod byas pas// sdig pa spangasazhas rnam dag sims srung ba/ shin tu brtson pa'i skya bo de dag la// gnyisasumadu dbrag pa gcig pu bshad// da lta'i
'khor 'di theg pa gsum/dacan/ ]la la nyan thos theg pa'i chos dang ldan// las kyi dngos po mang pos 'jigs pa dag/ de ni byang bu mchog gi stodam yin// lal dban par dga' zhing
rangabyang chub// dan drung chub mchog gi snod yin// la laya shesan chog labakodazhes ba// dungs mos pa bzhin du thag gsum 'de// spungs pa'i yon tan tsam gyis grola'adod pa// thag
khubya/ dachen bshad pa thos na ngan song ltung// bad kan nad la rom 'thung bcug bzhin// de phyir dug tu 'gyur gyi nadamasal/ de bzhin stodamin nyan thos theg pa dag/ thag chen

[>>]]bshad pa thosan rmongs 'gyur zhing// chad par lta la ngan song ba'agyur bas// des na dbang po brtags tu chos bstan to// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sa'i snying po'i 'khor lo bcu ba zhes bya ba las/
gnas pa dang spyad pa'i le'u sta bzhi pa'o// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa de dag gsungs pa na/ 'khor gyidakyil 'khor de'i nang na/ sems can tshadamad

ra brgyastong nyid sngon chos thos pa las yi gol te/ stong pa ma yin par go nas/ rgyu dang 'bras bu med par lta zhing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bcad nas/ ngan song du ltung bar 'gyur ba dag/ mdo sde 'di
bshad pa thos nas phyir yang yang dag pa'i lta ba dang ldan pa ngagyur to// de nas de dga' dug pa las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar shin du 'dzes pa bskyadod 1 so sorab shags par bya ba'i
phyir tha'am snga ba bdud dbyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'adas la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag sogs nyan thos kyi theg pa'i rigs su dge ba'i rtsa ba la spyod pa las/ nyan

thos kyi theg pa de yang yongs sum smin par/ rangasangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos thos so// rmongs mngon du ma gyur pas stong par lta zhing rgyu dang 'bras bu yang med par 'dzin to// de'i rgyu da'i rkyen gyis lus

[p/]dang ngag dang/ yid kyi sgo nas sdig pa mi dge badrilas tshadamad pa bgyis pas/ ngan songadag tu snang ba 'gyur ba las/ dang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mdo sde 'dibashad pa thosas/ sur yang yang dag
pa'i lta ba red de/ shin tu 'dzem ba dang ngo tshaba'isams kyis so sor bshags te/ ma bcabs pos de dug yongs su byang bar gyur cig/ deng slan chad ji snyad sgrib pa 'gyur ba'i las mi bgyid par yongs
su bsrung bar 'tshalalo// bdag cag gi sdig pa de dag yongs su byang ba dang/ snyanarmad mi bgyid par bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse bas bzung du gsol/ bdag cag ma 'ongs pa na ngan song gi sdug bsngal/
myong bar 'gyur ba las thugs brtse bas bskyab tu gsal/ bdag cag slar yang sngon spyad pa'i nyan thos kyi theg pa la spyod cing nan tan bgyid kyis/ bcom ldan 'das thugs partsa bu'i slad du bstan
du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// legs so legs so// byed 'di ltar 'dzem pa dang nga tsha bas so sorab shags pa legs so// nga'i bstan pa 'am 20/sa pa'i skyes bu dam pa
gnyis yod de// gcig ni rangab zhin gyis yongs su dag cing/ thog mnasanyes pa mi byed pa'o// gcig nyes pa byas su zin kyang 'dzem ba dang ngo tshabs so sor 'chags pa ste/ skyes bu dam pa
'di gnyis ni ricos la shin tu 'dun pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o// denas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi mos pa bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i chos bstan te 'khor re'i/
phu ]/nanal la ni bzod pa tham thob/ la la nibabyed pa bam thob/ la la ni bod pa mchog thob lal ni 'jig rten gyi mchog gi chos thob/ lalanirgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob

[>>la 'di lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob/ la lan phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo// gzhan yang dge slong brgyad khri bzhi stong brag pa thams cad brad pa/ samasu yapar grol// blo shin tu rnam par

'tsha dag pa'i dgra bcom par gyur nas/ dga' bzhin du sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal te/ phyirje yang so so'i stan la 'khod de/ !yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khoradenangan sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag
lnga bcu rtsa bdun gyis sngon thos pas chos stongapa yin par 'khrul nas/ rgyu dang 'bras bu med par lta zhing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su btsadan/ ngan song du ltung bar 'gyur ba las mdo sde 'debashad
da thos nas/ phyir yang dag pa'i lta ba rnyed de 'dug pa las 'angs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos gtugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snga na skadra shin tu 'dzem pa dang/ tshab dang
bcas pas so sor bshags te thal mo sdur ba btud cing/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'dus bdag cag sngon rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i rigs sudag
ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa las/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i snod du mang yongs sum smin b.ratheg ba chen po richos thos nas dad pa dang mos pa skyes kyang/ ma rigs pas mdongs shing rtogs pa ma gyur te
stong par lta zhing rgyu dang 'bras bu nad par bzung nga// de'i rgyud rkyen gyis lus dang ) ngagadang/ yid kyis sdig pa mi dge ba las tshadamad pa dag bgyis pas/ bskal pa ngamad pa'i bar du shin
mi bgrad pa'i sdug bsngalam pa sna tshogs myong zhing ngan song du ltung bar 'gyur ba las/ dung bcom ldan 'das kyi snga na sngaramado sde 'di bshad pa thos nas/ slar yang dag pa'i lta ba red de//
shinaturadzem pa dang ngo tshibar ldan pa/ mi 'chab ba'isams kyis si sor bshags te/ dngasan tshad dze sAd sgrib pa'i 'gyur ba'i las rnams mi bgyid bar yongs su bsrung bar 'tshol lo//
bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba can gyis bdag cag gi sdig pa dedag yongs su byang b dang/ slan da mi bgyid par rjes su gzung du gsol/ bdag cagam 'ongs pan ngan song gi sdug
bsngal myongabar 'gyur ba las/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs rjes bskyab tu gsol/ bdag cag slar yang sngon spyad pa'i rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la spyod cing nan tan bgyid kyis/
bcom ldan 'dus thugs brtse ba can gyis bstan dugasol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so zhes bka' stsal to/ legs so 'a gsaso// khyed 'di ltar 'dzam pa dang ngo tsha bas so so
bshags pa legs so// nga'i bstan pa lam mas pa'i skyes bu gnyis yod de/ gcigazhi rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag cing thogamanasanyes pami byed pa'o// gciganyis pa byas su ba'i
[2]// kyaba'adzom pa dang ngo tsha bas so so 'chags pa ste/ skyug bu dam pa 'di gnyis nga'i chos la shin tu 'dun pa rnam bar dug ga zhes bya'o// danas bcom ldan

[>>'das kyis de dag gi mos pa bzhin du rten cing 'brel te byung ba'i chos bstan nas/ dadag thams cad rang sangs rgyus kyi theg pa la nan tan byas te/ thams cad matha gyis rgyalan la dmigs pa zhes thuba'i

'a ding nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs nas/ ras ngas rgyas kyi theg pa las phyi ni ldog cing dga' bzhin dubcom ldan 'das la phyag 'atsalanas/ phyir yang soso'i stan la 'khod do// yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor

de'i nang na sems can bye ba brgya stongaphrag brgyud chu snyad sngon 'das pa'i sangs rgyas chos la skur pa nas/ chung ngu nasas rgyas kyis bstan pa rmigasasu bcad pa gcig tsam la smad ba/ de'i rgyu da'i rgyan/

gyis ngan song dag tu lhung zhing sdug bsngal mang pomyong/ slar mi'i lus thob nayang thob mnas skugs pa/ dig ba/ lce ldib meng snyam shes ba dgamad sde 'di bshad pa thos nas/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang
de de dag 'dug pa 'dis lases ]bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshalanas) bcom ldan 'dus kyi spyan sngashod du'adzem pa dang/ ngo tsha bas sngon gyi sdig ba'i sas so bshags
nas thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la mig mi 'dzums par lta'o// denas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag thams cad skya nus par byin gyisabarlabs te/ de'i tshe bcom
ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du de dag la bka' stsal nga khyedams mi dge ba'i las ci zhig byas n khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di'i nangan sna mi shes par gyur/ da dug gis bcon ldan 'das
la 'di skad ces gsol te// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kha cig gis ni sngon rnam pa gabrigs de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa'i sa la kha cig gis ni theg pa chen po'i chos la
skur to// la lanarang sa rgyasakyi theg pa'i chos la skurato// kha cig gis ni nyan thosakyi thog gi sal skur ro// de la chung ngu na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam la skur dus bdag cagami dge ba'i
las de dag gi dbang gi/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig go bar du 'khor bar 'khodra zhing ! rtag tu sems can dmyalaM ba dang/ byol song gi skye gnas dang/ yi dpa gas kyi 'jig rten du skyes te/lhugs
pa dang/ rig pa dang/ lcamad pa dang/ snyachenus pa dang/ shin tui bgrad pa'i sdug bsngal chen po skyong// gdong tsho 'di la mi'i lu thob kyis kyang lugs pa dad da dge ba dang/ rtag tu/
nad can du gyur pa las/ bcom ldan 'dras kyi byin gyi ba pas kyis smanus pa dang/ sngon 'das pa'i dus nam dge ba'i las kyi sgrib pa ci dang ci bgyis pa thams cad kyang dran par gyur te// pa'i nang
na yang btsoge/zhi 'di skad du/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag sngonobcom pha 'das gtsug to'am gyis bstan pa'i ngos la kha cig gis ni theg pa chen po la skar to// kha cig gis/
]]nirang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la skur ba nas/ sngon gyi dmigs pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa yang ji ltar rgyas par bshad pa bzhinan// darinangan kha cig 'di skad du/ btsun
po da bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ston thams cad skyob de bzhin gshags pa'i bstan pa la/ bcig gis ni theg ba na po yang dag ba'ichos sku'u pa nas/ dmigs pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa/
yang ji ltar rgyas par bshad pa bzhin no// de la kha cig gis ni 'di skad du/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ston log bar du alu de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la/ kha cig theg
klopa chen po'i yang dag pa'i chos la skur ba nas/ dmigs pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa yang ji ltar gong du rgyas par bshad pa bzhinano// de la kha cig gis ni 'di skad du/ btsun pa bcom ldan
'das bdag cag ston gsar thub de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la kha cig gisani theg pa chen po'i dam pa'i chos la skur ba na// dmigs kha ji ltar bzhin du ston pa ji ltar gang du rgyus
bar bshad pa bzhinano// de la bdug gas ni 'di skad du/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag sngon 'dasungs pa bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la/ kha cig gisani thag paman po'i dam
pa'i chos la skur te// khacig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos la skur to// kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi theg pa'i sa la skur ba nas/ chung ngunatshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam la/
klad pas/ mi dge ba'i las kyi dbang gis datshund 'khor bar 'khor te/ rtag tu sams can dmyal ba dang byol song gi skye gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du rgyas shing )lcags ba dang/
dig re dang/ lce med pa dang/ brda ma 'phrod pa dang/ shinatumi 'brang pa'i sdug bsngal chen pomyong nas/ gdod mo'adi' mi'i lus thob kyis kyang/ lkugs pa dang/ dag pa dang/ lce
nad can du gyur pa dang/ brda 'phrod pa las/ bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis gdod smanus pa dang/ sngon 'das pa'i dus na mi dge ba'i las kyi slab pa ci bgyis
pa thams cad dran bar gyur cing/ bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mdosde 'di bshad pa 'di thos nas )slar yang yang dag pa'i lta ba rnyed de/ shin tu ngotsha ba dad ) 'dzum pa dang
mi'achab b.risams kyis sosor bshags so// rengasand ji snyad sgrib par 'gyur ba'i las rnamasami bgyid par yongs su bsrung bar 'tshol// bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse bas
gyis bdag cag gisdig pa de dag yongs su byang ba dang/ slan chad mi bgyid par rjes su gzung du gsol// ma 'ongs pa na 'ang ngan song gi sdug bsngal yos su myang bar 'gyur ba las/bcom
ldan 'das kyi thugs rjes bskyab pa dang/ dam pa'i chos bstan dugasal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so zhes bka' stsal te/ legs so legasaso ]dpyod 'di ltar 'dzamapa
[4 ]@#// phung ngo bas so sor bshags pa legasaso// ngaribastan pa la skyes bu dum ba ma nyams bya gnyis yod de/ gcig na rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag cing shog
[>mnasanyes pa mi byedapa'o// gcig ninyes pa byas su byin kyang/ 'dzem pa dang ngo tshabs so sor 'chugs ba ste/ skyes bu dam pa 'diganyis ni de rebastan pa'ichos la shin tu'adunaparnam
par dag pa zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du dam pa'atshos rnam pa sna tshogs bstan cing bshad de so sortsi dga' ba'i bde bathob
par byas so// dedag dga' bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas sa so'i stan la 'khod do// de'i tsho'akhor gyi dkyil 'khor de ri nangan nyan thos tshadamed pa brgya stong skud dang byung
chub sems dpa'atshad med pa bye ba brgya stong steng kyis mdo sde 'di bshad pa thos nas/ mi dgi ngaril sa kyi sgrib pa sngon du byas pa dran te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyaga'atsalanus/
bcom ldan 'das kyi ldan par shin tu 'dzem pa dang ngo tsha ba sems kyis so ser rarlags shing thal mo sbyar te bsti stang dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
btsun ba bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ston sangs rgyas tshademad pa dag gi dam ba'i chos la/ 2lani'adi skad du/ bdag cag sangs rgyus de'i gnas chos kyi snod du gyur pa rom chos kyi ]
snod dus gyur pa la bro ba dang/ zhe sdang ba dang/ gshazhing spro ba dang/ smod par ng// brnyas bdang rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'phya zhi skur te gnod bar glags lta ba dang/ yon tan bcabasanas
nyis pa bsgrags te/ bdag cag mi dge ba las de'i dbang gis bskal pa tshad med pa'i bar dungan song du ltung zhing/ shin tu mi bgrad pa'i sdug bsngal chenango myong ngo// phyis sangs rgyas tshad
mar ba dag la bsnyen bkur dang mchod pa bgyis so// gzhan yangubya ba sums drab 'aAms dang 'a chen po tsAmadab snyad la bsnyen bkur dang/ mchod pa dang/ g.yog bgyisunas//
sangs rgyas dare re dang/ byang chub sams dpasums dpa' chenapo dor re lashin du'adzem pa dang ngo tsha bas sdig pa'i las kyi sgrib pa dag so sor bshags sa// sangs rgyas dera'i dang/
byang bsams dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i ral yangs kyi rnam grangs tshod med pa snyad ma te/ thos nas shin tunan tan bgyis pa dang/ shin du spyad dka' ba tshad med pa dgaspyad
kyang : las kyi sgrib pa'ilhag ma lus pas bdag cag shin tu bde ba'i mya ngan las 'dul ba ma thob bo// bdag cag ting nge 'dzin gyi sgarikhyad par dang yon tan kyang m thob bo// bdag cagading
bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngaramado sde 'di bshadapa thos nas lhag par shin tu 'dzem pa dang ngochab 'i sems ma rab ra'asams kyis so sor bshags so// yongs su byang bar shog/
[©]// cig/ dang smanand ji sud sgrib par 'agyur ba'i las rnams mi bgyid par yongs su bsrung bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'dus thugs brtse ba canagyis bdag cag
[>>gi sdige ba de dag yongs su byung ba dang/ skran chad mi bgyid par rjes su gzung du gsol/ bdag cag ma 'ongs pa na ngan song gi sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba 'as/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs

kho rjes bskyab tu gsol/ bdag cag bcom ldan 'dasakyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus mos pa bzhin du mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bde ba myur du thob pa dang/ nga nge 'dzin gyi sgo'i yon tan gyi khyad par thob pa/
mdzad du gsol/ de la bcig 'di skad du/ bdag cag sngon bcom ldan 'das chog mo zhig gnyo gnas chos kyi snodadang/ chos kyi snyed sa yin pa la tshig rtsub pa zhe gcod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis
'a zhing gnod pa bgyisar sa/ bdag cagami dge ba'i las de'i dbang gis bskul ba dmed pa'i bar du ngan godadu ltung bar gyur pa nas ! de bzhin du gdod rgyas bar bshad pa bzhin no// la
lan 'di skad du/ bdag cag sngon bcom ldan 'das tshagasazhigaganye gnas chos kyi snod dang/ zlosakya skyongam yin pa la gzhu bdung/ 'dogs pas 'tsho ba dang gnod pa bgyisapami
dge ba'i las de'i dbang gis bskal pa (med ba'i bar du ngan song du ltung bar gyur pa nas ) de bzhin du gong du rgyas bar bshadangabazhin no// de la kha cigani 'di skadadu/ bdag cas/ sngon bcom/
ldan 'as gam zhig gi nye gnas rjes kyi snang dang/ chos kyi snod ma yin pa'i chos gos dang lhung babred thugs bas/ mi dge bas de'i dbang gi bskal ba tshudand pa'i bar du ngan song du ltung ba/
dag de bzhin du lo nga durgyus par bshad pa bzhin no// de la bcig ni 'di skad du/ bdag cog sngon bcom ldan 'das rlu gamozhig gi nyi gnas chos kyi snod dang/ chos kyisodaa yin pa'i tshe/
ba'i yo byad rnam ba sna tshogs 'dzugs de/ babrab dang bachung pa phrogs shing bar chad byas pa mi dag ba'i las de'i dbang gis/ bskal pa tshad med pa 'ibar dungan song du ltung ba dang/ de bzhinang
gang du rgyas par bshad pa bzhinano// del bcugazhi 'di skad du/ bdug rug sngon bcom ldan 'das chage mo zhig gi nyi gnas chos kyi snod dang/ chos kyi snod ma yin pa dag gi chus gas phrogs
nas byam par phab ste/ las rnam pa sna rogs byed du bcug pa/ mi dag ba'i las dadabang gis bskal pa tshad med pa'i bar du ngan song du lhung ba nas/ de bzhin dugong du rgyas par bshad pa/

bzhinano// de la kha cig ni 'di skad du/ bdag rtag sngon bcom ldan 'das chagam zhig gi nyi gnas rab tu byung ba chos kyi snod dang/ chos kyi snod ma yin pa dag nyes pa byas pa dang/ nyes pa ma byas pa la

lcags dang/ khong sgril dang/ shing sgrog du bcug ste/ gces pa medage ba'i las de'i dbang gis bskal pa tshad med pa'i bar du bdag cag ngan song du ltung ba las/ de bzhin du gang du rgyas nga 2 bshad pa bzhin/
[F ]// gno/ de la kha cig ni 'diskong du/ bdag cag bcom ldan 'das tshe gamozhig gi nye gnas rab du byung ba chos kyi snod dang/ chos kyi snod ma yin pa dag la dbang bya ba'i sems kyis 'tshob/
po dang (gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mo bdabar bgyis pa/ bdag cagami dge ba'i las deradangang gis bskyal bad yod pa'i badzadushin duzhibagrad pa'i sdug bsngalan bo myong bar gyur to// phyis sa/
ka rgyas dmadapa dag ngasan bkur dang mchod pa dang/ mnyes pa bgyis so/ gzhan yang byang bu son/sa dpa' sems dang 'debo tshad med pasnyade de dag la yang bsnyen bkuradang/ ma'od pa dang/
mnyis pa bgyes te/ sangs rgyas de re re dang/ byang chub sems dba' sams dba' napo de rer la yang shine tu'adzem pa dang bcas pas mi dge ba'i las de dag sosor bshags so// sangs rgyas de de re dang/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' de na po de de'i las kyang tshad med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs mnyanata/ thos nas shin tu 'bad pa'i ba rtson 'grus kyis nan tan bgyis 3 shin tu da dka' spyad kyang
las kyi slob pa'i lhag ma lus pas/ bdag cag nga dung dung shin tu bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pam thob bo// ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo'i yon tan gyi khyadaparam thob bo// bdag cag deng bcom ldan 'das kyi
spyan sngar mdo sde 'di thos nas lhag par shin tu 'dzem ba dang/ mi 'chab pas so sor bshags te yongs su byang bar gyur to// dengasmand ji srung sgrib bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams mi bgyid par yongs su
bsrung b.raratshal lo// bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba can gyis bdag cag gisdog pa de dag yongs su byang bdang// nad mi bgyid par rjes su gzung du gsol/ bdag cag ma 'os pa ngan
song gi sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba las ]bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs rjes bskyab gsal/ bdagatsag bcom ldan 'das kyi byen gyi rlabs kyi mthus mya ngan las 'da' b.rebade myur du
thob pa dang/ gzhanayang ting nge 'dzin gyi yon tan gyi sgo'i khyad par thob par mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thob dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag
labaka' stsalang/ legs so legs so// byed 'di ltar shin tu'adzum pa dang bas pas so sor bshags pa legs so// yongs sumanyams pa'i skyes bu dom pa 'di gnyis yod de/
gcig rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag cing thog ma nas nyes pa mi byed pa'o// gcig nyis pa byas su zin kya'adzem pa dang bcas pas so sor 'chagApa ste/ skyes bu 'di gnyis de'i bstan
dal shin tu 'dun pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la rab tu byungaba'i gnas laganodapa bus pa'i sdig pa gong dubashad pa'i mtshams med pa dang lto
ba'asdig ba rnamong tsam du bud de/ sdig pa zhes kyang bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi gnas rab dubyung ba'i gnod ba phyisan/ de'i sdog pa'igong du bshad pa'imatshamasamed ba lta'i sdig pa bas tshad mngags
med pas lhag par cher// datsakhyor zhen/ dge slong gang tshul khrims ms te sdig pa byed kyang/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med ba snyad latshungan las
[>'da' ba phyin ci ma log pa'i lam ston nus so// sems mang bo la yon tan de'irinapo 'i gter du'agyur banag de bzhin du ltar rgyas bar bshadab bzhi'akol khrigs srung
wa zhing dge ba'i chos spyod bltaci smos/ de bas gdagisas sa rgyus kyibastan pa la rab tu byung ba'i slobam la'atshab dang gnod pa byas n/ den dkon cog gsum gyig dung gcod pa yin pa shes
[']bar bya'o// de'i gos can thams cad kyis kyithog bcar ba yin no/ de'ings sngonashin du dkarab slad nas skyed ba'i rnam ba'i 'os ma rung bar byas pa yin no// de nasems can thams
na'azhituganod pa chen po byas pa yin no// de bsanasangs rgyus kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba la gnod pa byas n/ de'i sdig pa sngar bshad pa'ang masamod blta'i ldig bu bas/
tshad med grangs tshud pas lhag par ro// de bas na khyed kyis denganga'i mdun du shin du sim pa dag cing lhag khari'adzam ba da'abade par bacag pas sngon gyi mi dge ba'i las kyi sgrub
pa thams cad sosobashags pa'i phyir/ khyed shugs chen pos rjesasu bzung bas/ khyodakyi sdog pa'i lasakyi sgrib bams cad khyed kyis byiba'agyur te/ sas rgyas kyi zhing 'di bskal

[4, ]pabathang pa'i sangs rgyas stong byung ba thams cad layang khyerakyis 'dibazhin du/ de nga zhin gshegs pa de dag gi sbasngar yang sdig pa'i las kyi gling ba thams cad shin tu sa seng shogs shig/ ma/
'os pa'i shis pa yang shin tusung bar gyis shig/ bskal pa bzangapo'isangs rgyas stong gi thamasnang mdzad ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dgapa tshogs pa'i sangs rgyas ba
dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten rig pa/ bla na mdapa/ gyes bu 'dul zhing ba la sgyur ba/ lha dang mi'i ston pa )sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngayang jug pa'i las kyi
sgrib pa thams cad shin tu so sor shogs shig dang/ lhag mam lus par yongs su byang ba'agyur re rin thos de dag dang byang ba rams dang 'dedag gis gsol pa// dbazhinano//
bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gal te 'diltar sangs rgyas stongagi thu masnangamadzod kyi tshoyang dag pa'i lta ba 'thob cing log par lta b rnams spangs te/ sdig ba'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad lhags
ma lus par 'byang zhing/ sdug bsngal thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyungan/ bdag cag bskal ba bzang bo 'di la mtshams med pa'isams can dmyal bar skyes te/ sdug bsngala rnam ba sna
tshogs mon yang bzod do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// legs so legs so// khyed kyis 'di ltar rtul bod pa dang/ shi'i 'bar pa'i brtson 'grus brtan bodang smon lam gyi
[mthus gdonami za bsangs rgyas snangamadzad kyi cha/ sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang ba dang/ lhag pa'i bsam pas bsnyesnang dang bcas te/ bgAnabakur dang
[>>gdakha gdanani'u bar byed par 'gyur// dbazhin gshegs pa snang mdzadakyis kyang gdonamo khri bar/ nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs subacud pa'i dgra bcom par 'gyur ba mdzad do//
tsha gdon mi za bar di nga'adzin gyi sgra'i yon tan gyi khyad nga 'thob bar mdzad de// de nas nyan thos de dag dang/ byang bsams dang 'du dag dga' bzhin dukhacom ldan 'das kyi
sgyu zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas phyir yang go 'i stan la khod do// de'i bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bya[<]chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i ging po la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ngas/

zla sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten thams cad la brtagasan/ma 'ongs pa'i dus nasangs rgyas zhing 'dir tshad med grangasamed pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong snyad kyi rgyal rigs gdol pa can dang/
bram ze gdol pa can dang/ blon po gdol pa can dang/ khyim bdagagadol pa can dang/ tshong dpon gdol pa can dang dge sbyong gdol pa can dang/ rje'u rigs dung/ dmangs rigs dang/ gdol pa
zhagyi skyes pa ma budached la sogs pa de dag dag kha'i rtsa ba chung ngubaskyod pa mi'i lus thob tu branekyang/ mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ston cing/ gapa'i ltab bskyod pa/ sdig bami dge ba'i las

[&]/ kyis nga'i blanamad pa 'am nga 'i sa shin du sabam 'jig par byed de// bstan par rgyas par mi byed/ rgyas pa rnams med par byed cing mos pa mi skyed/ ngas bstan pa'i nyan thos kyi theg pa can gyi dpa'i
ngos la 'ju zhing skur te/ bgegs dang bar da byed cing rgyas pa lam byed pa dang/ bar b.ranings bstan pa ring sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can gyi dag pa'i sa la 'phya zhing skur pa dang/ bragags dang

bar chad byed cing rgyasaM pa rami byed pa dang/ bar bur ni ngas bstan pa'i thun mad pa'i theg pa can gyi dam pa'i rjes la 'phya zhing skur pa dang/ bgegs dang/ bar chad byedacing rgyas pa mi byed pa dang/

bar b.rani ngas bstan pa la rab du byung ba nges kyi snod dang/ A kyi snodamA yin pa la zhe sdang bskyed cing gshi ba dang/ glo ba dang dospyod ba dang/ tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gnod par grags ltaste/
'phya zhing skur po dang yon tanang tsabs nas nyes pa bsgrags te de bzhin smed pa'i sams kyis re ba dang gnodapa rnam pa sna tshogs byed do// de ltaragang brag 'phags pa'i chos kyi snad dug

gyur pa dag ngo dag par glen zhing gti mug ga red bzhin chen gde te/ cungaphradatsam gyis shes pa snyams pa'i nga rgyal can de 'di nas rje'adzadasam thog tungan sodra gsum du lhung ste/ dmad nga snyakyi
shazhedumi bgrad pa'i sdug bsngal chen po 'ong bar 'gyur ro// bskal pa tshad med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bar dumi'i lus thob par dka' ba nas/ de bzhin du gongod rgyas bar bshad pa
bzhin// rigs kyi bsams na dmatshamasamud pasams can dmyal ba chen po 'dugaste/sngag bsngal chen po myong yang grwa'i/ de lta bu'i lus sdig can nga rgyal gyis
[>mngon par nang/ sdig ba'i bshes gnyan gyi rjes su 'brang zhing/ dge ba las byed pa las 'khorab r 'khor te shin dubasgrol dka' ba rtag tu'akhor bar sdug bsngal gyis gdungs par
gyur pa ni ma yin no// de'i rakhor gyidakyil 'khor dazhin na/ bu gros chenapa can gyi sems can dmed grangs med pasAng stan las langs te bca ldan 'dasakyi zhabs la
zla spyi bos phyag Dalas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na bu dulegs su the'am srang de mchim blags nas/ bcom lcana'angs la 'di skadaces gsal ta// btsun pa bcam ldan 'das 'di
zla ltar 'jig rten gyisams can 'di dag ma'i lus shin tu thob pa radaka' bsnyed kyang dpa yongs su srongang/ yang dag pa'i smon lam yos su spong ngo// yang dag pa'i mos pa dang
mang dag pa'i lta ba yongs su srong ngo// dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su spong ngo// dus bzang po dang/ gnas 'brangapa dang/ tshul khrims dag pa yongs su spang ngo// yang dag ba'i nga
pa'adzinadang/ yang dag pa'i shes rab yongs su spong ngo// sems can 'di dag shin tu thob par daka' ba'i mi lus thobachod kyi glen pami shes pa dang/ dargyal gyi dbang gis ji
ba ltar gong du bshad pa'i sdig lcing rnams kun bgyid de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dam pa'i chos la 'bya zhing skur pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kying stanang la rab tu byung ba'i gnas la rab
dang gnodang bgyidado// bdag cag deng bcom ldan 'das kyispyan sngar sems rtsa gcig las yang dag pa'i yi dam nga ca' 'o// bdag cag dengasman dA'akhongor 'khor ba 'di bzhad
nas/ rnam rnam par grol bamathob kying du de lta bu'i sdig pa'igrogs po dang mimajal nga dang/de lta bu'i sdig pa'i las mi bgyid pa dang sangs rgyas kyi dam pa'i chos lami sku pa dang/
rab tu byung pa'i gang zag la gnodapa mibagyid pa dang sems can gyi chos kyi mig mi 'byinang dang/ dkonamchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'dud par dam bcas pa dang/ bcom ldan 'adus
nga dang/ tsag la thugs rtsa ba'i slad du dam bcas pa de dag rjes su gzung dugasal/ de'i 'khar gyi dkyil bor de'i nang nasasems can blo dang ldan pa tshad med pa bye ba khrag khrig
brgya stongasAdastan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsa' te// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag
cag deng bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga rab sam pa nges par dam 'cha'o bar 'tshol to/ 'khor ba 'khor ba 'di ban danas/ namacos kyi bzod ban thob kyis 'durgyal po'am gyur cig/ blon po 'gyur
cagi yul gyi ston par ma gyur cage/ grongardal dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong 'dabakyi bdag poagyurag/ danag la dbang ba'i nga dag de la mgyur cig/ tshod dpon dunu gyur
[>cig mchod pa dang gtsug lag khang la dbang byed pa'i bdag por mgyucig tshong dpon dang/ khyim bdag dang/ dgasbyong gi bdag po mgyur cig/ slob dpon dngabag ma gyur cig/ khyim pa'ilugasumagyur

tsha cig zhal che gcod pa'i dpang po ram gyuracig/ phyug pa dang btsan pa'i bag kho nagyur cig/ bdag cag rjes kyi bzodapa mthob par de lta bu'i gnas su skyes na/ de nyid sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'am dge

tshwa ba'i rgyur 'gyu zhes byab// ban ma tho ba'i sdig pa chen po byed pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i dam pa'i chos la 'phya zhing skur bzhes bgyi'o// sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba la 'a zhing
gnod pa bgyid pa'o// sams can mang po'i sa kyimig 'byin pa'o// dkonamchog gsum gyi gdung gcod pa'o// sems can tshad med pa la gnod pa dang 'tshob bgyid pa'o// de'i dbang gis gdonami
'tshol par mtshams mdang 'isams canadamyal bar lhung sta/ nganasong ngu'akhor ba lasathar pa'i dusam maango// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du smon lam 'di dag byin gyis
brlab par gsol/ de'i tshe'akhoDa gyi dkyil 'khor der ras pa'i lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri bra dang/ mi dang/ mim yin la sogs pa thams cad stazhalasalangs te/gcog
pa[/ ] ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyagarAl nas 1 naa blags te nyal no grwa ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la de skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag thog ma na
mas pa nas 'khor bar re zhing glan pa dang mishes pa dang/ ngargyal gyi dbangagos mi dag pa'i las thams cad rgyud do// lus kyi las dge ba dang/ ngagagi las mi dge ba dang/ yid kyi las

ni dge ba bdag gis bgyis pa dang/ gzhan bgyid du stsal ba dang/ mthong ba dang/ thos pa la rjes su yi rang ba'i sdig pa dedag thams cad dang bcom ldan 'dus kyi spyanusngashin tu 'dzem padang/ mi ba pa'i
sams kyis so sor bshags pas/ sla da mi bgyid par yongs su bsrung ba dang/ mams pa'i dus kyi sgrib pa riragyu rab 'i sdig pa byang bar gyu cig ! de bzhin du lan gcig/ lan gnyis/
lan gsum gyi bar du brjod de// dengagun chad 'badrab 'i mthas gtugs kyi bar du rtag du sdig pa'i grags pa dmi phrad pa dang/ ga ngag ba'i dbang du ma gyur cig/ gal taphradanayang de'i rjes gzhi
'jug pabasamapa nges pasadam bca'abara'atsalal// sdig pa'i las de dag thams cad bgyid par ma gyur cig/ bdag cag yun ring bor sdug bsngal myong bam gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das

bdag cag la thugasabatsuba'islad du smon lam 'di dag rjes su gzung dugasal/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'dus pa'i 'khor de dag thams cad 'baka' stsal pa// sa/ slan chadama'athamathas gtugs kyi rang rgyug rtsar bgyid par ma gyur cig/ bag chags 'dug pa'i 'khor ngangag tham
[/ ]@#// legs so legs so/// khyed ma'os pa'i sdug bsngal gyis 'jigs pa dang/ 'dzem byas so sobashags pa legasas// khyad 'khor ba'i chu bo chen po las bsgral ba
[S/ ]dang 'jigs pa mad pa'i mya ngana' sa 'da' ba'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i phyir de lta bu'i smon lam btab pa legrags// rigs kyi bu chos rnag pa 'dabacudang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sogs/
dpa' chen po rnams yang dag pa'i lam skyon med pa'i chos kyi ngo bod pa 'thob par 'gyura'o// bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/ gas kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rgyun po rnams gang nang gi
zla lus lami gnas/ phyiral gyi lus 'tshaganas/ phyinangagi lus la mi gnas 'das pa'i lus la ma gnas/ ma 'ongs pa'i lus la mganas/ da ltar gyi lus la mi gnas pa ste/ chos dang
po 'di na/ byang chub sams dang 'asams dpa' chen po rnams yang dag pa'i lam stond pa'i ches kyi babyed pa 'thob bo// rigs kyi bugazhan yang byang rlung sems dbang san sudabar

chen po rnams ganganang gi tshor ba miganas/phyi rol gyi tshor ba la mi gnas phyi nang gi tsho ba la mi gnas/'dus pa'i tshor ba la mi gnas/ ma 'ongs pa'ar ba la mi gnas pa ltar gyatsho la mi gnas ba ste/
chos gnyis pa 'dis na/ byang chub sems dpa'asemasadang ra chen po rnams yang dag pa'i lam skyon med pa'i blos kyi bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' !
sems dpa chen po rnams gang nang gi 'du shes la mi gnas/ phyi rol gyi 'du shesalami gnag/ phyi nang gnyis ka'i 'dushes lami gnas/ 'das pa'i 'du shes lami gnas ]ma 'os//
pa'i 'du shes lami gnas/ da ltar gyi 'du shes la mi gnas pa ste/ sa gsum pa 'dis na/ byang chub sems dpa'asams dang la rgyun bo rnams yang dag pa'a'am skyon med pa'i rjes kyi bgrod
pa thob bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang shasas dba'asams dpa' chen po rnams ganganang gi 'du byed lam gnas/ phyi rob gyi 'du byed la mi gnas phyi nang gnyis ka'i bdu
byadalami gnas/ 'das pa'i 'du byed la mi gnas/ ma 'ongs pa'i 'du byed lam gnas/ de ltar gyi 'du byed lamig/snus pa ste/ cas bzhi pa 'jis na 3 byang chub sems
dpa' sams dpa' chen po rnams yang dag pa'i lag skyon med ba'its+tshes kyi bzod pa thob bo// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po rnams gang nang gi rnam
par shes pa 'ami gnas/ phyi rol gyi rnam par shes pa 'ami gnas/ phyinang gnyis ka'i rnam paTashes pa lam gnas/ 'das pa'i rnam par shes pa lami gnas/ ma 'ongs pa'i rnam
par shes pa la mi gnas/ da ltar gyi rnam par shes pa lami gnas pa ste/ tshogalnga pa 'dis na/ byang chub sams dpa' sums dpa' chen pa rnams yang dag nga 'i lam skyon mtshad pa'ichos kyi
babyed pa thob nga ra'agyur ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' bo rnams gang 'jig rtan 'di lami gnas pa ste/ chos drug pa 'dis na/
[>byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yang dag pa'i lam skyo med pa'i chos kyi bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu ba gzhan yang byang chub mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams gang 'jig
rten pha rola' mi gnas pa ste/ chos bdun pa 'dis na/ byang chub sems dpa'asams dpa' denapo rnams yang dag pa'i lam skyon med pa'i chos kyi bathong bathob bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang
sgyu nubasems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams gang 'dod pa'i khams la mi gnas pa ste/ chos brgyud ba'adas// byang chub samasadapa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yang dag pa'i lam skyonagang ra'i sa/
kyibasod pa 'thob par 'gyura'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byangurngub sems dpa' sams dwanga' chenapo gang gzugs yod nga 'i khams la mi gnas pa ste// tshes dgu pa 'disan 1 byang chub sems dang dra
sems dpa' chen po rnams yang dag pa'i lam skyonamed pa'ichos kyibazed ba thob ra rug raro// rigs kyi bu gzhan mang byang chub sangs dpa' sems dang 'a chenapo gang gzugs med pa'i bams lami
gnas pa ste/ chos bcupa 'diso nabyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenapo rnams yang dag pa'i lam skyon med pa'itshesakyi bzod pa thob par 'gyura'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam

grangs 'dibashad pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de'i nang na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba brgya stong bdun cu rtsags snyapa miskya ba'i skyes kyi brad pa theb ba// byang chub sems dba'akhrag

khrig phrag brgyad nu rtsa bzhi snyed kyis chos kyi rjes su babad ba thob bo// nyan thos tshad mdapa brgya stongasnyad kyis nyanamongs pa thams cad yongs su bcad pa nas/ dgra bcom pa'i bar du thob par
gyur to// sems can khrag khrig brgya stongasnyadasngonam skyod pa'i ban med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tusems bskyed de/ dben gshogs pa'iyi shes la phyirami ldog pa'is la
gnus bar gyur to// sems can grangs medats+tshadamed pa snyedasngonarang sangs rgyas kyi sems ma bskyadapa de soms bskyed par gyurato// gzhan yang sems can grangs med tshad mang pasnyad sngon
na thos kyi sems ma bslad pa de bskyang par gyur to// yang de'i bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang bo 'baka' stsal pa/ sems can gang 'os kyi bzad pa thob pas na/ rgyal gas rgyal
thabs spyi bonasadabang bskuranga'i gnas su gnas par byas te/ nor rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs 'du longs spyod cing/ bdaganyid che nango khri gnas su lo drasad padrangs gnang gi/ sems
gzhan zhim yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rdo rjesnying pos yang ) bcom ldan 'das la 'di skadaces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dus/sems canagang chos kyi bgrod pa ma thob par rgyalathabab/
spyi ba nas dbang bskur ba'i gnas su gnas taM/ nor rin po chanam pa sna tshogs la spyadapa dang/ bdag nyid che ba'i gnas su gnas par ma gnang ngam/ 'on tanangu ba'i skabs/
kyang mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can gangachas kyi bgrod pa mthob kyang/ dge ba banu las kyi lam la spadal/ sags can gzhan yang slob tubanugan/ de yang dus
rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskurlaba'iganas sunarinapo rnam pa sna tshogs dang ) gzhanayang bdag nyid cheba'i gnas su 'dug cing longs spyod du gnangango/ sems can gangachos kyi babrad
da yangs thob la// dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang mi spyad de/ sems can gzhan yang slob ba lam 'dzudal/ dbang sngon po dang nan tan gyis rgyal thabs spyi bzhis dbang bskur ba'i
gnas su rgyal po byed de/ nor rin po che rnam pa tshogs dang bdag nyid chen po'i gnas su lengs spyod pa dag ni/ rgyal rigs gdol pa can dang ) gzhan yang bdag nyid bye ba'i
gnas su 'phongs spyod pa'igadol pa can gyi bdag pazhes bya sta/ glen pa/ gdimug can/ nga rgyal gyis mngon par byon pa pa'idam pa'i chos shin tu brab mo 'jigs pa byed pa//
dkonamaNog gsum gyi gdang gcod cing/ dam ba'is kyi sgron mamad par byedapa/ nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba dag la gnod pa dang 'tsho ba rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa/ 'jug pa dang//
pa gzhu ba dang/ da pas gcod pa dang/ chos gos dang/ lhung bzed dang/ 'tsho ba'i yo byad 'grog pa dang/ chos gos 'phrogs te khyim par phab nas/ las rnam pa sna tshogs khyad du
bcug pa dang/ bcings pa dang/ brtson du bzung pa nas/ 'tsho ba'i dbang padang phral ba dang/ nga'i bstan pa dam pa'i rjes la 'phya zhingakar dra dang/ bar dugacod cing bugags byed cing/
yangs su rgyas par mi byed pa dang mdan dang/ dge 'dun gyi nira'aphrag par byed pa'igang brag duni gdon mi bra bar mtshamasamadapo'i sems can dmyal bar lhung sta/ sdug bsngal
chen pa myong zhing ngan songagi gnas su raber zhing thar pa'i dus med do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'dasaMsams chen gang leg
kyibabab yangs thub/ dge ba bcuri'asakyi 'am yang mesrod/ sems can gzhan yang spyod nga 'a moskul bar dbang chen po dang nan gyis rgyal thabs spebo nas dbang bskurab 'i gnas su rgyalapo
bgyid cing/ nang gin po che rnamab sna tshogs dang/ gzhan yang bdag nyid che ba'iganas su gnas pa la rgyugazhan dang/ thabs gzhan gyis ma(masamadapa'i sems can dmyal ba las gdan de/
nganasong gzhan gyi sdug bsngal las kyang tharapar bgyi bamachis sam/ bcom ldan radas kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyud gzhan dang thabs gzhan gyis gdon ngu rung ba yod de/ sems can gang rgyal
thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal por zhugs la/ legasodarnam pa sna tshogs la srod/ 3 chos kyi bgrod pa yang ma thob/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi mdang yang mi ldan yang/

dad pa'i mthu dang ldan te/ dkonamog gsum la ma gro dang bsti stangabyedacing/ sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa'i theg pa gsum dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos la rlung ngun tshigs su bcad pagacig pa yang ra phya zhing
'a[E ]skyar pa'am bar dgacod pa ma/ bgegs mi byed la/ sangs rgyas kyibastan pa la rab tu byung ba'i gnas tshul khrims cananam/ tshul khrims nyamasapa 'am/ tshul khrims med kyang rung/ sku dang ba spu
bregs nas/ gas dur smig gyon pa thams cad la'ang ba dang/ gnod pa dang/ gzhu ba dang/ 'tshog pa dang/ rmad pas gcodapa dang 3 tshogagos dang/ lhung babre dang/ 'tsho ba'i yo byad 'phrog pa dang/
sagos phrogs te khyim par phab nas/ las byed dubacug pa dang/ btson rar bcug nas 'tsho ba'i dbang po dang phral ba'i bar dumi byed la mchod rten dang dge 'dun gyi nem mi 'phrog pa dang/ ngan pasdig

pa can dag rab tu byung ba la rAtse ba dang gnod pa byed dumi 'dzad pa dang/ dkonamchog gsum gyi noral 'phrog cing spyod dum 'dzud pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa theg pa gsum dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i sa

la bsti stang dang bcas pasamanyecingagathungs su 'dzin pa dang/ mnyan togazungasasubazung nas kyang/ ji ltar bshad pa bzhin du chos kyi rjes su btson 'grus dang nan tan byed pa dang/ngas bstan pa theg pa//

ba gsumagyi 'thags pa'i gnas dag lamachod pa dang/ bstanabakuradang/ bsti stang du bcas ngas g.yog byed pa dang/ theg pa chen po la shin tubartan pa'i yi dam bcas te/ the tshom dang 3 phyir ldog pa'i sems
mabaskyad pa dang/ gzhan yang sams can jag theg ba chen bo la dad cing yid ches pa dang/ gzungs su 'dzin pa dang/ slob pa nan tan byed du'ajagun/ rgyal rigs gdol pa cana'adid/ gzhan yang
bdag nyid chab 'i gdol pa can dag ni/ snga ma 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang rgyal thabs kyi dbang bskur zhing longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs laspyod gnang do// gzhan yang grong dang/ grong khyer
dang nor dbyig thams cad la spyod kyang matshams med pa'i sams can dmyal bar mi ltung ba nas/ nganasong gzhan gyi bar du yang ltung bar mi 'gyu'o// denings rgyal thabs kyi dbang bskurazhing
les spyod rnam pas zogs spyod du gnang// de ltar grong dang grong khyer la spyod kyang matshams mdapa'asams can dmyal ba mi lhung bas/ ngan song gzhanaduyang mi ltung ngo// sam na cana'ang sdig pa'i/
las kyi sgrib pa thams cad lhag ma ma lus par byang b.ra'adodan/ sa bstan pa'i dam pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la nan tan dubaslabacing gzungs su gzung bar bya'o/ de gang gis de ltar dge 'dun gyi
mngon sum du gyur pa la shin tu 'dzem pa dang ngo tshaba'i sems kyis sdig pa'i las so sor bshagasan/ sngon gyi dus na byas pa'i sdig pa'i las thams cad lhag ma ma lus pa dang/ yongs su byang bar/
@#// 'gyur ro// 'dug sachen po ya/'phags pa byang rlubasems dpa' sa'asnying po'i 'khor lebanu pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i bam po brgyudab//
de'i byang chub sems dpa'asams dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos yang/ bcom ldan ' das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsunapa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dbangan
po ji ltaran nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'phrul daamachis pa lags/ jilta na nyan thos kyi thegabarigang thogal 'khrul pamamachis pa lags/ ji ltar na rangs ngas rgyas kyi theg pa la sprul pa ma mchis
sgyu ba lags/ ji ltaranarangasangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa mams pa lags/ driltar na theg pa chen po la 'khrulang mams pa lags/ jiltar thagapa apo rigang brag la
'khrul pa ma mchis pa lags/ ji ltar na dkonam ga gsum gyi gdung rtagapar yongs su 'phal bar bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab du byung ba chos kyi skor/
dam/ chos kyisod ma lags pa yang rlang rludang naNosagos kyi tshul bu 'tshal zhing/ skra dang kha spu bregs pa thams cad la rukhrul pa yas pa lags/ ji ltar na theg bdun pa sa la gong
sa gong du 'phar zhing phyir mi ldog por 'gyur lags/ jit+tan rnaba'i shes rab dang/ bsod namasakyi khyad par rtag tu skyazhong 'phel bar 'gyur ba las/ jiltaran ting nga 'dzin dang/
gabus dang/ bzod pa dang/ sa rnams la dbang du 'gyurazhing/ phyiildeg b.ra'agyur ba lags// ji ltar na rtag tshu dgu ba'i bshes gzhan dang mjal cing rjes su 'jun bar 'gyur ba lags/
jiltan rtag dusangs rgyas thams cad mathongab dang mi 'bral zhing/ byang gsems dpa' dang nyan thosakyitoganas dang mi 'bral ba dang/ sa thos pa dang 'bral ba dang/ dge 'dun lam chodapa dang
bsnyen bkur gyid pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyurab lags/ ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la bu du brtson pas semasamangoms palags/ jilta na byang chub kyi spyod brnam pa sna tshogs lasemasami nag
ba'ags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dang sams dpa' chen po rdo rjesengapo 'a'adiskad ces bka'asal to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dang 'asams dbakachen po'i
'khor le rnam pa bcu yod de/ byang bsams dpa'asams dpa' chen po ganga'akhor lo bcu po 'di dang ldan n/ 3nathos kyi theg pa la rakhrul pa med par 'gyuye// nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul
pa med par 'gyurar// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'khrul pamed par 'gyurar// rasangs rgyas kyi thag pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa mdapar 'gyur// theg pa chen po la 'khrul pamed par 'gyur ro//
theg pa chen po'i gang zag la 'khrul pa dpar 'gyuraro// dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rtag par yongs su 'phal bka'agyuraro// dbazhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba chos kyi snod dam/
[d/ ©]// chos kyi snod yin pa yang rung/ chung ngun chos gos kyi tshal du gyon cing/sgyu dang kha spu bre gas pa thams ca da la ra khrul ba med pa thob par 'gyu'o// theg pa chen po'i sa la gong

[>sa gong du 'phur zhing byin ldog pa dang/ rnaba'i shes rab dang/ bsod nams kyi khyad par rtag du skye zhing 'phel ba dang/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang/ gzungs dad/ bzod pa dang/ sa rnams la dbang du

mtsho'agyur zhing/ phyi mi ldog pa dang/ rtagadudage ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'phrad cing/ de'i rjes su 'gro ba dang/ rtag tusangs rgyas thams cad ma glong dngami 'bral zhing/ byang chub sems dpa' dang rang
sangs rgyas kyi gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang/ sa thos pa dang ma 'bral ba dang/ dge 'dun lamachod pa dang bsnyen bkur byed pa dadami 'bral ba dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la brtson pas
sams mi ngoms pa dang/ byang+kachub kyi spyod pa dang/ smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis masami ngoms pa dang/ rtson sdig pa mi dge ba'ilas ci byas pa thams cad 'phags pa'i sa kyi ye shes rdo rjeltar
sra la nobs lhagam ma lus par bcom ste// rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu mi myong ba dang/ gsar du sgrig pa mi dge ba'i las thams cad mi byed pa dang/ skyo ba dang/ sgyid lug pachad pa'i sams kyis
blazhamed pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskob dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag rin po chosna bdunanan tan byed kha la skyo zhinged lug pamed pa'i sems dang/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad rnams //

'jilabalta skye zhing sgyid lug pa med pa'isams kyisasems can thams cad kyi rten dang gnas su 'gyur zhing bar 'tshog yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ 'khoralo sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po tshe sna bdun dang ldan/
pa'i gar 'gro yang rin po che'i 'khor lo thog mar 'gro ste/ rin poche gzhan de'i phyi bzhin du 'brangang// gling bzhi kun tu rgyu zhing/ sems nams cad kyi lus dang sams kyi rnyog ba thams cad kyang
bsal te/ sags canathams cad kyi lus dang sems kyabade ba yang skye ni 'bal bar byed de// byang gsems dpa' semasaM dpa' chenapo yang de bzhin du 'khe le banu'adi dang wan/ nyan thos kyi theg
pa la 'khrul pa med pa nas/ sems can thams cad kyi rkyen dang gnas su 'gyur zhing 'bara'atsheba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ shing rta chen po 'khor le bzhidang ldan te/
mimang po'i nang du 'dug nas lamachan por 'gro'o// lamadan bong ba 'am/ gye mo ram/ gseg ma 'am/ rtswa 'am/ shinge'am/ lem 'am/ yal ga'am/ ma rtogagam/ 'brasabudzesud yod pa thams
cad shing rta de'i 'khor lerig pusang na/ thams cad chag cing grugs te/ noradun ngabar byadad// de bzhin du byungachub sems dang 'as/sa dpa'atshan po yang 'khor lo rnam pa bcu dang ldan n/

stonamongs pa'isgrub ba dang/ sams kyi sgrub ba dang/ sa kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su bcom ste/ rnam par smin pa mi len par byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ 'khoral nonapo nithangacig 'phangs pas
phas rgol ba'idagra'imago dang yan lag bcad de/ de spyod pa'i thumed par byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpar chanapo yung 'khor la rnam pa bcu po 'di
[>>dang ldan/ rgyud lngar 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal chen po thams cad 'dzoms pa dang/ nyon mongs pa dang/sdig pa'i las thams cad yongs su bcad de rnam par smin pa len par mi byed do// rigs kyi
bu 'di lta ste/ me'i bskal pa byung ba'i tshe/ nyim lngacigachadzashar nas/glingabazhi'i klongadang/ mtshodang chubo dang/ chu'i khams su gtogs pa gsher ba thams tsadabangayang mi skyems bamad do/
dbazhin du byang chub sems dpa'/mas dpa ra na po yang 'khor lo rnam pa bcu bo 'di dang ldan n/ rgyud bzhi dang/ nyon mongs pa 'isgrib pa dang/ gnas kyi sgrib pa dang/ chos kyi sgrib ba dang/
sdug bsngal gyi rtsa bar smin pa thams cad yongs su skoms par byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ rlungago bskal pa byung ba'i tshe/ phyogs bzhinus rlung chenapo dus gcig tu langs pas 'jig rten
gyi khams thams cad nari bo chungadang/ sa chenapo rnams thams cad 'jig cinga'atherab ra'agyuraro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang 'khor 'arnam pa bcu
dang ldan na/ 'jig rten gyi phyinaci log bzhi dang/ nga rgyal gyi thems cad mingashigs pa gang ya med pa dang/ semasacan thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang/ sams kyi sgrib pa dang/ chesakyi
sgrib ba dang/ sdug bsngal gyi rnam par sminapa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang 'jig cing 'thor bar 'gyur// rigs kyi bu'adilta ste/ seng ge'irgyal po ral pa can gyi skad thad gcig phyung bas gcan gzan
thams cad 'phung ba dang/ 'gro ba thams cad skrag cing 'gul mi nus par 'gyur// de bzhin du byang rlub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang 'khor lo rnam ba'abacu dang ldan pa'i chos kyi
sdu thang cig bsgrags pas mu snyags canadang log par ston pa'i sdig pa'i grogs su gyur ba cad 'jigs skragan sasA ba'i tshig 'khrul zhing 'grib pa dang/ rgalami nus par 'gyur ro//
rigs kyi bu 'dilta ste brgya byin lha'i dbang po lha ma yinadang 'thab pa'i/ lca'i dmagal gang gis bskor cing 'gan rdo rje thogs te g.yul du zhugs na/ lha ma yin thams cad skrag pas rdzog
par 'gyura'o// de bzhin byang chub sems dba'asems dpa' chen po yang 'akhor la rnam pa 'di btsudang ldan n/log par lta ba'i mu stags can thams cad dang/ log par ston pasdig pa'i grogs
ba thams cad skyabs 'bros par 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ 'di bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che rgya lam gyi rtse mo lab dgasan/ rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs char bzhin du 'bab ste/ dbul
'bongs pa'i sems can thams cad la phyin pa byed do// de bzhin du byang bsamasadab sems dpon nabo yang ma bor la rnam pa 'di bsu dad ldan te/ rnamakha'adag raritshul khrims kyi rgyal mtshan la
[7 ]@#// gnas2 tshes chen po'i char rab tu 'bebs pas sems can tshad med pa thams cad la sbyin pa byed par 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ mtshan mo'i dus su 'a drig na ku mun
par gyur nas 'thom zhing 'brog bslad pa na/ bla nga nya ba sharabs mun pa thams cad bsal te/ 'brog smad pa rnams kyi lam mtshonang ra 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ byang chub sems duba'agems dang 'tshon
po yang 'khor lo rnam pa 'di bcu dang ldan na/ sems canag ma rig pa'i mun pasamados te/ 'bags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad stor ba rnams la dbyang+gachub sems dngas dam pa'i chos bshad de/ ma rig
yaM1 pa'i mun pa thams cad bsal nas/ chos kyi sangang skyes pa'i phyir/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyadamangon du gyur te/ brag pa thams cad rtsad nas sdug bsngal gyim ra zad pa ra 'dang/rigs kyi bu
rgyu 'di ltaste 32ma'i dkyil 'khor chenapo 'jig rtan dushar ba dang/ le tog thams cad skye zhing 'phel te/ me tog dang/ le tog dang/ mthams cad rgyas pa dang gnam zhing btsog pa thags nad sel ba
dang 3 le tog gi 'bru dang/ sman gyi 'bras bu thams cad smin pa dang gangs kyi ro bo zhu bas 'bab mukun brag sta/ rim gyis rgya mtsho chen por 'bab par 'gyur ro// dbazhin du byang chub sems
dang 'asams dpa' chen po yang 'khor lo rnam pa 'dibacu dang ldan te/ lhag pa'i phyin pa la gnas shing phyolapa'i tshul khrims dang bde ba'i bzod pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan dang/
shes rab dang/ thabs dang/ byams pa dang/ sIng dzadang/ spobs pa'i yon tanashin tu rgyas shing/ sems can thams cad la dam pa'i sa ston te// zlos de'i 'od kyi gabri brjid kyisems can thugs

cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba lhagapa rile ga rnam pa sna tshogs skye zhing 'di la bo dang/ lhag pa risdod ba dam ba'i ma tog dang/ lam rnam pa sna tshogs shin tu rgyas pa dang/ nyon mongs pa'i las ngan pa thams cad

yongs su sel ba dang/ mtho ris dang ngan las 'darab 'ibras bu yongs su smin par 'gyur ba dang/ log par lta ba dang dargyal gyi ri bo thams cad zhu zhing 'bab pas yang dag pa'i dad pa dang tshul khrims dang
thas pa dang) gtong ba dang/ shes rab dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi churim gyis 'bab cing/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i rgyamatsho'agangs pa dang/ sems can thams cad yid bzhin du 'jigs pa med pasu nal 'da'
ba'igrong khyeradu 'jug par 'gyuraro// gsakyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa'achenapo'i 'khorale bcugang zhen/ rigasakyi bu 'khro'abacuzhes bya ba'i tshes gzhan mi gdagasakyi/
ga ba bcu'i las kyi lamanyid yinabashes rabya'o// 'khor lo rnam pa bcu bo 'di dag dang ldan pas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa ban bo zhes bya sdige ba thams cad las rnam par grol ba
dang dge ba'i chos thams cad yid bzhin du rdzogs pa dang/ myur dumya ngan las 'da' ba rtenapo' mayongs su 'gangs pa dang/ thabs mkhas pa chen pa'i ye shes kyi 'od kyis skye bo thams cad yongs
[9 ]@#// su smin par byed cing/ thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba yongs su thob par byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu tha ma 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyams cad kyis
po kyang mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su spangs te/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di la yongs su bsngags pas 'bras bu thob par gyur to// de bas na gang gis dgab bcu'i las kyi ma 'di dag las
'ga' zhig nam 'tsho ba'i bar dum nyams par srangan/ 'bras bu khyad par can mthog du 'gyur ba thams cad thob paniji ltarab shar ba bzhin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dngas
chenapo gang nam 'tsho ba'i bar dusrog gcod pa yongasaMgu spangs na/ dazhir sems can thams cad las 'jigs pa sdig pa yin ta/sems nadag la'ajigasashing bag tsha b.ram byedapas/de'i 'jigs

pa'i sdug bsngal mi bskyod pa'i dbangagis/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad myur du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyura'o//thogo ma med pa'i mtha' nas rgyud lngar 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor bying ba/ srog gcod ba'i dbang
gis/ lus dang ) ngag dang/ yid kyi sdigapa ma dge ba'i sa bdag kyongabyed la/ gzhan yang byed du 'jug cing/ mthong ba dang thos pa 'i sa su yi rung ba 2/sa byungaba'inyin mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang/
nas kyi sgrib pa dang/ chos kyi sgrib pa dang/ tshe'i sgrib pas bsgribasal gyur to// 'di ltar srog gcod pa yongs su spungs pa'i 'khor 'das de dag lhagayom lus par yongs su bcom zhing
b.rIl bas rnam par smin pale'abras bu ma myong b.rubyed do// 'as 'di nyid la yang lha dang mi la sogs pa kun daga' zhing yid du 'ong ba dang/ dogs pa mi skye ba dang/ lus dngasag rab tu
bde zhing yun rangedu 'tsho bar 'gyu/ 'chi'aphaba'idus byed pa na yang lus dung sams 'a sdug bsngal gyis ma gdung zhing yid du 'ong ba'i bu dang [:]nga skudad/ 'khor thams cad kyis yegagu
bskarabs 'chi'apho ba'i dus byed kyi/ shin tu 'jigs pa'i gshin rjeraM ye ka mthong bar ni 'gyuraro// gzhan yang yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dulab/ tshul khrims dang yon/

tun dut+tan ba/ bsod nams kyizhing yang dag pa dang 'phrad de/ lus dang sems rab tu dga' ba dang nga la bkur ste dngar chas par shin tu dad pa skye bar 'gyur ro// yang tsha'angos nas kyang phyi ma'i nang dgyes
te dbang pa yongs su rdzogs shingayan lag dang ldan pa dang/ gang nas gang du skyes par dmadapa dang/ du ba dang/ byadu gzugs bsrang ba dang/ yid gzhungs pa dang/ rab tubade zhing skyid pa dang/
gzhan yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyenazlas kyis ngul ba/ tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de/ de'i rjes su slob pa dang: srog gcodapa yongs
su spong ba dang/ sdig pa dag brje sags ca da los su gcod pa dang/ dge ba'i chos khyad par can thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ theg pa chen pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad tshol ba dang
byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang/ spad pa thams cad la rim gyis gzhol zhing/ shin tuyangs pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtshol 'jug pa nas bla na med pa'i byang bu thob pa'i

[>bar du 'gyur ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhingamatshon cha mad pa dang/ dgra dang 'tsho ba'i mo)mi grag pa dang/ 'jigs ba thams cad dang bral te/ rab tu bde zhing skyid pa dang/ nadamad pa dang/ tshering ba'i zhing du sams
can dogaskya bar 'gyulo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshor tshad kyang dag tumad de/ sams cad dwag cis 'dul ba bzhin du dam pa'i chos ston to// yongs su chu ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i
[@]chos yun ring du gnas shing/ sems can dmed pa la phan pa dang bde ba'i zhi byed par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sums dpa' chen po srog gcod pa yongs su spangs
pa'i'aloralo ste dang po'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khorale dedang ldan n/ nyan thos kyi thog pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag
la 'khrul pamed par ra gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyis theg pa lar brul pa med par 'gyur/ rang sangs rgyas kyitheg pa'i brag la 'khrul ba mdapar 'gyuraro// theg pa chen po la 'khrulapa
mdaba'i 'gyur/theg pa chen po'i gang brag la 'khrul pamed par 'gyur// dkonamchog gsum gyi gdung yongs su 'phel ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i 'ganas

rjes kye ste da rams kyi snod ma yin pa yang rung/ chung ngunas shes kyits+tsha' du gyon cing/ skra dang kha spu bregs pa 'khrul pa med pa 'gyur ro// theg pa chen po'i chos la gong nas gong du 'phagrazhing/
phyir mi ldeg pa dang/ rnaba'ishes rab dang/ bsod nams kyi khyad par rtag sa zhing phal ba dang/ ting nga 'dzin dang/ gzungs dang/ bgrod pa dang sa rnams thams cad la dbang du 'gyur zhing phyir
mi ldog pa dang/ rtag tu dag pa'i bshes gnyen dang 'phrad cing rjes su 'gro ba dang/ rtag ngus ngas rgyus thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral9zhing/ byang chub sems dpo 'dang/ nyan thos kyi nye gnas
mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang/ chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang/ dge 'dun la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byed ba dang mi 'bral ba dang/ dag ba'itso ba thams cad tshol ba la brtson pas sen
mi ngams pa dang/ bya chub kyi spyongapa dang/ smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sems mi ngoms par 'gyur te/ 'bras bu gzhan thob pa yang ji ltar rgyas par bshad pa bzhin no// rigs kyi
bu gzhan yang byung chub sems dpa' sams dang 'a chen po gang nam 'tshong 'i bar du ma phyin par len pa longs su spangasan/ danyid sams can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin bainate/
longs su gdung ba dang pa dang/ 'bamadapa dang/ bdaganyidatshul bzhin nga rnyed pa'i noragyis chog shes bar gnas kyi/ chosam yin pa rinor dang khe la re bgad pa de'i dmangagaso dge ba'i rtsa ba
@#/ thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// thog ma med pa'i mtha' nas rgyang ltar 'khor zhing 'khor ba'i rgyamatshor bying bar 'gyur ba yang ma byin par len pa'i dbang gis
[>>lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid mi dge ba'i las rnams bdag kyang byed la/ gzhan yang byed du 'dzud cing/ mthong ba dang thos pa'i rjes su yi rang ba las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang/ sams
'tsha kyi sgrib pa dang/ sakyi sgrib pa dang/ rin po che dang neral sgribangs bsgribs par gyur to// 'di ltar min nga ra len pa so sa su spangs pa'i 'khor les lhagamam lus par yongs su bcom/
n+ti pas rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu myang ste/ lus 'di nyid la lang ltadangami la sogs pa kun daga' zhing/ yid du 'ong thas dogs pa mi skyo ba dang/ lus dang sems rang bde ba dang/ der rin
po che thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ro// nam 'chi'apho ba'i dus byed pa na yang lus dang sems la sdug bsngal gyisami gdung zhing yid du 'ong ba'i bu dang chung ma dang) 'khor thams cad kyi
yongs su bskor bas 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed kyi/ shin tu'ajigs pa'i gshinaNe'ipho 'amathong bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yid du 'ong ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba/ tshul khrims dang
yon tan du ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de/ lus dang sems drub dudagur ba dang/ de' bkur sti dang bcas pas dad pa skyabara'agyuraro// tshe 'phos nas kyang phyir mi'i nang du
skyes te/ dbang po yongs su rdzogs shing yan lag dang ldan pa dang/ gang nas gang dusus par longs spyod napo dung ldan zhinge byad gzugs babrang nga dang/ yid gzhungs pa dang/ rab tu
bde zhing skyidab dang/ 'jigs pa lnga dang ]ni thun mong du mi 'gyur ro// phyir yang yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyin chos kyis dul/ tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa// bsod
nams kyizhing yang dag pa dang phrad de/ de'i rjes su slob cingam byon nga ro lenab yongs su spong ba dang/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i blos thams cad yongs su gcod pa dang/ dge ba'i sa khyod par can thams
cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ theg pa chenapo'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad tshol ba dang/ byang chub sems dang 'asnyan lam dang/ spyod po thams cad u0f8brim gyis gzhal ba dang/ shin tu yas

pa'i yang shes kyi rgyamatsho la 'jugapanas/ bla ma dpa'i byang chub kyi bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro// yangs ngas rgyas kyi zhing po rirnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dang/ na po che'i shing dang/ zhe po/
cha'i rdzing dang/ rin po che'i gzhalanar khang la sogs pas yongs su gangab dang/ bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa dang bral ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis bkod pa dang ldan pa lizhing de sems can dag skyabar
'gyu ra'o// dbazhinag shegs pa'itshe'i tshad kyang dapag tu medad sems can dag cing 'dul ba bzhin dudamapa'i sa ston to// yongs sumu nalas 'das nas kyang/ dam pa'i chos yunaring du gnas
shing/ sems canadamadapalaphan pa dang bde ba'i don byedapar 'gyuyo/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenango sam byin par len pa yos su spangs pa'i
[>>'khor leganyis pa'o// byang shubasems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khoral 'di dang ldan na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrulapa mad par 'gyur/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gangabrag la

'chi 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyithogapa la 'khrul pa mad par 'agyur/ rangasaargyas kyi theg pa'i gang brag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyura'o/ theg pa chen pol 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/ theg

[@]pa chen po'i gang thog la 'khrul pamedabar 'gyur ro// dkonamchog gsum gyi gdung yongs su 'bal ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'inyegs chos kyisod dem/ rmas kyi snyidam yin pa

yang ngu/ chungangu na chos gos kyi tshal bu gyon cing/ skra dang kha spu bregs pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/ theg ba rgan po'i chos la gang nas gong du 'phar zhing phyirami ldog pa dang/ rno ba'ishes rab dang/ bsod

gnas kyi khyad par rtag du skye zhing 'phel ba dang/ ting 'dzin dang/ gzungs dang/ bzodapa dang/ sa rnams thams cad l dbang du 'gyur zhing/ phyir mi ldog pa dang/ rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'phrad/

cing de'i rjes su'agro ba dang/ rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bralazhing/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ nyan thos kyi nye gan/mthong ba dngami 'bral bdang/ chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang/

dge 'dun la mchod pa dngabasubakur byed pa dngam rabral ba dang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad lab 'bartson pas semasami ngoms pa dang/ byang chub kyi srid pa dang/ smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyisasemasami
ngoms pa 'gyur te ]'bras bu thob pa dag kyang ji ltar bshadapa bzhin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nam 'tshe ba'ibar du'adodapas leg par/
g.yam pa yongs su spangs na/ denyid sems can thams cad 'dodapa'i klung gis g.yengs pa las 'jigs pachad pa/ phrag dogamed pa/2tshabamed pa yongs su gdung ba med pa/ 'khrug pamadapa'i
sbyin pa yin te/ bdag gi chung mas chog sheg shang gzhan gyi ma la re ba med pas/ de'i dbang gis ngag ba'irtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyuraro// thog mamed pa rimatha'anas rgyud lta'akhor
bar 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'bying ba yang 'dod pas log par g.yem pa'i dbang gis lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid mi dge ba'i las bdag kyang byed la/ gzhan yang byed du 'jug cing/ mthong ba dang thos pa'i
rjes su yi rang ba las byungaba'inyon mongs pa'i sgrib ba dang/ sems kyi slob ba dang/ chos kyi zlob bu dang/ chuma'i sgrub pas bsgribs par gyur to// 'di ltar 'dod pas log par g.yem pa yos
su spangs pa'i 'khor los lhag ma ma lus par bcos pas/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu'i lin te/ lus 'dinyid la yang lha dang mi la sogs pa kun dga' zhingayid du 'ong bas rtogs pas skye ba
lus dang sems ba tu bde ba dang/ chungamawed pa dbacas bam yinupa'agyu'i// 'chi' po ba'i dus byed pa na yang lus dang sems la sdug bsngal gyisagi gdungs te/
[>>yid du 'ong ba'i bu dang/ chung mdud/ 'khor thams cad kyis yongs su bskor bsa'i pho ba'i dus byed par 'gyuragyi/ zhi tu 'jigs pa'i gshin rje'i pho nya'amathob 'gyura'o// gzhayang yid/
du long ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba/ tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi zhingayang dag pa dang phrad de lus dang sems rab tudag rab dang/ de la bkurasti dang bcas/
klubs shin tududab skya baba'agyur ro// tsho'athos nas kyang phyi mi'inangang skyes te/ dbang bo yongs su rdzogs shingayan lag dang ldan s dang/ gang dngagang du skyes pa 'khor phun sumamatshogs pa

rgyurang byadagabrugs babrang ba dang/ yid bazhungs pa dang/ rab tu bde zhing skyod ba dang/ phyir yang shin tu 'opa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyin chos kyis dul ba/ tshul khrims dang yon tun du khrumapa/ bsod
nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad do/ de'irjes su slob cing 'dod pas 'og par g.yem pa yongs suspong ba dang/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i sa thams cad yongs su spong ba dang/ dge ba'is khyadang ra
can thams cad yongs su tshogs pa dang/ thegab na bo'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad tshol ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang/ spyod pa thams cad la yi gyis gzhol zhing shin tu
yas nga'i ya shes kyi rgyamatshol 'jug pa nas/ bla namad pa'i byang chub 'thob pa'i b.radu 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing bud medamed pa dang/ 'dod gas dung/ ga yang bam dpa tshangs par spyod
pa mchog dang ldan pa'i sems can dag zhing de'askus te/ dngag thams cad rjes de skye'i mi gtsang ba'i mngal nas skyabazhim yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i tsha tshad kyang dpag dum de/sams
canag la cis 'dul ba bzhin du dam pa'is ston to// yongs su mya ngan las 'dasonus kyang dmapa'i sa yun ring duganas shing sems canatsad med pa la phan pa dang bde ba'idon byed par 'gyur
ro// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dong pas log par g.yem pa yongs su spangs pa 'khoralegasum ba'o// byang chub sems dpa'
lags dpa' chen po 'khor lo 'di dang ldan n/ kun thogakyi theg pa la ra khrul pa med pa 'gyur/ kun thus kyi theg pa'i gang zag 'arakhrul pa med par 'gyur// gangasangs rgyas kyi theg pa
la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/ rangs pas rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang brag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyuraro// theg pa chen po la 'phrul bamadapa'agyur/ theg pachan po rigang zug la 'khrul ba 'od
bar 'gyura'o// dkon mchog gsum gyi gdungayosasu 'phal ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i gnas chos kyi snad dam/ chos kyisod ma yin pa yarang/
@#/ ngangun chosagos kyi tshal bu gyon cing/ sku dang kha spu bregs pa la 'khrul pamad par 'gyur/ theg pa chen po'i chos lagong nas gong du 'phar zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang/
no ba'i shes rub dang 1 bsod nams kyi khyadabar rtag tu skye zhing 'phelabo dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ gzungs dang/ bzod pa dang sa rnams thams cad la dbang du 'gyu zhing/ phyir mi ldog pa dang/

rtag tudag ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad cing rjes su 'thun par 'gyur ba dang/ rtag tu sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi bral zhing byang chub semasadapa' dang nyan thos kyi rto gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba
dang/ chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang/ dge 'dun la mchod pa dang bstun bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral ba dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad chol ba la brtson pas sems mingems pa dang/ byang bkyi
stod pa dang/ smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyisasems mi ngoms pa dang 'bras bu gzhan ngag thob pa yang ji ltar bshad pa bzhin no// rigs kyi bu gzhanayang byang bsams dpa' sems dpa' chenapo gang nam

'tsho ba'i bar dubardzun du snab yongs su grangs na/ sems can thams cad kyis rtag tu bkur ba dang/ tshig gtsigs pa tshad mar 'gyur ba dang/ tshig kun rten cing gus pa dang dogs pa mi su bar 'grub de/ de'i
dbang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// thog mamadapa'i mtha' nas rgyung ltar 'khor bar 'khor ba'i rgya mar 'byingab yang/ rdzun du smra ba'i dbang gis lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid kyis

sdig pa mi dge ba'i las bdag kyang byed la/ gzhan yang nged du 'dzud cing/ mthong ba dang thos pa'i rjes su yi rang ba las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang/ sems kyi sgrib pa dang chos kyi sgrib pa dang//
tshig gtsugs pa la sgrib pas bsgribs par 'gyur// 'di ltar brdzun du snub yongs su spangs pa'iborales lhag mem lus par yongs su bcom pas rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bumalen par 'gyur ro//

lus 'di nyid la lha dang mi la sogs pa kun dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba dang// dogs pas skya ba dang/ lus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang tshig tu smra ba thams cad la gzhan yid ches shinganyan par 'gyu raro// 'chi
'pha ba'i dus byed pan yang lus dang sems la sdug bsngal gyis mi gdung zhing/ yid du 'ong ba'i budang nga ma dang/ 'khor thams cad kyis yongs su bskor bas 'khyi'apho ba'i dus byed kyi/ shin tu
'jigs pa'i gshin rje'ipha 2nimathong bar 'gyuraro// gzhan yang yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gon chos kyis dul ba/ rmul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa) bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang

phrad da/ lus dang sems rab tudagarab dang/ de la bkur sti dang bcas pas shin du dad pa skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe 'phos nas kyang phyirami'i lus su skye zhing dbang po yongs su rdzogs pa yan lag dang ldan
pa dang/ gang nas gang du skyes par tshig gtsigs pa dang/ byad gzugs babras ba dang/ yid gzhungs pa dang/ rab tu bde zhing skyid pa dang/ yid du'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba//
tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan ng/ bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phradade/ de'i rjes su slob pa dang/ banang snya ba yongasasu spangs pa dang/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su

[>>gcodapa dang/ dge ba'i chos khyad par can thams cad rdzogs pa dang/ theg pa chen poris kyi rnam grangs thams cad tshol ba dang/ byang blob sims dpa'ismon lam dang/ spyod pa thams cad la ris gyis gzhol

'gaM dang/ shin du yas pa'iyongashes kyi rgya mtshol 'jug banas/ blanamed pa'i byang nub 'thobapabar du'agyuraro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad bden par smra ba/ sbyadang bral ba/ lha'igasungagis yongs
pa su brgyan pa dang/ slob mngacing sems kyi spyod pa drang ba dang/ yang dag pa spyod panam pa' dkarngaba'i sa 'ba' zhig la spyod pa/ lha'i gos bsungan gyon pa/ rinapo'irgyagyis bkod pa risams can
dgashing der skye bar gyur re// de bzhin gshegs par 'i tshad kyang dpag tumad de/ sams canadagacis 'dul ba bzhinang ngos ston to// yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos yun ring du
ba gnas shing sams can dam pa la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byedapanga'agyur ro// rigs kyi bu'adi ni byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po'i ban dub yongs su spangs ba'i 'khor lo bzhi ba'o//
byang chub sems dpalasems dpa' chen po 'khe le 'di dang ldan na da nyan thos kyitheg pa la 'khrul ba med par 'gyur/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gangathog la 'khrul pa med/
07 par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/ rasangs rgyas kyi theg pa rigang brag la 'khrul pa mad par 'agyur ro// thog bachen po la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/theg pa
chenang rigang brag la 'brel pa med par 'gyur ro// dkon mchogagasum gyi gdungayongs su 'phal ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'inyeganas chos kyi snod dam sakyi
snod ma yin pa yang rung chung ngun chos gos kyi rgyal bu gyon cing/ skra dang kha spu byugs pa la 'bral pamed par 'a gyur/ theg ba chen po'i chos la gongonas gong du 'pharazhing phyi mi ldeg par
'gyur ba dang/ rnaba'ishes rab dang/ bsod nams kyi khyadapar rtag tusu zhong 'thal ba dang tingang 'dzin dang/ gzungs dang/ bzod pa dang/ sa rnams thams cad la dbang du 'gyur zhing//
phyir mi ldog pa dang/ rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyin dang 'phradacing/ rongos su 'grob dang rtag dusangs rgyasamathongab dang ya 'bral zhing/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ nyan thos kyi gnas
mthengab dang mi 'bral bdang/ chos thos pa dang ni 'bral ba dang/ dge 'dun la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byedapa dang mi 'bral ba dang/ dag ba'i rtsa ba thams cad shin tu tshol ba la brtson pasasems

mi ngoms pa dang/ byang chub kyi spyod pa dang 3 smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems mi ngoms par-i'agyur te/ 'bras bu gzhan thob pa yang ji ltar bshad pa bzhinano// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang sgrub
sems dpasems dpa' chen po gnam 'tsho ba'i bar du phum yongs su spangasan/ sems can thams cad kyis rtag dubakur zhing bla mar byed pa dang/ tshig smra ba thams cad
gzhan gyisamanyan pa dang/ 'dum pa dang/ dogs pameskya bar 'gyur te/ de'i dbang gis dge ba'irtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// thog ma med pa re mtha' nas rgyud lngar 'khor 'are'akhor ba'i

rgya mad+mor 'bying ba yang phra ma byas pa'i dbang gis lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid kyi mi dge ba'i las bdag kyang byed la/ gzhan yang byed du'adzud cing/ mthong bdang thos paris su yi rang ba lasabyung ba/
nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang/ sems kyisgrib pa dang/ chos kyi sgrib pa dang/ 'dug pa la sgrib pas bsgribs par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar phrama'i tshig yongs su spangs pa'i 'khor les lhagamamalus khar
yongs su bcom pas rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu mi len par byed do// lus 'di nyid la yang lha dngami la sogs pa kun dga' zhing ) yid du 'ong ba dang/ dogs pa mi skya ba dang lus dang mas rab tu

bangab dang/ tshig tu smra b.rathams cad la nyan cing 'dum par 'gyuraro// rami'apho ba'i dus byidab na yang lus dungasams la sdug bsngal gyis mi gdung zhing/ yid du 'ong ba'i bu dang/ chung ma dang rabo
thamasacad kyis yongs su bskor bas 'chi'apho ba'i dus byed par 'gyuragyi/ shin tu'ajigs pa'agashin rje'i pha ltamathong ba mi 'gyur ro// yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'iteshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba/

tshul khrims dang yon tand ldan pa// bsod nams kyi zhingayang dag pa dang phrad de/ lus dang sems rab tu dga' ba dang/ bkur stadangabacas pas shin tu dad bskye bar 'gyur/tshe'angos nas kyang phyi'ami'i nang du
snyas te/ dbang po yos su rdzogs shing yan lag dang ldan pa dang/ gang nas gang du skyes par snaba'ichog 'jam zhing rngam pa dang/ byad gzugs bzang ba dung/ yid gazhus pa dang/ rab bde zhing skyid/

pa dang/ phyi yang yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba/ tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan ba/ bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de/ ri rjes su slob pa dang/ phrama'i tshig dang yongs
su bral bas/ sdig pas dge ba'i zlos thams cad yongs su gcod pa dang/ dge ba'i chos khyad par can thams cad yongasasu rdzogs pa dang/ thegapa chenapo'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad tshol ba dang :
byang bsams dpa'ismon lam dang/ spyod pa thams cad la rim gyis gzhal cing/ yashes kyi rgyalatshol 'jug pa nas/ bla namang par byang ba thob pa'i bar du 'gyur ro/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
tu brtan pa/ sra ba/ mi shigs pa dang/ lha rdzas babrang pos yongs su brgyan par 'gyur ba dang/ 'thun pa/mi rtsodapa/ shin du dul zhing 'dum pa/ dge ba'i chos tshol ba'i sams can dag zhing der/
skya par 'gyuraro// ga du'adum zhing gus pas dam pa'i rmos nyanapa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'tshad kyang dpag med de/ sems can dag ci dang cis 'dul ba bzhin du dam pa'i tos ston/
kyi// do yongs sus ngunalas 'das nas kyang dam pa skyes yun ring du gnasashing/ sams can(dmad pa la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byedapar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu'adi nyibyung
