po sangs dpar sems dpa' chen po phra ma yongs su sngaTas pa'i 'khor le lnga pa'o/ nga/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo 'dedang ldan na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa
'khrul med par 'gyur/ 2na thos kyi theg pa'i gang brag la 'khrul pa mdapara'agyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'khrul bamad par 'gyur/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang brag la babrul
pamed par 'gyura'o// theg pa chen po la 'khrul pamed pa 'gyur ) theg pa chen po'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro// dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yongs su 'pho'ab dang/ dbazhin

ga shegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i nye gnas chos kyi sdod dam/ chos kyi snyingaa yin pa'ang rung/ chung ngun chos gos kyi tshal bu gyon rung/ skra dang ba spu bregs pa la 'khrulapasemadapa/'a 'gyur
theg pa chen poris la gong nas gong du'apar zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang/ rna ba'ishes rab dang/ bsod nams kyi khyad par rtag tu skye zhing 'phel ba dang/ [”]ting nge 'dzin dang/ gzungs dang/
bzod pa dang/ sa rnams thams cad ladabang du 'gyur zhing ) phyirami ldog pa dang/ rtag dug ba'i bshes gnyen dang phradacing/ de'i rjes su 'gro ba dang/ rtag tusangs rgyasamathong ba dang mi

[ne]/ 'bral zhing byang chub sems dparadang nyanas kyi lte gnasamathong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang/ sathos pa dang mi bral ba dang/ dge 'dun lamachod pa dang/ bsnyen bkur byed pa dngami 'bral ba dang/ dag pa'i rtsa ba thams cad/
la bal brtson pas sems mi mas pa dang/ byang chub kyi srod pa dang/ smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems mi ngoms par 'agyur te/ 'bras bu gzhan thob pa yang ji skad bshadapa bzhin/
no: rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems donga' chen po ganganam 'tsho ba'i bar du zhe gcodapa'i gathams cad yongs su spangasan/ sems can thams cad kyis bkupazhing/
blamar byed pa dang/ tshig tu smra ba kun la pha rol po kun dga' zhing nyan pas dogs pa mad par ragyur to/ de'i dbang gis dge ba'i nub thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// thogamachod pa'i
mtha' nas rgyud ltar 'kho 'dra'akhor ba'i rgya mtshor 'bying ba yang zhe gcodapa'i tshig gi dbang gis lus dang ngag dang yid mi dge ba'i las bdag kyang byedal ga[é]na yang byed du 'dzud
cing mthong ba dang thos pa'i rjes su yi rang ba las byung ba/ nyon mongs ba'isgrib pa dang/ sems kyi sgrib pa dang/ chos kyi sgrib pa dang shin tu'adus pa la sgrib pas bsgribs par 'gyur ro// 'di
ltar zhagacod pa rig yongs su spyas pa'i 'khor lesaM lhagamam lus par yongs su bcom pa'i dbang gis rnam par sminabale'abras bu yongs su mi len te// lus 'di nyid la yang lha dang mi la sogs pa
[zj3]@#/// kun dga' bas dogs pami skye ba dang/ lus dasems rab tu bde ba dang/ tshig du skya ba thams cad pha rol gyi yid du 'ong ba dang snyan par 'gyur/ nama'i pho ba'i dus byed pa yang
lus dngasams la sdug bsngal gyisomigadung zhunge/ namisos ba dang/ yid du 'ong ba'i bu dang/ chung mdang/ 'khor thams cad kyis yongs su bskorabs 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed pa 'gyur gyi/ shin du 'jig
pa'i gshin rje'i bo mthong b.rami 'gyur ro// yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyenas sa dul ba/ tshul khrims dngayon tanang ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi zhing dadag ba dang phradade/ lus dngasems

drag tudaga' ba dang/ de la bkur sti dang bcas pas shin tu dad pa skye bar 'gyur ro// tsho'athos nas kyang phyi ma'i nang du skyes te/ dbangapa yongasasu rdzogs shing yan lag dang ldan pa dang/ gang nas gang

skyes par tshig 'jam por sgrub dang/ byadagazugasabazung ba dang/ yid gazhungs pa dang/ rab tshubade zhing skyed pa dang/ phyir yang yod du'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba/ tshul khrims dang yon

tan du ldan ba/ bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de/ de'i rjes su slob pa dang zhe gcod pa'i tshog yongs su spong ba dang/ sdig pas dge ba'i sathams cad yongs su gcodapa dang/ dge ba'i chos khyad
paracan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ theg pa chen po'i ngos kyi rnam grangs thams cad tshol ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'ismon lam dang/ spyod pa thams cad rim gyis gzhol zhing/ shin

tu yangs pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtshol 'jugapa nas/ bla na med pa'i byang rtsub kyi bar du 'thob pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nayid dum 'ong ba'i sgra thams cadudangabral te/yid du 'ong ba'i sgra dbyangs snyan/

pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang chos kyi sgras zhing de yongs su gang ba dang/ dran po dang blogres su ldan pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs shin dungul bo'i sems can dag zhing deraskya ba dang/ rtag tutshig 'jam pos gcig
la gcigabaskul bar 'gyur ro// dbazhinagashegs pa'atsho'i tshad kyang dpag med de/ sems can dag sa 'dul ba bzhin chos ston pa dang/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'ichos yun ring du
gnas shing sams canats+tshadamadapa la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byedapara'agyur ro// rigs kyibu 'di'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhe gcod pa'i tshig yongs su sngangs pa'i 'khor lo drug
pa'o// byang bsems dpa' sems dpa' napo'akhoral 'didad ldan ngs/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pamed par 'gyur/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'igang thog la 'khrul pa
mad pa'agyurar// rangasangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa mdapar 'gyur/ rangasas rgyus kyi theg pa'i gangabrag la 'khrul pamed par 'gyur ro// theg pa chen khol 'khrul pamed par 'gyur/ theg
pa chen po'i gang zag la 'khrul pamadapar 'gyur ro// dkon macog gsum gyi gdung yos su 'phel ba dang/ de bzhinagashegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tubyung ba'i gnas chos kyi snod dam/ chos
kyi snodam yin pa yang rung/ cung ngun chos gos kyi rgol bu gyon cing/ skra dang kha spu bregs pal 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/ theg pa chen po'itos la gong nas gong du 'phar zhing
po phyir mi ldog pa dang/ rnaba'ishes rab dang/ bsod nams kyi khyadapar rtag rtaskya zhing 'phal ba dang/ tonganga'adzin dang/ gzugs dang/ bzod pa dang/ sa rnams thams cad la dbang du 'gyur zhing
kha phyirami ldeg pa dang/ rtag tudage ba'i bshes ginadangaphradamyong/ rjes su 'gro ba'agyur ba dang/ rtag tugs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral zhing/ byang bsems dpa' dang
nyan thos kyi byed gnas mthongab dang mi 'bral ba dang/ chesathos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang/ dge 'dun la mchod pa dang bsAn bkurabyedapa dang mi 'bral b.rang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tshol ba la/
brtson pasasemasam ngoms pa dang/ byang chub kyi sdod pa dang/ smonalam rnam pa sna tshegs kyis sems mi ngoms par 'gyur te/ 'bras bu gzhan thob pa yang jis dbashadapa bzhin no//
rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenapo ganganama'atshoba'i bar du chig bkyal pa yongs su spangs pasro/ sems can thams cad kyis bkur zhing blamar byed pa dang/ tshig tu
smra ba thams cad don du'agyur zhing chog thos pa'i rnams nyan cingagus pas dogs pa med par 'gyur ro// de'i dbang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// thog mamod/

0 pa'i mtha' nas rgyud lngas 'bodabar 'khor ba'i ma 'bying ba yang g bkyal pa smra ba'i dbangagis lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid mi dge ba'i las bdag kyang byed la/ gzhan yang byed du 'dzud cing/ mthong bdang shos

pa'i rjes su yi rang ba las byung ba/ nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang/ sems kyi sgrib pa dang/ chos kyi sgrib ba dang/ don du spu ba la sgrib pas bsgribs par gyurado// 'dir tshig bkyal pa yongs su spangs pa'i
'khorales lhag mam lus par yongs su bcom pas/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu mi len par byedado// lus 'di nyid la lha dang mi la sogs pa kun dga' zhingayadangu'ong bas dogs pamed par 'gyur ba dang/

lus dang sems rab tubade b.rang/ tshig dusmra ba thams cad donadu 'gyur ba dang/ 'gyi'il ba'i dus byed pan mngalus dang sems la sdug bsngal gyis mi gdung zhing yid du 'ong ba'i bu dang/ chung ma dang/ 'khor
gyi longs su bskor bas 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed bar 'gyur gyi/ shinatu'ajigs pa'i gan rje'i phonyamathongabar mi 'gyur ro// yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyin chos kyis dul ba/ tshul khrims
dang yon tan du ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de/ lus dang sems rab tudagro' ba dang/ dal bkur sti dngabacas pas shin tu dad paskye bar 'gyur ro// tshe 'phos nas kyang phyi mi'i
nang skye zhing/ dbang po yongs su rdzogs pa/ yan lag dang ldan pa dang/ gang sa gang dgyes b.raphan pa dang don du 'gyurab 'itshogasmra ba dang/ byadagazugs bzang ba dang/ yid gzhungasabadang
ba du bde zhing skyed pa dang/ phyir yang yid du 'ongaba'i dge ba'i bshesagazhan tshos kyis dul ba/ tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag padang phrad de/
de'i rjesasu slob pa dang/ tshig bkyal par smra ba yongs su spong ba dang/ sdig pami dge ba'i rkyes thams cad yongs su gcodapa dang/ dag ba'i sa khyad par can thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang/

ka theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad tshol ba dang/ byang chub sems rupa'i smon lam dang/ spyod pa thams cad la rim gyis gzhol zhing/ la tu yangs pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtshol 'jug pa nas/

bla namad pa'i byang chub 'thob pa'i bar du 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas kyi zhinamad pa'ichog thams cad dang bral te/ byang chubusamasadapa'i sde snod du gtogs pa chos chen po'i sgamchog dam pa rnam pa mang
pos zhange de yongs su khyab pa dang/ dpag du med pa 'i smon lam dang/ ye shes dam pa phun sum tshogs pas sa kyi don rnam pa sna tshogs 'chad pa la mkhas pa'i sems cand lta bu dag zhing derAskye bar
'gyurar/ )dbazhin gshegs parits+tsha'itshad kyang dpag tu mang/ sems can dag cis 'dul ba bzhin dudam pa'i saston to// yongasasu myang n las 'jus nas kyang dam pa'i chos yunaring du gnas
shing/ sems can tshad med pa la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byed par 'gyur// rigs kyi bu 'din byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chog bkyal pa yongs su spangs pa'i 'khor lo bdun po 'o
dbyang rlub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor le 'di dang ldan pas/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pamed par 'gyur nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyu/
ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi thog pa la ra khrul pamed par 'gyur/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg parigang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro// thog pa chen po la 'khrul pamed par 'gyur/ theg pa chen po'i seng
brag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro// dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yongs su 'phul ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byang ba'i ltaganas chos kyi snod de// chos kyi snod ma yin pa

yang rung/ chung ngu nas nges kyi chol bu gyonacing/ sgra dang kha spu bregs pa la 'khrul pamed bar 'gyur// theg pachen po'i tis la gong nas gong du'apharazhing phyir mi ldog pa dang/ rnaba'i shag rngab dang/

bso danamasakyi khyad par rtag du skye zhing 'phel ba dang 3 teng nge 'dzin dang/ gzungs dang/bgrod pa dang/ sa rnams thams cad la dbangangu'agyuzhing/ phyi mi ldeg pa dang/ rtag tudage ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad

cing de'i rjes su 'gro ba dang/ rtagatusangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral zhing/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ nyan thos kyi she gnasamathongab dang ma 'bral ba dang/ chos shes pa dang mi 'bral
ba dang/ dge 'dun 2yo da pa dang bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral ba dang/ dge ba'itsa ba thams cad tsholangal brtson pas semasam ngoms pa dang/ byang chub kyi spyod pa dang/ smon lam rnam pa
sna tshogs kyi sums mi ngoms par 'gyur te ! 'bras bu gzhan thob pa yang ji skad bshad pa bzhin no// gsakyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang/ snachag
po nam 'tshonga'i bar du chags sams yes su spas na/ sems can thams cad kyis bkur zhing btsun par bad pa dang/ sams rnas par dag cing rtog pa dang bral te/ de'i ngabang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// thog mamadapa'i mtha' nas rgyud ltar 'khor bar 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'byong ba yang chags sems kyi dbang gis lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las bdag

kyang byeng la/ gzhan yang byed du 'dzud cing/ mthong ba dang thos pa'i sa su yi rang ba las byung ba nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang/ sa mas kyi sgrib pa dang/ chos kyi sgrib pa dang/ 'dadasams med pa la sgribabs
babs par 'gyur ro// 'dod sems yongs su sdongs ba'i 'khoralos lhag ma ma lus par yongs su bcom pas/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yongs su mi len te/ lus 'di)de la'ang lhadangumaM2/
bsaM sogs pa kun dga'i zhing yid du 'ong ba dang/ dogs pamed par 'gyur ba dang/ lus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang/ sems rnam par dag cing ga pa dang bral bar 'o gyur ro// 'chi 'pho ba'i dus bar pa na

yang lus dang sems pa sdug bsngal gyis migadung ba dang/ yid du 'ong ba'i bu dang chung ma dang 'khor gyis yongs su bskor bas 'chi'apho ba'i dus byed par 'gyuragyi/ shin tu 'jigs pa'i gshin rje'i pho2

tha mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen byes kyis dul ba tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phradad 1 lus dasems khrab dudagar ba dang/

de la bkur sti dang bcas pas shin tu dad pa skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe 'phos nas kyang phyir mi'i nang du skye zhing/ dbang po yongs su rdzogs pa yan lag dang ldan pa dang/ gang nas gang du skyes par sems rnam par dag

cing rtog pa med pa dang/ byad gzugs babrang ba dang/ yid bzhungs pa dang/ rab tu bde zhingaspyod pa dang/ phyir yang yid du 'ong ba'idagaba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba/ tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa//

bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de/ de'i rjes su slob pa dang/ gas sams yongs su spong ba dang/ mi dge ba'i chos yongs su gcod pa dang/ dgaba'i tshes khyad pa ma can thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang
theg pa chen po'ichos kyi rnam grangs thams cad tshol ba dang/ byangurlabasams dpa'ismon lam dang/ sdod pa thams cad la rim gyis gzhol zhing/ shin tu yangs pa 'i ye shes kyi rgya mtshol 'jug pa nas//

ba mad pa'i byang chub 'thob pa'i bar du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyizhing lag mthil bzhin dumanyam lo/ rin pa che rnam pa mang po sa yongasasu gang ba dang/ rin po che'i shing rnam pa sna tshogs dkrigs pa dang/
rin po che'i gos dang/ rin po che'i rgyan gyi yo byad dang/ rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ gdugs dang/ gsar gangul dang/ mu tig gi dra ba dang/ shing la sogs pas yongs su gang ba dang/
shin tuyid du 'ong zhing blta na sdug pa/ nga rgyal yongs su spangs pa/ bung gzugs shin tu mdzes pa/ dbang po ma nyams pa/ sams mnyam pa'i sems can ngag zhing der sku bar
[>'gyur te/ chags sems mdapa'i nan tan phunasum tshogs pas brgyanapar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa ritsho'i tshod kyang dpag tu mngang/ sams can ngaganyis 'dul ba bzhin du ngamo pa'i
ka chos ston to// yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang/ dam pa'i sa yun ring du gnas shing 3 sams can tshad med pa la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byed par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'dzin byang chub las
dpa' sems dpa' chenapo tshugs sams yongs su spangs pa'i 'khor lo brgyad pa'o/ byang chub sems dang res mas dba' chen po 'khor le 'didang ldan na[2]nathos kyi theg pa la'akhrul
pa med par 'gyur nyanathus kyi theg pa'i gangabrag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro// rangasangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa
ba mad par 'gyuraro// theg pa chen po la 'khrul pa med pa ba'agyor/ theg pa chen po'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro// dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yongs su 'phel ba dang/ ngabazhini/

gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab du byung ba phyogs gnas chos kyi snod dam/ chos kyi snod ma yin pa yang rung/ chung ngun chos gos kyi tshal bu gyon cing/ skra dang kha spu bregs pa la'akhrul pamed par 'gyur/

theg pa chen pa'i chos la gong nas gong du 'phar zhing phyir mi ldog ba dang/ rnapa'i shes rab dang/ bsod nams kyi khyad par rtag tu skye zhing 'phel ba dang/ ting nga 'dzin dang/ gathungs dang/ babyed padang/ sa rnams /

thams cad la dbang du 'gyur zhing/ phyi mi ldog pa dang/ rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phradacing/ de'i rjes su 'thun par 'gyur ba dang/ rtag tusangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral zhing/ byang chub
sams dpar dang/ nyan thos kyin gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang/ chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dad dge 'dun la mchod pa dang bsAn bkur byed pa dngami 'bral ba dang/ dge ba'i rtsa bathams cad
tshol ba la brtson pas sems mi ngoms pa dang/ byang bkyigyod pa dang/ smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyisasamus mi ngoms par 'gyur te/ 'bras bu gzhan dag thob pa yang dzisnyad bshad pa bzhin no//
sapachen bos 'phags pa byang bsems dba' sa'isnying bo ri'akhoralo bcu pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo bam po dgu ba she sa kyi bu gzhan yang byang
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nam 'tsho ba'i bar du gnodasems yongs su spangs na/ sems can thams cad kyis bkur zhing blamar byed pa dang/ sems rnam par dag pa dang/ drin dang bral
bar 'gyur te/ de'i dbang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// thogamamad pa'i mtha' nas rgyung ltar 'khor bar 'khor ba'i rgyamatshor 'bying ba yang gnod sems kyi dbang ]
[', g/ ]/gis lus dang/ ngag dang yid sdig pa mi dge ba'i lus bdag kyang byed la/ gzhan yang byed du 'dzud cing/ mthong ba dang thos ba'i rjes su yi rang ba las byung ba nyamongs pa'i/
[>>sgribapa dung ) sems kyi sgrib pa dang/ chos kyi sgrib pa dang/ gnadasems byed pa la sgrib pas bslabs par gyur to// 'di ltaraganadasams yongs su spras pa'i 'khor los lhagam ma lus
par yongs su bcom pas/ rnam pa sminapa'i 'bras bu yongs su mi len te// lus 'di nyid la yang lha dang mi la sogs pa kun dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba dang/ dogs par mi 'gyu ba dang/ sams

rnam par dagapa dang/ drim dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ ]'chi'apha ba'i dus byedapa na yang lus dang sems la sdug bsngal gyis mi gdungs shingayidadu'ongaba'i bu dang/ chungam dang/ 'khor thams cad kyisaya=
su bskorabs 'chi'apho ba'ig byed par 'a gyur gyi/ shin tu 'jigs pa'igashin rje'ipho mthongab mi 'gyur ro// yid du'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba/ tshul khrims dang yon tan

du ldan pa// bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag padang phrad de// lus dang sams rab du dgar ba dang/ de la bkur sti dang bcas pas shon tshudad pa skya b.ra'agyu ra'o// cho'aphos nas kyang phyi mi'i nang skyo zhing

dbang po yongs su rdzogs pa/ yan lag dngaldan pa dang/ gang nas gang duskyes par sems rnam par dag cidI dri ma dang bral ba dang/ byad gzugs bzang ba dang/ yid gazhungs pa dang/rob tu bde zhing skyid pa/
dang phyir yang yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba ) tshul khrims dang yon tan duldan kha/ bsod namasakyi kongamang dag pa dang phradade/ de'i rjes su 'thunapar slob pa dang/ gnod

sems mos su spangab dang/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su gcod pa dang/ dgekharicos khyad parngacan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad stsol/
ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lamadang/spyod pa thams cad la rim gyis gzhol zhing/ shin tumangs ba'iyAshes kyi rgyamatshol 'jug banas/ blunamadapa'aphyang chub 'thob pa'i b.radu 'gyur ro//

sangs rgyas kyi zhingerog pa dang/ smra ba dang/ sprinadang/ khug rlungs dang/ rdul dang/ dri ma dang/ misdug pa/ mi mdzes pa thams cad dang bral te/ rin po che mang posangashin tu brgyan pa/ yid du 'ong ba dang
nga rgyal dang bralakha gozugs mdzes shing sdug ba/ dbang po ma nyams po// sems rtog cu zhi ba'i sems can dag zhing deraskye ste/ byams pa dang/ snying rjadang/ yon tan phun sum tshogs pas brgyan par
'gyura'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'i tshadakyong du ngog tumad de/ sams can dag sa 'dul ba bzhin du dam pa'i chos ston to// yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'ichos yun ring du
gnas shing/ sems can tshodam da pa la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byed par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenapo gnod sems yongs su spangs pa'i 'khor lo dgu
pa'o: byang chub sems dpa3sems dpa' chen po 'khoralo 'di dang ldan n/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'i
po gang thog la 'khrul pamang bar 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'khrul ba med par 'gyur/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg b.rigang zug la 'khrul pa med par 'agyura'o// theg pa chen po la 'khrul
tsha paged par 'gyur ) theg pa chen po'i gang zag la 'khrul pamed par 'gyur ro/ dkon mchog gsum gyigadung yongs su raphal ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab du byung ba'ishu gnas
chos kyi snad dam/ chos kyi snod ma yin pa yang rung/ ngang na chos gos kyi tshal bu gyon cing/ skra dang kha spu bregs pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ) theg pa chen po'i chos la gong nas gong du/
'bar zhing phyir mi ldeg pa dang/ rno ba'i shes rngab dang/ bsonganams kyi khyad par rtag du skye zhing 'phel bdang/ ting 'dzin dang/ gzungasadang/ bzod pa dang/ sa rnams thams cud la dbang du
'gyungazhing/ phyiramaldogapa dang/ rtag tshudag ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'phrad cing/ de'i rjes su slob pa dang/ rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mathongab dang mi 'bral zhing/ byang chub sems dpa'
dang nyan thos kyi na gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang/ sa thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang/ dge 'dun la mchod pa dngabasnyen bkur byed ba dang mi 'bral ba dang/ dge bcu ba thams
cad l ba la brtson bsasams mi ngoms pa dang/ byang chub kyi srid pa dang/ smonalam rnam ba sna tshogs kyis sems mi ngoms par 'gyur te/ 'bras bu gzhan dag thob pa yang skad
bshad pa bzhinano// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dbo' sems dpa' chen po gang nam 'tsho ba'i b.ranguleg bar lta ba yongs su spangasan/ sems can thams cad kyis bku shing ba
mar byed ba dang/ sems rnam par dag cing log par rtog pa dang bral bar 'gyur te/ de'i dbang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyuraro// thogamAmed pa'i mtha' nas rgyud
lta ra'akhor bar 'khor ba'irgyamatshor 'bying ba yang log par lta ba'i dbang gis lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid snyig pa mi dge ba'i las bdag kyang byedal/ gzhan yang byed du'adzud cing/ mthongag
dang thos pa'ings su yi rang ba las byung ba/ nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang/ sems kyi sgrib pa dang skyes gyi sgrib pa dang/ yang dag par lta ba la sgrib pas bsgribs par gyur to// 'di ltar leg
par lta ba yongs su sangs pa'i 'khor los lhag ma ma lus bcom pas/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yongs su mi len te/ lus 'dinyid la yang lha dang mi la sogs pa kun dga' zhing yid du 'ongab dang/
dogs pamed paro'agyur ba dang/ lus dang sems rab tu bdeb dang/ sems rnam par dag cing log par lta ba dang bral bar 'gyuraro// 'chi'apho ba'i dus byed pan yang lus dang sems la
sdug bsngal gyis mi gdungasashing/ yid du 'ong ba'i bu dang/ ngam dang/ 'khor thams cad kyis yongs su bskor bas 'tshe'apho ba'i dus byed par 'gyu'agyi/ shin tu
[>'jigs pa'i gshin rje'i phonyamathong bami 'gyur ro// yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyin chos kyis dul ba/ tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa/ bsod nams kyizhing yang dag pa dang phrad/
de lus dang sems rab tu dga' pa dang bku sti dang bcas pas dad pa skya b.ra'agyur ro// d+hA'angos nas kyang phyir mi'i nang du skye zhing dbang po yongs su rdzogs pa/ yan lag dang ldan pa dang/
gang nas gang du sus par sems rnam par dag cing/ log par lta ba dang bral ba dang/ byad gzugs bzang ba dang/ yid gzhungs pa dang/ rab tu bde zhing skyid pa dang/ phyir yang yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i

dushes gnyen ches kyis dul ba/ tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa bsonganams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phradade/ de'i rjes su 'thun par slob pa dang/ leg par lta ba'i chos yongs suphreng ba dang/ sdig pa mi

dge ba'i+is thams cad yongs su gcod pa dang/ dge ba'i sa khyad par can thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ theg pa rkyen pa'i zlosakyi rnam gras thams cad tshol ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lamadang

spyod pa thams cad la rim gyis gzhol zhing/ shin tu yas pa'iya shes kyi rgyamatshol 'jug ba nas/ bla namad pa'i byang chub 'thob pa'i bar du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi

[2/ ]theg pa dang bral ba dang/ lha'i bdud kyi 'khorale thams cad dang bral ba dang/ musnyegs can gyi 'khor thams cad dang bral ba dang/ rinapo che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan cing shin tumadzes pa dang/ yang dag par

lta bu dang ldan zhing/ ngomatshar dang/ bkra shis dang tshulan pa'i lta ba sna tshogs dang/ rtag par lta ba dang chad par lta ba dang/ bdag dad bdag gis lta ba thams cad yongs su sbas pa'isams can dag zhing der

skyes te/ shin tu tshering ba dang/ theg pa chanaba'iro gcig ba la les spyod par 'gyur ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa ratshe'i tshad kyang dpag dumed de/ sams can dag cis 'dul ba bzhin du rjes ston pa dang

yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'ichos yun ring du gnas shing/ sems can tshad med pa la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du ro gcig pa'i chos bstan pa la rtsod pa med pas yongs su rgyas bar byed cing/ bgagA
dang bar chad med par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu'adazhi byang nub sems dpa' sems dpa' skyen po log par lta ba longs su spangs pa'i 'khor lo bcu ba'o/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dang 'chan po'akhol rnam ba bcu po 'did ldan pas/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa mad pa bar gyur/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa/
la 'khrul pa med paro'agyur rongasangs rgyas kyi theg pa gang brag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro// thog pen po la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/ theg pa chen po'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med pa'
@#// 'gyur ro// dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yongs su 'phel ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i po stan pa la rab tu byung ba rirtaganas chos kyi snod dmu/ chos kyi snadam yin pa yang/

[>>rung/ chung ngunachos gos kyitshal bu gyon cing/ skra dang kha spu bregs pa la 'khrul pa med pa dang/ theg pa chen po'i chos la gong nas gong du 'bar zhing phyi mi ldog ba dang/ rnaba'i shes rab dang/ bsod zhan su kyi

khyad par rtag tu skye zhing rephal ba dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ gzungs dang/ bzod pa dang/ sa rnams thams cad la dbang du 'gyur zhing/ mi ldog pa dang/ rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phradacing/ rjes
su slob pa dang/ rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi bral zhing/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ nyan thos kyi gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang/ tshos theg pa dang mi 'bral bdang/ dge

'dun la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byed pa dngami 'bral ba dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tshol ba la brtson pas sems mi ngoms pa dang/ byang chub kyi spyod pa dang/ smon lam dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug
la sems mi ngoms par 'gyur te/ 'bras bu gzhan thob pa yang ji skad bshad ba bzhin no// rigs kyi bu byung ba sems dpa' sems dpar chen po gang 'khor lo rnam pa bcu po de dag dang ldan na

myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa ri byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya b.rar gyur ro// de ci'i phyirazhon ) snga ma 'das pa'i dbazhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas thams cad kyang gi dge ba bcu'i las yongs su spangs nas/ thams cad kyis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi 'bras bu bsngags shing bstod de/ sams can thams cad la bde ba dang/
phan pa'i don dang byang chub kyi lam skye zhing 'phar bar bya ba dang/ sems can thams cad kyi las dang nyon mongs pa'i sdug bsngal lhag ma ma lus par basal bar bya ba dang/ ngan songagasum bsam
par byob dang dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung bsab par bya ba dang/ khams gsumagyi srid pa yongs su gcad par byi ba dang/ phung po dang/ khams dang/ skyomadra bcad par bya ba dang/ thams
cad maradu 'jigs med pa'i rgya ngana'as 'das pa'i grong khyer du brud ba'i/ ji skad bshad pa bzhin dumi dge ba bcu'ilas kyi 'bras bu yongs su slong ngo// dbasan rigs kyi bu gal te

yang dgo pa ji lta ba bzhin du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'dim bsgrungs pamangon par 'atshong rgya ba 'am/ chung ngu nayang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'ga' tsam yang mi srungabar/
ngani theg pa ni bo yang dag par spyod pa'o 'u 'am/ nga ni bla na mdong yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub pa'o zhes thon gang zag de ni shin tu brdzun par sa ba ste/ phyogs bcu'i sangs/
rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'jig rten spu ba dang/ 'dzom pa dang/ ngo ba med ba/ stong par sbo zhing chad par lta ba glen pa/ sla bo can yin te/ da tsho'aphos nas ngan song dultung bar
bshes par bya'o// rigs kyi bu gang tshig tu brjod pa tsam mam/ mnyan pa tsam gyis ga ste/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam bsgom pa 'am/ nan tan bya mi dgos par//
[>>byang chub dang mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob tuzinazhi/ bskal pa gcig tsam la yud tsamathangacig gis/ phyogs bcu'isangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyisa'i khams kyi rdul phram snyedakyi sems
can thams cad byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgyas/ mya nganalu'ada' bar 'gyur ba zhigan/ nade lta bu'i gnas medado// de'i phyi'i zhen/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam ni theg panapo'i rtsa ba yin te/
byang chub kyi rgyudang/ mya ngan las 'da'aba'i them skas lta bu 'o// rigs kyi bu gal tesems bskyod pa tsamamag/ smon lam btab pa tsam gyis chog ste/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi 'am goms ba ra nan tan bya
mi dgos par/ byang chub dang yongs sumya ngan las 'das pa 'thob tu bin ni/ bskal pa gcig la yud tsam gra cig gis/ phyogs bcu'i sas rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sa'i khams kyi rdul phramo
sAd kyi sems can yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngonaparar ngargyazhing/ mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba zhig na/ de nad lta bu'i gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhenu/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam

ni'ajig rten dang 'jig rten las 'dar ba'i 'bras bu'i khyad par dang yon tan gyi rgyura'agyur ro// rigs kyi bu gal tadage ba bcu'i las kyi lam la nan tan du ma byas na/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyasakyi zhing
[4/]thams cad kyi rdul phra mo sAd kyi bskal par bdag ni theg pa chenapo pa'o zhes zer ta/ 'dadam [A]tam ) sams bskyadam/ smon lam btabakyang/ byang dngamanalas 'do ba thob par mi
'gyural/ gzhan yang 'khor ba'asdug bsngal las gnami nus so// rigs kyi bu dge babaru'i 'asakyilamal natan byas pas/ 'jig rtazhan rgyal rigs dang/ bram bre la sogs pa rigs chen po dang

rgyal chen rig bzhi'i lha nas/ 'dushesamadamin skye mched stas kyi bar du yod pa dang/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bgang yang yod

par 'gyupate/ de dag kun kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la nan tan byed pa'i khyad par dang bye brag las gyur to// de bas na rigs kyi bu gang myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob

par 'dangan/ dge ba bcu'i 'a sakyilegalanan tan gyi rgyan gyis brgyan te/ mi ngag ba bcu'i sdom b.lagi gnas na/ blo named pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dumangon par 'tshang rgya'o// gangamyur

du theg pa chen po'i spyod yul chud par 'dod dus/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang b thob par 'dod dam ! myur dudage ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'dadan/ star dge ba bcu/
las kyi'amashinatubasrung bar bya'o/ daci'i phyi'i zhan/ dge ba bcu rigasakyi lam gyis nidag pa'i sa thams cad dang/ yon tan rnam par gzhag pa'i gzhi dang ! 'jig rtenadang 'jig rten/
[7 ]@#// las 'da' ba'i 'bras bumchog thob par byed pa'i rgyu yin no// de bas na dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la shin tun tan bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag
po gsal bar babs pa'i phyir tshigs su gcad de gsungs pa/ srid pa'i sdug bsngal kun gcod cing// byung ba chen po 'thob 'dod ba/ dge bcu'i 'khor lenan tan la/ le lo ma byed brtson par gyis
theg pa gsumagyi dam chos dang/ theg pa rnam gsum gang brag dang// rab tu byung ba thams cad la// 'khrul pa med par 'thob par 'agyur// theg chen spyod la dmos shing// thams cad 'bar gyi
dbugs 'byin pa'i// chos mchog rtogs nas zhing dag der// byang chub chen po myur du'athob// gal te srog gcod yongs spangs na// kun gyis bkur zhing bla mar byed// rtag tund med tshoang ring
bde zhing skyid la gnod pa mang// skya ba'i gnas ni thams cad du// sangs rgyas spyod yul lam la mos// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun mthong// myur du bla mad byang chub 'thob// mabyin len pa yongs
rtisungs na// mkhas pas bkur zhing bla marabyed// 'dod chags sku zhi lam kun zhi// 'dod chags med pa skye bar 'gyur// skye ba kun tu lengs spyod ldan// sbyin bdag zen po' de'agyur te// rin chayang
pos brgyan pa dang// yid 'ongs sangs rgyas zhing yang 'thob// 'dod pas log g.yem yongs spangs na// nyonamos drom zhi bar 'gyur// 'dod chags srid pa'imatshoyang skams// rnam dag sangs rgyas
zhing ma 'thob// sems can rnam pa mang po yang// 'dod pa'i 'dam las 'byin nga la 'gyur// theg chaka'ani rab bkod nas// sa pa'i spyad pa spyod du bcud// rdzun du snyab yongs spang na// 'phags
pa 'debangadang ye shes 'thob// rtag tu bden la smra bar dga'// brdzun du'agyu nga'i sdug bsngal 'jil// chogagacig tshad mar btsugs pas no// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dunamathong/ de brdzun mi smabu
bsgoms pas na// byungachub chen po myur du 'thob// phrama'i ga yongs sbyangs na// dge ba'i chos kyi snod du 'gyur// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun mthong// chad par lta bar yong mi 'gyur
'phags pa'i gsamad dga' ba dngo// rin chen gter gyi gzungs 'thob cing// zabamo ris kyisatsho rig/ myur du blamad byang chub 'thob// gal tezhi gcod cig spangs te// 'jam zhing/
gnyen pa'i tshigasmras na// sems can kun gyis bkur bar 'gyuraM// snga ma'i mi dge'i las kyang zhi// 'khor rnams rtag tu dga' ba dang// byang chub sams dpa'i ston par 'gyur// sangs
rgyas mang po'i spyod yul shes// sa bcu las kyang 'da' b.re'agyur// bkyal par smra ba yongs pas na// mkhas par bkur zhing bla marabyed// gzhan la tshig dus ba kun// yon tan rnam
lnga 'thob par 'gyur// rtag tu 'phags pa'ichog nyan cing// 'phags pa lam tshol spro bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas rgyamatsho yongs rdzogs shing// thams cad mkhyen pa myur du 'thog/ gal te/
chags sems yongs spangs te// 'phags pa rnams la mi smod cing// ngur smrig gyon lamachod pa byed// theg pa gsum gyi byang ba bsgrub// rtag tu num dag zhing du skye//
po ston pa'i gnas su gnas par 'gyur// bla med theg pa la zhon te// rgyal ba'i ye shes myur du 'theb/ gal te gnodasams yongs spangs te// gcig tu byamaMs po'i sems bsgomasan// masham
'daM par bazhag pa'ang myur du 'thob// 'phags pa'i spyod yulamos par 'gyur// rnam dag sangs rgyas zhing du// nyes pa'i skyon rnams kun dang bral// del gnasan byang chub 'athob// gnodasems thams

[: ]cad srung bar bya// ngan par lta ba yongs spangs te// rnam dag dad pa'i sems bsremasan// theg gsum ston lamos byed cing// sangs rgyas kun lamachod pa byed// ngan song kun las yongs thar te// 'phags
pa'i dge 'dun rnams dang phrad/ dbyangub sems dpa'i yon tan ldan// ye shes mchog kyang 'thob par 'gyur// dgu ba bsuye 'asam gyis// byang chub mchog thob 'gyur zhes gsungs
sAms par 'jug dang gzungs rnams dang// sa dang bathongapa skye bar 'gyur// bdag nyid che ba'i 'khor le 'dis// ngan song thams cad rub bcamanas/ sdig pa'i sgrib pa kun kyang ngoms/ myur du byang chub
chenapo thob// 'phags pa shin turgyas pa chenapo sa'i snying pa'i khe le bcu pazhes bya ba las/ dge ba'is kyi lam zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug go/ rigasakyibu gzhon yang byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brang bring gi sbyin pa'i go chachen po'i 'khor lo rnam po bcu yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang rakhorale de dag dang ldan/ thog ma sems bskyed panas/

'dod pa lta yongs su bsal te nyan thos dang rangasangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu'adas nus/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi senganams kyizhing chen por 'a grubrab dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas/

kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyisamachod pa dang/ srung ba dang/ bsan bkur byed pa 'gyur ro// bcugang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bras dang/ skom dang/ gos dang/ zhe po che'i rgyan dang/ ba glang dang//
rtadang/ shing rtangang/ lus kyi yan lag dang/ rkang pa dang/ lag pa dang/ rna ba dang/ sna dang mgo dang/ mig dang/ rkang dang kladapa dang pags pa dang rus pa dang/ shadang/ brag dang/

yul dang/ srid dang/ bu ngang/ chungs dang/ bran bo dang/ bran mo dang/ khang khyimadung/ zhing 'brog la sogs po de dag thams cad sbyin pa du re re byedan/ lus dang srog la mi lta zhid/ bdug gcig pu 'jig

rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba 'dod pa'iphyirjesams bsladad spen pabyed pam yin gyi/ sems can thams cad la byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen po'i mgubaskyod pa'i phyir sprin pa spen pa'i

sems skyed do// thabasamakhas pa dang/ shes rab mig bskyed pa'i phyir zhe pasbyin pa'i sems skyed do// sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyi'i spyin pa sngon pasims spyod do// sems/
na thams cad kyi sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyi spyin pa sbyin pasags spyad do// gzhanalas sngag gosAm pamed pa'i sems dang/ brgya ba mad pa'i sems dang/ phrag dog/

po mdang 'i soms dang/ ser sna dang zhum pa midapa'i sems kyis srin po spyin no// gangasbyin pa'i dngos po yang rung/ nga yang rung/ chung ngunaza/ngagacig tsam gyi spyin pa byas na yang/ rnam bar sinapa/

ma 'bras bu lami'i bar sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sems skyed do// nyan thos kyi thego ba'i 'bras bu la ma bar sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sems skyid do// rang sangs kyi theg pa'i 'bras bu la ma bar sbyin pa sbyin ba'i/

s+sa sems skyed do// gang phyin pa'i dngos po de tsho yang 'ang/ ngayang ngung chung ngu na than ngagacigatsam gyisinapa byas na yang/ rnam pa thamasacad mkhyen pa'iye shes su bsngo zhing/ sbyin pa sbyin pa'i man
skyad do// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thang brengegi spyin pa'i go ngan po'i'akhor lo rnam pa bcu po de dag dang ldan/ thog sems skyed ban ) 'dod po rnam po lnga yo sas
bsal ba'i phyir/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu'adas bdang/ nyan thos dang rangasangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams chen po'i zhing du'agyurab dang/ nyan thos dang rangesangs

rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod cing bsnyen bkur bya ba dang/ yongs su srung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyirezhen/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis sbyin pa sbyin pa'isims bskyed pa ni byams pa

dang snying rje chen po'i bsamadakyi/ bdag gi dbul ba desang ba dang/ bdag sdug bsngal las thar pa dang/ bdag bad ba thob par bya ba dang/ brtag mya ngan las 'dar bar bya ba'i phyir sbyin pa byed de//
sems can thams cad kyi phyir sbyin pa byed pa nis yin no// byang chub semaso dba' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin parishums pa dang/ snying rjen po'i sems kyis sems can thams cad kyi
dbul 'phongs spong ba dang/ samos canathams cad sdug bsngal las gdonapa dang/ sams can thams cad bde ba thob bar byed ba dang ! sems can thams cad mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir sprinapa byed
kyi bdag 'ba' zhig gi phyi phyin pa spyod pa ma yin no// de lta bas na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad lasashin du 'dus pa/ nyan thos dngadzad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams
kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi thog pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang bstan bkur byedacing/ yongs su srung b.ra'agyur// byang chub sems dpa'asams duba'
chenapo gang thang phing go spyin pa'i parol tu phyin pa 'a spyod pa na/ 'dodapa rnam lnga'i mchog bsamasam chags te/ bdag nyid ngabang ba bdaba'i yo byadathams cad sems can kun la sbyin pa byed de//
sams can thams cad yongs su sdud pa 'i sems dang/ bdag gi sdug bsngalathams cad 'tsho snyam pa'i bzod parisoms dang sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar bya ba'ims dang/
[w]/ @#// sems can thams cad la bde ba sbyin pa sems dad/ sems can thams cad mya ngan las bzla ba'i sems la gnas te sbyin pa byed do// de bas nyan thos dang rang
[>sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa// nyan thos dang rangasas rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhingan bor 'gyur ba dang/ nyan thos dang rang sa rgyas kyi theg bab thams cad kyi mchod
ba dang/ bsAnabakur dang/ srung ba byed par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gal te 'dod pa lnga la samasAmi chags shing byams pa dang snying rjen pos sbyin b byedan/ byang chub sems dpasems/

dang 'a chen po zhes bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod zhums kyi zhing yang dag pa zhes bya'o// gal te 'jig rten gyi 'dod pa rnam lnga yang ma spangs la/ byams pa dngasnying rjechan

po yang med par sbyin pa byedan/ sbyin pa'i dngos po tshad mad grangs med dpag du med pa btang yang/ byang chub semasadapa' sems dpa' chen po zhes mi bya ste de nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi bsod nams

kyi zhing yang dag pa yang m yin pas/ sbyin pa 'di ni 'phags pa rnamasakyi phyag rgyusabab bam yin no/ dri bsanu'ajig rtasha gyi 'dodapa lnga spangs te/ byams pa dang snying rje chen po dngaldan ng/sa srin pa
bya'o// gal te 'jig rten gyi 'dod pa lnga yang m spangs la/ byams pa dang snying rje chen po ya ngamadapar sbyin pa byedan/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes kyang mi byal/ bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa
yang m yin no// rigs kyi bu 'dod pa rnam lnga la rlugs pa sa skyin pa byedan/ bdag nyid kyi lus kyi sdug bsngal gyi rlung zad kyang zhib mi 'gyuran/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal tshad med pa
bsal ba lta ci smos/ denas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ zang zing sbyin pa'i 'khor laldan pa// mkhas pa
bsal pa dag pa'i mos pas// 'dod brnam lnga dag ni spyas te// sems can kun la phan dang bde byed// sems can kun la bde ba'i phyir gyi// rnamasmina'abras bu re phyiras yin// sprin pa'i dngos pobyin
nga chung yang// yang dag bsod rnams zhing du de 'gyur// sbyin pa'i dngos po mang du byas kyang// 'dod pa rnam lnga dag la gnas na// 'phags pa dag gi phyag rgyas ma brtag/ ma nges pa yi tshogs lags
'gyur// sbyin pa'i dngos po byin pa chung yang// 'dod bsngal mi gnas pa ni// nyan thos dang nirang rgyal ba yi// yang dag bsod nams zhing dpo'agyur// dbas 'dodapa malnga spangs pa// rtag tu

nas dag sbyin pa byed cing// sems can kun 'abadebubyas n// yang dgabs/da nams zhing dud 'gyur// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dang 'ganas dang ba chen po nges kyi sbyin ba'i go ngan po'i 'khor

po rnam ba bcu yod de/ byang H bsams ngang lngasams dpa' chen po 'khor/ de dang ldan n/ thog ma mas bskyedanas 'dod pa rnamalnga longs su bsal ba'i phyir/ myur du t+tim sgronama'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting
khubya nge 'dzin thob cing/ nyanathegs dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu'adas pa// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams chen po 'i zhing du'agyur bdang/ nyan thos dang/
po rang sangs rgyas kyi theg ba pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang/ bsrung ba dang/ bsnyen bkur byas ba/'gyur ro// bcu gang zhen/ 'diwAste/ dubazhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bstan pa dam pa'i chos

sa 1na thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i dam pa ris dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i sa dang/ theg pa chen po dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos dang/ 'jig rtan gyi chos dang/ 'jig rten las
'das pa'i sa dang/ thug pa dang bcas pa'i chos dang/ zag pa zad pa'i sa dang/ 'dus byas kyi sa dang/ 'dus ma byas kyi sa dang gnyis su med pa'i chos rnams te/ byung tshubasams/
dpa' sems dbar chen po sa rnam pa bcu po 'di la dad cing gus pa byed pa dang ji skad thos pa rnams gzungs su 'dzanicang yid la byed do// rab tu rtog go/ mthar khong duchud par byed cing/ gzhan
ngag la yang ci rigs par ston par byed do/ nAm chos ston pa'i tshan/ brag dog med pa'i sams dang/ bar snamed pa'i sems dang/ nga rgyal med pa'i sam sa dang/ rnyed par mi ri ba'i sams dang/
gzhan mi smad pa'i sems dang/ bdagamibastod pa'i sems dang/ bsdu stangadang bcas pa'i sems dang/ phan pa'i sems dang/ byams pa chen pa'i sems dang/ snying rje chen po'i sems
su bya'o ]1na thos kyi theg pa can gyi gang zug la nitan thas kyi chos ston cing 'ad kyi de la rang sangs rgyas kyichos sam/ theg pa chen po'i chos kyis ma yin pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi thog

pa can gyi gang ga la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i sa ston gyi/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'i rkyes sam/ theg ba chen po'i chos kyis kha yin pa dang/ theg pa chen po'i gad khragalani theg pa chen po'i sa

snyanagyi/ 2nagros dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos kyisam yin pa dang/ sems can gyi dbang bo dang snod ji lta ba bzhin dudam pa'i u0f7csa ston gyi/ dbang po snod dum gyur pa la chos mi ston to// gang
thag pa chen po'i sems can la rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa spyodacig b.raram/ zhan thos kyi theg pa spyod cig bar skul lo// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can gyis mas nal skabs ba cig tu thug

pa na ba'i spyod ba la nan tan byos shig ces bskul ba'i skabasani yod do// nyan thos kyi theg ba can gyisams na la skabs kha cig turadasangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i spyod pa dang/ theg pa chen pa'i spodapa
la nan tan gyis shig ces bskul ba'i skabs kyang yod do// dbazhinagashegs pas bstan pa'i dam pa'i chos chung dun tshigs su bcad pa gcig gam/ tshigs su bcad pa phyadatsanal yang shin dud
cing bkur sti byed kyi/ del 'phya bo 'am 3 skur ba'am/ bgagasasam bar chad mi byed do/ chos ston pa la sangs rgyas dang 'dra bar 'du shes pa dang/ chos nyan pa'i 'khor rnams la nad pa dang 'dra bar
'dushes pa dang/ gang 'chad pa'i chos la snyan bzang po dang 'dra ba 'dushesangashing/ 'dod pa rnam lnga yos su bcad de de ra bamed pas dam pa'i chos ston to// rigs kyi bu 'di
[>dag ni byang chub sems dpa'asomasadapa' chen po'i chos kyi sbyin pa go nganapo'i 'khorale rnam ba bcu zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'anyenapo gang thakho yod dang ldan n/'dodapa lnga
'a yongs su bsal te/ myur du ma'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nga'adzin thobacing/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu'adas pa dang/ nyan thos dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sod
nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba dang/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyisamachod pa dang/ srung ba dang/ ban bka'abyed bar 'gyur yo ga/ denas bcom ldan bs
kyis don 'di dag gsal ba bzlas par phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ mkhas pa chos kyi sbyin bskyed pa dwag/ snodabazhin theg pa gsum gyi chos ston to// thugapa gzhanadag de'aso/
zhi mi byed// thos nas de la 'phro zhing skur mi 'gyur// dbang po skyod bzhin dam pa'i chos ston gyi// dbang po u0f8bsnodamin dag la ma yin no// sosoradzolta ji la mos pa bzhin// ded de yos ston
skag pa byed/ theg ban po spyod pa'i gong brag la// theg pa chung ngu rnams kyi chos mi ston// b.rab theg pa gnyis kyi gang zag la// theg pa 'bring dang rab kyi chos ston to// shin tudad cing gus pas
chosamanyan gyi// dela' pa zhing sku bzhi 'o// chos smra ba la mchod pa byed bani// sangs rgyas 'bar de la 'du shes brgyud// kun nas nyon mongs pa yind bsal phyir// dam pa'i chos kyi snyan dag
man pa bskul/ khe dang grags bshin tu'ang ma ngas te// dam pa'i chos dag bstanaci bshadabarubya'o// rigs kyi bu bzhanayang byung chub sems dpa' sems dang 'dun po tshul khrims rnam par
dag pa'i go chan bor 'khor la yod da/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo dodang ldan n/ thogamasams bskyed nas 'dod pa lta yongs su bsal te/ nyan thos dadarang sas
rgya sa thams cad lasan tu 'das pa/ kanathos dang rangasas rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyizhing chen bo 'gyurab dang/ na thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyi mchod pa dang/

bsrung ba dang/ bgAnam su ra byed par 'gyur 'o// de la ji ltakhanatshul khrims rnam par dag pa go chen po'i 'khor lo gangazhen/ rigasakyi bu byang chub sems dba'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa rnam pa gnyis te/

na mong ba dang/ thun mongs yin pa'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khris rnam par dag pa'i 'khor lo thun mong ba gang zhen/ gang yanaganas pa dge bsnyen pha dang/ dge bsnyenaa'i tshul khrims kyi

sdom pa blangs pa// sangan rab du byung bso sothar pad+me hU~Ml khrims kyis bsnyen pa ra rdzogs pa ste/ sngom pa 'di dang so so thar pa'i tshul phrims 'din) byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i 'khor
[7]@#// le thun mong sta/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ba yin no// byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi 'khor le rnam par dag pa 'di'i debang gis/ sems can//
thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mos pa spyod par ram/ log par lta bsal bar la/ las kyi sgrib pa dang/ 'khor ba las grol bar mi 'gyur te/ go rma chan pa'i 'khor 'gazhas kyang m bya/ byang b sems dpa'/

'a sems dpa' chen pa zhes kyang mi bya ste de nyan thos dang rangasangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod namasakya zhing yang dag ba yang ma yin no/ (nga la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa gong bo'i
'khor lo thunamong ma yin pa gang zhen/ gangabyangugasems dpa'a rnams phyogs bcu'i sams can thams cad l mnyamapa nyid kyi sems dang/ gnod pa mar pa'i sems dang ) len du'adzinabamar ba'i/
sems kyis rnam par rtog pa'i tshul khrims srung// tshul khrims dang/ la khrims ngan pa can dang/ sbyin pa dang/ sar sna dang/ byams pa dang/ zhe sdang ba dang/ brtson 'grus dang lel/
smracan rab 'bring tha ma kun la bye brag mi 'byed pa'i sems dang/ khyadapamed pa'i 'du shes kyis tshul khrims yongs su spung ngo// khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad la zhe sdang med pa dang khong

khromod ba dang/ ngan pa la spyod ba mdapas tshul khrims yongs su srung ngo// srid pa gsum gyi phung po dang/ khams dang/ sku mched rnam par rtog pa mngapas tshul khrims yongs su srung ngo// 'dod ba'i khams lami
[/]gnas par tshul khrims spud de// gzugs yod palikhams la gnas par tshul khrims srung ngo// gzugs med pa'i khams la miganas bar tshul khrims srung ngo// sridapa'i ma par smin pa'i 'brasabu/
thams cad la mi gnas ba tshul khrims srung// rnyed pa dngami nadab lam gas bar tshul khrims srung// 'du byeda rnams lami gnas bar tshul khrims srung ste/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i

tshul khrims rnam pa 'dug pa go cha chen po lo'akhor lo thun mong ma yin pa zhes bya'o// rdzogs kyi bu byengachub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po gang+gatshul khrims rnam par dag pa go mtshonapo'i 'khor le
'di dang ldan n/ thog mkhems bsunganas/ 'ded pa 2 yongs su bsal te/ byang rlabasems dang 'asems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// nyan thos dang 'dasangs rgyas thams cad laMs shin tus
shing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhingen por 'gyurab dang/ nyan thos dungarangasangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchodapa dang/ srung bdang/ bstanabakur byed
pa 'gyuralo/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyirogs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ khyiman gnas shing sdom pa len pa// rab byung so so tharab 'i tshul khrims//
theg pa gnyis dang mong ba yin// byang chub chen po zhes namakhye// mkhas ba stong pa nyid blos sgom pa// 'jig rten kun la mi na mi gnas// srid pa kun la gnas mo yin par// rnam poradag pa'i
tshul khrims srungang/ mtshanam song ba'i tshul khrims dag ni// rtags bzhed de thug pakun med// tshul khrims 'di ltarasrung ba dag ni// mngadag bsod nams zhing zhes de/
[>bya// gis kyi bung/ zhan yang byang bsams dpa' sems dpa 'chan po 'i bzod ba'i go cha chen po ri boralo nas bya ba yod de/ byabub sems dpa' sems dpa' zhapo ganga'akhor lo 'di dang
'a ldan n/ thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dodapa lnga shos su bsal te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ nyan thos dang rangasangs rgyas thams cad kyidanams kyi zhing
lha por 'gyur ba dang/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyisamad pa dang/ srung dang/ bsAn ku byadapa 'gyura'o// dal ji ltar na bzopa'i go chachanabo'il khoraleg/ngan
na: rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i babod pa la mchinanyidarnam ba gnyis te/ gabazhin/ 'jig rtan dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'ji/
rtanagyi bgrodapa gang zhe na/ de zag pa dang bcas pa'i ba bod pa ste// sems can la dmigs pa/ len pa dang bcas pa// mtshanam dang bcas pa/ rnam par sminaba'i 'bras bu la brten pa/
bso danams kyi las la brten te bzod b.rabyed ba'o// gzhan yang bdag gi gzugs dang/ sgadang/ dri dang/ ro dang/ reg bya la brtan nas bzod par byedapa'o// 'jug pa dang bcas pa'i
bzod pa ci mi snyam pa med pa'i bgrod pa dang/ mthu zhan pa'i bzodapa sems can gangab babyed pa dang/ g.yo dang sgyur bcas pa'i bzod pa dang/ pha rol la 'dud pa'i bzad ba dang/ semasacan/
la phan pa dang bde ba'i don mi byed pa'i bzod pa ste/ 'di deg nibudachub sems dpar 'jig rtenagyi bsred pa zheso bya sa/ bzod pa 'dimi na thos dang rang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dang
thunamong ba yin gyi/ go chachen po'i 'khor lazha mibya'o// denibyang bsams dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang ma yin te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyus thams cad kyi bsod namasakyi
zhingaang dbab zhes kyang mi bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang rlub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bzodab go cha chen po'i 'khorale gang zhe na/ thag pa chad pa'i bzod pa sta 'phags ba
thams cad kyi tshes chen po la'od kyis sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyiphyirags baudapa'athodapa dang/ bya ba'i dngos po thams cad dang/ tshig dusba ba dang/ rgyu dang/
mtshanam dang/ yage dang/ sgra skad thams cad yongs su bcad pa'i sku mchedal brten pa'i bzod pa la spyod do// bzod pa 'dibasgoms pas/ kun nas nyon mongs pa gsum dang/ bskalaparnam gsum/
dang mtshananyid gsum dang/ dus gsum dang/ sridapa gsum dang 'dubyedarnam gsum dang/ mi de ba'i nub gsum ngachu bo bzhi dang ]mdudab rnam bzhi dang/ nye bar len pa bzhi dang/ las
kyimadudapa rnam bzhi la sogs pa yongs su bcad pas/ bathod pa 'dibasgom pa'i tsho sams dang yid rab tu zhi bas/ 'di ni byang chub sems duba'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
go cha chen po'i 'khor lobazed pa zhes bya'o// gas kyi bu byang d+hAb sems dba'asems dpa' chen po go cha chenapo'i 'khor lo'i bodapa dedungaldan ngs thog ma soms bskyed panas/ 'dod pa rnam lnga yongs
su bsal ba'i phyir/ byongachub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa zhes bya'o// nyan thos dang bsangs rgyas thams cadu las shin tu'adas shing/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhib
chen por 'gyurab/ nyan thos dung sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang/ bsrung ba dang bsnyanabakur byed par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar
bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa// bgrod pa la nirnam pa gnyis te/ mtshams bcad dang mtshanAm med pa// mtshan marab tsas nga'i babrong pa chags yod/ ]mkhas pa dag ni de lamistod
'du byed rnam gsum phung po khams dang// skye mched la brtabazodang bsgom pa// de ni brag bcas bzed pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po ma yin// phyin ci log pa rnam bzhi bsal nas//
chagos pa med pa'i bzod pa sgom zhing// 'du byed rnam pa gsum dag zhin ]/bzod pa 'di la thams cad bstod 'gyur// 'du byed thams cad rab tu zhizhing// rtog pa thams cad yongs su spangs te/
tha/ senus mamakha' 'dra b.ramanyam pa// bzodapa 'di la thams cad bstod 'gyur// thams cad+hA sa la ro gcig 'dun par// byung ba mnam med pa'i zhib// semasaci 'ang mi gnasatshigs/
bashradapa padi'i phanadon cher 'gyur// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi go chanapo ri'akhorale yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' na

po gang 'khoralo re dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed pa nas 'dod pa la yongs su bsal te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu'angs ba/ nyan thosadongar sangs rgyasaThacad kyi bsod namA
kyi zhing chen por 'gyurab dang/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang/ srung ba dang/ bsAn bkur byed par 'agyuraro// dal ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi go nabo'i
brtson 'thus grang she na/ rigs kyi bu byang : ba sems dpa' brtson 'grus rnam pa gnyis te/ 'jig rten pa dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'o/ de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten pa'i
'grus gong zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus kyis 'jig rten gyi bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po rnam pa gsum la nan tan byang ngo// gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta
spyan ba byed pa'i bsod nams kyi las dang/ tshul khrims srung ba'i bsod nams kyi las dang/ bsgom pa'i bsod nams kyi byed pa 'das so// las de deg byed pa ni brtson 'grus rnam pa gsum zhes
bya ste brtson 'grus rnam pa 'di dag ni/ sems can 'di gnadamigs pa/ ! zag pa dang bcas pa/ nye bar len pa dang bcas pa/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu la brtenab/

[>bsod nams kyi las la brtenab ste/ danibyang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi brtson 'gras zhes bya'o// brtson 'grus 'di'i nyan thos dang bsangs kyi theg pa la sogs dang thun mong yin te/ gochachen po'i

'khor le zhes mi bya/ byang ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang mi bya ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thamasacad kyi bsod nams kyi zhingayang dag pa yang m yin no// del ji ltaranabyang chub
sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa/ ribartson 'grus kyi go cha napa'i 'khorale gang zhen/ byang chub sems dpa' rtag shin tu 'badapa'i brtson 'grus kyis sems canathams cad la mnyam pa'i grems
kyis/ nyon mongs pa'i las dang sdug bsngal thams cad sel ba ste/ brtson 'grus 'di ni 'phags pa thams cad kyis bsngags pa/ thag pa med pa/ dazhe bar len pa med pa// rten dang gnas med de//
brtson 'grus dang/ le lo dang/ sbyin pa dang/ sor stsa dang tshul khrims dang/ zhapa'i tshul khrims can dang byams pa dang/ zhesngang dang/ sems can 'badung/ 'bring dang/ tham kun la ma 'byed/
pa'i sams dang/ bye brag mdapale'angushes kyis shin tu'abad pa'i brtson 'grus rtsomamo// khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid dang/ dmigs pa mang sa bya ba'i las byed do/
! sba ba dang/ rtog pa dang/ dpyod pa'i gnas thams cad ' mi gnas pa'i sems kyis shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom mo// srid pa gsum gyi phung ba dang khams dang/ skyems rnam par rtag/
pa mdabs shin tu'abadapa'i brtson 'grus rtsom sta/ 'dod pa'i khams la mi gnas pa'i 'bad pa'i brtsona'agrus dang/ gzugs yod pa'i khams la mi gnas pa'i 'badapa'i brtson 'grus dang/ gzug
mad pa'i khams 'bami gnas pa'i 'badang mi brtson 'grus dang/ srid pa'irnam bdu smin pa'i 'bras bu thams cad la mi rtog pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang/ dad pa dngam red pa kun lami gnas
pa'i'abad pa'i brtson 'grus dang 'du byed rnams la miganas par 'bad ba'i brtson 'grus dang/ 'jig rten gyi bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos bo gsum la miganas pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang/
'jig rten las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po rnam pa gsum la shin tu rtson 'grus rtsom// 'dini byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i brtson 'grus kyi go d+hachenapa'i
'khor lo zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bubyang bsams dang rasams dpa' chen po gangabartson 'grus kyi go cha chen pori'akhoral dadag dang ldan n thogam sems bskyedanas 'dod pa rnam lnga yongs su bsal te/

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' na bo zhi bya'o/ zhan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu'adas ta nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du'agyur ba dad/ nyan thos dngarang sangs rgyas
kru// kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang/ srung ba dang bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// denas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar babs pa'i phyir
[>>tshigs su bcad dbaka' stsal pa// dbang po drug la shin tu gas pa'i// byis ba bo lngasani khyerab/ shin tu 'bad pa'ibartson 'grus rtsom yang// mkhas pa rnams kyis de la smod 'gyur// sems can dmig
kha shing hrag dang bcas la// len par bcasashingabartson 'grus rtsoman// yang dag bsod nams zhing ma yin te// byang chub sems dpa' dpom yin// mkhas pa ban 'grus rtsom pa dag ]/rmugs pa
thams cad ring du sus te// sems ni rtse la'ang yi gnasami gus// yang dag bsod nams zhing zhes dbya// ming dang gzugs la gas pa mad cing/ phung po khams dang skya mdasbyangs te// thams
cad 'khor gyi rten du 'gyur ba// 'di na ngeng bsams dpa' chen po// 'jig rten spyokyang bla bzhin te// 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i mthar phyin// 'khor lo 'di ni yongs su bcom
skye bo kun nas nyonamos bcings pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi go cha chen pori bor le yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po gang 'khor lo 'di ngaldan n/ thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod ba lnga yongs su bsal te nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das nas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyasathams
cad kyi bsod nams kyi mi chen por 'gyur dang/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang/ sul ba dang/ bsAn bkur byed par 'gyur ro// de la ji ltaran bsam gtan gyi gam
chen po'i 'kho rale gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan la rnam pa gnyis te ! 'jig rten dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'o// de la ji ltaran byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi
bsam gtan gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams phung po la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang/ khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang/ skyemachod la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang/
'dod pa'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang/ gzugs yod pa'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang/ sdom pa
gsum la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang/ rnam par grol ba gsum la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi laganas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang/ yang dag par spong ba/
gzhi la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnasanas bsam gtan sgom pa dang/ dang po lnga la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang/ stobs lnga la gnas nas bsam gtan
sgom pa dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdunal gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas nas bsam gtan bsgom pa dang sa'ikhams la gnas nas bsam gtan
gom pa dang/ chu'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang ! marikhams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang/ rlung gi khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang/
[>nam mkha'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang/ rnam par shes pa'i khamasal gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang/ bde ba'itsi ba la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang/ sdug bsal ba'i
'a tshor ba la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang/ bde ba yam yin sdug bsngal ba angam yin pa'i tshor bu la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang/ nam mkha' mthar yas skye mched lcaganas nas bsam gtan
sgom pa dang/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la gnas nas bsam gtanas+saMm pa dang/ nyung bradamad pa'i sku mched la gnas nasabasam gtan sgom pa dang/ 28shesamad 'du shes mi na skye mched pa gnas bsam
gtanAsgom pa dang/ 'jig rtan 'di la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang/ 'jig rten pha rol la gnasanas bsam gtan sgom pa dang/ 'dushes rlung la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang/
pa 'dushes chen po la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang/ 'du shes tshad med pa 'dra gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa ste/ bsam gtan de ngagazhi zag pa dang bcas pa/ nyabar len pa dang/
bcas pa/ chags pa dang bcas pa ste/ 'di nibyang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten dang bcas ba'i bsam gtan zhes bya'o// bsam gtan 'di nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang thunamong bzhas

'a bya sta/ gachan po'i 'khor len yin/ byang chub semasadang 'asams dpa' chen pa nas mi bya ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa yang ma yin no// de la dziltacan
byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das po'ibasamagatani gang zhe na/'di lta sta byang chub sems dang 'a rnams phung pa dang bral ba ra ba mgatan sgom pa dang/ khams dang bral ba bsam gtan
gom pa dang/ skum da dang bral ba bsam gtan sgom ba dang/ 'dod pa'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang/ gzugs kyi khams dang srol badra bsam gtan sgol ba dang/ gzugasamadang 'bams/
dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang/ sdom pa gsum dang brel ba bsam gtan sgom pa dang/ rnam par thar pa gsum dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang bral bar
bsam gtan sgom ba dang/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi dngul ba bsam gtan sgom pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi kung pakhazhi dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang/ dbang po lnga dang bral bsam gtan sgom pa dang/
stobs ldadangubalab grab sam gtan sgom pa dang/ byang+gatshul kyiyan lagabadun dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dbul bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang/ sa'i khams
dang bral b.rab sam gtan sgom dang/ tshulikhams dang bral bsam gtan sgom pa dang/ malikhams dngaba' bar bsam bsgom pa dang/ rlung gi khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgos pa dang/ namamakha'i
khams dang bral bar bsam gtanasgom pa dang/ rnam par shes pa'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtanasgom pa dang/ bde bar rmo ba dang bral ba bsam gtan sgom pa dang/ sngag bsngal du

[>cho phu dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang/ sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba dang bral ba bsam gtan sgom pa dang namamakha' mtha' yas skye mched dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang

'tsha rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dngubral ba bsam gtan sgom pa dang/ chung thadamad pa'i mdadang bralabakrab samagatanasgom pa dang/ 'du shes med 'du shes med minaskye mched dang phral babasam gtan
sgomapa dang/ 'jig rtena'adi dang bral ba bsam gAtan sgom pa dang/ 'jig rten pha rol dang bral ba bsam gtan sgom pa dang/ 'du shes rlung ngudang bral ba bsam gtan sgom pa dang/ 'du shes chen po
dang lab bsam gtan glog pa dang/ 'du shes tshad med pa dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom ba ste/ bsam gta'adi ni'aphags pa'i 'od zer napa sudapa/ zag pa zadabamed pa/ nyo ba len bzhi/
pa[& ]pa/ gis bshad pa ste/ 'din byang bsams dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das ba'i bsam gtan gyi go rman pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang
bsam gtan gyig chenapore'akhopale 'di dang ldan n/ thog ma sems bskyang nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te byang chub sems dpa' sas dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// zhan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad

[p/ ]lasangashin du'adusu shing/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du'agyur ba dang/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang/ srung ba dang/ bsnyanabakur byedapa

'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bablus ba'i phyire tshigs su gcad dang ko' stsal ba/ bdag gi khur lci spong ba'i phyir// dmigs dngabacas pa'i ting 'dzin bsgoms te// bdagagika/

nas shomos gcod 'dod// yang dag mkhas ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin// snod la rten cingartog dang bcas pa// rnam par grol 'dod de nga'adzin sgom yang// tshurol pha rol mu la gnasan// sems canadag la phan don/
byengamin// sems can kun la phanadang bde phyir// ting 'dzin sgom zhing khur lci spangs te// kun nas nyon mos thams cad sel ba// denayang dgamakhas pa'i mats+tshan nyid// sems can thams cad sam par

byed phyir// mi gnas pa yi ring 'dzin bsgoms te// 'dod pa'i srid pa thams cad chod nga// de ni blo gros chenapo zhes bya// srid pas bcis pa thams cad bkrol te// 'jigs pamed pa'i grong du gzung phyir//
rab tu zhiba'i ting 'dzin bsgom pa// de'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po'o/// 'dus ba chen po las/ byang chub sems dang lasa'i snying bo'i 'khor la bcu pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen
bo'amado bam po bcu pa// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dang re masadapa' tshan pa shes rab kyi go cha chen po 'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba yod de/ byang bu sams dpa' sems dpa' chenapo//
gapa'akhor la de dpaldan n/ thogam sams bskyed nas 'dod pa lnga longs su bsal te 3na thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das shing/ mthos dang rang sangs rgyas

ba thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chab ra'agyur ba dang/ nyan thos dad rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa shams cad kyis mchod pa dang srang ba dang/ bsAn bkur byed par 'gyur ro// de la ji ltar na shes bkyig
yaM chachenapo'akhor 'gang zhen/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab nirnam pa gnyis/ 'jig rtanadang 'jig rtan las 'das pa'o/ dal ji ltar na byang bsams dpa'i 'jig rten pa'i

smA shes rab can/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams theg pa gsum gyi dam pa'i chos klog pa dang/ 'don pa dang/ glegs bam du 'drib pa/ nyan pa dang/ ba rol la ston cing 'chad pa'a' zhig la rten te
bsams can thams cad kyis rig pa 'amun pasal bar 'dod pa dang/ sems can thams cad kyi shes rab kyi sgronamadabyung ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i nyan thosakyi theg pa dngaldan pa chos

shin tu 'bad pa brtson 'grus kyis klog pa dang/ 'don pa dang 3 nyan ba dang/ glegs bam du 'drib dang/ gzhanal rgyas bar stan cing rand pa dang/ yang dag pa'i brtson 'grus kyis nan tan byed pa dang/ bzhin

gshegs ngos bstan pa'i rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i chos la klog pa dang/ 'don pa dang nyan pa dang/ glegs bamadu 'bidang/ gzhan la ston cinga'acham dang yang dag pa'i brtson 'grus kyisazhan tan

du spyod do// de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i theg pa chen po dang ldan pa'i chos la brtson 'grus su klog pa dang/ 'don pa dang/ nyan pa dang/ glegs bam du 'dri ba dang/ gzhan yang rgyas par stonaci 'chad pa dang//
yang dag pa'i brtson 'grus kyis nan tan byed pa ste/ 'phags pa thog pa mad pa'i lam gyi yan lag tshol ba ma yin/ 'phags par 'aa myol bas yin/ 'phags pa'i lam du gtogs pa'i rnam par grol ba

tshol ba ma yin/ rab tu zhing yang dag pa'i shes rab lanan tan byed pa ma yin te/rtag dulta ba dang bcas pa mtshanam dang bcas ba rishesarang 'anan tan byed de// deltaralen pa dang bcas pa/ rgyags pa dang bcas

pa'i shes rab ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi shes rab ces bya'o// shes rab de renyanathos dada'ang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ba yin te/ go ngan po'i 'khor lo zhes mi bya/ de la byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang ming ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thamasacad kyi bsod rnams kyizhing yang dag pam yin no// de la jiltaranabyang u0f74ba sems dpa'i 'jig rta'as 'das pashos
rab can/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub kyilam la brtson 'grus su nan tan byed pa na/ nyinus su theg pa gsum gyi yang dag pa'i sa la klog pa dang/ 'don pa dang da2nang dang/ glegs
bam du 'drib dang// gzhan la rgyus bar ston cing 'chad kyang/ de la dmigs su med pa'i phyogs gal gnas te migayo ba dang/ mi rtag pa dang/ dpo nyid med pa dang/ nam mkha' lta bu'i mas dang/ rab tu
[@]// zhi pa'i sa zhag dang/ 'phel ba dang 'grib pa med pa re shes rab dang/ chags pa med pa'i sems dang/ skye ba dang 'gog pa med pa'i sems dang/ phyi na ldog pa'i sems dang/ chos masham
panyid kyi shems dang/ de bzhin nyid kyi soms dang : yang dag pa'i mtha'i sems dang ! chos kyi dbyings kyi sems dang/ bdag med pa'i sems dang/ rnam par mi rtog pa'i soms dod/ rab tu zhi ba dang//

'thong thod pa dang/ rtog pa dang bral b.risams kyis grub pa dang 'jig pa med pa ris dngashin tuthabasam khas pas bde brdzaganas pa dang/ mi gnas pa mi chags pa'i mchog dam pa 'i blo gros kyis la thabs mkhas

glu pa sa bde bar gnas pa ste/ shes rab 'din len pa med la chags pa mad pas/ byang chub sems dang 'i 'jig rten las 'das pa ri shes rab kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 'di dang ldan n/ thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes
'o[Y]nyan thos dang rangasangs rgyas kyis las shin tu 'das shing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen po 'gyur ba dang/ nyan thos dang bas sa rgyus thams cad kyis
mchod pa dang/ bsrung ba dang/ bsnyen bkur bya ba'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa'i go chachen po'i 'khor le yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems

[&]/ dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo 'didang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa lta yongs su bsal te 3 nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin du'adas nas/ nyan shas dad rang sangs rgyas thams cad

kyiyasod nams kyi zhing u0f7anapoja'agyur ba dang/ nyan thos dang 'ang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa po thams cad kyis mchod pa dang/ srungab dang/ bstanabakur byedapar 'gyur ro// de la ji ltaran thabasamakhas pa'i go
chenapo'i 'khor lo gangazhen ! rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i thabs mkhas pa la rnam pa gnyis te/ 'jig rtan pa dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'o// ngel jiltar byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten ba'i
thabasamakhas pa gang yin zhe na/ 'delta// byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdag gi don nam/ gzhan gyi rimanam/ gnyis ka'i don la bdag dang gzhan du rtog cing/ bzo dang sgyu rtsal rnam pa sna tshogs/

kyis/ ba dag dang gzhan gyi donayongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos lamachod pa dang bsnyano bkur byed pa dang pa dang/
ma dang/ nad pa dang/ nyam thag pa dang mgono dang rganamed pa dang gnod pamang pos sdug bsngal bar gyur pa mthongan/ shin du thabs mkhas pas sgrol zhing/ bsdu ba'i dngos po rnamang zhes sems can

yongs su sminapar byed do// byang chub sems dpa' dbadag theg pa chen po la gnas pas/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi thag pa pa dang/ theg pa chen po'i snodam yin pa nyan thos dang
[7/©]/ rasangs rgyas kyi dbang po yongs sum smin pa la shin tu phul brab pa/ dam pa'i chos ston de slob tu gzhug pa dang/'phags pa'ibasam gtan lonan tan byed du gzhug go/ gzhan yang

don dam pa'i bden pa bstanate/ nan tan byedadugazhug po dang/ phyin cing ga ba'i las 'da' zhing mi ltung ba'ichos kyi mtshananyid rig par byab dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa ba'i lagazhol bar bya ba nas/gzhan yang

dranang da bar gzhag pa bang/ yang dag pa spong ba bzhi dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang/ dbang po lnga dang/ stobs lnga dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang/ 'bags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang/ lhagam

blo dngabacas pa dang/ lhagamam lus pa'i lamadang/ lam gyi 'bras bu'i bdadu'ajugapar ba la mkhas pa'i yang shes kyis yongs su smin par byed do// sems can gang khe dang/ grags pa dang/ las spyod la chags te/ dbang

po rgod pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma smin pa lani/ mdo sde dang/ 'dul ba dang/ mamoklog pa dang/ 'don pa byed du gzhug pa dang/ sas rgyas gzhan gyis bshad pa las gzhan pa// rnam par grol ba dang 'thun pa'i gtsug

lag klog cing 'don du bcug ste/ yos su sminapar byed do// sams can gang sbyin pa byedapa lamamos pal/ rin po che dang/ noradabyig rnam pa sna tshogs gtong bar bskul bas yongs su smin par byed do// sems can

gang gtum pa/ mi des pa'i rang bzhin can la tshangs pa'i gnas bzhislob dustsol ba dang/ sems can gang zha sdongacan la bzod pa slob par skul ba dang/ sems can gang le lan la ni brtson 'grus slob par skul
ba dang/ sems canagang sems g.yengs pa la ni bsam gtan sgom par skul ba dang/ sems can gang 'tshal pa'i shes rab can la yang dag pa'i nges ston pas/ bka' lung brda' sprod cing lung 'bog pa
la thabs mkhas pas yongs su smin par byed do// sems can gang dkon mchog gsum la mngon par ma dad cing mi gnas pa la rang mi spyod pa can phani/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang/

dkonamchog gsum la dad pa dang/ dge bsnyen ba'i sdom pa la bslab pa dang/ bsAn gnas pa'i sdom pa bslab pas yongs su smin par byed do// gzhan yang bzo dang sgyu rtsal rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gnasab slob

cingasbyod du bsuMng pas yongs su smin par byed do// de la sogs pa byang ba sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rtan parishin tuthabs mkhas pa'i ye shes kyi rnam pa ni klung gang+ga'i bye ma snyadapas mang ngo//
da lta riyi ge dang/ gtsug lag dang/ bzo dang/ sgyu rtsal gyi las kyi gnas thams cad la lhag pa'i spyod pa dang/ brtson 'gros dang/ thabs mkhas pa'i ya shes kyis mu stagis can dang/ ston pa
gzhan la zhugs pa thams cad btul ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten pa'i thabasamakhas pa'o// thabs mkhas pa 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ba yin te/ gas
rgyas kyis thams cad gzhas pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ thabasemakhas pa sbyad pa'i gnas su gyur pa/ shin tu thabs mkhas pa lhun gyis grub pas rtog bkod pa phyir ldog pa med pa'i sasu gyur ba'o//
gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang gsams dpa' gang ston pa mkhas pa la'angamisnyen/ dag pa'i bshes gnyen la'ang mi ltos par 'dzig rtenagyi thabasamakhas pa'anan tan byedan/ byang
drug sems dpa' de ni 'jig rten gyi thabs mkhas pas rmongs pa yin te/ nasong du ltung bar 'gyur ro// den 'jig rten las 'dus pa'i shin tu thabs mkhas pa'iyi shes la gzhol zhing gnas par yang
'tha mis la/ thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa yang ma yin no// shinatuthabasamiakhas pas/ sems can gyi dbang po dang stod pa'i khyad par yang mi shes la/ shin tu thubasamakhas pa la yang

la rmongs par gyur pas/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang/ rangasangs rgyas kyi thog pa dang/ theg pa chen po'i snodam yin pa dang/ theg pa chen po'i dbang poram smin pa dag la theg pa napo ston pa dang/ slob cing

! nan tan byed du bcugago/ gang theg pa chen po'ichos kyi snod du gyur pa'i sems can la ninyan thos dang/ rung dus rgyas kyi theg pa'i tshesastanacing/ nyan thos dungarang sangs rgyus kyi theg pa la slob
cinan tan byed du bcug go/ gangarang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'icos kyi snod du gyur pa'isims can 'aninyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos ston cinge/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la slob cinganan tan byed dubacug go

gangashan thos kyi theg pa'i zlos kyi snod du gyur pa'isoms can lani'akhor ba'i chos la bde ba dang dga' bar ston te/ 'khor ba'i zlos la skyo bskyed par mi ston te// gzhan yang shin tu thabs mkhas pa la rmongs pas
[/ ]sems can gang srog gcod pa la dga' ba nas/ dbazhin du leg b.ralta ba'i bar dums pa dag lanishin tuthab pa theg pa chenapo'i sa ston te/ de la 'khor ba 'dinas shi 'phos nas pha rol duskya zhing/
sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu rnam pa smin pa myong ba la skyo zhing 'jigs pa dang ! sdig pami dag b.rirIsasong bam ston to// gzhan yang shin du thabs mkhas pa la rmos pas/ sams can gang tshul
khrims srungabar mos pa la ni sbyin pa sprod du bcug go/ sams can gang bzod pa sgom par ms pa wanibabrodapa spong ba ston cing/ tshul khrims srung btsug go/ sems can gang brtson 'grus
rtsom par mos pa la ni brtson 'gros spong ba ston cing/ bzod pa spyod bcug go/ sams can gang bsam gtan sgom pa'ames pa lani bsam gtan spong ba son cing/ brtson 'grus la nan tanabyed du
bcug go/ sems can gangashes rab sgom bar mos pa lanishes rab sdong bton cing/ bsam gtan sgom du bcugago/ de ltar byungachub sems rang la 'jig rten gyi blabs mkhas pa la rmongs
pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin dusams can la phan pa dang bde ba'in byed mi nus te/ sa mas can thams cad kyi sdig pa'i grogs por gyur to// thabasamakhas pa 'din dmigs pa dang bcas pa/
chags ba dngabacas pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi thabs mkhas pa zhes bya ro// de ltar 'jig rten gyi thabs mkhas pa 'di'o nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyasakyi theg
pa dang thun mong ba yin te// go chachen po'i 'khor lem lan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chen po zhes kyang mi bya ste/ 2nathos dang rang sangs rgyas thamasacad kyi bsod
[>nams kyi zhing yang dag pa ma yin no// de' dziltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das parishin tu thabs mkhas pa yin zhen/ 'diltaste/byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdag gdonabatang

gzhan gyi don lha byedabs bzo dang sgyu rtsal rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par ston pas/ yongs su sminapar byabagyi'o da sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang nub sems dpa' dang/nyan thos dang/ rang sangs
sgyu rgyas dang/ pha dngo/ ma la bsnyen bkor dngamachod rabyed pa dang/ nad pa dang/ 'phongs pa dang/ nyam thag par ng mgonadang skyabs med pa dang/ shin tu sdug bsngal ma ba mang pos gzir la thabs
kyis sgrol ba dang : bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam pa bzhis sems can yongs su smin par byed de/ cil mos pa dang/ dbang po dang/ stod lta ba bzhin du sems can la dam pa ris ston to// gzhan yang ris

gyis nyan thos kyithog po ba ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa slobacingan tan byed par skul ba dang/ rang sangs rgyus kyi theg pa'i theg pa rjen po slob cinganan tan byed par skul ba dang/ gal te nyan thos dang rang sangs
rgyas kyi theg bar dbang po ma smin pa lani/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis smos kyis skyobasdon/ 'khor bas skyo bdang mya ngan las 'da' ba tshol bar skul lo// sems canagang srog gcod pa las
nas/ log par lta ba'i bdugs pa la dbang po dang/ rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du 'khor b.ra'akhor ba'i chos ston pa dang/ 'jig rten 'dazhes shi 'phos nas pha rol tuskye ba 'di dang/ pha rol gyi
sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu myong babastan te/ sdig pa mi dge ba'is kyis 'jigs pa dang skyo ba ston to// kha cig la ni1na thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i chos ston to// kha cig lanerang sangs rgyas
kyi thag pa dang ldan pa'i Nos ston to// khacigalanibla na med pa'i thog b.ratos yang dag pa bstan te/ khad sa slob tu 'jug go/ sems can gang sbyin palamos par gyur pa rnams lani/ tshul khrims
rnam par dag pa'i mchog srung b.raston pa de bzhin du/ rgyas pasems can gang bsam gtan lamos bar gyur pa ni/ thag pa med pa 'phags pa'i lam gyi mchog gis bsdus pa dang/ shes rab bran
med pa ston cing nan tan byed dbacug ste/ shin tu thabs mkhas pa 'dzin dmigs bsad pa dang/ chags pamed pa sku 'dzin byang chub sems dpalirag rten las 'dus po'i thabs mkhas pa'i
go chen po'i 'khoralozhes bya'o// rigs kyibuphyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenapo gang shin tu thabasamakhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khoralo 'di dang ldan n/ thog ma sems bskyadanas 'dod pa
rnam lnga yongs su bsal bas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thamasacan las shin tu'adas shing/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
bsod nams kyi zhing chen bora'agyur ba dang/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ba thams cad kyisamatshad pa dang/ bsrung ba dang/ bsnyen bkur bya ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das/
[>>kyis don de dag gsalab bzlas pa'i phyirortog su bcad de bka'astsal ba/ shes rab nan tanarnam gnyis te// 'jig rten bcas dang 'jig 'das// gos pa de 'jig rten bcas// chagasamed pa'i
'tsha 'jig rten 'das// shin tuthabs mkhas nan tan ni// khyad par rnamaM pa gnyis la gnas// dmigs pa yod pa 'jig rten bcas// dmigs medadan 'jig rten 'das// gang zhig theg pa gcig ston pa//
danal gas bar chos son min// bdag kyang yongs su mi sminan// gzhan gyi don du ga la 'gyur// gcig tumi dag gnas can// theg pa gsum gyi chos stonan/ dezhig demug rmos pa ste// byang l chen ngo/
de'i ma yin// theg ba gsum la 'jug snga zhing// yang dag pa mi 'os 'dod la// 'khor ba spro ba'i sa stonan// mkhas pa'i rang bzhin des yin// rtsa gcig blo yis rab brtags te// 'dod dang chosab
bzhin du ston// 'di'i shin tuthabs mkhas bas// mkhas pa rnams kyis de la bsngags// semasacan sdug bdag spyod kyang// theg pa gsum gyi snod gyur na// dbang po snod bzhin chos bstan te// sdig/
ba kun las grol bar byed// rigs kyi bugazhan yang byang ba sems dpa' sems dpa' u0f7ana po'i byams pa chen po'i go chen po'i 'khor lo yod de/ byang bsems dpa 'gems dpa'achin bong

mas/'khor la 'dirang bzhin/ thog ma sems bskyangs 'dod ba rnam lnga yongs su bsal te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad lasashin du'adzag pas/nyan thos dang 'angasas rgyus thams cad kyang yod/
nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyurab dang/3na thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang/ bsrung badrang/ bsnyen bkur bya ba'agyur ro// del dziltar na byams pa chen po'i go ra/
