chen po 'khor lo gang zhenaM/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa la rnam pa gnyis te/ tshos la dmigs pa'i byams pa dang/ sems can la dmigs pa'i byams pa'o// chos la dmigs
ba'i byams panabyams pa de na pa'i go cha chen pomi'akhorale zhes bya'o// sams can la dmigs pa byams pa'i byams pa nApo'agachazhesami bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhan/ sems can la dmigA

pa'i byams pa ni thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang thun mong du gyur pa ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas nibadag la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir sems can la dmigs pa'i bzod pa lanan tan
byed do// nyan thos dang sangs rgyas nibadag zhib dang/ bdag mya ngan las 'da' ba dang/ bdag gi sgrib pa bsal ba dang/ bdag gi kun nas nyonamos pa gcad pa'i phyir yinagyi/ sams can thams
cad kyi phyir/ sams can la dmigs pa'i byams pas brtson 'grus nan tan byedapa ni ma yin no// de bas na byams pa 'di nibyams pa na po zhes mi bya ste/ go chachen po ma yin no// des ladamig
pa'i byams pa ninyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa dung thun mong ma yin gyi/ byang ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'ba' zhig gis nan tan byenus par 'gyur ro//
byang chub sems dang sems dpa' chenapo nisaMms can thamasacad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don dubartson 'grus kyi sbyor bas/ sa la dmigs pa'i byams pa 'di 'azhan tan byed do// byung ba sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen bzhi/ sems can thams cad rab tu zhi ba'i yongs su myu na las bzla ba dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa yongs su gcad pa'i phyir/ shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus kyis zlos la dmigs pa'i byams ba
zla la nan tan byed do// debs nabyams pa 'di byams pa skyen po'i go cha chen po zhes bya'o// gzhanayang byung ba sams dpa' chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa la nan tan byed pa ni phungapo lamigs/ spemachod
mi gnas/ khams lamiganas/ dran pa nye bar gzhug pa rnams la mi gnas pa nas/ byang chub kyi lam gyi yan lag gi bar du gnas so// 'dod pa'i khams miganas/ gzugs kyi khams lami
gnas/ gabrugasazhed pa'i khams lamiganas/ 'jig rten 'di lamiganas 3 'jig rten pa rel lami gnas/ tshu rol gyi lam gnas ! pa rol gyi mu lamiganas/ dmigs pa la 'ganas/mi dmigs
pa la mi gnas te/ de ltar byang chub sems dbar la la dmigs pa'i byams pa lanan tan byedapas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi theg pa'i sa lam du 'bus te/ de nibya bsemasadaba'i

ba/ chos la dmigs pa'i byams pan po'igo chaden pori' khor zhag bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang rlabasems dparasamasadapalan bo gang byamu pa chen po'i chachen po' 'i bod 'a 'di der ldan nag thog ma sem spyad nas 'dod

dam balnga yo nga su bsal te nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin du 'das pa// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur ba dang/ nyan thos dang bsangs rgyas kyi thog ba ba
thams cad kyis mdapa dang/ bsrung ba dang/ bsAn bkur bka'agyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dgagasal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs subacad de bka' stsal pa//nyan thos dang ni rang
rgyal ba// sems canadamigs pa'i byams sgom pa// sems la bcu gsum skyona'angazhing// bdag la phan pa'idzin phyir rtsol// byang bsams dpa' grags chanani// sems can thams cad kun gyi
gi/ thun mong ma yin byams chen bsgoms// bcu gsum sonas kyi skyon rnams spangs// drim bcu gsum rab spangs nas// byang ban bor gzhol bar byed// chos la dmigs pa'i phyogs bsgoms
na// bsod nams zhing grub ring bsin// bcu gsum stobs la bdagunas na// sems can kun las shin tu 'phags// jiltar sang ga'i rgyal po de// ri dgas kun las 'phags pa bzhin// bcugasum
dgra rnams shin tubatul// rtag dang chad pa'i mthar 'dzinasangs// sems la cis kyang mi gos na// myur dubyang rlu ba chen po 'thob// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang sems dpa' sams dpa' chen bosnyid
[7 ]@#// rjen po 'ig chachen pa ri 'bel yod de/ byang chub sems dang 'a sams dpa' chen po ga'akhor lo 'di dang ldan/thogam sams bskyed nas 'dod ba rnam lnga yongs su bsal te//

[>>nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las ni du 'das pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thamasacad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur zhing/ nyan thus dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa

dang/ bsrung ba dang/ bgan bkur bya bar 'gyur ro// deng la zhen/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ba thams cad ni bdag la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyi nying rje la spyod kyi sems can thams

wa chad la phanab dang bde ba'i don gyi phyi re snying rje na po skyed pas min// byang chub semasadapa sams dang 'chen po nibaga'aba' zhig la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyiresnying dzachen poskyod pa ma yin gyi/ sems

can thams cad la phan pa dang bdeba'idon gyi phyir snying rje chen po skyedado// de bas na byang chub sems dpa'asnying rje chen pa'i go chachan po'i 'khor dang ldan pas/ 2nathos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las
shin tu'adas pa/ nyan thos dang rasangs rgyasams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchodabarung/ bsrung ba dang/ snyan
bkur bya bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad la phan ba dang bde ba'i don gyi phyi'i/ bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam pa bzhis soms can yongs su sminepar byed do//

00/ snying rje chen pos sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba don gyi phyir sbyin bas yongs su sdud pa ni/'di lta ste/ zhe bo dang/noradang/ dbyig dang/ theg pa dang/ bran dang/ las byed pa'amodeng/yuladang//
srid dang/ budang/ ngag dang/ lus dang/ srog gi bar du yongs su gtongabol saNatsA medade/ mi dmigs pa 'byor pa la sbyobs 'dul ba'i sems can yod par mamathong sbyin pa byed pa'amamathong len
pamamathong/ nor gyi dngos bo mi mthong/ sbyin pa sprod par mi mthong/ sbyin pa byas ba'i 'bras bu mi mthong ba nas/ mi dmigs pa'ibar du yang mi mthob delta bu'i snying rjen po skad do// sems/

thams cad la phan pa dang bdaba'i don gyi phyir ngag snyan po dang/ don bsgrub pa dang/ donamathunangs ci dang cis 'dul ba bzhinang/ mi dmigs pa yang mi mthong ba'i b.radu dudang des rgyas bar son cing da
do/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag dumIg dam pa'i rdul ba'i sems dang/ rab tu zhiba'isams dang/ dmadapa'i sems dang/ phung po dang/ khams dang/ snyamad

thams cad lamangon par 'du mi byed parisams kyis/ gang nas gang durgyus kyang g.yo ba med pa dang/ nIganas pa'i snying rje chenapo'igi rman po'i 'boral 'dzi snodadu gyur pa'i sems can thams cad yongs/

usmin bar byedapa la skyo mdado// de ltar na byang chub sems dbarisnying rje na po'i go chan po'i 'khor zhas bya ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyasams cad dang thun mong bam yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub
sems dang re sams dbal chen po gang snying rje chen po rig chen po'i 'khar ba'adang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
rgyas thams cad las shin tu'adas shing/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod namasakyi zhing bu'agyur ba dang/ nyan thos dang rasangs rgyasakyi theg
'tsho ba pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang/ srung ba dang/ bganabakurubyed par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlos pa'i tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa shin tu
brab kho dam pa'i chos dag/ snying rjechan pa'ibazhind 'gyur// shin tshudapag dka lanam mkha' 'diste// gnas pa med de gabrugasakyang med de// byang 'ab sems dpa'i brtson 'grus chen po// yon tan
chenapo dang ldan te// rgyal pa'i ya shesasnying rje chen pos// dpa' bo 'jig rten 'da' babs 'gyur// mgon dang srubasamadasems can dag ni// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rtog pas bcings pa// snying rje can
bo'i chu yis bkrus te// sems can rnam pa grol bar byed do// byang chub sems dba'isi rje skyid pa// 'khor ba'i rgya mtshoskams par byed de// nyan thos theg nga 'i 'khor rnams dang ni/ rang rgyal
theg pa spyod pas ma yin// 'dod chags zhe sdang gtimug sems can// ngan song dag tu lhung bar 'gyu ba// snying rje chen po'i rlayis bkrusato// sdug bsngal kun las grol bar byed do// rigs kyi bu

0/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenapo tshig so so yang dag par rig pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings dngam nyam pa// tshadamadang// mtha' yas pa/ shin du rgya chenapo dang ldan pa ji snyadasangs rgyas kyi
chos thams cad di/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang ]gzungs rnams dang/ shin dubartan pa'i babrod pa bon po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yodad/ byang chub sams dba' sems dpa' chenang gang 'khol
'dudang ldan n/ thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa rnam lnga yongs su bsal te/ nyanAthos dang rangasangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'dus pa/ kun thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod zhamasakyi

zhing rmen por 'gyur ba dang/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg ba pa thams cad kyisamachod pa dang/ srung ba dang/ bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po tshig so so yang dag par rig pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa/ tshangamadapa/ mtha' yas kha/ shin tu rgya che ba dang ldan pa ji snyad sangs rgyas kyices thams cad ting nge 'dzin rnams dang/
gabrungs rnams dang/ shin tu bskyon pa chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khoralo gang zhen/ 'di lta sta byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos thams cad lashin tu rtog pa ni/ ji ltar bya ba'i dkyil 'khor
gyi 'od kyis namamakha' kun tu khyab pa bzhin du/ sems mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa mtshanamamadang/ rten pa med pa/ mi gnas pa// gos bamed pa ri ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo dang/ gzungs kyisgo
thams cad la sems kyi spyod pa med nga/ mig dang/ gzugs dang/ mig gi rnam pa shes pa dang/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa la yid kyis rnam par zhen pa dang bral bas//
kyi spyod med pa las/ mag gi 'dus te reg pa'o rkyen gyis nang gitshor ba rnam gsum skyes te/ bad ba dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang Na[“]'jo ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin par tshor ba la
sems rab tu zhi zhing rlags pamad do// de bzhin du ba dang/ sgra dang/ rnapa'i rnam par shes pa dang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ sna dang/ dri dang/ sna'i rnam par shes pa dang/ sna' 'dus te reg pa
dang/ ludang/ ro dang/ lce'i rnam par shes pa dang/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ lus dang/ reg bya dang/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang/ yid dang/ chos dang/ yid
kyi rnam par shes pa dang/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i bar du gzhung de bzhin du rgyas par soms dang/ yid dang/ rnam par shes pa thams cad rtag tshu zhi zhing chags pa mad do// sems dang/ yid dang
rnam par shes pa las skyes pa'i tsho ba rnam gsum ste/ bdeb dang/ sdug bsngalab dang bdeb yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin par tshorab la sems rtag tu zhi zhing chags pa med do//
dus gsum gyi phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad la len pa med pa sems kyi spyod pamed pa'o// gangajisnying khams gsum dang/ 'dubyed gsum dang/ reg byagasum dang/
ku tshor ba gsum dang/ dbang bo gsum dang/ nyag pa gsum dang/ sdom pa gsum dang/ rnam par grol ba gsum dang/ rnam bde dag thams cad la sems rab tu zhig/ gnas pa med pa/ mtshanamamed pa//
len pa med pas mnyam pa nyid du gnas so// gang dzisnyad sbyin ba dang/ tshul khrims dang/ bzod pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ bsam gtan dang shes rab dang/ pha rol du phyin pa thams cad la sems kyi

spyod pa med pa rab tu zhi bar gnas so// de bzhin du dran po zhi bar gzhag pa bzhi dang/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba bzhi dang/ dbang po lnga dang/ stobs lnga dang/ byang chub kyi yan
lag bdun dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyud pa la yang sems kyi spyod pa mang pa rab tu zhi bar gnas so// gang dzisod dgu mthar gyisasnyoms par 'jug pa la yang sems kyi spyod pa med pa rab
zhi bar gnas so// gzhan yang mangon par 'du byed pa gsum dang/ chos la sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes rung/ lam gyi yan lag dang/ lam gyi dang ba 'dren par byed pa dag la yang len pa dang/
sems kyi spyod pa med pa/ kun gzhirnyam pa shes pa dang kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ma yin pa dang/ nye bar len pa dang bcasapa dang nye bar len pa med pa dang/ brag pa dngabacasapa dang/ thog pa

med pa dang/ tshu rol gyi mu dang/ pha rol gyi mu dang/ chung ngu dang/ chen po dang/ tshad med pa dang/ byed pa dang byed pa dang/ dge ba dang/ mi dge ba dang/ lung du mi ston pa thams cad kyirnam pal
[/ ]/sems kyi spyod pa med pa rab tu zhi bar gnas so// ga ji snyad byams pa chen podang/ snying chen po dang shubasamakhas pas sems can smin par byed pa nas bsrung bar byab

[>>cad pa gsum dang/ mi'ajigs pabazhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du chos thamasacad kyi rnam pa la len pa med pa sems kyi spyod pa med pa rab tu zhib gnasaso// byang sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' khor lo 'di'i debang gis tsho ba rnam gsum gyi nyes pa yongs su bsal ba dang/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad yongs su zhib dang/ mtshanama'icos thams cad yongs su spong
@# 'gyuraro// gzhan yang dza snyad namamakha'i mig dang/ spyi bo'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang/ gzungs rnams la thabs mkhas pa'igo chachen po'i 'khor lo yang 'dren ba 'gyur te/ byang chub
(sams ropo'a'akhor lod lags pas gang 'das pa'i dus kyi sgrig ba mi dgab las kyi lhag mas gtar te/ ngan 'gro mnar med pa dang/ gzhan yang srid pa dang/ 'grob rnams su 'khor
khar 'khor ba'i las thams cad lhag ma ma lus par yongs su bsal te/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bumimyong bar byed du// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ mun pa nag posanam mkhar thams cad
yog pa na/ i shar ba'i tshiunapa thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang tshig so so yang dag par rig pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa// tshad med pa
mtha' yas pa/ yangs shing rgya chen po dang ldan pa jisnyad sas rgyas kyis thams cad du/ ting 'dzin rnams dang ]ba/zungs rnams dang/ shin tu brtan pa'i bzod pa go rman po'i 'khar le
yang grub cing 'dren nga/ rwa ung 'gyur ro// gzhan yang namamakha'i mig dang/ spyi bo'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang/ gzungs rnams la bsamakhas pa ga chen po'i 'bor le la gnas pas/ dpag tu
med pa nam mkha' lta bu ya shes kyi nyims phyin log bzhi'i mun pa yongs su bsal te/ 'das pa'i dus kyi sdig pa mi dag ba'i las kyi lhagams gnyer te ngan 'gromanangamud pa dang/ gzhan yang
srid pa dang 'gro ba rnams su 'khor bar 'khor ba'i las thachos lhag ma ma lus par yongs su sel te/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bumong pa yi byed do// gzhan yang de'i dbang gis sangs
rgyas kyi sa rnams la dbang thob pa dang/ phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te/ sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang dus 'gro zhing rjes su mi spyod pa dang/ rtag tusangs rgyus mthong ba dang 'bral ba dang/ byung
nub sems dang 'a dang/ nyan thos kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang mi bral ba dang chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang/ dge 'dun la mchod pa dang bsAn bku ra byed pa dang mi 'bral ba dang/ yon tan
thams cad la sems mi ngoms pa nas byang chub kyi bar du rgyun mi 'chadade/ rtag tu sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang mi 'bral bzhi chung ngan rmi'am du yang bar chad med par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de
ji ltazhan byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig so so yang dag par rigs pa/ namamakha'i dbyings dang mam pa da mad pa/ mtha' yas pa yang sashing rgya che

ji ltar byang chub semasadag [>>ba dang ldan pa je snyadasangs rgyas kyis thams cad de/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang/ gablangs rnams dang/ shin du brtan pa'i bzod pa go chen po' 'khor la 'dren par 'gyur zhe na/'dilta skye/
byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsam gtan dang po nas/ bsam gtan bzhapa'ibarangusnyoms par 'jug pa dang/ namamakha'aatha' yas sumad nas 'dushes mda'adu shes med min ar kyi
bar du snyoms bar 'jug pa dang/ 'du shes 'gog pa ri ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa ste/ tingange 'dzin 'di la gnas na/ skyob rnam gsum dang/ 'du byedugasum po yongs su bcad de/
(mngon par 'du byed pa dang/ g.yo ba'isims kyi spyod pa med pa// chor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ sems pa dang/ reg pa dang/ yid la byed pa la sogs pa kun gcod par 'gyur ro// tingang 'dzin 'di la
gnas na/ zhag gcig gam zhag bdun gyi bar du bsam gtan gyi thas tha bar 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin de las langs na yang sams 'bu du zhibalen pa med cing lhan ner gnas par 'gyur ro//
gzhan yang don dam pa'i mthas gtugs ba'i stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam parogazhag go/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas na/ sems rab tu51mapas mamakha' ltar chags pa med pa dang/ lus kyi

ba spu'i bu ga kun nas brel dang gyi thigs pas skar ma snar ma lta bu mngon par byang bas kun nas nyon mongs pas bcings dra yongs su gdung ba thams cad selab gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas/

yang dag nga 'i dranapa thob ste/ dga' ba khyad par can gyis lus la khyab par gyurabon ji ltar lha'isras po dbang phyug chen po bad ba'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad la 'jugan/ lus kyi g.yulikhungabu kun nas rab tu
bde ba myong ba bzhin/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de lus la bde ba reg pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran par 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pas sangs rgyasamathong ba las mtshan ma gzhan mthong ba
mad do// byang chub sems dpa' de'i ngosangs rgyas gcig yid la byas na sangs rgyas gcig mthong ngo// gal tesangs rgyas mang po yid la byas na sangs rgyas mang po mthongang// gal tesangs rgyas kyi

sku chung bar yid la byas na sangs rgyas kyi sku chung du mthong ngo// gal tasangs rgyas kyis cham por yid la byas na sangs rgyas kyi sa chen por mthong ngo// gal sangs rgyas kyi sku tshademadapar yid byas nasangs

rgyas kyi sku tshadamed par mathong ngo// gal 'badag gi lus sangs rgyas kyi sku'i mtshan dang ldan par yid la byas na bdag gi lus sangs rgyas kyi sku dang 'dra bsnamtshan phun sum tshogs par mthong ngo// gal te

gzhan gyi lus sangs rgyas kyi skur yid la byas n gzhan gyi lus sangs rgyas kyi sku dang 'dra bar mtshan phun sum tshogs par mthong ngo// gal tesems canadang/ sems can ma yin pa dang/ ji snyed gzugs su
gtogs pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sku mtshan dang ldan par yid la byas na/ sam san dang/ samasam yin pa dang nyid gzugs su gtogs pa thams cad sangs rgyas
de kyi sku dang 'dra bar mtshon phun sum tshogs pa ramathong gi/ gzugs su mimathong ngo// byang chub sems dpa' de ratshiyang 'disAm du/ chos thams cad dang gzugs masacan sgyu ma dang 'dra stayang/
dag pa ma yin pas bdag gis ra ba rnam gsum dang/ 'du byed gsum la sogs pa chos thams cad lhag ma lus par yongs su bcad do snyam nas/ 'gog pa'i ting nga 'dzin la snyoms pa bzhugs so
hid de 'dzin de la gnas nas blo sngon du btang pa bzhin du thams cad yongs su bcad de/ ting 'dzin gyi roribras kyis 'tsho'o// gal tan zhag bdunanam/ zhag bdun gnyis sam/ bdun gsum mtsha/
'azhi ma/ lnga a/drug gam/ bdunanam/ brgyad dam/ gal ten bskal ba dmed pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bar du cinus su gnas te/ tinganga'an gyi zas rnga'o// ting nge 'dzin de las la sa nas:

sems rab tu zhib na ci'i yang mi chags te bde bar gnas so// gal tadon dam pa rim thag gzhugs pa'i ting 'dzin du zhugs n mang sngar ji ltar bshad pa bzhin du sa nas rgyas kyi skumtshan dang ldan pa yod
la bya ba nas/ ches thams cad dang gzugs thams cad snum dang 'dra ste/ yang dag pa ma yin nga ri bar du chud par byed do// rigs kyi bu'adin byang sogs dab 'asoms dpa' chen po'i tshig so so lang ga/
par rig pa/ naman ba rid bya nges dmanyam pa/ tshademad pa/mgro' yas pa/ yangs shing rgya ba dang ldan pa ji snyed sangs rgyasakyis thams cad de/ ting nge 'dzinathams cad dang/ gzungs thugs

cad dang/ shin tu brtan pa ri khrod pa na po'i go chen po'i 'a khoral zhes bya ste// byang chub sems dpa' res mas dpa' chen po dag 'khor lo'adi dang ldan na/ namamakha'i mig dang spyi bo'i ting nge 'dzin
rnams dang/ gzungs rnams la thabs mkhas pas thams cad lhug ma ma lus par spangs te/ rnam pa smin pa'i 'bras bu len pa mi byed de// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khamasasu
mas 'jig ba 'byung du du ba na/ rim lnga cig car shar te/ 'jig rten gyi khams nA rdzing bu dang/ rdzing chen po dang/ 'bab tshudang/ 'bab chu chen po dang/ mchodang/ mtshon ngo 'a rnams lhag ma lus
par thams cad goms par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang tshig so so yang dag bar gyi pa/ namamab rid pyings dang mnyam ba ]tshadamad pa: mtha' yas pa yasapashing rgya chab rang
ldan pa jisAd sangs rgyas kyi chos thamasacad de/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang gzus rnams dang/ na tu brtan pa'i bgrodang chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khorale yang mngon par 'dren te// gzhan yang
namamakha'i gloge dang/ spyi bo'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang/ gzungs rnams la spobs ma khas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor le la yang gnas shing 'dren pa 'gyur ro// gang 'das pa'i dus kyi sdig pa midag
[ap1 ]/ba'i las kyi lhags gtar te/ ngan 'gro mnar med pa dang/ gzhan yang srid ba dang/ 'gro ba rnams su 'khor bar 'khor ba'i las thams cad lhag ma ma lus par yongs su
so shams te/ rnam par n pa 'bras bumalen par byed do// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'di la ste/ 'jig nas 'jig pa 'byung ba na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i khams da'i

'tsha gling chen po bzhi dang/ gling phran brgyad dang/ ri ba li'i rgyal po dang/ ri phran thams cad chus bkrus de zhig nas lhagam ma lus bor brad pa'i 'gyur ro// bzhin byang chung sems dpa' yang tshig so so dang

dag par rig pa nam mkha'i dbyings dang nam pa/ tshad med pa// mtha' yas pa/ yangs shing rgya che ba dang ldan pa jisnyadasangs rgyas kyichos thams cad de/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang/ gzungs rnams dang/ shin tu

lhab na pa ri ba khrid pa ri bo chen po'i khol yang 'grub ceng 'dran bar 'gyur ro// namam ba'i mig dang spyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang/ gzungs rnams la thab sa mkhas pa'i go chen po'i 'khor la gnas shing
'drenang ru 'gyur bas/ 'gang 'dus kyi sdig pa mi dag pa'i las kyi lhagams gte/ ngan 'groman med pa dang/ gzhan yang srid pa dang/ 'gro ba rnams su 'khor ba 'khor ba'i las lam ngas da 'go
man po li 'khor la yang gnas par 'gyura'o// 'khorale 'dil gnas pas dpag tumed pa zhamam bar lta bu'i ye shes kyi nyim byung bas/ rang gi lus la phyin ci log bzhi dang/ ma rig pa'i mun pa thams
cad yongs su ga la ba khagyura'o// 'dus pa'i sa kyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi lhag mas gterata ) ngasar mnar med pa dang/ gzhan yang srid pa dang/ 'gro ba rnams su 'khor bar 'khor ba la//
mas cad kyang lhag ma ma lus par yongs su se bte/ rnam par smin pa ni 'bras bu yang slob mi byed do// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'ashesadapa' chen po ganga'akhor la'adi dang ldan// thogamalegan

bskyed nas 'dod pa rnam lnga yongs su bsal te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin du'adusangashing/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang so dmas kyi zhing du 'gyur ba dang/ nanas dang
ras ngas rgyas kyi ga pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang/bsrung ba dang/ bgan bkur byed pa 'gyuro// 'khorale'adi'i dbang gis sangs rgyus kyi chos thams cad la bod du 'gyur ba dang/ phyi mi 'gang

dang/ sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang dus grol dang/ sangs rgyas thams ca dmathong ba dang mi 'bral zhing/ byang g sems dpa' dang nyan thos kyi lta gnas mthong ba dang mi 'brel ba dang/ sa chog pa dang mi bral
ba dang/ dge 'dun la mchod pa dang bsod bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral ba dang ! yon tan thams cad la sems mi ngoms te/ mngon par byang ba kyi 'du gyunami chad pa dang/ rtag tu sangs rgyas rjes su

dran ba dang mi 'phral ba ni/ chung ngu mi lam na yang 'bral bar mi byed do// delta na byang ba sems dpa 'debasod nams dang yang shes kyi tshogs kyang yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ ring po mi thogs par rnam pa'
dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dub namad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing dazhu sems can thams cad kyang rdzus teklu ba/
po mtshan dang gzugs sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang 'dra ba/ shonamos pa srab cing zhung ba/ theg pa chen po la bde bar gnas pa sha stag go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de dag gsal ba bzlas
la/b.ri'i tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ chos kyi snod du'agyur bar 'dod pa dag/ nyon mongs thams cad yongs su gcad par bya// gang dag stong pa nyid la snyoms zhugs na// dngos po gang yang bya/
'daka' bzhin// srid pa'i bcing pa thams cad gcad pa 'i phyir// sAms par 'jug la nan tan brtson par bya// ting 'dzin yon tan dag dang ldan pas na// gdon mi bra bar dpag dka ri shes rab/
'thob// gzugs med pa yi bsam gtan bsgom zhing// 'gogar 'i ting 'dzin skyong nga nyid brtagasan// sangs rgyas dran pa'i blomchog rab skye ste// sdig pa thams cad yongs su khyed 'gyur//
yod dang med pa'i rjes rnams thams cad ni// yang dag stong panyid du brtags pas bcom// ngan par 'gro ba'i rgyud rnams yongs bsal nas/ rtag tusangs rgyas mang po mthong bar 'gyur/
yang dag stong ba nyid la rab sgomapas// dgaba'ichos gzhan kun la brtson byas// sangs rgyas thams cad kun la rab mchod na// myur du sangs rgyas 'bras bu thob par gyur// sems can kun gyidage

ba'igrogs bya ste/ kun nas nyon mongs nga yi u0f7anang bsal na// rnam dag sangs rgyas zhing du myur du sku// mngon bar 'tshang rgya byang chub chen po 'thob// sangs rgyas mtshan dang ldan pa 'i sams can dag/ ]
sangs rgyas zhing de yongs su gang bar 'gyur// thams cad sangs rgyas thag la 'dunapa ste// nyan thos rang rgyal theg pa yongs su spyod// 'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa napo sa'i song pa li'akhol
bsu ba zhes byab las/ bsod nams kyi zhing gi mtshan nyid kyi le'u zhes bya ba ste bdun pa'o/// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos po'i rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'ichi
'khoragyi dkyil 'khor darinangan byungachub sems dpa'i sa mas dpa' chen po gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyad dung mnyam pa// sngon 'dus pa'i dus nasangs rgyas rjes su dran pa la goms pa dag/
dang 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa la nan tan bya ba'i sror ba bshad pa thos nas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'iting nga'adzin gyi sgom thob bo// gzhan yang ams can na
mang grangs med pa rnams chos 'di thos nas/ ting de 'dzin gyis 'tsho ba me tog gi 'phreng ba zhes bya ba'i gzus kyi sgo mo thams cad thob bo// gzhan yang sems na tshad medagrasagad pa dag
bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas/ dpa' bar 'grob glog gi 'od la rten dazhes bya ba'i gzungs kyisgo mo thams cad thob po// gzhan yang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan
'das kyis bshad pa thos nas/ sa bsgyur ba 'od snang ba la ldan par byed pa rjes su 'thun pa'i bgrodang thams cad theba'o// gzhan yang sems can tshad med grangasamed pa dag
[>bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas/ rdul dang dri ma dang bral tis la chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa skyes te/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo// gzhan yang sems can dmad grangs med pa dag
ba na bcom ldan 'das kyis bshadab thos nas/ lan cig phyir ldog pa'i 'bras bu thob bo// gzhan yang sams can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas// lan cig phyi'i
ldog pa'i 'bras bu thob bo// gzhan yang sems rten tshad med grangs med pa dag bcomaldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas/ mchog gi dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ sams can tshad mgrangs med pa dag
bcos ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas/ khams gsum gyi btson nas 'byung ba'artsol bas/ bcom ldan 'das la rtan cing rab tu byung nas yang dag pa'i sa 'dazhugs par gyur to// gzhan yang shel gnyan tshad
mad grangs medapo dag nam 'a po'i bo du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bde bar gnas shing nyan thos kyi theg pa soms bslad pas phyir mi ldan par gyur to// gzhan yang sems can tshad mad grangs med pa dag
bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas/ nam 'tsho'i bar du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bdeb dra gnas nas/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par san sa bskyed pa las phyir mi ldeg par gyur to// gzhan yang
pu sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas/ nam 'tsho ba'i bar du dge ba bcu'is kyi lam la bde bar gnas satheg pa de na po sems bskyed dang/ bya namad pa yang dag

pa'atshogs nga 'ing ba grags pa'i mi ldeg par gyur to// gzhan yang san sa can tshad med gang sa mad pa dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa shes nas ! 'jig rten gyi yang dag pa'i lta ba thob par gyur de/ mang
dag par lta ba de'i dbang gis na song du 'gro ba'i rgyudang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i las dang/ nyon mongs pa thams cad byanas mthu sasu'agro ba'i rgyu dang/ yang dag pa'i smon lam dang/ dge ba'i las
thams cad skye zhing 'phel bar gyur to// gzhan yang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshadab thos nas dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song ste/ dge sAn gyi sdom pa
blangs nas/ sangs rgyasamachod pal smra ba dang/ chos thos pa la dga' ba dang/ ga 'dun gyi g.yog byed ba la mos ta nyin na du 'bad pa brtson 'grus la sems bar chadamod ngang rgyur do//
gatshan yungasams can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas/ leg pa la 'babapa dang/ log pa la phyogs pa dang/ blo gros ngan pa dang/ las na bathams cad yongs su

spangs te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos lami'agyu bya ba'i dang ba thob nas/ khyim na gnas pa'i chos yongasasu spangs te/ rnam par dag pas rab tu byung bar gyur to// denas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sams/
u@#// dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// krigs kyi bu ngas sa'i snying po'i 'khole bcu pa zhes bya ba ba rdzasprod pa pachen po chos kyi sgo mo 'di
[>>khyod kyi lag tu gtad kyi/ khyod kyis gathungs su srung ba shin tu rgyas par gyis shig/ sems can gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la glog gam/ 'don tam/ yid byed dam/ gzhan la rgya gat+tAd rnam/
yang dgu pa sprod pa la gnas pa dag la khyod kyis chos rnam pa 'dir cus bsus te yun ring por phan pa dang bang ba'i don thob pa gyis shig/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de'i thabs dang bdog
zla ba ni nor thams cad la srungs te kums par mi bya ba dang/ gnod pa thams cad las bsrungs te gzher ba med par bya ba dang/ log par lta ba dang/ 'ag par phyogs pa las bslangs mi dge ba bcu'i dus

kyilam spang bar bya ba dang/ de'i lus la gnod pa thams cad las bsrungs te yod par bya ba dang/ 'phya ba dang skur pa thams cad las bsrungs te med pa bya ba dang/ tshul khrims dang spyod pa thums cad nyams
la ba mi 'gyur bar srungs ba dang/ de la ma yin pa phranas dadang/ 'byung ba chen go 'khrugs pa dang/ sam yin pa'i nad dang/ rga ba thams cad yongs susal bar srung bdu/ dal dus ma yin pa

tshulan yin pa/ ltas nadang/ rims thams cad mi 'byung ba srung ba dang/ de la'achi ba'i dus byed pan yang/ sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba srung ba dang/ da d+mo 'phos nas kyang bde 'gror skya ba dang//
0 na pa dang/ dad pa'i phan thob par yongasasu srung bar byed do// rigs kyi bu sems can gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di klog pa dang/ 'don pa dang/ don yid la byed pa dang/ gzhan dag la rgya cha
'chad dan/ yang dag pa'i spyod pa la gnas pa dag la/ khyod kyis ches rnam pa 'dib cus shin tub srung zhing byin gyis babs te/ chos rnam pa 'di bcus yun ring por phan pa dang bde ba gyis
shig de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos ! bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// ded bzhin no// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sa kyi rnam grangs 'di
gzungs su 'dzin cing shin turgyas par bgyi'o// sems canag 'os kyi rnam gras 'di la klog pa dang ) 'don pa dang/ donayid 'bagyid pa dang/ pha rol po la rgya cher ston pa dang/ yang dag pa'i
spyod pa la gnas pa dag la/ bdagagis chos rnam pa 'dibatsus shin tu bsrungs te/ yun ring bor phan ba dang bde bar bgyi'o// danas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde 'di gsungs nas 'kho gyi
dkyil 'kha da naganas pa'i byang chub sems dang sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snyingapo dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po saTisnying po dang/ byang bsam sa dang 'asams dpangan
pa rdo rje'i snying po dang byang rgyud sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rigs pa the tshom 'drib dang/ ngas pa chen bo lha'i snying po dang lha dang kladang/ gnod spyin dang/ dri ba dang lham yin dang/
01/ @# nam mkha' lding dang mi'am ci dang/ lce'aphya na pa dang/ mi dad/ mi ma yin pa la sogs pa 'khor mang bo thams cad/ bcom ldan 'dus kyis gsungs pa lam don
par dga' 'o// 'dus pa chen po las/ byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po 'khor lo bcu pa las/ bad ba'i don 'thob pa yongs su gdams pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so//
ban d+he rnam par mi rtog pas rgya bas bsgyur ba'o// mdo 'dir skad gsar bcad kyis gtan la ma bab pa'i gyur snying ba 'ba' zhig gda' 'o//
tshe/ rgya gar skad du/ Aratag tag cha nAla'o hAyAn sU tA/ bodaskad du/ 'phag sa ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po zhes bya ba theg ba napo'amed// sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub
sams dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal// 'di skad bdag gis spros pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'dasamangon par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas nas// labacul zhes pa dang/ shin tu tshaba'i dus kyi tshe/

a rgyal po khan/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la rin po cha'i gdugs kyi khang bzangs tsan dan gyi sang po'i khang pa brtsegs pan/ slob pa dang/ mi slob pa'i shon thos kyi dag slong 'bum du tshang ba'i dag slong gi
dge 'dun chen po phal cher dgra bcom pa/ brag pa thod pa/ nyen mongs pa med pa// dbang dang ldan pa gyurapa/ sams shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/
glang po chen po// bya ba byas pa/ byedapa ngus pa khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su sheb pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su brad nga/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam pa grol ba/ sams
thams cad kyi dbang gi dam pa'i pha rolason pa sha stag la 3 'di lta ste da drod srungs chen po dang tshodang ldan pa ltengargyas 'od srungs dang/ tshe dang ldan pa chub 'od srungs dang/ dang ldan pa

ga ya 'od srungs dang/ tshe dang ldan ng ka t+yA'i bu chen po dang/ tshe dang ldan pa gsus pa re ngaldan pa ba ku la dang/ tshe dang ldan pa rnam gru dang/ tshodang ldan pa rab 'byoradang/ tshadang ldan pa byams ma'i

bu gang po dang/ tshe dang ldan pa ngag dbang dang/ tshodang ldan pa shA ri'abu dang tshod/ ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang/ modang ldan pa cang shes ko'u rgya dang/ rmadang ldan pa'achar ka dang [！]
ngaldan pa sgra gcan thin dang/ tshadang ldan ng dga' bo dang tshodang ldan ng na dge'o dang/ tshidang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang/ dedag la sogs pa dge slong 'bum du tshang ba dang thabs gcig tu
ba zhugs so/ byang rlabasems dpa' sems dpa' posangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa nas 'dus ba/ gang+gA'i klung ngag nu'i bye ma snyed tham sa cad kyang/ skye ba gcig gis thogs pa// mngon par shas
pa chen po dang/ gongs dang/ mi 'jigs pa thob pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po la bstan bkur byas pa/ phyi'i mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskob/ gang dag gi ming
[– ]lung// thos pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa'i sams can bla na med pa yang dag pa la rdzogs pa'i byang las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba sha stag la// 'di lta ste/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi blo gros dang/ sang ga'i bla gros dang/ stag gi blo gros dang/ don gyi blo gros dang/ rin po che'akhyi gros dang/ rab mchog blo gros dang/ zla'od dang/
haM rin chen zla 'od dang/ zlang nya ba'i 'od dang/ rnam par gnon pa chenang dang/ rnam par gnon pa dang gnad dang/ rnam par gnon pa mtha' yas dang/ 'jig rten gsumarnam par gnon dang/
mi g.yo ba'i gnas rnam par gnon dang/ mthun thob dang/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang/ spos kyi glang po dang/ spos dga' dang/ spos dga' ba'i dubal dang/ dpal gyi snang ba
dang ) ma'isnying po dang/ rtog dang/ togazhan po dang/ rtog dri ma med pa dang/ rin chi'amatha' yas dbyu gu dang/ rin chen dmyu gu 'dor dang/ rin chenadrimadadabyu gu dang mchog tudaga'
ba'i rgyal po dang/ rtag tur ba tu dga' dang/ lag na zhi po dang/ nam mkha mdzod dad/ ri ngo dang/ ri rib dwang/ ri'i nubo dang/ yon tan rinanasnang dang/ go khungs kyi dbang phugagi
rgyal po dang/ sa 'dzin dang/ sams can thams cad kyi dge la dang/ rab tu yid dga' dang/ yid skyob dang/ skyomed dang/ 'od byed dang/ zhin dang/ g.yo zlog dang/ dpag medalon
bsgrags dbyangs dang/ byang chub kun nas bslang dang/ mthong ba don yodadad/ chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba dang/ byang chubums dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang/ 'jam dang la
gzhi'onu gyur pa dang/ de dgal sogs pa byang chub sems dba'asadag dpa' na bo gang+gA'i klung drag cu'i bye ma snyed dang yang thabs gcigago/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod spyinadad/ drithudang lha
ma yin dong mamakha' lding dang/ mi 'amacodad/ lta'aphya chen po dang/ nid yam yinapo dang ga med pa dang yang thabs gcig go/ denas bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'bum phrag dums yongs su
skor cing mdun gyis bltas te/ rgyal po dang/ blon po na pa dang/ tshong dpon dang/ khyim bdag dang blon po dang/ grong rdal pa dang/ yul gyi rnams kyis ba nyisang dbyas/ bram 'athus/ 'gror
gug shingagachod do// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das bshis gsol ba'ig tutsan ngan gyi sAde bodi khang pa brtsigs pa de nyid du yang dag 'jog la zhugs pa gyur to// zhas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tsan dan gyi

snying po'i kha ba batshogs pa de las pad+ma 'dab ma bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum yod pa tshod shing rta'i 'phang lo tsamapa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/kha la bya ba bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum byung bar gyur te/ da dag steng
ginamamakha'i bar snang la/ man par 'phagasanas/ mas can dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di kha bas par gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dpan zhi po tsho'i blo robazhin du kun tu bzhis rgyug
ro pad+ma'i snying po re re la yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skye lam krung bcas te bzhugs shing 'od zera'abum dag rab tu 'gyed par kun tu snang la/ pad+made dag thams cad/

[>>kyang zhi ba bye bar gyur to// de nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis pad de dag gi 'dab ma dedag thams cad kyang mo bag chog dang/ nogazhog bo dang/ dri ba dang/ smadapar 'os pa dang/ mngon bar
dga' bar 'gyur bam yin par gyur to// 'on kyang pad+ma'i snying po de dag la/ dbazhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams skyil mo krung bcas dbazhugs shing/ 'ad zer 'bum dag rab tu 'gyud par kun tu
snang ngo// de bzhin gshegs ba'i skabad+ma'i snying po la bzhugs pa de dag gis kyang thams cad dang ldan pa risangs rgyas kyi de 'di khyad par gyur te/ da'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ni dums par/
gyur to/ des de'i byung rgyug sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad duda'akhor bzhi ya shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur cing dga' ba'agyurato// bcom ldan 'dakyilja'aphrulamangon par

'du mdzad pa dmatho nas the tshom du gyur te/ gang dang bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'buma'adi dag gi 'dab ma rnams 'diltar kha dog ngan cing+gechung ba rnams kyang kha dog ngan la smad pa'i 'os su gyur te/
mngon par dga' bar 'gyur bam yi pa dang/ pad+ma'i snying po de dag la yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs shing 'od gzapar dum dag rab tu 'gyod pa sa pashin tumadzes par
kun tu snang ba 'di'i rgyu nigang yin/ rkyen ni gang yin/mo// nganas thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang/ 'khor bzhi po thatsom du gyur pa rnams 'dang bar du ba'am[$]nam las
pa'i tsan dan gyi snying po'i bang ba brtsigs pa der/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i blo gros zhes bya ba 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/ denas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chugs/dpa'

sams dpa' spyanapo rdo rje'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos can gyigatam las rtsogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la yongs su zhu bar spobs/
bar gyis shig/ de nasabyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i blagros bcom ldan 'dasakyis gnadzabs lha dang mi dang lham yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang/ byang sha
sams dpa' thams cad dang/ 'khor bzhipo dag gi the tshom gyi brag rtsarig nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jig na gyi khams mi thams cad pang ba dog ldan cing
drao bda' 'di lta bu bya ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum 'di ngag gis khebs bdang/ de dgagi dbu na yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lamo krungabarus shingabazhugs te/ 'od zer 'bumadag rab tu'agyed par kun tu
gda' ba dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag mthong nas kyang/ srog rlags bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum thalam sdurd phyag 'a6la ba'i rgyu ni gang lags/ kyizhig gas/ de nas de'i tshig ga de nas
@#// dba' rdo rje'i blo gros kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// sangs rgyas stong phrag bye ba ni g.yo ru/ pad+ma dag gi dbus na bzhugs par ni// khyodakyis 'di'adra'i rdzu'agrul ston
[>>mdzad pa// bdag gis ldan cad nam yang 'dim mthong// 'od bar stong rnams rab tu 'gyadamadzad cing// sangs rgyas zhing 'di thams cad khe las pa'amadzad// ngomatshar chos kyi rnams la rol mdzad pa'i/
'drenapa rnams kyis bar dam mchis mdzes// 'dabam dag dad chub skya 'os la// kha dog ngan payud rnams dbus der// dadag rinam/rang bzhin 'drar bzhugs pa// ci saMslad du rdzur phral 'di dag
zla sprul bdag gis sangs rgyas gang+gA'i sud mthong// de yi rdzu 'phrul khyad 'phags bdag mthong ste// dering gda' ba'i rnam sprul 'drab// sngon gnam yang 'di 'dra 'dim mthong// rkang gnyis
gtso'i lhasan pas na dugasol// gong rkyen gang lags pa bshadangugasel// 'jig rtan don mdzad thugs ba ma gsung du gsol// lus can kun gyi the tshom dgum du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po rdo rje'i blo gros la sogs pa thams cad dang ldan paribyang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag de bzhinagashegs pasIng po
zhes bya ba'i mdoshin tu rgyas pa yod de/ de rab tu snyan pa'i phyir/de bzhin gshegs pas snang rimtshanam 'di lta bu 'di byas so// de'i phyir legs par ga tu nyon la yid la zung dang bshad do// byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i blo gros dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs des/ bcom ldan 'das la 'degs so zhes gsal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyiltanyan/
pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i pad+ma kha dog ngan pa/ dring ba/ smad pa ngos pa/mngon par dga' ba 'gyur
ba ma yin pa 'di dag dug/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mdzes pa/ gakhrugs bzang ba/ balhan sdug ba ga ba'ising po 'di dag la skyil mokrung bcas shing 'khod de/ 'od gza'abumadag
rab tu 'gyed cing 'khod pa de dag kyang ga nas/ lha dang mi rnams phyag 'tshal zhing/ mchod pa'i las kyang byed pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu dag gshin ga shags pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'as sa rgyas kyis kyang/ rang gi shes rab dang/ gshes dad/ dbazhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyi sems can srog/gas su gyur ba/ 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gdimug dang/ srid nga
rad/ mag pa nyon mongs pa bye ba phrag 'bum gyi spubs su gyur pa thams cad dang/ rigs kyi bu dgo sams canon mongs pa'i sbubs su gyur ba de dag gi nang na/ nga 'drab r ma shes rung ldan ba/

mig dang ldan pa ji bzhin gshegs pa ma ba'akhod cing skyil mo krung bcas nas mi g.yo bar 'bod pa mthong ste/ nyon mongs pa thamasaM cad kyis nyomongs ba can du gyur pa dadag gi nang na/ de bzhin gsheg
pa'i chos de mi g.yo zhing/ srid pa'i 'gro ba thams cad kyis ma gos pa dag ma gronganas/de bzhin gshegs pa de gzhi de dang 'dra'o zhes smra'o// rigs kyi bu dag dengazhin gshegs
pa'i spyananid lhas mdzes pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa smananges sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying por mthong ngo// rigs kyi bu dag 'di lta ste dbalen/ skyes bu lha'i mig can la la zhig

ba'igis ltarimig gis 'di lta ba deg nganacing/'di ltar dring ba'ipad+ma kha ma phye zhing/ ma gyis pa dag bltas te/ de'i dbusan pad+ma'i snying po la deb zhinam/shegs pa skyil mo krung bcas shing 'jug par rigs/

mde bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs nga lta par 'dod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs de yang dag pa sgruba'i phyir/ pad+ma'i 'dab ma kha dog ngan cing dringal/ smad par 'os pa de dag 'byed cing sol ba de bzhin du/
rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis son can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po mthong nag/ sams can de dag gi 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug dang/
srad pa dang/ ma rig pa'i nyon mongs pa'i bas dbye ba'i phyir sa ston te de sgrub ba'idabazhin gshegs pa rnams ni yang dag pa nyid du gnas so/ rigs kyi ba dug 'di ni chos rnams kyi chos nyid de/ de
bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung ma byung yang rung/ sems can 'di dag lho rtag tu re bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can yin na/ rigs kyi bu dag da par 'os pa'i don mongs pa'i sgrubs rnams
kyis log pa sa/ de dag gi nyon mongs pa'i sbubs gzhig pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes kyang yongs su srung ba'i phyir/ dbazhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs/
pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams lo ga ston// bya ba 'di la yang mos par byed do// de la byang chub sems dpo 'asems dpa' chen po chen de dag la mngon pa brtson pa gnas pa de dag gang
ga chu ) zhanamongs ba dang/ nuba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar gyurapa de'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro
sku 3 de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba thums cad kyang byed do// denas de'itshobcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// ji ltar padasmad par 'os gyur pa// de yi 'dab ma spubs gyuram

byas la// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying bom gas te// mi 'ga' la las lha yimig gis mthong// denade ri 'dabam 'byed pan// dbus na rgyal ba'i skrun mthong gyur nas// rgyal ba nye ba'i zhonamongs phyir 'gyur// de

zhi'ajig na kun tu rgyal bar 'gyur// dbazhin ngas kyang srog chags thams cad kyi// dkyil derlaganas pa'i rgyal ba rnams kyis// ji ltar sbyang 'os pa'i sgrubs 'dra ba'i// nyon mongasastong phrag bye bas khebs
pa mthong// ra yang de dag gi nibasal ba'i phyir// mkhas pa rnams la rtag turjes ston to// sems can 'di dag sangs rgyas 'gyur bya zhes/ rgyal ba'i bu nyon mos rnam par spong// nga yisangs rgyas
[/ ]/spyan ni de 'dra ste// nga yis rgyal ba'i lus su gnas pa yi// sams can 'di dag thams cad mathong gyur te// de dag rnam par srung phyi'i chos smra'o// rigs kyi bu dug gzhan yang

[>>'di lta ste dpon/ sbrangatshong zlum po shing gi ma log la'aphyang ba// bung ba 'bum gyis kun tu bsungs shing// sbrang rtsis yongs su gang ba zhig yodal/ renas sbrang rtsi 'dod pa'i mi zhig gis srog gag

kyi rnam pa bung ba de dag thabs mkhas pas spyadazhas/ sbyartsi des sbrang rtsi'i bya ba byed do// rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin du sams can tham sa cad kyang sgrung tshong dang 'dra ste/ de la sangs rgyas nyid nyan mongs
ba dang/ zhapa'ikonamo sa ba bye ba phrag 'bum gyis shin tu bsdus pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mingashesamathong bas rig go/ gas kyi bu dag ji ltar srung tshang gi zhing/ sbrang rtsi bung ba bye ba phrag
'bum gyis kun tubaslus pa yod par skyes bu mkhas pa zhig gis shes pas rig ba de bzhin du/ sems can thamasacad la yang sangs rgyas nyid nyon mongs pa dang/ nye ba'i nyon mongs ba byeb phrag 'bum
gyis kun tu bsrungs pa yodapa redabazhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong bas rig ste/ rigs kyi bu dag de la de bzhin gshegs pa yang thabs lamakhas pas bung ba bsal bde bzhin du sems can de dag gi
'dod chags dang/ zhesdang dang/ gtilugadang/ nga rgyal dang/ rgyags pa dang/ 'tshab pa dang/ khro ba dang/ gnod sems dang/ phrag dog dang/ sarasna la sogs pa nyon mongs pa dang 'a ba'i nyonamong
pa rnams bsal nas/ ji ltar sems can de dag la yang nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa can du mi 'gyur ba dang/ gnod par mi 'gyu rab de lta de ltar chos ston to// de bzhinagashegs pa'i ye/
shes mthong ba de nam bar spungs nas 'jig rten de bzhin gshegs pa thub byed de/ rigs kyi ba dag nga'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan yos su dag pa des/ ngasasems can thams cad de ltar mthongang//

nas de'i bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigasasu bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// ji ltar 'din sbrang tshang yong pa la// bung ngas kun tu bsrungs shing spras gyur pa// migang sgrung rtsi 'dod pas de mthong nas//
des nibungab rab duspyod par byed// de bzhin 'dir yang sgrung tshangalta bu ni// srid pa gsum gyi sems can thams cad d// de dag nyon mongs bya bamang bas// nyon mongs dbusan de bzhin gshegs 'dug
thong// ngayang sangs rgyas rnam par spyadadon tu/ bung bskyod pa lta bu shonamongs sel// gang gis nyon mongs bye ba gnod 'gyu rab// chos rnams 'di ni thabs kyis rang ston to// de dag ji ltar dab 3
bshags sgyu ral// 'jig rten kun tubya ba byed 'gyur zhing// spobs ldan ji ltar sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi yi// snod 'dra'i sa ston 'gyur bar bya phyir ro// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang 'di lta ste dpar na
'bras lu 'am/ nas sag cici 'am/ 'bru rnams ni snying po phub mas yongs su bsrungs pa yin te/ de'angagi phub ma lasam byung gi b.rad bza' ba dang/ bca' ba dang/ ltung ba'i byabaibyed kyi
rigs kyi bdag skyes pa 'am/ budad gang dag baba' ba dang/ bca' ba sogs pa bas sgom gyi bya ba 'dod pa de dag gisabs shing brdzus te/ phub ma'i sbubs dang phyi shunasal/
[>>te/ rigasakyi bu dag de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyis sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa nyid// sas rgyasad rang byung nyid/ nyon mongs pa'i rlabs kyashagangs dkros
shing gnas par mthong ngo// rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin sho shegs pa yang nyomos pa'i srubs kyi shun pa bsal ba dang/ dbazhin gshegs pa nyidi lo sa gyi sgrung bdad sa mar so can 'di dagaji
ltar konamongs pa'i srubs kyi shanang thums cad las grol te/ 'jig nang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa sangs rgyus shesabu bango grangs du 'gro bar 'gyur snyam nas/
sems can rnams la sa yonato// da nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// ji ltar 'bru 'am bu 'a bras kyang rung/ citso'am 'on tanas kyang bya/
'i srid bar du de dag phub bcas// de srid bar du bya ba mi byed de// de dag gis brdungs nas phub bsazhu// bya ba rnam pa mang po dag kyang byed// sIng po phubal ldan pa de dag ni// sems can
rnams la bya ba mi byed do// de bzhin sems can kun gyis sa rgyas sa// nyon mongs rnams kyis kheb par samathonganas// sa ni rig par sbyang ba dang/ sangs rgyas myur thob bya ba'i chos ston to// khams/

ba[/]can kun l ba'adra'i chos nyid ni// nyon mongs brgya yis dkris nas gdayod pa// de ni rnam sbyangs thams cad ji lta bu r// rgyal ba'i myur 'gyur bya phyir chos ston to// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang 'di lta ste
dang na/ rul ba dang/ nyalatil gyi gnas bshang gci dri mam pas kun tugang ba zhig tu/ mi gzhan gsab lamanas song ba zhig gose gsaragyi gang bu blug po zhig lhung ba gyural/ bshang gci
bring pas kun du gang ba rul ba dang/ 3parnyil gyi gnas dmigatsang pa gzhan dang gzhan dag grimanan pos// bltar mi snang par gyur cing derade lebacu'amaM/ kishu'om/ sum cu 'am/ bzhibasu
'am lnga bsu'am/ lo brgya 'am/ le stong du mi gtsang bas chun ma tha nga 'is sunu de sems can gang la yang phan pa mi byed do/ rigs kyi bu dag de nas las la mig gis gser gyi gar bu zlum
po de la bltas nas/ zhig la kye mi khyodaso ngal 'din/ rin po che'i mchog gsan rul ba dang/ nyal shel gyi rnam pas non pa de spyi dor gyis la gsar gyis gsar gyi bya ba gyis shig ces//
bsgo narigs kyi bu dag rul ba dang nyal nyil gyi rnam pa zhes bya ba de ni nyon mongs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi (ga bla dgas so// gser gyi gar bu zhes bya ba de nichud mi za ba'i chos can gyi tshig
rtagasaso// lhas lha'i mig ces bya ba de ni/ deng zhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshig bla dgas so// rigs kyi bu dag de ltar de bzhin gshegs padagra bcom pa
ma da @#// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang/ sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid du mi khu ba yod pa nyon mongs parul ba dang/ 'dam rdzab lta bu rnams bsal/
[>>ba'i phyir/ sams can mas la chos ston to// danas de'i bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// ji ltarami yisags gyi gabazhi// nyalazhil rnam pa'i nang du lhung gyur la/
rade le ni mi nyungabazhig tu// de ltar gnas kyang mi 'jig chos can no// lha yis lha yi mig gis demathong nas// rnam pa srung phyir gzhan la smras pa'i// 'din 'ani chen mchog gi gsar yod ba/ nam/
bar sbyongs la dosazhi bya ba gyis// de bzhin sanisams can thams cad kyang// nyonamos rnams kyis yun ring rtag no mthongo// de dag ni blo budakonamongs shes// rang bzhin sbyang phyir thabs kyis
sa ston to// rigs kyi bu dugagazhan yang 'di lta stadaparan/ dbul po zhig gi khyim gyi nang gi mdzod kyi 'ag gis lagadal chen po dbyig dang gsal gyis rab tu gang ba mdzod kyi tshad tsam zhig mi
zhi bdunasrid kyi sas yog pa'i 'og na yod la/ gter chen de ni dbul po de la'adziskad du/ kye mi 'gater na pa lta/ gas yog cing 'dug go zhes mi smra ste/'di lta ste/gtakachan pos mas kyi ngotso
nyid kyis soms can ma yin pa'o// mir bumakho khyim gyi bdag po rinadabul pa sams kyis rjes su sems shing rid kyi stangan rnam par rgyu yang/ sa'i 'og gter chen po yod pa des thog mi shes

tha na thong ngeng// jigs kyi bu dag de bzhin du sums can thams ca da kyimangon par zhen pa'i yid la byed pa khyin lta bu r gyur nga 'a'og na/ dang zhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i stobs dang/ mi 'jigs pa dang/ ma
'dres pa dang/ sas rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi mdzodakyi gter chenapo yod kyang/ sems can de dag gzugs dang/ sgra dang/ dridang/ ro dang gu pa la chags pas sdug bsngalabs 'khor bar 'khor te/

chos kyi gterachen po de ma shes pas thob par ma gyur cing yongs su spang ba'i phyir brtson pa ya nga mi byed do// rigs kyi bu dugade nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dubyung ste byang gsems 2pa'i nang tshudi

lta bu'i chos kyi gter chen po yang dag par pa du ston to// de dag kyad zlos kyi gter chen po de la mos nas rko ste/ de'i phyir 'jig rtaman de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dgapar rdzogs pa'i gangs
rgyas rnams shes bya ste// chos kyi gter chen po ltaTar gyur nas sems can rnams la sngon ma byung ba'am// sngonam byung ba'i gtan tshigs kyi rnam pa dang dpe dung/ byed pa'i gan tshigs dang/ grub
rnams ston pa gter chenapo'i mdzod kyi srin bdag chags pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan zhing/ stobus dang/ mi 'jigs pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi sa mang po'i mdzod du gyur pa yin no// rigs kyi bu dag de
lta'ade bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mig shin tu yangs su dag pas sems can thams cad da lta bu r mthongam// de bzhin gsheg
pa'i ya shes dang/ stobs dang/ mi 'jigs pa dwang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i mdzod yongs su spang ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos ston to// denas
[>pa'i tshe bcom ldanu'adas kyi tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// ji ltar dbul po la khyim gyi 'og logasazhu// dbyig dang gser gyis gang ba'i gter yod pa// del g.yab ma rlom sems yod/
min te// ngani khyod kyi yin zhes mi smra// de yi tshon sems can khyim bdag de// dbul bar gyul rnam pa mishesashing// sus kyang de labasAd pa med pasan// dbul po dazhu de'i steng na 'dug/
sgyu de ltar ngas ni sangs rgyas mig gis su// sems can de dag thams cad dbul 'dra la// de dag rnams la gter nayod pa dang// g.yabamad cing bde gshegs lus su mthong// ngani demathong
byang sems dpa' la// khyod kyis nga yi ashesumadzod byung la// dbul bamad cing 'jig rkyen mgon gyuradang// bla med chos gtor 'gyur bar gyis shes bstan// gang dag sa bstan pa la
mos gyur pa// sems can dengag kun l gterayodado// gang dgams nas bdag nyid rtsa 'a byed pa/ dengagamangang byang chub mchogamathob 'gyur// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang 'di lta ste dpan/ shing
(khama'i bris bu 'am 'dzam bu'i 'bras bu lam/ ta la'i 'bras bu 'am pa'i 'bras bu yang rung ste/ phyi'am gyi sbubs kyi nangan/ myu gu'i sa bon dmibaba'i chos can yod pa gang gisas 'batang
mas ]na/ shin gi rgyal po chen por 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs ba yang 'jig rten gnas pa 'dod chags dang/ zhe sngang dang/ gtinug dang/ srid pa dang/ mjig pa'i/
nyon mongs pa'i phyi shun kyi spubs kyis kun tu dkris par mthong ngo// de 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang ( gtimug dang/ rtsod pa dang/ marig pa'i nyon mongs pa'i sgrubs kyi nangan nAng bo gyur ba
dbazhin gshags pa'i chos nyid de nasems can zhes bya ming du chags so// de la gang bsala'agyur pa de ma ngan las 'jug pa ste ma rig pa'i nyin mos pa'i slobag yongs su u
ba'ir sams can gyi khams kyi shes na po'i tshogs su gyur pa gang yin pa danind pa desems can gyi khams kyi ye she ba chen po'i tshogs dam pa de'i/ de bzhin goshegs pa ji lta ba de/
bzhin du sna bar lha dang bcas ra'i 'jig rtan gyis mthong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i 'dushes su byed do// rigs kyi bu dag de la de bzhin gshegs pas de ltar mthong nas/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/ dbazhin gshegs pa'i ye shes khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir don de ba stonato// danas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
bka' stsal to// ji ltar sa yi 'bras bu thams cad ni/ nangan sa yi myu gu yod pa ste// tal dngani 'dzam bu kun la 'bod// nang na yod pa'i 'bras bu bskyodan skya// de bzhin chos kyi dbang phyug
sems can thams cad sgra yi sa bona'adra/de kun nang budagashegs lus yod par// bragamasangs rgyayig gi dam pasumathong// spobs bshig
[>mgyur de ni sazhus can brjod// mishesanang na gnas kyang rlom semag mad/ ting 'dzin thob ste gnas nas rab zhi ste// del g.yo ba ci yang yodam yin// dparan sdong ches bon las
byung ltar sams can 'di dag ltar 'tshang rgya zhing// sgod bcas pa'i 'jig rten skyabs 'gyur zhes// yongs su sbyang ba'i rten tungos ga dam smad du rigs kyi bdag gzhan yang 'di lta ste
dbangan/ skyes bu dbu la pa zhig la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs na po che sna bdun las bsab)lag mthil tsam zhig yod la/ de nas skyes bu dbul po dus/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
gablugs de khyer te/ 'brog dgon b lasashin tu'ada'aba' dod par gyur nas/ cinas kyanged gzhan gyis mitshorazhing/ rkun pos mi tsher ngar byuba'i phyir/des de rus rul pa dri zhim pa'i duma'adu
mas dkris te/ sa skyes bu de'abrog dgon pa dang nyes pa gang gis kyang 'chi ba'i dus byas par ma gyural/de'id bzhin gshegs pa risku gzugs rin po chalas byas pa/ ras rul pa'i
dum bus dkris pa yang rdog lamana'aphun cing 'dug pa dang/ 'gron po rnams kyisemakyisashes nas/ 'goms shinge 'goms shing dong la bas rul pa dri zhim pa'i dum bu'i thum bu kun tu dril

'a0 ba 'duge nganas rlung gis ba dus shes smad pa'i dngos por yang ston pa dang/ 'brogazhaganas pa'i lho'i mig gis rnam par bltas na// mi gzhan dag cig la bstan te/ kye skyes bu dag ras kyi dum bu'i thum bu/
'di nangan/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs ni bro chalas byas pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis phyag bya bar 'os pa yod kyis byang shig ces bsgolo// rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa
yang sams can thams cad nyon mongs pa kri bas dkros sta smadapa'i sa su gyuracing/ yun ring po ra'akhor nga 'i 'brog dgon pa na kun tu' khyab bamathong ste/ rigs kyi bu dug na dud 'gro'i gnas

su song ba rnams kyang rung ste/ sems can nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyi dkri bas dkris par gyur ba rnams kyi nang na yang de bzhin gshags pa'i lus da kyi 'drab yod pa mthong ngo// rigs kyi bu dag de bde
bzhin gshags pa ni/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong nye ba'i nyonamos pa dang bral zhing yongs su dag par gyural/ ji ltar da ltarang bzhin du 'jig rten mas cad kyis phyag bya ba'i
'os su'agyu sAm sa/ nyon mongs pa'i kibs dkris pa las thar bar bya ba'i ri/ byung tshul sems dpa' thams cad las ston to// dranas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
bka' stsal to// jiltar dring smad b.ra'os rnams kyis// yongs su dkris pa bde ba 'gashegs kyi gzugs/ nin byas pas dus dkris pa de// lam gyi ban bor ta larten gyur pa// lha yi
tsha @#/ mig gis de mthong nas su// lha des gzhan zhig lani ba skyesal// 'din de bzhin gshegs pa nin yod/ ras dus thumabu 'dzin myur du phyu// de bzhin nga yi lhamig 'di
[>'dra ba// gnasams can 'di dag thams cad kyang// nyon mongs dkribs dkris nas 'bu sdug bsngal: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngagyis nirtag gtsesamathog ngasazhinyon mongs dkris pa'inang dag/
sgo na rgyal ba'i sku ni mnyam pa rab zhag gyur la// donagayo bamadacing 'gyur yang// de yongos tha'abyed gang yang med pa'i mthong// samathongadenas skulamabatab pani// byang nub mchog dugang
zla dag zhug pa ston// de ltar sems canas nyid 'di 'drarartag/ 'di na yongs su dkris pa'i rgyal ba bzhugs// bde bar gshegasakyi ya shis yongs bkrol nas// gang tshe nyonamos thams cayab
zhing : rtade tsho'odisangs rgyas ming thob ste// lha dang mi rnamasasams ni rab tudugar// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang 'di lta ste dper na/ bud medumagomadapagyur pa mdog danapa//
yazhi pa/ snad pa ra'os pa/ 'jigs su rung ba/ bzhan mi sdug pa/ 'dromo 'dra ba zhig mgon med pa'i khang b.razhugs nas gnas so// de deraganas pa dang sbrum mar gyur te/ gang gis
gdon mi za bar 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid byed par 'gyur ba'isems can de'adra ba zhig de'i mngal du zhugs kyang/ budamed demangalan 'dug pa'i sems nad la bodag mngal du zhugs pa'i
sems zhi 'di 'dra ba zhig snyamadu yang yid la mi byed/ bdag gi mngal du zhugs sam/ ma lugs skam pa a da dadani yid la mi byedakyi/ gzhan du nad dbul ba'ims dang/ zhum pa dang//
dman pa dang/ khong du chud pa snyam pa'i sems rdzas su gnas shing/ mdog ngan pa dang/ dri'i zhim pa nyid kyi mgonamadu palibang bas gzhus te/ dus 'da' bar byed do// rigs kyi bu dag
de bzhin dusams can thams cad kyang mgon med par gyur cing/ 'khorapa'i sdug bsngal gyis gtsos par gyural/ srid par skyo ba'i gnas mgonamud pa'i khang ngan gnasaso//
denas sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs zhugs te/ khongan yod kyang sams can de dag gis khongadum chud do/ rigs kyi bu dag de la de bzhin gshegs pa nasams can dag ba dag
nyid la khyad du mi gsad par bya ba'i phyir/ rigasakyi budag khyadabadag dgroshibs byedaparakhyedabartson 'grus ba rtan par gyisangashig dang/ khyed bde bzhin gshags pa zhugs pa yod pa dus
shigan 'byung bar 'gyur khyedabyang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro b.ra'agyur gyi/ sems can zhes bya bar ni ma yin no// der yang sangs rgyushes bya ba'i gras su 'gro/
byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya b.ranim ilen zhes rjes ston to// denas de'i tshabcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka'astsal to// ji ltabumadamagonamad gyur ba zhig kha ga ngan
wa0 @#// cingagazugs ni mi sdug la// byis pa yin tamagon med khang par gazhas/ deng gi dus na nyida' spran gyur// de yi mngal du gang zhig nges bzhi// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal
[>po ba de// ri rnams kyis 'phags pa'i gling bzhi yi// bdag po byed pa 'gyur pa de 'dra po zhugs// budamadabyis po ni 'di lta bu r// mngal du zhugs sam zhugs ma shes la// mgonamed
blobang pazhiganas byed/ dbul bsnyam dusams shing dus 'da' byed// dbazhin sanisams can thams cad kyang/ mgonamod gyur la sdug nga sngalas kyisazhen// khams gsum pa yi bde
ba chung la gnas// nangan chos nyid mngal 'dra yod pa mthong// de 'dramathong nas byang chub sems dpa' la/ 'jig rten phan par byed pa mngagasan// sems can kun gyis chos nyid shes pas
kyis/ bdag man dungashasam bskyedatsug nas bstan// khyadatsam brtson 'grus brtsam pa brtan gyis dang// rang lus ring por mi thogs rgyal b.ra'agyur// dus zhib byang chub snying bo thob gyur
nas srog chags stong khrag bye ba grol byed 'gyur// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ dpatshan sbra tshil las rta gzugs sam/ glang bo che'i gzugs sam/ bu dmadakyigazugs can/
skyes pa'i gzugs dag cig byas te/ 'jim pa'i nang du bcug nas g.yogs 'bazhug/ zags par byas la gso'abazhu/ zhu bar gyur pas bkangan/ rim gyis grangs par gyur nasamanyam par
ba 0 gzhas par gyur pa'i gzugs de dag thams cad phyi rol gyi 'jim bra gnag cing kha dog mi sdug kyang nangagi nums gsebs byas rudag go nas mgar ba 'amamagar ba'i slob ma zhig gis///
de las gzugs gang dang gang dag gras brar gyur ba'am thodabu ru dang de dag gi tshom gyi 'jim pa tho bas bkogayun/ gnas skadacig de lanang na gsar las byas pa'i gzugs yodapa dag yongs su
dag pa'a'agyuraro// rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin dudabazhin gshags pa yang/ dbazhin gshegs ba'i sman gyis goms na thams cad 'jig pa'i gzugs lta bu yin la ! ril gyi rtogos
pa dang/ skaba'i namongs ba'i sbubs kyinagi spu gu sangs rgyas kyis gang brag pa mdara'iye shes ni po che'i nangan ) de bzhin gshegs pamadzes bar 'dug pa mthong ngo// rigs
kyi bu dag de la de bzhin gshegs pos sems canams cad de ltar mthong nas/ byang chub sems dpa'anang dgos/ 'di lta bu'i chos kyi rnam gras 'di dag yang dag par rab ston to//
drel byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag zhi zhing bsil ba gyur pa de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i yashes na ngo tshaongs su sbyang ba'i phyir/ dbazhin gshegs nga 'i chos kyi
rdo rje'i thobangs phyi la gyi nyon mongs pa thams cad 'gogs so/ rigs kyi bu dag mgar ba zhes bya ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshig bla dgasago/ rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
[©]/ bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ sangs rgyus kyi spyan gyis sems can thams cad de ltaramathong nas/ 2mongs pa da ngag las thar bar byas te
[>sangs rgyas kyi a shes la rab tu 'god pa'i phyir sa ston to// da nas de'i ngobcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// ji ltar gzugs ni phyi rol 'jim pas g.yogs//
nangan phru gu yod cing gsog yin pa// yin na bzhus pas rab dubakanganani// brgya stong phraganamang pora'agyur ba yin// mgar bsazhin dugrangs par gyurangashes nas// 'di ltar rin chan las byas
pa 'di// rnam dag gzugs 'gyuralas gang snyam ste// gzugs la g.yogs pa'i 'jim pa 'grogs par byad// dbazhinangs nisams can thams cad kyang// gser gathugs 'dzin pas/
g.yogs pa 'dra bas/ phyi rola'anapa nyamosaspabs yinal// nang nas dzas rgyas ye shes yod pa mthong// de la byang chub sems dpa' gang dpa ni// zhi zhing shin tu bsilakhas gyur pa dag/ gang
gis dedag nyon mongs ma lus 'byin// tshes kyi lagechags de la 'gogs par byed// zhe chen gzugs ni bskrun sdug pa ltar// rgyal sras gang zhig 'dir dgagyur pa// stobs bcu dag gis lus
rnams yongs gang ste// lha bcas 'jig rtenared dmachod par 'gyur// ngas ni srog chags thams cad de ltayathong// byadachub sems dpa' 'ang ngasanideltar mthong// de ltar dag pa bde ba'/
ba zagashegs 'gyur te// bdegashegs dgan sa ngas rgyas tshul ston to// denas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub shams dba' rdo rje'i blo gros la bka' stsal ba/ rdo rje'i blo gros rigs//
kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bumo khyig pa 'am/ rab tu byung ba yang rung/ gang zhig dbazhin gshegs pa'i snying po'is kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ kun chub bar byed pa
dang/ glegs bam dubyas te 'jog pa dang/ gzhan dag la yang rgyatsher 'tshadapa dang/ yang dagapararab tu gon pa de bsod namasam dudang 'gyuraro// rdo rje'i blo gros yang byang chub sems
dpa' gzhan gang zhigadaba'anagashegs pa'i ye shes bsgrub pa'i phyir brtson par gyural 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang sangs rgyas thams cad la yang machod pa'i phyir/ rdzu 'phrul bsgrubs

nas 'di'abu'i nga nga'adzin la snyoms par zhugs te// nganga'adzin gyi stobs bskyod pa desangs rgyas kyizhing bya ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag b+hAng+gA'i klung gi byas bas kyang mang ba rnams su gang+gA'i klung gi
byam bas kyang mang risangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang bcas pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dngabacas pa bzhugs shingaganas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa re re la yo bang ba/
brtsegs pa/ dus subadeb/ rgyar dpag tshad tsam la/ 'phang du dpag tshad bcu pa/ rin po chathams cad las byas pa lha'i dri zhum po dang ldan pa/ ma tog silamasna tshogs bkram pa/
longs spyod banamatho bamadapams cad dang ldanub// 'bumu phrag gang+gA'i klu lubanu'i bye masAnyin r zhing phul te/ bskal pa 'bum du tshang ba'i bar du 'dir bu'imachod pa byed/
[>>dbas/ rigs kyi bu ma/ gos kyi bu mo rngu gzhan zhig byung ba dusems bskyedade/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snyingapo'i tshigakyi rnamagra 'di bas dpagacig tsamalus la'atshangangam/ glegs
zlobam du gnas par byedazha/ do brogros de'i bsod namasamangon par 'du byed pa dol bsod namasamangon par 'du byed pa sngamasabargyu'achadang/ stong gi tshadang/ 'bum gyi chadang/ gras dang/
chadang/ bgrung ba dang dngagrwayang lte ba mi 'grosta/ rgyur yang mi bzed do// de rje'i blo gros yang byang chub sems duba'i gang sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su tshol bas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan bugade

rgyu dag las de bzhin gshegs pa re re la yang bskal pa 'bum tshang gi bar du/ shingaman ra ba'il tog khal bzhib 'bum 'thoral/ dordzo'i blo gros dag slong ngam dag slongan ma/ dge bsnyen nam dge bganam/
zhig gis byang chub tu sems bskyad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i tshes kyi rnam gras 'di thos nas thulao lan cig sbyar te/ rjes su yi rang zhesatshig gcig smras na/ rdo rje'i blo gros 'god
rnams mngonabara'adubya ba dang/ dge ba mngon pa 'du bya ba de lam rtog dang/ me tog phrang phul ba dang ldan ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bzhag pa'i bsod nams mngon pa 'du bya ba dang/ dge baman par

ba 3 'du bya ba snga ma des/ ba rgya'i cha dang/ stong gi dang 'bum gyi dang/ grangs dang/ cha dang/ bgrang pa dang dpar yang ra bar ni 'gro ste/ rgyur yang mi bzod do// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis/
tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// semasazhal la gang zhig byung la/ mos pa bskyod nas 'dinyana'an pa bzhi// yig ra 'dri'am glegs bam gzhag byed cing// gus dang bcas/
pas tshogs bcad gcig bshad ma// deng zhin gshegs pa snying po 'di thos nas// gang zhig byung rumchog 'di tshol byedan// bsodAnams phung po jitsam skyed gyurapa// de yi phan yon/
'dir ni kun pa gyi rdzo'aphrul stobs mchog 'di la gnas nas su// dpa' bo bskal ba dag nistong bar du// phyogs bcu rnams su mi yi gtsob dag/ nyan thos bas pa rnams la bskang
byed ji lta gang+gA'i stong mang bye ba bas// de bas lhag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// gzhal med baa garin thegalas byas pa// 'jig rten slob dbon la yang phul dadag 'phad du
dAragatshadabacu yod la/ mtshudang rgyu ni dpag tshad gcig yod ba/ spos dang bdug pa dag dang rab ldan la// da rin chan las byas khribashams shing// dar dang bcos bu'i sazhi rgya bting ba'i//
khri dag dang khri stanagazhan rnams kyang// zhiragang+gA'i klung bzhin dpag med pa// rgyal ba gcig la dbul ba byas gyur la// rgyal bgangadag 'jig rten khams zhugs pa// ji ltar ga'ici mkhas
[@{ ]/mang ba// rgyul ba de dag rnams la de ltar phul// kun la gus pa bad pa byed pa bas// mkhas pa gang zhig mdo sde 'dithosanas// dpa gcig tsam zhig yang dag 'dzin byed dam//
[>>gzung nas 'ga' zhig 'chad byedan/ de'i dbas bsod nams phung pomang/ dpa' bos bzung ba'i bsod nams 'di lani/ chadang dpar yang de ni nyer mi go srog chags dga' kun gyi
skyaba'agyur zhing// denigyur du byang H ba ga'achang rgyu// de bzhin gshegs kyisAng po 'dra yod// sems can dug pa kun gyi chos nyid 'di// byang chub sems dpa'am bas pa gangasams pa//
ni dpyang sangs rgyas maredu 'gyur/ rje'i blo gros rnam grangs 'anyis kyang 'di ltar gi nam grangs 'di ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la thams cad mkhyen pa'iye shes
bsgrub par 'gyurab dzegacig spras byed par rig par bya'o// rdo rje'iblo gros sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dusan/ bskal po glos tshad shin tu rgyas pa// tshadand do// bas
gyis khyab pa/ mtshus pa/ brjod dumadapa/ de pha rol bas kyang ches pha rol du gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dusan/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa
dang zhabs su ldan pa/ ba de bar gshegs ba/ 'jig rtamakhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha losgyur ba blanamed pa// lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa gsargyas bcom ldan 'das rtag tu'od gabar
[gtang ba zhes bya ba 'jig nadabyung ngo// rdo rje'i blo gros kyi phyi de bzhin gshegs ba de rtag tu 'od bar gtong zhes bya zhen/ rdo rje'i blo gros bcom ldan 'das de bzhin shugs la rtag tu'od zer
ga tong de byang bsams dgaragyur pan/ ma'i mngal du zhugs ma thag dudama'i mal na 'dug bzhin du lus las 'od byung// shar phyogs su 'jig rten khams 'bum phrag sangs rgyas kyi

zhing bcu'ijul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag snang bas rtag du khyob pa gyur to// dbazhin du lho dang/ nub dang/ byangodang/ sharalhodang/ lhanub dang (nub byung dang/ byang shar dang/ srog dang ! byung
gi phyogs dang phyogs bcu'i'ajig rten gyi khams 'bum phrag sangs rgyas kyis zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyad dag snang bas rtag tukhyab par gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus kyi 'od
dga' bar 'gyur ba/ sdug ba/ mchog dudagarab 'abyed pa mgu bar 'gyur bas 'jig rtan gyims 'bum phrag rigang snang bas gdukhyatsagyur to// de rdzo'iblo gros byang chub sems dbang ma'i

mang la gnas pa de'i tshod kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'bumade dag tu sems can gang dag la reg par gyur de dag thams cad gagribarjid dang ldan pa dang/ kha dog dang ldan pa dang/ dranapa dang ldan pa dang/
blo gros dang ldan pa dang/ rtogapadang ldan pa dang/ spobs ba dang ldan bsgyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum dodagasems can gangadagasams na dmyal ba dang/ duda'agro'i gnas dad//
gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang/ lham yin rnams kyinang du skyes par gyurapa de dag thams cad byang chub sams dang 'a de'i 'od kyis reg pa tsam gyis rang gi 'gro ba duganas shi 'phos

tu lha dang mi rnams kyi nang duskyes so// de dag reg pa tsam gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i spyang chub las phyi ma lhag par gyur to// yang phyi'am ldeg pagang dag la 'od des reg pa de dag rig
ma thag tu de dag thams cad mi ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/yon tan lnga brgya pa'i le'u zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang thob bo// byang H ba sems dpa' ma'imang lan gnas pa de'i lus kyi 'od kyis/
'jig rten gyi khams 'bumagang dag la reg pa gyur pa de dag thams cad nge 'ad+ma las grub par yongs su gnas par gyur to/ gsar gyi skud pas mig mang ris su bres bar gyur la/ mig mangs ris thams

cad nas kyang rin po rishing ljanam ma tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ dri dang kha dog dang ldan ba rnams 'then par gyur to// yin patsharing de dag rlung gis bskyod cing bsgralan/ 'dilta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang/
chos kyi sgra dang dge 'dun gyis dang/ byang bsams dpa'i sgra dang/ byang gsams dpa'i stobs dang/ dbang po dang/ byang chub kyi an 'godang/ rnam par thar pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ snyoms par

'jug pa'i sgra snyan pa yid du 'ong ba 'di lta bu 'di dag byung// rin po Tishing ljon pa'i sgra des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum pod dag thams cad zha/ sems can rnams dgar ba dang/ mchog tudaga' ba thob/
ba ]nas gnas so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad// sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang/ lha ma yin gyi sa rnams med par gyur to// byang chub
sems dpa'amamangalan gnas pa de yang sems can de dag thams cad la zla ba'i rakyil 'khor bzhin dusrung bar gyur te mdza' gnas pa nyid la nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du thal mo gru pa'i lag

byas so// rdo rje'i blo gros de ltar byung tshubasams dang 'a de btsas pa dang/ mngon b.rabyung ba dang/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyus kyi bar dubyang chub sems dpa' de'i lus las 'od rtag du byung
paragyur to/ mngonapar rdzogs pa sangs rgyas nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de'i lus las bod rtag tu byang ba gyurato// tshul de bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus kyi bar du bcom ldan 'das
de'i lus kyi bod dartag du byung ba gyur to// de bzhin gshegs ba de yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/ ring bsrel mchod rten la gnas pa'i yang lus kyi 'od dartag byung ba'agyur te/ rdo rje'ab gros
de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das de rtag tu 'od zer gdong zhes byabar/ lha dang mi rnams kyis mtshan gsol to// rdo rje'i bgros ang bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagashegs pa dgrabcom pa yang dag par rdzogs/

pa'i sangs rgyas rtag du'od zer gtong de dang po mngon par rdzogs pasangs rgyus pa'i bstan pa la/ byang chub samasadapa' 'od zi'amatha' ya shes bya ba g.yog stong dang ldan pa zhig byung// rdo rje'iblo gros
byang gsems dpa'a'od brematha' yas des/ bcom ldan 'dus de bzhin gshegs pa dgrabcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtag tu 'od zer gtodad la/ de/
[>bzhin gshegs pa'isnying po tshes kyi rnam grangs 'di las brtsams te yongs su bris so// denas bcom ldan 'das deb zhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtag tu 'od zer
zlogatong des/ byangogasems dpa' de dag rjes su gzungabudang/ yongs su gzung ba'iphyir stan gcig la 'jug bzhin du/ bskal pa chen po lnga brgyar de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying bo'i chos kyi rnams
grangs 'di yang dag par rab chub shad de/ des de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di tshig rnam par shes par bya bas/ chos bsgrub pa dang/ nges pa'i tshig dang/ dpara'abum

phrag du mas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la yang dag par rab tubashadapas/ phyogs bcu rnams su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su yang tshegs chung dug go/

tshe bar gyurato// doji'i blo gros de la byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam gros 'di than de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying bo zhes bya ba'i ming thos pa de dag thams cad matha'

gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su sminanas/ yon tan bkod pa de 'dra ba nyid du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs bar sangs rgyas te ! byang chub sems dpa' sems dbang sa bo/

sa ]bzhin ma gtogs so// rdo rje'i blo gros de'i tshe de'i dus// byang chub sems dpa' 'od thebamathar yas shes bya bar gyur pa degazhan zhig yin nga sAm du khyod sems// de de ltar mi blta ste/ rdo rje'i/

blo gros khyod nyid de'i tshe de'i dusan/ byang chub sems dpa' 'od zeramatha' yas zhes bya bar gyurato/ bcomaldan 'das de'i bstan pa la gang dag da dung du yang banamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'byung mngon

par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i byung chub sems dpar bzhi po dedag gang zhe na ('dit+ta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam bal dad/yathun thob dang/ rgyun ras gzigang ba phyug dung rdo rje'i bgo byed nyid dbazhi/
rdo rje'i blo gros de ltarade bzhin gshegs pa'iging po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa tsam gyis byang jug sems dpa' chen po rnams la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes sgrub pas don ma yin// denas de'i/
tshabcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// 'das pa'i dus ni bskal pa mtha' yas na// bcom ldan 'od thubagatong zhes bya ba byung// de yi lus las 'di 'dra'i 'od byungabs//
zhingonams bye ba stong dag snang bar gyur// rgya'ab dang pomangon rdzogs sangs rgyas rig/ byang chub sems dpa' 'od zeramatha' yas kyis// demyobado gshegs rgyal dbang de la zhus// mdo 'di rtag
tuyang dag rab tu bshad// gangagis rgyal de'i bstan las mdo sde 'di// 'dren pa las ni mngonagum thos gyurang// dekun gyur du byang chub dam pa thob/ byang chub sems dba' bzhi'i
[9]/ mag rtogs te// mthu chen thob dngathun ras gzigs dbang phyug/ byang rlugasemag dparu'ajam dpal gsum pa sku/ rdo rje'i blo gros khyod nyid bzhi pa yi// dache
po dag gis mdo 'dis// byang chub sems dpa'amed gabrematha' yas pa/ dotshigang gis rgyal zhus byungs// de yi dbang byas bde gshegs sras po// de'i tshe rdo rje'i blo grosakhyod
zlanyid yin// nga yang sngonanibangachub spyodaba'i// bde bar gshegs pasangaga'i rgyalamanalas// mdo sde 'di yi minganithosapang gyur// gus bar byas tathos nas thal mo sbyar// ngani/
legs par byas pa'i las de yis/ byang chub dam pa myurang shub par gyur// de bas byang chub sems dang lamakhas rnams kyis// rtag tumado mchog 'di'i gabrung bar bya// jorje'i blo gros
gas kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo lA kyi sgrib bsgrib+bapagang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'ichos kyi rnam gras 'dinyan tam/ lung nodadam kha ton byed dam/ stonakyang rang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
'un pa dang/ lunganod pa dang/ kha ton byed pa dang/ rab tu 'thad pa dang/ yi ger 'dribadedag la chogs chung dus chos de dug kyang mangon sum du 'gyur/ las kyi sgrib pa de yang byung ba'agyur ro//
de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am// rigs kyi bum gang lasakyi sgrib pas bsgribs par mi 'gyur zhing
wa tshes kyi rnam grasu 'del brtsonaparab gyid pa de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji ngacig las mang du shes pas bstan pa'i slad du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur lags bcam ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bumo gang dag sangs rgyas brgya'i chos bstan pa kun du gzungaba'i phor nges par 'byung ba dag kyang yod do// kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
kyi bu mo gang dag sangs rgyas nyis brgya dang sum brgyadang/ bzhi brgya dang/ lnga brgyadang/ stong dang/ nyis stongadang/ sum stongadang/ bzhi stong dang/ lnga stong dang/ drug stong dang/ bdun
stong dang/ brgyad stong dang/ dgu shong dang/ khridang/ sangs rgyas bam nas/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum gyi b.radag gis chos bstan pa kun tugakhrung ba'i phyirangs par 'byungaba'agyur ba
dag kyang yod do// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dbang gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ gzhan dag la yang rgyu cher yang dag par rab tu stonapa dang/ glegs bam du byas te/

'chang ba des 'di snyam du bdag gis de nyid thunam da ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/ de ni ji ltar da ltarang bzhin du lta dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin du bcas
pa'i 'jig rten gyi phyag bya ba'i 'os dang/ mchod pa'i sa yin// nas pa'itsho bcom ldan 'dasakyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka'astsal to dbyang chub sems dpa'amado sde 'di thog nas//
[/ ]@#// bdag gis byang chub dam pa thob par bsam// gang gi lag namado sde 'di yod pa// denang ltar 'jig rten phyag bya'i 'os// de ni 'jig rten mgon po rnam bar 'dren//
po khrid byed rnam par khridabyebasngags pa'i 'os// ga gi laganamadosde 'di yod pa// de ltar chos kyi rgyal zhes bya// gang gi lags mdo sde 'diyodapa// ma yi byamchog chos kyi sgron ma
'dzin// zhi ba lhabur lta ba'i 'is// 'jig rten mgonapo lta bu r phyag bya'i gnas// bcom ldan 'dasakyis de skadatsaabaka'agalanas/ ngub sems dpa' rdo rje'i blo gros dang//
[% ]thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dngang/ nyan thos chen po de dag dang/ 'khor bzhi po dang/ lha dang mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri za bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/
bcom ldan 'dasakyis gsungs pa lamangonaparab stodad// 'phags pa dbazhinagashegs pa'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/// rgya gar gyimakhan po
shAkya pra b+ha dang/ nu+in gyi la baban d+he bshes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ @#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yatsatur dA ka lA
d+hiranAmam hAyAnasU tA bodaskad du 'phagasapa khye'u bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa ba'i mdo/ ma po dang po// gangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dong 'bag cad laphyag
a ]'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba de nyid kyi dus kyi tshe/ ku sha'i grong khyeban/ gyad rnams dang ba na yod la shing sA la zung
gi tshalan 3 shing sA la zungagib nabazhugs go/ de nas tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bro bcom ldan 'das ga 'dar sod sa phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das
mig mi 'dzugs par rtog cinga'adug go/ denus bcom ldan 'das kyis chodang lhan pa kun dga' bo' bka' stsal pa go 'u tam bu khyod ci'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa la
