zlogis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'adz+dzana'adi thob pa lags sam/ 'onote 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dgan yang gang dgaspyan lta bu ritang nge 'dzin 'di thob pa'i skyes bu dam

padag kyang mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ]pad+ma'idapal gyi snying po sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub kyi phyogasatshalegs su sangs rgyasakyi zhing bye ba brgya stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams

bdeb can zhes bya ba yodade/ don de bzhin gshegs ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas 'od dpagamed ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing du

nabyang chub sems dparasems dpal chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bya'adang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chenathob ces bya ba dang gnyis ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa yin// pad+ma'i

dpal gyisnying nge skyes bu dam pa dganyis las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gzhan dag nub bdun du 'dri ba'i lanyan pa de dag sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo// de skadaces bka' stsal pa dang/

[; ]bcom ldan 'dus la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ad+ma 'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing na sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i byang chub
sems dpa ra soms dpa' chen po ming dumachis so// de ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dba'i sems dba' chen bo de dag ni bsgrim mi
'tshal bar skyes bu dam pa de gnyis las chos 'dri ba'i lanyan pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkar stsal pa/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po dziskad zeb de de bzhin te danabyang chub sems dpasems
dpar chen po gang dag sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa dag nitshadamed grangs med do// daskad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dba'asems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dbal gyi
snying pos 'di skadaces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis jilta bu'i sams kyi mtshanam bstan pas/ skyes bu dam pa de gnyisu'ajig
rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir bar 'gyur ba dang/ bde pan gyi 'jig rten gyi khams de dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag mod de yang 'jig rten
gyi khams 'din gda' bar gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa legs par mdzad dugasol ) deci'i slad du zhen ) bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa de gnyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dimachis/
ka/ @#// byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa parigs kyi budang/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ skyes bu dmar da gnyis las chos 'di pa'i lan thos pas/

sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob par 'gyur ) sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas 'od dpag med de

zla[']yongamathong ste/ mthong nas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mdag/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skya bar smon lam 'debs pa dang/ deraskyes
( ma thag duman med pa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'e byang chub las phyir mi ldeg par 'gyur ba'i slad du'o// denas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpasems dpar chen po pad+ma'i dpal gyi
snying pos gsol ba btab par mkhyen nas/ mdzod spu nas 'od rab tu bkyalta/ 'od des stongagasum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gsegyi kha dog gi snang chen pos khyab par gyur to//
stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'din ri'itshogs dang/ shing ljon pa dang/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang/ ri btang bzung dang/ btangobazung chen bo dang/ khor yug dang/ khor yug

chon po gang dag yod ba dang/ gang dag 'jig rten gyi b.ragyi mun pa mun nag de dag thams cad kyang gser gyi kha dog gi snang ba des khyab bar gyur to// nyim dang zla ba 'diltar rdzu 'phrul cha ba/ 'di ltar
ba/ mju ba/ 'diltaradabang chab r grags pa 'di dag kyang mig gi dbang po la snang bar ma gyur to// nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya stong las thal nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde/
ba can de thams cad gsegyi kha dog snangar chag bos khyab b.ragyur to// de nas 'od dbam ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isas rgyas 'od dpag med kyi zhabs
la phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskong bcas nas/ bcom ldan 'das de smyonastar mi snang bar gyur to// de nas gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams bdeb can der skyes pa'i sems can rnams dang/ byang chub
sems dpa' rnams dang/ nyan thos de dag gis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di mthong zhing/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shA kya thub pa byung chub
sems dang ri tshogs kyis longs su bskor cing/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dunagyis mdun gyis bltas pa de yang mthong sta dpagan skya ru ra'i 'bras bu lag mthil du bzhag pa ltar mthong nas/ de dag dga'

ba dngamchog tu dgar ba rgya cher skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs paresams rgyasaM shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lozhas tshig de skad kyang brjod do// 'jig
rten gyi khamasami mjed 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du gang dag 'dus pa/ dgaslong dang/ dag srongam dang/
0 @#/ dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyenam dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri khri dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding nang/ mi 'am ci ded/ lta phya chen po dang/
mi dang/ mi ma yin pa dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba dang/ byang chub sems dpar 'dus pa de dag gis kyang 'jig ska gyi khams bde ba can de dang/ de bzhin gshegs
ts+tsa[” ]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag mdabyang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis mdun gyis bltas te/ ri'i rgyal pobazhin
du'abar ba de dang ]thams cad dang ldan pa'isangs rgyas kyi zhing de yangs lemathong ste/ 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu mig dang ldan pas 'dom gang tsam gyis phyogs na skyes bu ye shes kyi bzhin gyi
dkyil pa'i bsgrim mi dgos par mthong ba de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag tumad

rtsa bamathong ngo// 'jig rten gyi khams bdeb canayon tan bye ba khrag khrig brgya so bdunas gangab yon tan gyi bkodal chen po dang ldan b de yang snangang// mthung nas kyang dga' ba dang/ mchog turaga' ba rgya

chen po skyas te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig de skadakyang brjod do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag

00 pabastan pa mdzad kha na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i sngonasams maskyed pa'i srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sams skyes so// 'jig rten gyi khams

bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ba dang/ blazhu med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'gro la// 'jig rtag gyi khams bde ba can du na/ byang chub sems dba'asams dpa' chen po
dang/ nyan thos chenapo gang dga' khod pa dedag gis/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzoda'adi mthong nas ngomatshar du gyur te thalam sgra nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag bar

rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal zhing tshig 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal nas kyang brjod

do byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen podang/ nyan thos chen po de dag gis tshig de brjod ma thag tu ) da'atshithams cad dang ldan pa'i rajig rtan gyi khams de rnam pa drug tu'agul rag tu 'gul kun tu
rab tu 'gul/ g.yos/ rad tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ ldeg/ rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rag ldeg 'ur 'ur rab tuphur ra/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur 'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab
turakhrugs/ chem chem/ rab tuchem chem/ kun tu chem chemamo// denas byang chub sems dpa' soms da pa' chen po spyan ras gabrigs dbang phyug dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen pomathu
[rg) ]dachen thob/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs kha dgrabcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpagamedag la ba der dong ste phyi nas/ bcom lhag 'das kyi zhabs la/
pho mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ zhes dang bcas par phyogs gcig tulakhod do// skyes bu dam pa de gnyis phyogs gcig tul danas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas shAkya thub pa remathu brtan pa brnyes pa'i bcom ldan 'das ngomatshar to// bde bar gshegs pa dmatshar to// de ci'i slad du zhen/
bcom ldan 'das 'di ltakhacom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de'i mtshan brjod pa tsam gyis ) sems ma mchis pa'i rigs 'di yang
rnam pa drug tu g.yos pa'i slad du'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpagamed kyis/ skyes bu dam pa de gnyis la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag sangs rgyas
kyi zhing 'di na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i mtshanabarjodapag tshad kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan du ma dgan yang

bcom ldan 'das de'i mtshan yongs su brjod do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang 'od desa'i ga pas rnam ba drug tu rab tu g.yos so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dganasems 'tshadamed grangs med

ba dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'imatshathos nas/ dgaba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par gyur bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'ibyang chub las phyir mi ldog bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems

dpa'i'akhor de las byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bzhibanus ) bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i mtshan thos so// thos nas kyang de dag thams cad 'dus nas mgrin gcig tu ngag b.rertsa ba rnams
bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yos susngo'o// de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyimi ldog khalung bstan te// dazhas de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dapagamed de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gabrigs dbang phyug dang ) byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po mthu chen thob kyis 'daskad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pashAkya thub pa des sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i 'od 'di btang ba rgyu ma mchis rkyenaa mchis par ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin/

gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas shAkya thub pas 'di ltar yid dumachis pa dang/ 'di lta bltan sdug pa'i 'dam gtong negang gi sladadu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya
thub pa des 'di ltar yid dumachas ba dang/ diltar blta na sdug pa'i 'od bkra ba 'di'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyenatsi lags/ daskad ces gsol pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyis/ skyes bu
[Se; ]@#/ ]nam pa deganyis la 'daskad ces pa ka bstsal te// shes kyi bu dgazid smas ba de deb shin te/ rgyu med rkyen med pa bcom ldan dus des/ 'di ltar yid du 'ong ba dang/ 'a na/
blta na sdug pa'i 'od mi bgyi'o/ daci'i phyir zhen bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs bdagrabcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de/ dadabyang+gachub mas dpa'i 'jug pa zhes

bya ba'i ring 'dzin rin po che bsgrub pa'achos kyi rnam gras stol 'gyur te/de'i phyirebcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa des chos bstan pa de yis ltas su 'di ltar yid du 'ong ba dang : 'di ltabalta na sdug pa'i
da 'dibaskyegro/ danas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa sa rgyas 'od dapagam de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan rasagathigs dbang phyag dang/ byang tshub/
sems dpa' semasarapachenapomathuchen thob kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegasapa dgrabcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la 'olta ba dang/
phyag bgyi ba dang/ mchodapa dang/ bsnyen bkur bgyi de dang/ chos bstan pa de yang nyan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 'ge rten gyi khams mi mjedadematshi/ bka' stsal pa/ rigasakyi
bu dag pa com ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de spyang ki las brtsams techos ston pa 'gyur gyis/ deri al dbab par shes na khyed dang shig ces skabs phya bas/ de nas byang chub sems
ba ba/ dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang/ byang chub sems dba' sems dpar chen po' chen thob kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i nye la khong ga 'bod/

pa'i spyang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bzhi bcu po rnamasal smras pa/ rigs kyi bu dag tshur shog khyod kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya

thub pa de la blta ba dang/ phyag bya ba dang/ mchod pa dang/ bstanAthAkurabyab dang/ chos bstan pa de yang mnyan pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten gyi khams mimajed der 'dong ngo// de ci'i phyi'i zhin/ bcom ldan
'das de bzhin gshegs padagra bcom pa yang dgar rardzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa no/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yos su dag pa gzhan dang gzhan dag na yod pa spangs nas/ smon lam dang thugs rjen mos
sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can rer byung ste/ mas can dman pa la mos pa/ 'dod chags kyi shas cheb/ zhe snangagishas cheb/ gtimug gi shas che ba rnams kyi nang du/ bla na med pa yang dag

bar rdzogs/'byang chub mngon par rdzogs posangs rgyas pa'idaka' ba mdzad pa'i phyir ro// skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyis tshig 'di:sa ma thag tu/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de'i byung chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad lhan cig 'dus nas mgrinagacig du tshig smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de re mtshan thos de
[j ]da ga kyang red ra legs par red pa lags na/ gang dag gis sha rimig gis de mngon sum du mthong la/ mthong nas kyang dad pa med pa dag lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan
po 'das bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang/ phyag bgyi ba dang bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang/ chos
bstan pa de yang manyan pa'i slad du/ 'jigeg rten gyi khams mi mjed der mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag byed de ri dus la da bab par shesan dang zhig/ de nas byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis yodras su bskor nas
mdun du bdarate/ 'jig rtenagyi khams bde ba can dezhas dong ngo// de nas deri re lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'dus byas pas/ byang chub sems dpa 'bye ba phragabargyad

ka shu rtsabazhi ba de dag thams cad re re la yang khang pa brtsegs pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhisprul pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngonobar 'du bya ba mngon par 'dus byas so// khang pa brtsegs pa de dag kyang gru bzhi lham pa/

ka ba bzhi smug pa/ mamanyam pa ) legs par rnam par phyu ba/ legs par son pa sha stag go//khang pa brtsigs pa re re yang 'phang du ni dang ga tshad bcu gnyis/ rgyar ni dpag tshad brgyad do// khang brtsegs
[s/ ]pa dag gsar las byas pa dag kyang yod/ dngul las byas pa dag kyang yod/ brlu las byas pa dag kyang yod/ shel las byas ba dag kyang yod ( mu tig dmar po dang/ rdo'i snying po dang/ sprug las
byas pa dag kyang yod ) rin po che gsar dang/ dngul dang/ sna gnyis pa dag kyang yod/ rin po che gser dang ) dngul dang/ba zlumang [） ]sna gsum pa dag kyang yod/ rinapo chagasar dang/ dngulo dang/
be rmadang/ shel dang/ sna bzhi pa dag kyang yod/ rin po chagaser dang/ dngul dang/ bzlumu dang/ shel dang/ mu tig dmar po dang/ lnga pa'i khang pa brtsigs pa dag kyang yod/ na po chegaser dang/
dngul dang/ bi klurlu dang/ shel dang/ mu tig dmar po dang/ sbug dang/ snajugang re khang pa brtsigs pa dag kyang yod/ rin po che ba/sar dang/ dngul dang/ bu rmadang/ shel dang/ mu tig dmar bodang/

grug dang/ rdo'i snying po dang/ sna bdunapare khang pa brtsegapa dag kyang yod/ na dan dmar po las byas pa'i khang pa brtsigs pa dag kyang yod/ tsan dan sbrul gyi snyingapa laMs byas pa dag kyang yod/ a ka ru dang

dan lasabyas pa dag kyang yod/ a ka ru nag po dang tsan dan las byas pa dag kyang yod/ tsan dan thams cad las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dgakyang yod/ ma tog ud+ma la dad/ pad+ma dang/ ku mu dA dang/

pad dkar po las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/ sna ma'i ma tog dang 3 ba sha ka dang/ tsam pa ka dang/ skya snaradang ( a ti mug ti ka dang/ ta ran deng/ go ta pa las byas pa'i khang brtsegs
ba dag kyang yod/ me tog da nusu ra las byas pa'i khang pa brtse gas pa dag kyang yod/ ma tog mnar dang/ mnar chen po las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/ ma rtog pa rusha ka
[>dang/ pa rusha ka chen po dang/ man dzushakadang/ mamadzungashakachen po dang/ mdogamadzes dang/ mdog mdzes chenapo dang/ ma rtog 'khor lo dang/ 'khor 'tshanapo dang/ kun tu 'khor lo dang/

tu 'khor lo dang/ shin tumadzes pa'i 'khor lo dang me tog zla ba dang/ smra ba chen po dang/ shin tumadzes pa'i zla ba dang/ zla bamchog dang sbra la dang/ sgra la chen po dang/ shin tu mdzes pa'i sku la las

byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/ ma tog thams cad las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/ kha dog dum pa/ kha dog sna tshogs pa// kha dog brgya stong dum pa/ bkra ba/ phalta na sdug

pa/ yongs su dag pa/ 'od gsal bdagakyang yodado// khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang lha'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stongamangon par sprul te/ den lha'i bu mo kha cig lagazhi dung ba/ rnga bo chadang/ rdza rnga dang/ raMb

'tshe/ ja dwang 3 pi wang rgyud gcig pa dang/ glu dbyangs sgra snyan pa dang/ gling bu dang/ rgyud zhu pa wang dang/ pa wangargyud gsum pa rnams thogs te/ sil snyan dang/ glu dbyangs dang/ rol mo'i sgra skadarnam pa mang

po de lta bu lenacing 'khod do// lha'i bu mo kha cig ni tsan dan dmar po'i phyi ma riyur ma thogs shing 'khod do/ lha'i bumo kha cig ni tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i pha ma'i phur thogs shing 'khod do// lha'i

bu mo kha cig ni a ka ru dang tsan dan gyi phyi ma'i phur ma thogs shing 'khod do// lha'i bu mo kha cig ni cis ka ru nag po dang/ tsan dan gyi phyama'i phur ma thogs shing 'khod do// lha'i bu mo kha cig ni tsan dan/
thams cad kyi phyamari phur ma thogs shing 'khod do// lha'i bumag kha cig ni sut+pal dang// da dang/ ku chud dang/ pad+ma dkar po'am tog gi phur ma thogs shing 'khod do// lha'i bu mo bcig ni mo
togaman+dar dang/ man+da rachen po dang/ pa ruka dang/ ba ru shaka chen po rang/ man dzu shaka dang/ man jusha kachen po dang/ me tog mdog mdzes dang/ mdog mdzes chen po dang/ ma rtog 'khor la
dang/ 'khor lo chen po dang/ kun tu 'khoral dang/ shin tu mdzes pa re 'khor lo dang/ ma rtag blu ba dang/ glu ba chen po dang/ shin tu mdzes pa'i zla ba dang/ blu ba mchog dang/ sbrul dang/
sgra la chen po dang/ shin mdzes pa'i sgra la'am tog gi phur ma thogs shing 'khod do// lha'i bu mo kha cigami ma tog thams cad dang/ bdug pa dang/ spos dang ma togaruphreng dang/ byug padang
phyi mar phur ma thogs shing 'khodad/ de khang pa brtsegs pa re rarayang bkod pa chen po seng ge'ikhril skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan pa'i de bzhin gshegs ba'i

skumangon par sprul to// khang pa brtse gas pa rerar yang mu tig dkar po dang/ mu tig dmar po dang ) mu tig mthon ka'amu tig gi 'phrengab brgyad khri bzhi stongamangon par sprul to// khang pa brtsegs pa'irer

0 @#// yang lha'i ras bcos khu'i rgyal mtshan gsar gyi kri'i bu ga yang kari dra bas g.yogs ba brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par sprul to// khang ba brtse gas pa'i rer yang smos kyi phur ma rgyud khri/
[>>bzhi stong mngonapasprul to// khang pa rtsigs pa re rer yang gadagu kha dog dum pa// kha dog sna tshogs ba/ 'dog brgya stong dum/ bkrab/ blta na sdug pa legs par las su byas pa/ dbyibs

shin tulegs ba brgyad khri bzhi stongamangon b.rasprul to// khang pa brtsegasab ra'i yang shing ta la'i 'phreng brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon bar sprul to// khang ba brtsegs pa rang yang rin ba che shing ljon pa brgyad khri

bzhi stongamangonapar sprul to// khang pa brtsegasaM pa re rer yang dril bu g.yer ka'adra ba gang dag rlung gis bskyod na da lta bu'i sgra dag 'amyong ba redi lta ste 3 dpal nAlha sil snyan yan lag bye ba brgya stong dang ldan

bamakhas pa dug bas legs pa bsgrungs nus sgra 'byung ba de bzhin du/ dril bu g.yeraka'i dra ba de dpo/kyang rlung gi skyon sgra na pa yid du 'ong ba dag 'byungab brgyad khri bzhi stong mngonapal sprul to// khangal
brtsegs pa 'dor yang rdzing bu zhig gsar gyi khyim bdal ba/ bzludangashel gyis spras pa/ rin po chesnya'adugyi kha khyer gyis bskob/ ma rtog ut+pal dang/ pad+ma dang/ kuutAdong/ pad+ma dkar pos

gang 3 ngur pa sgra 'byin pa// yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chusaMgang ba/ bya'og gis btung du rung bar mu dang khad chad du gang pa dag sprul te/ khang ba btsugs pa re rer yang ni po che'i shing ljon ba'i 'phrang

tsa 0 ba rim pa bdun gyis bskor to// rin po che'i skud pa brgyud khri bzhi stong gis kun nas dkris sa// rin po che'i khang pa brtsigs pa re re'i 'od kyis kyang dpag tshad brgyad khribazhi stong du srung bar gyur to//
de bzhin du khang pa btsugs pathams cad kyi bkod ba dgaso sor byas so/ danas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po radag gi khang pa brtsigs pa bkodapa dzisnyad yod pa/ khang pa brtsigs pa de dag thams cad kyi nangan bkod pa chen pa
gang dag yod ba de dag thams cad khangang btsugs pa re re angon babasprul to// snga ma bzhin du sbagate/ khang pabatsugs pa re rer yang de ltarab kod pa rnamasamangon bar sprul nas/ bkod bde lta bu

dus byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyud khri bzhi stong dang lhan cig tu 'di lta ste/ dban skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa las brkyang b dang/ borkyang galas bskum pa tsam gyis dedagag
yi phrang cig yudatsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin to// denas byang chub sems dpa'i dgashos kyis de'i tshe ji lta bu'i
rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngonabang 'dus byas pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di rang lagamathil bzhin dumanyam par gyur pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'dus byas
@#/ sa da duchub sems dang 'dedag kyang khang pa brtsigs pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar nas ) yon tan gyi bkod pa chen po dang ldan pas shin tu
[>>lhag ga'o/ khang ba brtsi ba/sa bde dag gi 'od kyis kyang/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bas khyab par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems da pa ba dganyis/
zlobcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste phyinanas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
kAH dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lan ba gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs la cig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ skyes bu dam pa
zlade gnyis kyis tshig 'an par sgra dbyangs gcig tu[】 ]bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// gzi brjid mtshus med yon tan phung po gcig la phyag 'tshal
la [7 ]drang srong chen po kun mkhyen yon tan kun gyi pha rol gshegs// thams cad zil gnon srid ba gsum gyi chags pa'i lam las 'das/ shAkya khyu mchog dri bral bla ba'i zhul la
phyag 'tshal lo// nyim dri med lta bu'i sku dang ldan pa rnam par mdzes// mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis dag gi go chamanabs gyuratshang// dpa byad brang po rnams kyis spras pa 'jig rten kun
[z/]tu gsal mi mchog khyad mtshungs 'jig rten gsuman gang yang yong ma mchis// bde bar gshegs pa'i sku yi 'od kyis gang tsha reg gyur pa// de'i tshe 'jig rten nyi ma bla ba nor bu zhugs rnams
dang/ brgya byin tshas ba lha dang de bzhin mi rnams kyi 'od// snag tsha'i phung po bzhin dumog mog mi snang gsalam mchis// rgyal ba zhing gcig nani yang dag bzhugs par gdar bzhin du// 'gro ba'i
don du skadacig gcig gis mtha' yas zhing du gshegs// ston pa'i bzhud dang byen pa 'tshal ba su yang yongam mchis// mdzad pa dag dang 'dul ba sna tshogs dag gis sems can 'dul// sgra yi phud
gcig nang du mtha' yas zhinge rnams ston mdzad kyang// 'ab la ba dang ni bri bar gyur pa gang yang yong ma mchis// 'di ni je bzhin las dang byed pa rgyu dang 'bras gda' la// sems can rnams la gnod pa
mamachis 'dres par gyur ma mchis// gang na sems can dmyal ba dud 'gro yi dogs mamachis shing// rgyal ba'i sras po grags pa chen po dag gi sa yo ngas gang la// mi khom brgyad po dag dang bral te
mchog du nyams dang/ 'bar// yongs dag zhing de dag kyang mi mchog la lar ston pa mdzad// lhagi gang dag ma 'jigs bag mams ba bgrang mad du// sems dmyal dud 'gro yi dgas 'gro ba shin tu mi
babad pa'i// kun nas nyon mongs zhing rnams la 'a dag kyang bstan mdzad nas// de dag thams cad bade bar gshegs 'askyabs su nye bar mchi ]/zhing gzhan la la dag kyang nam mkha' lta bu r ston pa/
mdzad// de bzhin gzhan yang zhub sa kyi bltamangs rtse 'brugs pa dang// zhing gzhan dag kyang g kyis yongs su bltam par ston pa mdzad// rnam 'phrul 'di ni thams/
cad m khyen pa'i ye shes yul lags so// 'dul ba redon du gzugs kyi rnam pa mtha' yas stonamadzad pa// la lama'adod pa'i dbang phyug 'dod chags gzugs dang ldan par 'gyur// tshangs pa'i/
zlo bdag pomchog tu ni bo'i ting 'azhired pa dang// sum cu rtsa gsum dbang phyug mig stong darje 'bar ba dang// srog chags brgya phrag mang po rab tu dga' bas mchod bgyid cing// dgab bcu po dag gis
( sems nas mthar yas 'dul bgyid ba// blon po tshong dpon dag dang bka' la gtogs pa'i gtso gyur cing// shin tu 'jigs med dgra tshogs phab nas chad pas mi gcod la// bsduba'i dngos po bzhi
pos sems can rnams ni sdudabagyid cing// rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'am lasems can rab tu 'jog bgyid pa// bsod nams las kyi rin chen bdun dang ldan pa'i rgyurapa yi// gling bzhi dag gi dbang
phyug labales sgyur ba dag tu rgyu// 'jig rtan 'di na la larab ltam pa lta bu ston mdzad de// dag sa la gom pa bdun dag bo zhing gshegs nas kyang// ngan skyes nas skyo dang 'chi bo'i tham
dbyung bzhes// yid 'ong yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gsung mchog brjod pamadzad// mar me mdzad pa tshun chad drim thams cad sngas lags kyang// 'gro rnams sas rgyas ye shesamchog la
[747]yongs smin mdzad sladadu// la larasams can dag pa btsun mo'i 'khor na bzhugs par gda'o// ma yi dbang po btsun mo dgadangasras kyang ston pa mdzad// yab yum dag dang gnyen gyi rtsa lag sdug par//
'khor rnams dang// yul 'khor 'byor dang rin chen gter mdzod mang bo btang mdzad nas// brgya byin tshangs pa dag dang lhamin rnams kyis phyag bgyis shing// drang srong chen po mngon pa byung ste nags
bzhugs pa ra gda'o// 'gro la sman slad dgung lo drug tu dka' ba spyad nasan// bsam gtanamakhar khyab 'azhi chen mchog la bsam gtan mdzad par gda'o// mu stags can gyi tshogs rnams thams cad
tshar gcad madzad slad du// sems can dag pa byang chub shing drung du yang gshegs bar gda'// 'gro rnams sangs rgyus ye shes mchog tu yongs smin mdzad slad du// mi dbang sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin
mchog la bzhugs mdzad nas// sku yi tshul ni gang gis 'jig rten rnam par 'dul 'gyur ba// rgyal ba de 'dra nyid kyi sku yi cha lugs 'dzin pa mdzad// ji ltar skyam mkhan gyis 'a gro ba rmongs par bgyid
slad du/ sgyu mamang po'i rnam bar 'phrul pa rab tu ston bgyid pa// de bzhin 'gro ba'i sgron mas sems can 'dul bar mdzad slad du// sangs rgyas nyid kyi rnam por 'dzul pamang pa rnams kyang ston//
thub pa dpa' bo la lar dpung dang bcas pa'i bdud 'dul ston// gang la rol mu stegs tshogs kyi 'gro ba mamachis shing// rdul bral mya nganamams thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa// bla na med ra
'gyur ba ma mchis 'khor lo rab tu bskor// khyed kyis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang nas byang chub brnyes// phyogs kyis lam rnams thams cad du yang 'khor la skor ba
mdzad/ mi yi dbang po kun nas zhal ldan rgyazla bzhin du zhugag/ bde gshigs rang byungamatha' yas yul la bdag cag phyag 'tshal lo// la la dag lasangs rgyas chos kyi sku ni ston
mdzad pa// rtag pa brtan ba the zug 'gyur ba ma mchis gyur ba dang// ma bgyis ma skyes drimamo mas 'gog pa mamachis chos// mig yor 'dra bas phyogs bcu dag ni shin tu rgyas par 'gengs//

ring por ma thogs par ni sdug pa dag dang pral 'gyuragyis// 'dusabyas 'di la khyed cag yid brtan bya ba'i mo roges zhes// 'gro ba thams cad rmi lam sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra ba dang// mi rtag mi brtan spyad
cig bar yang la la dag la ston// bde gshegs sku yi 'khri'i bsam 'dang pha rol yong ma mchis// gsung dang thugs kyi 'jug pa'i spyod yul dag kyang dbagami lang// nam mkha' lta bu r rgya chatshan
a ma mchis pa ston mdzad de/ rgyal ba'i spyod yulasems can rnams kyis 'tshal bar nus ma lags// phyogs bcudogazhumachis pa'i sems can ma lus ji snyed pa// de dag 'di'i bu dang 'dra bar
shes rab ldan gyur kyang// rgyal ba chos kyi rgyal po'idabang po'i yulatshadaamachis pa// rgyal ba'aspyod yul thams cad de dag rnams kyis rig mi nus// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi yashesamakha 'dra pha
'a mtha' ma mchis// daltar rgyal ba'i yul ni bsam gyisam khyab ma lus pa// 'di ni rgyal ba'i sras rnams kun dang nyan thos rnams dang// rkyen gyi rgyal ba 'dus ba rnams kyis 'tshal ba nus ma lags//
de ltar 'di dag la sogs mtha' yas thabs dang ldan pa yis// 'dul ba'i don du sku yi mdzad pa mthar yas ston par mdzad// nam mkha'i khams dang mtshungs par mtha' yas sku dang ldan gyur ba// mgon po
rtog dang rnam par rtog dang bral la phyag 'tshal lo// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho chen pha rol rab tu brgal gyur pa// nyon mongs thul ba rgyal ba 'gro ba'igatso la bstod pa yi// bsod nams cimachis des
'an 'gro ba ma lus pa// byang chub rin chanarab mchog zhi zhing bde la sreg par shog// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snganaras gzigs dbang phyug dang/ byang chub sems dparasems
dma' chenapo mthunathobakyis tshul dang 'thunapa'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon ra ra bstodazhas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam zhes skusha gsolal// nyam ngar zhung ngam/ bskyod pa ya ngangam/ stobs dang
ldan nam[？ ]bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes kyang snyan gsol lo// 'di skadaces bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dag 'jig rten gyi khams nyams dga' ga'altar stsol cig ces kyang gsung ngo//
de nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir byang chub sems dang ra dang/ nyan thos chen po de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khong nga brtsa gas pa'i bkod pa chen po des yongs su/

khyab pa dang/ rin po che sna tshogs dag kyang mthong nas ngo mtshar du 'dzinacing ) dedag 'di snyam du sams te/ gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams bdebacan nas 'dir lhags pa 'di dub/ci de bzhin gshegs pa'i
ts+tso mthu 'am 'on te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag gi mthu yin snyam mo// de nas dar sangs rgyas kyis mthus/ byang chub sems dpa' de nas dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dpal gyi stong pas
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di khang pa brtsigs pa sna tshogs du mas brgyan cing yongs su khyab par gda' ba ni/ bcom
ldan 'das ngo mtsharato// bde bar gshegs pa mchog tu mtshar to// gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags pa dag ci de bzhin gshegs pa'amathu
lags sam/ 'on te byang chub sams dpal 'di dag gi mthu lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byanguchub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying
la 'di skad ces bka'astsal to// bapa'i dbal gyi snying po 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di rin po che sna tshogs kyi khangapa brtsigs pa du mas brgyan cing yongs su khyab par snang ba 'di ni/ da bzhin
gshegs pa'i mthu ma yin gyi/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'asams dpa' chen po ldan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa mthu chen thab kyi mthu yin no///
gsol pa 'di ltar 'di dag gi mthus/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa brtsigs pa du mas brgyan cing yongs su khyab par gda' ba ni/ skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis
kyismon lam dag dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dag yongs su sbyangs pa bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ bcom ldan 'das ngamatshar to// bde bar gshegs pa mchog tu ngo mtsharato// bcom ldan 'das

kyis bkaT stsal pa// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po ji skud snas pa de de bzhin te/ skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa nas dge ba'i rtsa ba dag yongs su spungs pa

yin no// pad+ma'i dpal gyisAng pa skyes bu dam pa 'diganyisan rgyam lta bu'i ting nge 'dzinathob pa yin te/ 'di gnyis sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin laganas nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par sprulo pa 'di
lta bu 'di dag ston to// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po byed yang shar kyi phyogs cha legs su du na snang ltos shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rA da'i dbal gyi snying po u0f7a/ byang

chub sems dpa'i lha'i mig sgrib pa med pas bltas na/ sharaphyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi byem snad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasagang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ngo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
[pe]/ @#/ 'das de dag thams cad kyi zhabs la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpar chen ngo spran ras gzigs dbang phyag dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob/
gnyis phyag 'tshal nas tshig 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag mad/ bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam zhes snyan gsol

la nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod ba yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes kyang skrun gsal le zhes smra'o// de bzhin du lha'i phyogs cha dang/ de bzhin du nub dang/ dbazhin du byang dang//

dbazhin du 'og dang/ de bzhin du steng dang/ de bzhin du phyogs bcu kun dus ngas rgyas kyi zhing gang+ga'i klung gi byam snyadan/ rin po tshasna tshogs kyi debang pa brtsegs pa'i bkodapa chen po du mas brgyan cing yongs su

khyab pa ramathong// sangs rgyasakyi zhing de dag thams cad n/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag kyang mthong ngo// sangs rgyas bcog ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyi spyan sngon ) skyes bu dam pa de gnyis zhabs/

la phyag 'tshal bar angamathong nga/ mthong nas kyang de shin tu ngomatsharachar 'dzinapar gyur to// denas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po ngo mtshar du gyur nas ) bcom
ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 'di ltar skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis kyis sgyu ma lta bu'i ngapo'adzin mngon par bsgrubs pani bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ bcom ldan 'das ngomatshar to// bde bar gshegs

0 pa mchog tu ngomatshar to// de ci'i slad du zhan/ 'di lta skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis tingang 'dzin la gnas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na gda' ba'i slad du'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta/

bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon pa ra 'du mdzad pa mngon pa la mdzad pas/ byang chub sams dpa' pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying nges phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag mthong pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dug na sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das dag dang/ skyes bu dam pa de gas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba mthong ba dang/ de bzhin du thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des kyang phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs

rgyab kyi zhing dag mthong ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag dang/ skyes bu dam pa de gnyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba mthong ba dang//

mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis ralor srog chags sum khri 'os stong bla na mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'dumadzad pa mngon par 'du mdzad do/
de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' pad+maredang la gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa 'od gnyis de bzhin gshegs pa gang las
bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyad nas ji srid cig lags/ de'i mtshanani zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
catha @#/ rgyas kyis legs par bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag kyang de'i grub dang/ de'i sprod pa dang/ de'i smon lam/

yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur te/ de lta bas na pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying bo khyod shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zungazhig dang bshadade// byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos ) bcom
ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltaranyan pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal
pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med ba/ yangs pa/ tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams brgya stong gi rdul phra rab ji snyed yod pa de snyad du tshad med pa/ de skad du bsam

gyis mi khyab pa/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul jitsam yod pa de bas kyang ches mang ba'i bskal pa phyung ba de'i tshe de'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin chen bsags pa dpag tu med pa bde ba kun tu ston pa
zhes bya ba na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs ba ) 'jig rten mkhyen pa// skyes
bu 'dul ba'il la sbyarab bla na med pa/ lha dang mi'i ston pa ) sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gser 'od sang ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba byung ste/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po bcom ldan/

[z/]'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od sang ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan bkod pa gangadag yod pa de dag dab cung

grang tsam gyis tsud Tad cig brjod par byas nyon cig/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po 'di jisnyam dusams ) 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
'od dpag med kyi sangs kyi zhingag yon tan bkod pa mang ngam/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das mang lags sa// bsam gyis mi khyab tshad ma mchis te/ngag gi las kyis lan gdab pa rdzas bam lags so//

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ) pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po 'di lta ste/ dper na mi la la zhig gis sku'i rtse mo brgyar gshags pa'i rtse mos rgya mtsho chen pa las chu'i thigs ba gcig blangs na/ pad+ma'i
dpal gyi snying po 'di ji snyam du sems/ chu blangs pa dang lhag ma lus pa de gang mang/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'dus blangs pa na nyung/ lhag ma lus pa ni tshad ma mchis so// bka' stsalapa/ pad+ma'i

dpal gyi snying po khyed mos par bya'o// khyod kyi khong du chud par bya'o// mi des skra'i rtse mo brgyar bshags pa'i rtse mo des rgyamatsho chen po las chu'i thigs pa gcig blangs pa jisAd pa de tsam du/ de bzhin

gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod par blta'o// rgya mtsho chen po'i chu'i phung po ji snyed pa de tsam du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin/
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i gangs rgyas gsara'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan rin chen bsags pa dpag tumed pa/
[） ]bde ba kun tu ston pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi yon tan bkod par blta'o// de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun yang dpag tu med de/ ji ltar da lta nad bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi nyan thos kyi dge
ts+tshA 'dun dang bag tu med do zhes bya na: de lasabargya stong du bsgras pa pas kyang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus gsar 'od seng ge rnam bar
rol pa'i rgyal po de'i nyan thos kyi dag 'dun ches mang// de bzhin du byang chub sems dang yid g 'dun kyang de snyad do/ )btsam ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de ni thig gsum bon las
brtsams te chos ston te// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po ngas bskal pa gang+gAri klung gi bye ma snyad du/ bcom ldan 'das de pa'i ga nyegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsar
'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po da'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkad pa dang ) nyan thosakyi yon tan bkod pa dang/ bad ba'-irgyu las brtsams te chos bstan par 'dod kyang pa'i srobs/
pa yang thad rang mi 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de'i mthar phyin par yang mi 'gyur ro// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa

(gsar 'od seng ge rnam pa rol ba'i rgyal po de'i gsung rab la// 'jig rten gyi khams stong gi dbang phyag chos dad lhag pa chos kyi rgyal po dpal gyi gabri brjid ces bya ba'i rgyal po zhig byung ste/ pad+ma'i/

dpal gyi snying po rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de la bu bye ba phrag brgyayod de/ rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag thamaMs cad kyang skyes bu chen po'i mtshan nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang ldan par gyur to// de dag thams cad bla

named pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs par gyur to// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po rgyal po dang la gyi gabri brjid kyi yongs su langs sdod pa'i skyed mos tshal ni bdun khri drug
stong yod do// rgyal bu re re la yang longs spyod kyi skyed mos tshal khri khri yod do// bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sams dpa' pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing den budamed mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po de ni med de// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bud mad kyi ming yang mi grag
ste/ rgyal po gzhon nu de dag thams cad kyang tshangs pa spyod pa las gyur pa rdzus te phyungab sha stag go/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi dga' ba dang/ chos kyi dga' ba'i
gras na yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de kha bas ragos ba mad par gyur to// pa'i dpal gyisnyingab rgyal po dpal gyi gtsi brjid dan las gzhan med de/ bu de rnams dang lhan cig bcom ldan
'das de la le bya ba stong phrag brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du bsnyan bkur byasu so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa des de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas/ tshad med pa'i

phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i chos kyi tshul la mkhas pa yang dag par rab tu bstanato// pad+ma'i dpal gyisnying po tshadamad nga 'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i chos kyi tshul la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po 'di la byang chub

blo sems dpa' chen po sa spyod pa tshad med pa dag don du gnyer bar mi bya ba de gang yang mdad// chul ba tshad med pa gang dag brtsam par mi bya ba de gang yang med do// de ci'i phyir zhen/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams

lha kyi sbyin pa ni tshad med/ tshul khrims ni tshad med/ bzod pa ni tshad med/ brtson 'grus ni tshad med/ bsam gtan ni tshad med/ shes rab ni chid med ) 'khor ba yongs su 'dzin pa ni tshadaad/ sems can dag/

la byams pa ni tshad med/ zhing gi bkod pa dag ni tshad med/ nyan thos dag ni tshad med/ gablugs yongs su grub pa ni tshad med/ dbyas ni tshad med/ spobs pa zhitshidamed pa'i phyir ro// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po/

byang chub sems dpa 'ani thanasams bskyed pa gcig gis/ dge ba'i rtsa bgangaci mngon par 'du byed pa de dag thams cad tshad med pa nyid du yongs su sngo'o// ji ltar yongs su bsngos pas tshad med par 'gyur/
zhen/ gang gi tshe sems can thams cad la yongs su sngo bar byed pa de'i sems na 'di dag thams cad skye ba med par mngon sum du byed/ sangs rgyas kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan

ma/las 'da' bar 'gyur pa radi ni/ rigs kyi bu yongs su skye ba tshad med pa zhes bya'o// stong pa nyid tshad med pa'o// mtshan ma med pa tshad med pa'o// smon pa med pa tshad med pa'o// mngon par 'du bya/
bamed pa tshad med pa'o// de ltar na 'dod chags dang bral ba/ yang dag pa'i mthar/ chos kyi dbyings rnam par grol ba/ ma skyes pa/ dben pa/ bral ba/ mya ngan las 'das pa/ tshad med pa
ste: rigs kyi bumador na chos thams cad ni tshad med pa'o// de'i phyir chos thams cad ma skyes pa ma 'gags pa zhes bya'o// gang mi mi 'gag ba da ni tshadamad pa'o// pa'i dpal gyi snying pa dang zhin

gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od sang ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal pos de ltar rgyal po dpal gyi gabri brjid de la tshad med pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i chos kyi tshul la
mkhas pa 'di yang dag par rab bstan to// des kyang chos tshad med pa dag la nges par sems par byas par gyur to// denas rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid kyis/ bcom ldan 'das
de las chos dpag tu med pa bstan pa 'di thos nas/ tshim zhing mgus yi rangs nas rab tu dga' ste dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ bu de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de la tshigs su bcad
pa dag gis mngonapar bstod ba ) 'dren pa chos rnams kun la dbang sgyurab// smra ba'i tshogs kun yang dag rab tu 'joms// bdud kyis rtsod nyon mos kun sel ba// mtshungs med ye shes
mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo// 'i glu dag dang ma yi 'od rnams dang// brgyaphyin tshangs pa nor bu glog 'od rnams // bde gshegs gabri brjid kyis ni mog mog gyur/ mi/
po mchog 'od mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// thub pa bskal pa rgya mtsho 'das par yang// dka' ba rnam pa du ma spyad pa mdzad// 'phrin lasang yi 'bras bu yid 'ong lta/ san 'gro bas bltas nangoms
blo/ mi 'gyur/ skye dang rga dngan dang 'chis gtsosangashing// sems can sdug bsngal mang pas gabrir gzigs nas// dedag rnams la thub chen thugs rje ste// rtag du mi 'ab zhwapa re ngos kyang ston//
srid gsum srog chags kun gyi sman pa 'dra// 'dod chags zhe sdang mun po thams cad sbyong// thugs rje bskyod pa mdzad nas tshes kyi sman/ zhipe bla na med pa rab tu ston// sags can kun gyi
sngod pa rab tumakhyen// rab 'byam zhing rnams kun nasrog gas kyi// mkhyen nas gang gis mya ngan 'das mchog la// reg par 'gyur ba de 'dra'i chos kyang ston// ma mchog khyod kyi thugs
rdzaci 'dra ba// ji snyad rab 'byam zhing gi nyanas dang// rkyen byung thub pa ma lus de dag la// de 'dra ba yi snying rdzayangs ma mchis/ )bsod nams phung pa mtshanamchog rnams dang ldan///
rgyal ba'i sku ni gsar gyi dri ba 'dra// bye ba gnyis las lhag pa'i gzimanga' ba// mi mchog mtshungs ma mchis la phyag 'tshal lo// chos sprin rgyas las chos rar 'bebs pa na/ de gang dag rgya
chen mos pa spyod yul ba// sngon gyi sangs rgyas spyod la 'jigs ma mchis// de dag rtag tu bde gshegs mdun mchis// bskal ba bye ba khrag khrig bsam yas su// mi mchog mthong ba
rnyed pa shin tu dka'// bsod nams las kyis bsam ba yongs sbyangs pa// de dag mig lam rnam par 'dren rnams gdar// rgyal ba'i sku ni chos dbyings rgyas par 'gas// zhing rnams rab
'phyam thams cad na yang gda'/ dbazhud dang byon par mngon pa yongam mchis// 'an kyang 'jig rten dag na snod bzhin gda'// bden pa gogrigs shing don dam ston pa po// chos kyi sbyin bdag
zhi ba'i thugs ldan pa// brgal nas srog chags bcings gyur gzhan sgrol ba// bde bar gshegs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod kyis skye ba'i shing ldan rtsa nas bton/ nga rgyal ri bos ba rdul du
brlags// rgod pami mngar g.yo dang sgyu dang bral// rab zhi thugs dang ldan la phyag 'tshal lo// mi mchog chags pa thams cad yongamimada'/ )dgos pa sa dang chu dang me dang 'dra// rgyal ba
sems can kun la snyoms thugs ldan// rlung dang nam mkha' 'dra la phyag 'tshal lo// thub pa chenab yon tan 'di 'dra'i gter// bsod nams rgya mtsho las byung sku dang ldan// bskal pa khrag
khrig dag tu de brjod kyang// yon tan rgya mtsho thang par nus ma lags// yon tan mnga' ba lha mes mchod pa la// bdag ni bu dang bcas temachod pa bgyid// rgyal po mchod pa'i bsod nams ci mchis/
pa3 des ni thub ba chenapa khyod 'drar shog/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po// de nas rgyal bo dpal gyi gabri brjid de dus gzhan zhig na/ skyed mos tshalan bsam
gtan gyi gnas pas gnas shing 'dug pa'i glo g.yas g.yonanas tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i pad+ma bkra ba blta na sdug pa dag pa gnyis byung ngo/ pad+ma de gnyis las khye'u ming rin chen sems dang/ ni

chenamchog ces bya ba gnyis rdzus te byung nas skyel mo krung bcas te 'dug go pa'i dpal gyisnying po de ltar rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de ting nge 'dzin de las langasan/ khye'u garjes skyel mo krung
T+ThitaM bcas te 'dug pa mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so// khyed gnyis lha ris klu yin nam// gnod sbyin dri ba mi 'am/ mi 'am mi ma yin nam ci// se pa sa

shig grogs po dag/ pad+mari dpal gyi snying po de ltar rgyal po dpal gyi gabri brjid kyi g.yas phyogs su byung ba'i khyi'u gang yin pa des/ rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de la tshigs su bcad smras pa// grogs
po chos kun stong pa yi// ming ni 'dri b.ranged dmagi/ chos rnams thams cad ming med na// gangani ming ni 'dri bar byed// stong nyid gang la lha med cing// gru med srin po yod ma yin// mi 'amamim
yin yang rung// thams cad den yong ched do// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po// de nas khye'acig shos des/ rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de la tshigs su bcad dasas ra )ming namang gis stong ba ste//
0ming laming ni yod ma yin// chos rnams thams cad ming med de// 'on kyang ming gis yongs su brjod// ming gi'ang bzhin gang yin pa// des nim mthong ma shes so// las kyis 'gags pa ma yin
na 'din gang gi mi zhig 'dri// tha snyad du ni mong byas nas// ming btags byas tebastan pa gi/ kho bo'amongan ni chen sems/ cig shes rin chen mchog ces bya/ pad+ma'i dmal gyi snying po de ltar
phyedu gnyis kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras du/ mngon par shes pa ldebasgrubs nas// rgyal bo dpal gyi gabri brjidadadang lhan cig tu// bcom ldan 'das derazhin gshes pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pare rgyal po go la bder dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan

gsum bskor ba byas nas thal mo sbyarate phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pod ltarakhye'u de gnyis kyis dbyangs gcig tu tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ pad+madag dang dra bdur dang/me tog/
'phrang dang na bza' 'am// 'on te bras dang skom gyis lam// rgyal ba ji ltar mchod par bagyi// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtso// ji ltaramachod par 'gyur ba lags// don 'di legs
parab stan du gsol// 'dren pa thosanas ngal bar bgyi// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po// de nas dbazhinag shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des/ khye'u gnyis la tshigs su bcad de
bka' stsal pa/ lus can kun la phan pa'i phyir// byang chub tu ni sems bskyang na// mtshan mchog sum cu gnyis ldan pa'i// sangs rgyas dag lamachod par 'gyur// mi gang
zhig gis sangs rgyas zhing// gang+ga'i bye ma'i grangs snyed dag/ me tog rnams kyis bkang byas te// 'jig rten mgon po phul ba bas// gang gis 'di ni thal sbyar nas// byang chub tu ni sems bdud
na: 'di ni bsod nams ches mnges// de latshad ni yod ma yin// byang chub sems na ci 'dra ba// de ltar blamchog gis bstan pa// de 'dra'i mchod pa gang yang mad// da 'dra ba yi dpal yang
med/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po de ltar khye'u deganyis kyis/ slar yang bcom ldan 'das de la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngarani// bdag cag yi dam yang dag 'as//
bla na med pa'isang gedzesgra// lha dang mi dag gsan mdzod cig/ ji srid dun 'khor ba yi// sngon gyi mtha' na mi dmigs pa// de srid bskal pa du mar yang// sams can phyir spyadang bgyi//
ji tsam sngon gyi mthar dran pa// rnam grangs 'di yi tshul dag gis// sams can kun la phan pa'iphyir// de srid bskal par spyad par bgyi// gal ted rang spun chad du// 'dad rtags
kyin sems byung na// phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa yi// sangs rgyas rnams ni bslus par 'gyur// de ltar zhe sdang gti mug dang// phrag dag sar stsa 'ong de bzhin no// rtag tu bden pa'i tshag
spu zhing/ brdzun gyi tshig ni spang bar bgyi// gal te da ring sunAchad du// rdul med byang chub ma thob bar// bdag caganyan thos sems gyur na// a brdzun du sba bar 'gyur// nams
kyang rang sangs rgyas su ni// bdag cag dga' bar mi bgyidade// sems can rnams la snying rje zhing// bskal pa bya ba spyad par bgyi// ji ltar dran pa khyod kyi zhing/ grub pa rnam pa 'di
dag las/ gzhan du yon tan phyi bsnyad// phun sumatshogs pa ring du bgyi// denanyanazes gang yang med/ rang rgyal 'dren pa dag kyang med// de tshe bye ba'i tshadamed pa'i// byang chub
sems dang ra 'ba' zhig gnas// bde ba 'di dang ldan pa yi// skya bodrim med par 'gyur// sangs rgyas mdzod ni ba thung bas na// sangs rgyas chos rnams tshar phyin to// gal du 'di dag/
gzhan min par/ de bzhin dune'agyur nges na// rgya mtshor bcas dang rir bcas pa'i// sa 'di thams cad g.yos par shog/ tshig 'di skyes pa'i mod lani// sa yang rab tug mos par gyur//
sil snyan dag nim dkrol bar// den thams cad sgra yang 'byin// stong phrag bye ba'i lha rnams kyis// ma tog char dang phyi ma'i char )sngos kyi char ni yid 'ong dang// na bza' bya ba rab tu thob//

pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po de'i tshe de'i dusan/ rgyal po dpal gyi gabri brjid ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig min pa skam du dogs sam yid gnyis than/ ded ltaram selta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dobazhin
[gj ]/gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po dpal gyi gathi brjid ces bya bar gyur to// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po da'i

che de 'i dus na/ khye'u rin chen sems dang/ rin chenamchog ces bya ba de gnyis gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na/ de yang de ltaram blta'o// deci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen pa spyan

ts+tso/ ras gzigs dbang phyug 'di khyi rinachenamchog ces bya bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpar chen po mthu chen thob 'di ni bya ru rin chen sams shes bya bar gyur to// rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis

rgyu ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dang po sems bskyadang nid yin no// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang ! bcom ldan 'das la ) byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying
pos 'di nyan ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa 'diganyis jitsam du brab mo la mos par gyur pa dang/ gang gi ming yang ma dmigs pa de srid du/ 'di gnyis byang chub tu sems bskyed par
gyur pa ngomatsharato// bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis kyis de bzhin gshags pa de'i pha rolan/ sangs rgyas jisnyad cig la rim gro bgyis par gyur bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gang+gA'i

klung gi bye ma ni bgrang bas mtha' rtogs par zhus kyi/ skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i pha rol na// sangs rgyas dag la bstan bkur byas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dadagazhi

de lta ma yin te/ de srid du 'di gnyis kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed do// skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos shing yon tan dang lag tu med pa dang ldan te/ 'di gnyis kyi yon
tan dag gi mtha' rtogs par mi nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa'i pad+ma'i dang la gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin chen bsags pa dang ba/
tumad pa/ bde ba kun tu ston pa zhes bgyi bde dang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gsar 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po zhes bgyi ba gang lags pa de 'di nas phyogs gang legs na mchis/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu nub phyogs logs na ste ) 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin chen bsags pa dpag tu med
nga/ bde ba kun tu ston ba zhes bya bar gyur to// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dang ra pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis skya ba mad pa lasmanang dang/ 'jig rtagal thugs brtse ba dang/ skya bo phal po che dang/ lha dang/ mi rnams

kyi don dang/ sman pa dang/ bde bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ci 'dra par 'gyur ba dang/ nyan thos phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang/ tsheji
@#// tsam pa dang/ longs spyod ci 'dra pa dang/ 'od ci 'dra ba dang/ skyes bu dam pa de gnyis thon med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/
@# nas mtshan ji skad ces bgyi ba de dag legs par bastan du gsol ) deci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis kyi smon lam chen po bshad pa thos nas/
byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag kyang smon lam chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur b.re slad du'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma 'i dpal
gyi snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dada'i dpa la gyi snying po da'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang bshad do// byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pas//
bcom ldan 'das rigs so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag
mad kyi tsheratshadani dpag tumad de de'i mthar nibaskal pa phyob khrag khrig brgya stong gi bar du bshad kyang rtogs par sla ba ma yin no// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag mdakyi
dpag tu med du zin kyang/ 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag pa/ mi brtan pa/ ther zug ma en pa/ yun du gnas pa ma yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bum 'os pa'i dus 'dar tsa pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dang ga mad de yongs su mya ngalas 'das par 'gyur ro// de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas
kyang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du de'i dam pa'i chos gnas te/ ji ltar bzhugs pa de bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang/ sems can rnams
kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'grub sbyo ) lhag chad med par 'gyur ro// gzhan du na sams can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa dmathong ba mang par zad do// byang chub sems dpa' dadag kyang
sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur/ de dag rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'od dpag med yongs su mya ngan las

'das nas kyang/ rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma dag dang/ shing ljon pa dag gis dbazhin gshegs pa de ji ltar chos ston pa de bzhin du/ pad+ma dag dang/ shing ljon pa de dag las kyang chos kyi sgo brgya phrag
dum 'byung bar 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu de ltarade bzhin gshegs pa 'od dbag med yongs su mya ngan las 'dus nas dam pa'i chos nub ma thag pa'i mtshan mo skya rengs 'char ba'i dus kyi tshe/

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gabrigs dbang phyug rinapo che dumakhakong pa'i byang chub kyishing drung du'adug nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
[r } ]'a@#// par 'tshang rgya'o// de mngon par rdzogs pas ngos rgyus nas/ 'od gzer kun nas 'phags pa'i dpal brtsegs rgyal pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od
gzer kun nas 'phags pa'i dpal brtsegs rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyadadu bstan

kyang mthar rtogs par mi nus so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'abad ba'i rgyu dang/ yon tan gyi rgyun desnyad du ragyur mod kyi/ 'on kyang rigs kyi bu dpe tsam du cung zad cig bshad pa 'bya'o// bcom ldan 'das

de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od sang gi rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na yon tan bkod pa gang dag yod pa// yon tan gyi bkod pa snga ma dag ni yon tan bkod pa 'di dag gi brgya'i char

yang mi chog/ stong gi cha dang/ brgya stong gi tshadang/ grangs dang/ dpa dang/ rgyur yang mi bzod do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi ming yang med par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas
kyi zhing de ni byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig gis gang bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu da ltar bcom ldan 'das 'od dung ga med kyi nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpar ji shud pa/
de dag thams cad bsdus kyang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od brer kun nas 'phags pa'i dpal brtsegs rgyal po de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyi brgya'i char yang mi chag ste )

stong gi cha dad/ brgya stong gi tshadad/ grangs dang/ dpa dang rgyur yang mi bzod do// de'i tshe'i tshadagi bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug du gyuraro// de'i dmar re ngos ni paskal pa
bye ba drug cu rtsa gsum duganas par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i dbal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das/
'jig rten gyi khams de'i ming yang bdeb can zhes bgyi bar 'gyuraram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu de ni ma yin te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de ni rin chen kun nas bsags pa
zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// gas kyi re bzhinagashegs pa 'od zer kun nas 'phags pa'i dpal brtsegs rgyal po'i tshe ji srid gnas pa nas bzung ste// yos su mya ngan las 'das pa de srid du )byang nug

sams dar ramathu chen thob mchod pa byed nga ra 'gyur ro// yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang de'idam pa'i chos 'dzin par 'gyur te/ dam pa'i chos yun ring bor gnas par bya ba'i phyir spro bar 'gyur ro//

phyi ma'i dus su dar dam pa'i chos nub nas)sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mangon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyabar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag/
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa ) bdebangagashegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba ) bla med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das yon tan shin du gnas pa nar bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byang bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
pa[>par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zerakun nas 'phags pa'i dpal brtsegs rgyal po de'i byang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa dang/ snang ba phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba de ltar/ bcom ldan 'das de

bzhin gshegs pa yon tan shin tu gnas pa nor bu brtse gas pa'i rgyal po de'i yang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur te[） ]lhag chadamad sring shin tu lhag pa med par 'gyur ro// tshe'i yun dang dam pa'i chos gnas pa
yang de srid du 'gyur ro/rigs kyi bu dang/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od gasrar kun nas 'phags pa ri dpal brtso gas rgyal po de dang bcom ldan 'das
de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan shin tu gnas pa noradu brtsegs pa'i rgyal po de'i mtshan thos pa de dag thams cad bu na mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldeg par 'gyur ro//
pad+ma'i dpal gyi stong pa bud mad gang la las bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dang/ ma 'ongs pa de gnyis kyimtshan

thos na/ de budamad kyi rang bzhin dumi 'gyur ro// bskal pa bye ba phrag bzhi bcur 'khor ba bsnyal bar 'gyur ) bla namad pa yang dag par rdzo gas pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldeg par 'gyur sangs rgyas mthong
ba dang/ chos nyan pa dang/ dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ tshe brjes nas kyang rab tu 'byung ba 'thob par 'gyur/ tshe rabs dran pa dang/ spobs pa thogs ba med par 'gyur//

gzungs kyang thob par 'gyur ro// de nas 'khor de'i nanganas lha dang/ma dang/ skye dgu'i srog chags bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug gis mgrin gcig tu tshig zlas ba/ gang dag ma byon pa de dag dang )gang dag da ltar/
bzhugs pa ratsho zhing gzhes pa de dag dang phyogs bcun gang dag yongs su mya ngana'as 'das pa'i de bzhin gshogs pa dedag 'a khyab ka 'tshal lo// de dag gi mtshan gang lags pa de dag la yang rjes
su yi rang ngo// tshig 'di skad ces kyang smras te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag lhan cig tshogs pa thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzo gas ba'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o zhes smras so//

da dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis thun med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung chub tu lung bstan to// srog chags khrag hrig brgya phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhin sa rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba
rnam par dag go/ dge slong bdun stong ni len pa med par thug pa rnams las sems rnam par grol la/ de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dara' chen po lnga nas gakhrigs dbang phyug

dang byang chub sems dpa' mthun thab kyis ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'dapyas ras/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis phyogs btsun/ bcom ldan 'das dngag tu med grangs med pa de
dag gis bran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston pa mthong ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'dus byas so// mthong nas kyang tshig 'di skad ces 'dzam
po bcom ldan 'das jitsam du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenang 'di gnyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gos legs par yongs su bzung ba lags te/ 'di lta skyes bu dam ba 'diganyis sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das 'di snyed cig gis lung ston pa ni ngo mtsharato// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chu sems dpa' pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/

rigs kyi bu mo gang de bzhin gshegs pas gsus pa'i mdo snga grab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ kun chub par bgyid pa dang 3 gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa
de'i bsod nams jisAd cig 'phel bar gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su radri re regatam 'dis gzhig bya/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/

gi sa kyi bu sems can dman pa la mos pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa la yid mi ches par 'gyur ba'i phyirate/ de ltar 'di ga un ring por gnod pa dang ) pan nga mad pa dang/ bde ba med pa dang/
log par ltung bar 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'din rigs kyi bu dang/ rigs kyi bu mo dag rgya chen bo la mos pa dang/ mos pa mang bo dag kyang mchis ]slad ma'i skye bo rnams la
yang snang ba bgyis pa 'gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pas skye bomang po la sman pa dang/ skye bomang po la bde ba'i slad du bshad par gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'astsal pa/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying
po de'i phyir legs par rab tunyon la yid la zung zhig drang bshad do// byang chub sems dpa' pada'i dpal gyi snying pos ) bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltajanyan pa dang/

bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka'astsal to// gas kyi bu 'di la mi gang la la stobs dang ldan pa/ mthu dang ldan ba ) bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/dzitsam sems can gyi khams su gad pas/
tagapasimasacan gyi khams de bzhin gshegachesamang bar gsungs kyi/ sa'i khams ni de lta ma yin te/ sems can de dag thams cad bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas mumad par mago bo'am) phug pa 'am/ lag pa

na thogs te/ rjesrid 'tsho'i bar de dag la gos dang gras dag byin te/ bad pa'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byed/ bla ma byedan/ padra'i dpal gyi snying po mi de gzhi de las bsod nams kyi phung po mang du
'phel lam/ gsol pa ) sems can gcig la yang sa gol gtogs pa tsam zhig byams pa'i sems kyis khyab par bgyis na/ datsam gyis kyang bsod nams mang du skyed na/ bskal pa bye bamathar yas/
mu ma mchis par sems can thams cad bsrungasta/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gro bgyis pa lta smos kyang ci ratshal/ bka' stsal pa ) da dra'i dpal gyi snying po khyed mos par bya'o// khyad kyis

gal de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo yu 'a bu 'di bang chub kyi sems la gnas tu len pa dang/ 'dzin pa dad/ 'chang ba dang// khong du chud par bya'o// gang de bzhin gshegs pas gsus pa'i mdo snga 'di lta bu 'di byang chub kyi sems la gnas te lan pa
klog pa dang/ kun chub par byed pa dang/ gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag bar rab tu ston pa'i rigs kyi bu dang/ rigs kyi bumo dad pa la zhugs pa/ mos pa mang ba dag gzhi de las bsod
ts+tsha nams kyi phung po ches mang du skyed do/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' padra'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcam ldan 'das dengazhin gshegs pas gsung
! pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang bdag gis blang bar bgyi/ gzung bar bgyi bcang bar bgyi/ bklag par bgyi/ kun nub par bgyi//

gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bgyi'o// denas byang chub sems dpar pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying nges tshig de skad ces smras pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug gis/
dbyangs gcig tu tshig 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang mado sde 'di lta bu 'di byang bar bgyi ) gzung bar bgyi/ bcang bar bgyi/ bkrug par bgyi/ kun chub par
bgyi/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po la 'di skad bka' stsal to// pad+ma'i

mas/ dpal gyi snying po chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bud med kyis thos ma thag tu bud med kyi dngos po las 'gyur te/ rgyu gnyisam gtogs bani 'di lta ste ) phrag dog dang/ sa sna'o// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya/

byin dang/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang/ rgyal pochenapo bzhi dang/ lhagi bu brgya stong du ma dag gis lha'i ma rtog man+da rab dug bcom ldan 'das dang/ byang chub sangs dang 'a sems dpar chen bod
dag la mngon par gar to// lha'i sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gras lanas tshig 'di skad ces kyang 'dzer to// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dag gi rna lam du grags pa dang/ legs par ston
nas 'dzin pa dang/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa'i sems can de dag gis ni rnyed pa legs par red par lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'gas kyi bu dag/

ji skad smras pa de de bzhin te chos kyinam gra sa 'di gang dag gi lagan 'dug pa dang/ gang dag thos nas mos par 'gyur bde sems can de dag ni/ sangs rgyas khri la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyad par 'gyur ro//
denas sring mo rdul dang bral zhes bya ba 'khor der 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa de stan las langs nas lhag pa'i bsam pas tshig 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang lhag pa'i bsam pas/
phrag dog dang ser sna spangs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga shigs panimad pa gsungs pa lags na/ bcom ldan ]
'das gal te bdag sangs rgyas su 'gyur zhing/ bud med gzhan gang gis ches kyi rnam grangs 'di thos na/ thos ba'amed la bud mad kyi dngos po las 'gyur ba ltan/

bcom ldan 'adas de'i slad du phung po 'di nyid la bud med kyi dbang po mi gda' bar gyur te skyes pa'i dbang po byung bar gyuratsage ces smras so// denas spring mo dang nyid du budamed kyi dbang po mi snang bar gyur
te skyes pa'i dbangapo byung bar gyur to// de yang bcom ldanu'adas kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub lasaphyir mi ldogatsange) de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par/

ny+nyo rdzo gas pa'i sangs rgyas nyon mongs pa thams cad globag pa zhes bya bar 'gyugazhas lung bstan to// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i
dbal gyi snying po dang/ dgeslong de dag dang/ byang chub sems dpa'amangapo de dag dang/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin dang drithar bcas pa'i 'jig rtenayirangs te/ bcom ldan 'das/
kyis gsungs pa'amangon par bastod do// 'phags pa sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nga 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po 'dirdzogaso// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dAn shIl la sogs pa dang/
zhu chen gyi latsapa ban d+he ye shes sde'agogs ngas bsgyur cingogatan la phab pa'o// ka @#/// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yasang gAta drad+hami ya/
ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lung gi mdo'i chos kyi rnam gras// bam pa dang pa// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dbu thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis

thos pa dus gciyen/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khaban/ byargod kyi phung ro'iri la dag slog nag 'dun chenapo dgaslong sum khri nyis stong la 'di ltasta/ tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'udi dang/ tshe dang

ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen bo dang/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang/ tshodang ldan pa 'od srungachenapo dang/ tshe dang ldan pasgra gcan zin dang/ tshe dang ldan pa ba ku la dang/tshadang ldan pa bgrang skyong dang/

tshe dang ldan pa bgrang dpal dang/ tshe dang ldan r tsan dan dang pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa dug sel dang/ tshodang ldan pa rab 'byor dang/ tshe dang ldan pa nam gru dang/ tshodang ldan pa dga' sde dang/ de la sogs pa/
dag slong sum khri nyis stong dang/ byang chub sems dpa' drug khri nyis stong la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang ) byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu
dpa'i ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpar chen po gzhon nu'i dpal dang/ byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpar chen po gzhon nur gnas pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a
chen po gzhagazhu bzang po dang// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'bri dang/ byang chung sems dpa' sems dpar chen po 'jam dpal dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/
po kun du bzang po dang/ byang chub sems dpa'asams dpa' chen po blta na sdug dang ! byang chub sems dpa'asams dpa' chen po sman gyis dang/ byang chub sems dpa'

po'i sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i sde dang/ de la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po drug khri nyis stong dang/ lha'i bu khris stong la 'di lta ste/ lha'i bu srid sgrub dang/ lha'i bu bzang po dang/ lha'i

du shin tu bzang po dang/ lha'i bu chos 'dod dang ! lha'i bu tsan dan snyingapo dang/ lha'i bu tsan dan gnas dang/ lha'i bu tsan dan dang ) de lasogs pa lha'i bu khri nyis stong dang/ lha'i bu mo brgyad stong la 'di lta ste/

lha'i bu mo nga ldan dang/ lha'i bum na dzes ldan dang/ lha'i bu mo bdag nyid che ldan dang/ lha'i bu ma mag dpa' dang/ lha'i bu mo skye dgu'i bdag mo gnas pa dang/ lha'i bu mo stobs 'dzin dang lha'e mo na la

sgyur dbal dang/ lha'i bu mo lag pa phang ldan dang/ de la sogs pa'i bu mo brgyad stongadang/ klu'i rgyal po brgyad stong la 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po sog ma med dang/ klu'i rgyal po a la ri 'dab ma dang/

klu'i rgyal po nyamid dad klu'i rgyal po bum pa'i snying bo dang/ klu'i rgyal po dum pa mgo dang/ klu'i rgyal po dag byed dang/ klu'i rgyal bo shin tu dga' ba dang/ klu'i rgyal po mdab pazangs dang/ klu'i

rgyal po glang lo'i mgo dang/ de la sogs pa'i kru'irgyal po brgyud stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de dag thams cad kyang rgyal po'i khab ga la ba dang bya rgod kyi phung po'i ra ga la ba dang/ bcom ldan/
'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngaparakhod pa dang/
bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ngo// de nas byang chub sems dang 'dzems dpa' chen po kun tu dpa' ba stan las la sa te/ bla gos phrag pacig tu bzar nas/ pus
mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bam ldan 'das ga la ba de legs su thal mo sbyarab btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lha bya ba dang/ lha'i bu ma bya ba dang/
byang chub sems dpa' bye bamang po dang/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos bye bamang po dang/ klu'i rgyal po rnams kyang chos nyan pa'i slad du/ 'dus nas 'khod cing mchis na/ dengazhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
gang dag par rdzogs pa'i saa rgyas kyis chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa dzilta bu s semasacan rgan po rnams thos ma thag tu las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ba dang/ sems can gzhananu rnams
'deg pa'i chos rnams la mngon par brtson zhingakhyad nga ru du'aphags pa thos par 'gyur te/ dge ba'i chos rnams las mi nyams/ mos su mi nyams shing yangs su nyams par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos
kyi tshul la 'jug pa de legs par bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu dang 'al 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ]
kun tu dpa' ba khyodade bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri b.rasems pa ni kun tu dparab legs so legs so// kun tu dpa' ba khyod de'i phyir legs par thad tu nyon la yid la zung shi ba dag/
po ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol nas )byang chub semasadapa rasams dpar chen po kun tu dpa' ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar nyan pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la

'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun tu dga' ba thung zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang da ltar yang 'dzam bu'i glingan spyod pa zhig yod de/ gang la la zhig zung gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos na/ de'i

me mtshams med pa lta'i las rnams 'byung zhing/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyire mi ldeg par 'gyur ro// kun du dngar ba 'diji snyam dus nas/ gang gis thung gimado thos na/ de
kyi bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi bsod nams kyi phung po jisnyad pa de skyed par 'gyur rasnyam na yang kun tu dpa' ba de ltar mi blta'o// kun tu dang 'a ras gsol pa/ 'o na ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun du dpa' ba de razhin ga shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyad rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po jisnyad par byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpar chen po de dag kyang bsod nams kyi phung po yang de snyed par 'gyur ro// kun tu dang 'pha gang dag tshes kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de dag thams cad ni phyir mi ldog par
'gyur ro/ (de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba'agyur// de dag thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag

par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'atshang rgya bar 'gyuraro// de dag thams cad kyis dge ba'i tshes gang dag 'thob par 'gyur ba de dag la bdud sdig can gyis mi rdzi bka'agyuraro// kun tu dang 'a ba
gang dag zung gimado 'di thos pa de dag thams cad skya ba dang 'gag pa shes par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dgathams cad de'i tshostan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa
gcig tu bathar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsug te )bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi bso da nams kyi phung nga ji sAd cig mchis// bcom ldan

'dasakyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag sangs rgyas gcig gi nges da nams kyi phung po ri tshadazhen cig/ 'di lta ste dpangan/ rgya mtsho chen pa'i chu'i thigs pa dang/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul phra rab ji snyed pa dang/

gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyad dngamanyam pa de dag thams cad sa bcul gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa 'a de dag thams cad kyi bgo danams kyi phung po bas ni/ sangs rgyas gcig gi

bsod nams kyi phungapo chas mngang// gang chung gi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa'i sems can rnams ni ragodanams kyi phung bo debs kyang ches mang du skyod par 'gyur te/ des bsod nams kyi phung po jid pa ni/
[©]// bgrang pa'i tshul gyis mtha' rtogs bar mi nus so// kun du dbal bde'i de'i dus na gang tshig 'di thes nas/ sprab chen por 'gyur ba de ni bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa spyad par
'gyurar de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dba'asanas dpar chen po kun tu dang ngo bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang ches kyis yongs su skom por 'gyur bde dag gang bags
de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dang ra chen po kun tu dpa' ba la 'di da ces bka' stsal to// kun tu dpar nga semasacan gnyis po 'di dag ni 3 chos kyis yongs su
skam pa yin te/ gnyis gang zhen/ kun tu dpa' ba 'a lta ste/ gcig ni sams can thams cad la sems mnyam pa'o// kun tu dpa' ba gnyis pa ni gang chos thos nas/ sems can thams cad lamatshungs par yang
dag par rab tu ston pa 'o// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu dpa' bas gsol pa ) bcom ldan 'das chos thos nas// sams can thams cad la mtshungs par yang dag par rab tu ston pa gang 'gags/ bcom ldan
'dus kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun du dpar ba gcig ni chos thos nas byang chub tu yos su skyo ste nam byang chub tu yongs su lnga bad ni/ sams can thams cad kyi phyi'i ches kyis yongs su skam pa yin no//

kun tu dpa' ba gnyis pa ni/ gang theg pa chen po la 'jug pa ste rtog tu yang chos kyi yongs su skam pa yin no// de nas lha dang/ klu dang/ mi dang lha'i bu ma bya bstan 'das langs nas ]bcom ldan 'das kyi
tsa phanasngar thalamo spyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsal to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang chos kyis yongs su skam zhing mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag tsag dang ) sems can thams/
cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// denas byang chub sems dpasems dpa' chen po kun tu dpa' ba stan las langs nas// bcom ldan
'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo snga ra ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsal to// bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gangalags ) de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub
sems dba'asems dang ra chen pa kun tu dpa' ba la bka' stsal pa/ kun tu dpa' bsems can gangadag 'dir lhags nas/ blo nam dang yang dag par rdzogs nga 'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyab
dedag thams cad ni/ dbazhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul yongs su bsgrub ba grub par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu dang 'o bas gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis na/
sems can 'dir lhags pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bying chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ) bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun tu dang rig byed de nga zhin gshags pa la
don 'dra par sems pa legs so'i gsas// kun du dpang ba de'i phyir 'di la yongs su bsnga ba'i khyad par nyon cig kun du dpa' ba sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grangs mad bar gyur
pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chenadapa la zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa// bde bar gshegs/

po nga/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha le sgyur ba/ bla na med nga/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo// kun tu dpa' ba de'i tshe de'i dus na/
rgyu ngu bram ze'i khye'u zhig tu gyur te/ ngas sems can gang dag sangs rgyas kyi ye shes las sor bkod pa de dag thams cad/ de'i tshida'i dus na/ ri dgas su gyur nas/ ngasanga'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'di
skad du da ltarar dgas ganga' sdug bsngal gyis yongs su gzir bar gyur pa de dag thams cad/ nga'isangs rgyas kyi zhing du skyabar gyur cig/ de dag thams cad kyang bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi
ya shes la so sor 'god par gyur cig ces smon lam btab ste/ ri dgas de dag gis kyang tshig de thos nas/ de bzhin du gyur cig ces de skad smras te/ kun tu dpa' ba dug ba'i rtsa ba des na/ sems
can de dag 'dir lhags te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems drang na sems dang 'a chen po kun du dang 'bras//
