byam dpa shordzogasakhar lha'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba'i ra namamakha' la 'phur mi nus pa de bzhin du/ khyed rnams kyang mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob par mi nus te/ khyedacag la de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul
mad do// daci'i phyir zhe na/ las kyi rnam pas bya gag gi skye gnas su skyes nas/ lus 'di ring po mi thogs par lus 'jig cing mthar 'chi rer 'gyur te/'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/ de dag ra bro bamad nas
bdag cag gis lus 'dici zhig gi phyirab zung bdag cag gis gang lha'i 'jig rten gyi bde ba dang/ mi'i 'jig rten gyi bde ba yang ma myongal/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i gnas la gnas par a gyur
te/ bdag cag gi lus 'di ni donomad par bzung na/ bdag cag gis gro ban gang yin/ bdag cag gi rten du ni su zhig 'gyur/ gang du skye zhing du 'jig par 'gyur zhig go snyam nas/ yongs su skrag
par 'gyuraro// denas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang kun tu dang/ gcer du nga de dag la bka' stsalapa/ khyed cag rin po cha'i 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir yid chad par mkhyed
tsaka' cig/ khyed ches dkonamchog las phyi rol tu ma gyuracig/ kyi grogs po dag phyed de ngazhin gshegs pa la ci dang ci 'dod pa bris shig dang/ ngas khyed kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzo gas pa
bya'o// de nas bram ze dang/ gzhan mu stags canasod pa pa dang/ kun tu rgyudang/ gcer pu pa de dag thams cang stan las langs nas/ gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos te thal mo sbyar nas/
bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs ngas gdugs mtshan dusams can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su bkral yang sems can gyi khams la bri ba 'om/ gang ba
yang mi gda'an/ bcom ldan 'das rgyugangadang/ rkyen gangags sams canadedag skye ba dang 'gog pa mnyam par ston/ donas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpar
sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde la bka' stsal pa// mu stegs 'di dag 'gyod pa chen po bsal ba dang/ chos kyi sgron ma chen po 'bar ba bya ba'i phyir/ go cha chen po bags nas 'drab 'i gleng gzhi chen
po 'dri ste/ phyi ma'i dus na sems can gzhan nudang rgan po rnams skye ba dang 'jig pa shes par 'gyurar// sman gyi sde sams can rgan po dag kyang gzhon nu bzhin du ci yang mishes pa yang yod
ngo// smanagyisde 'di lta ste dpangan ) skyes bu la la zhig skra bkrus nas gsasar pa bgos te/ de khyim gyi phyi rol dubyung ba de lasams can rnams kyis khyadags gsar pa legs par bags so zhes
[9 ]/sAs pa dang/ sams can gzhan zhig kyang mgo bkrus nas gos snying pa yang bkrus te bags bu dang/ de thegasazhas mi de skabakrus kyang mdzes par gyur la/ de'i zlos

[>>kyang madzes par ma gyur pa de bzhin du smanagyi sde 'dzam bu'i ngan sems can rgan po yod pa dag ni mdzes pa ma yin te/ sems can ba/ zhin nudag ni skye ba dang 'gag pa ston to// denas bram ze dang/
gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang/ kun tu rgyud dag thams cad stan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi nang na gzhonanuzhi gang lags
ra rgan po ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la pa/ khyed cag ni ang dang ang sams can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro dang/ yi dgas rnams su tshor ba mthong yang/ khyeng da dung du ngoms mi myong/
bas khyed cag nirgan pa 'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la bram ze de dag thams cad dung klu'i rgyal po thams cad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das slan chad 'khor bar sdug bsngal gyi
tshor ba myong ba lagi sngo'o/kagazhan mu stegs na spyod pa pa dang/ kun tu rgyudang/ gcer bu pa rnams kyis 'di skad ces smras so// sems can gzhon nu rnams las kyang gang chos nyid mngon sum du byed/
nusab mod de// de skad ces smras pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sams dang la chen po sman gyi sdes red skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du sems can rnams
[re]/ mos pa dka' ba la gzigs su gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sman gyi sde nyon cig dang/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten thams cad mngonasum du mdzad do// des
sanas ca gzhon nu bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa bzhi de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'dug ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal/ ga kyang istsalo// de nas bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyis sdus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can 'di dag bcom ldan 'das la mi skya kun tu mi sna zhing/ phyag kyang mi'atshal lo// bcom
ldan 'dras la zhu ba yang mi bgyid pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang la bags bcom ldan 'dus kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi snga nyon cig/ sems can ge khon nu rnams kyis chos nyid mngon sum
du byed mi nus so zhesasems can gang de skad zer ba la/ sman gyi sde 'di dag ni khyed kyis sems can ba gzhen nu yin par blta'o// sems can de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa
bcom ldan 'das bdag cag nisams can gzhon nu lags so// btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa bdag cag ga ni sems can gzhon nu lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye ma/
can 'di dag ni 'jig rten mngon sum du byed pa yin gyis ngarang gi lus las 'jig rten gyi tshad ston cig/ deritshe de'i dus na sams can gzhon nu bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa bzhi lus dad
[r/ ]@#/ bral ba stong gi nam mkhar la gnas te/ sa bcu ljaputu thob par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la khyang chub sems dpa' sems dpar chen po sman gyi sdes
'di skad ces gsol te// gang dag 'khor yongs su bad par bgyi ba dang/ yongs su byang bar bgyi ba'i slad du brtson 'grus brtsom pa 'i sems can de lta bu'i rten pa legs par red de/
bcom ldan 'das sams can 'di dagazhidang nyid skyes la/ bcom ldan 'das sems can 'di dag ni de nyid yongs su grol te/ thams cad kyangs bcu rab tu thob par mthongang// de nas bram ze
zla dang gzhanamu stegs can spyod pa pa dang/ kun tu rgyudang gcerapu pa dang/ rgyal po dang/ bdud sdig can 'khoradang bcas pa thams cad lhags nas g.yog bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 'dir dbazhin gshegs pa'i gan du mchis te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'dithos nas/ bdag cag gis sangs rgyas kyi bde ba 'di lta bu thob par gyur
leg/ 'jig rtenadu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di lta bu r gyur cige/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/bzhin bzang dag de de bzhin te/ ji ltar
khyod de bzhin gshegs pa rigan du lhags pa rnams kyis chung gi mdo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de na khyed thams cad
rang pa mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mangon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig 'di gsungs ma thag tu/ de nas gzhan mu stags
can de dag thams cad ma skyo ba'i chos la babyed nga thob par gyur te/ thams cad kyang sa bcu la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpar gyur nas// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad stangaginam
mkha' bar snang 'ashing ta la bdun srid dumangon par 'phags nas (rinapo masna bdun gyi deb nga pa brtsigs pa dag dbazhinagashegs pa la 'bul zhing/ thams cad kyang rnam par 'phrul pa sna
tshogs mi gyi slob ste/ rdzu 'phrul ma ngon par 'du bya bamangon par 'du byed do// denas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbu'i lagatsug gi byung lugs gnas te/ bcom ldan 'das la ma tog sil ma sna tshogs
'thor zhing de bzhin gshags pa thams cad kyang yid la byed do// rang gi lus la yang sangs rgyas su 'du shes skyed do// lha'i bu bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma yang de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par
'thor zhing tshig 'di skad du/ dge sbyong go'u ta mnirnyed pa chen po'o// zhing chen po'o// 'jig rten gyi mgonano// tingeng 'dzinagyistobs bskyed pa b.res pa'o// mkhas pa mkhas pa tshel ba lags te/
gangasams can 'di lta bu dag thabs mkhas pas mthar gyis 'khor ba las yongs su thar par mdzad de/ legs par gsungs pa gcig tsam gyis kyang sems can desnyad cig rakhorag las yongs
'bya/[ণপৰশুৰা ]/denas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyis stan las langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa kha cig tu gzar te/ pus mo
pa g.yas pa'i lha ngasal gtsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de 'gas su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyu ba nga dang skyon gang ba/sa rigs
kyi bu de dag tshig 'di skad 'byin cing rdzu 'phrulamangon par 'du bgyidad/ de bzhin gshogs pa re sngags pa mang po mngon par 'du bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rig kyi bu nyon cig/
de dag nang la bstod pa ma yin gyi/ rang gi lus la bstod cing/ rang gi lus chos kyi snyan dam pa la 'jog par 'gyur/ rang gi lus las chos kyi 'od gather 'byin par 'gyur/ mnam da pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang yos su bsrung bar 'gyuraro// mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyasanas kyang chos snyan
par 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dang sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sngas 'di skad ces gsol to// ]bam pa gsum pa/
bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pa gdugs mtshanaru sems namangapo zhig yongs su grol yang da dung du sems can rnams bad par ma gyuto// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman

gyi sde khyod gang de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri b.rasams pa legaso legaso/ sman gyi sde 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu la zhig phyag cing norache la longs spyod ches/ nor dang 'bru dang mdzod dang bung ba/

mang po dang ldan la/ bran po dngabran mo dang las byed pa dang/ zho shas 'tsho ba'i mi mang po dang ldan te/ de ner gyi phung po mngal zhing dang kun dga'ir ba mang du bdog cing/ 'di lta ste/ nas dang/ gro dang/
'dres dang/ bal sun dang/ sran chung la sogs pa 'brumang du bdag pa zhig yod la/ mi des dpyid kyi dus la 'bru thams cad kyi sa bon btab nas dus gzhan zhig grwa tshesangan de dag thams cad
mos su smin pa gyurar dang/ mi des 'bru de dang de dag so sor 'jog ste/ bzhaganas kyang d byed kyi dus kyi bar du bres nas/ yang 'debs pa dengazhin du sman gyi sde sams can rnams kyang sngon
las byas pa las de dag thams cad yongs su zad par gyur ba dang do la bsad nams kyi shing tshol to// dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams skyed de// bskyed nas kyang dge ba'i chos de dag lanan tan/
gyis sgrub ste/ chos thams cad 'phel bar byas nas dga' ba dang mgu ba skyed de/ sman gyi sde dga' zhing mgu ba'i sems des bskal pa bya ba'i bar du chud mi za'o// sman gyi sde de bzhin
du bya nubo sems dpa' sems dngapo bskyed pa yang chud baba'i chos can du nam yang mi 'gyur te/ mdoran chos thams cad rab tu shes so// gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
[/ g] ]dpal sems dang po bskyed ba'i rmi lam ji lta bu mthongabar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ sman gyi sde byang chub sems dpa' salas dang bo brgyad pa'i
rmi lam du 'jigs pa'ang bo mthong bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ las thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i phyir/ sems can sdig pa'i las can gyis ni sdug bsngalamakhazad pa sel bar mi
nus so// danasdig pa'i rmi lam mthong yang 'jigs pa ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dar rasems dang po bskyed pa'i rmi lam du tsholtar 'jigs pa mi mthong bar 'gyur
ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde ma rab tu 'bar bamathong ste/ des nibyang chub sems dpa' des bdag gi nyon mongs pa thams cad tshig par rig par bya'o// sman gyi sde gsasu

ni byang chub sems dpa sems dang po bskyodapa des chu byug cing rab tu brug pa mthongayang 'jigs pa'ami bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sman gyi sde de bzhin du bgati mug gis bcas pa thams cad las bzlog
sgo nas sdig pa byang bar byas pa yin no// sman gyi sde gsum dun/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyadang re rmi lam na 'jigs pa chenapo mthongang// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang lags/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bdagagilus kyi mgo bregs pa mthongayang/ sman gyi sde des de la 'jigs par mi bya'o// de ni phyi zhe na/bdag gi 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang/ gti mug bregs

pa yin te/ bdag ni 'gro ba drag tu 'khor ba las rgyal ba yin na snyam mo// de sems can dmyal bo gnas pa ma yin/ dud 'gro dang/ yi dgas rnams kyi nang ma yin/ lha ma yin rnams kyi nang du ma yin kurnyamA

kyind du ma ni/ lha rnams kyi nang du ma yin te/sman gyi sdakhyang chub sems dpa' sems dang bo bskyed bzhi)sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams su skye ba ran tu 'dzin to// sman gyi sde phyi ma'i tshe/ phyi ma'i dus na/ gal
te sems can la la zhig kyang chub tu sems yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur na des ye ngam chenapo bcas par blta ste/ brnyas par gnas par gyukyang sman gyi sde de la des skyo ba'i sems bskyed par mi bya/

zhum par mi bya'o// sman gyi sde ngas ches mang dubastanate/ sman gyi sde ngas bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dum zhig gi bar du dka' ba sbyang pasdad kyang/ sman gyi sde ngas langs spyod kyi phyir ram/ 'tsho

ba'i lengs stod kyi phyir ram/ dbang phyug gi la ngas spyod kyi phyir dka' ba spyod pa spyad pa ma yin gyi/ sman gyi sde chos kyi ngo bo nyid khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir ngas dkarab spyod pa spyad kyang/ ngas de srid kyi

bar dub namod du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma theb kyi/ sman gyi sde gang gi tshegang gi dus na/ sa rdung gi chos kyi rnamagrangs 'di thos pa de nyid kyi nyin m rgyan med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sas rgyas te/ sman gyi sde ches kyi rnam grangs 'di bab bo// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa rnyed par dga'o// sman gyi sde de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'byung
[gi ]/ba yang mchog tu rnyed par dka'o// sman gyi ste chos kyirnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dag kyang mchog tu rnyed par dka'o// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de dag thams cad

[>>ni blon med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// sman gyi sde bskal pa stong du 'khor ba bsu'i khar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rab tu
ts+tshA rnyed par 'gyur ro// 'gog pa dang 7 yang rab tu shes par 'gyur ro// gnas rab tu shes pa'i skal ba adapar 'gyur ro// dge ba'i gnas rab tu shes pa'iskal pa yod par 'gyur ro//
mngon par shes pa dang dge ba'iganas rab tu shes pa'iskal ba yod par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i gnas dang 'gog pa rab tu shes pa'i skal ba yod par 'gyur ro/ sman gyi snga ci'i phyir 'gog pa zhes bya/
rgyu gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das tshes kyi gnas ni don ces bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'dasakyis bka' stsal pa// sman gyi sde chos kyi gnas gang yin/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das skyes shes bgyi ba
ni brtson 'grus brtsams pa nyid dang/ tshul khrims brtsams pa nyid dang/ tshul khrims dang ldan ba lags te chos kyi gter zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di na chos kyi gter 'byung ba'o//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di yongs su 'dri bar sems pa'i legs so legs so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du de bzhin
[. ]gshegs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sman gyi sde gang dag mang du thos pa dang ldan pa// rab tu shes pa de dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'byung/
ba rab tu shesas// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'byung ba shes nas/ dbazhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'byung ba bde ba'i gnas 'di rab tu shes so// dam de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jig rten du
'byung ba den sems can rnams kyis chos thams cad rab tu shes so// thabs ma las pas chos rnams rab tu shes so// 'jig rtanapa dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams rab tu
shas so// 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes rnams rab tu shes so// gsol pa/ ya shes gnyis rtogs nas mya ngan las 'das pa gang rub tu 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyisaM

bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde chos rab tu shes nas/ chos rab tu shes so// sman gyi sde de bzhin du dam pa'i chos bsdu bar rab tu shes nas red pa dngapo skya'o// chos ji ltar thos pa bzhin du bzung nas// chos

dang ldan pa rnyed par 'gyuraro// sman gyi sde 'di lta ste/ dparanami tshong par gyur pa la la zhig mi khur stong gi gsar khyerate/ da khe spogs kyi phyir song ba dang/ de ripha mas 'di skad smra ste bu nyon cig
gser srang stong byaral gzhan dang rang gi gser leg par khyer cig/ tshong pa des gser khyer te song nas zla ba gcig tsam len pa dang/ gsarade dag thams cad chub gsan te med par byas kyi 'og tu den
nas mi de bsams dud/ shin tu ma dga' nas snying la mya ngan gyi thug rdus thugaste/ deganong zhing ngo tsha nas rang gi khyim dum song ba dang/ de'iya mas shes nas/ yi chad

pad snying la mya ngan gyi zug rngus thuganasags dag kyang dral te bu ngan pa de bdag cag gi khyim du bu'i gzugs su skyasas khyim so kun kyang bshig ste/bdagacab lamakho ba med cing sdug bsngal bar byas so//

ban gyi las byed du bcug go zhes de skad smra sngags 'don te/ de'i pham yi chad nas 'chi ba'i dus byas pa dang/ de nas bu des pha ma bdag la yi chad de 'chi ba'i dus byas so zhes thos nas/ bude yang yi

chad de ri po'i dus byas pa de bzhin du/ sman gyi sde de bzhin gshegs pas don 'di bshad pa la yang/ gang dag nga'i bstan pa la mi dad pa dedag ni/ ra thagachad nas 'chiba'i dus kyi tshe/ snyingal mya ngan gyi

zug rdus thug ste/ 'chiba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro// ji ltar pha ma de yi chad de/ gsar gyi phyir mya ngan byed cing/ snying la mya ngan gyi thuganas/ gzhan dang nang gi gsar gyi phyir mya ngan gyi thug rdu dang ldan pa de bzhin

du sman gyi sde gang dag nga'i bstan pa ma dad pa de dag ni/ phyis 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe gdung shing sngags 'don la/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong zhing/ sngon las byas pa'i bsod nams dag chus bodags/ phyin chad

zhing babrang po dang ldan pa'i bsod nams dgami byed de/ de dag gi snying mya ngan gyi zug rdudang ldan pas de'i tshe de'i dus na/ sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye zhing

[.j]mi bcad pa drag po mthong nas ) 'chiba'i dus kyi tshe 'di snyam du sems te/ gang sems canadamyal ba dang/ dud 'gro dang/ yi dwags dang ga shin rje'i 'jig rtenamathangabar mi 'gyur zhing/ sdug sngal
gyi tshor ba de myong bar mi 'gyurapar bdag la su zhig/ skyob par 'gyur snyam pa dang/ de'i pha mas 'di skad ces smras so// bu cig nad kyis 'jigs chenan/ dbyung bar mi nus ji ltar bya/ nab ri bas
'jigs mod kyi// bu khyod 'chi ba yod ma yin// nad kyi 'jigs dang skyag pa las// khyed ni tharapar 'gyur ba yin// bdag gi rnam par shes pa 'gag/ bdag gi lus la rab tu gnod// yan lag thams
cad sdug bsngal te// bdag gis 'ching ma thong bar 'gyur// bdag gi mig nemo mthong zhing// bdapa gisna gang mi thos so// rna bas thos ba mi 'gyu// bus kyang so mdog pad ma yin// yan lag nying
lag sdug bsngal te// shing dang 'dra bar sems bamed// bdag gi 'byib 'ong mad ces// yum gyis bdag gi snga bsring brad/ mas smas nga/ bu khyod de skad sma mi rigs// nga lamchog tu 'jigs ma/
byed khyod kyi lus la rims btab pas// rnam pa sna tshogs mthong bar gyur// bus smras pa ! lus la rims kyang ma mthong ste// na ba med cing sdug bsngale mad/ 'chi ba shin tu mi bdamathong//
bdag gi lus sdug bcom par gyur// bdag gi lus kun sdug bsngal gyis// rab tu gathare bar mthong gyur na// su la skyabs su 'gro bar bya// bdag gi skyob par su zhig 'gyur// phams smras pa
bu khyod la// lha yang rab tu skyon gyur gyis// lha rnams la ni mchod byas na// daa rig tu 'tsho bar 'gyur// bus smras pa) gang gis bdag ni'atsho'agyur ba// khyed kyis
de ltar mdzad du gsol// ringes shing rab tu myur bzhud la// lha chen po la dri bar gsal// de nas de pham lha'i rten gyi drud du song nas lha la 'dug pa phul ba dung denas lha bon pos lha la 'dug pa
b+hU phul nas tshig 'di skad ces smras go// khyed la lha skyon gyis lha rjed cig/ mchod sbyin gyis shig/ de la phyags sod cig/ mi yang sod cig dang/ de nas byed kyi bu nad las yongs su thar 'gyur//
denas pha ma de dag gis bsams pa bdag cag dbul na ji ltar bya ) gal te lha ma mnyes nan bu de yang 'chipa'i dus byed par 'gyur/ ji lde mnyes par byas na bdag cagan dbul

zla ngas mi dang phyugs gang nas blang snyam nas/ de dag rings shing myur bar khyim du dong ste/ khyim rdzas cung zad ci bdog pa de thams cad phyags nyo ba'i phyir tshong dudangang// nas mi gzhan zhig gi gan
phyinanas/ kye skyes bu gser zhig bskyer byin/ bskyin pa ni zhag bcu na slar 'bul nusan na legs/ ji ste 'bul ma nus na yang nged byed kyi bran du khas blas te las bya'o zhes de skad smras nas/ de
gnyis kyis gsor de khyer tai nyor dang ngo// de gnyis kyis mi sa nas/ mi des kyang bdag gsar bar ni ma shes so// de nas pha ma rmongs par gyur ba de gnyis slar rang gi khyim dum deng gi// lha

rten gyi drung du so nga ste/ lha bon po la myur du mchod sprin mdzod cig ces smras so// de nas pha ma de gnyis bdag nyid kyis phyugs kyang bsad mi de yang bsad do// de nas lha bon po des mchod sprin bya ba ra
bsams te ma dus pa dang/ denas lha babs te/ khyed kyi ngu ngas khyer ro zhes smas// de nas pha ma de nyid dga' zhing mgu las khyabanas/ bu 'disos nas bdag cag bran du gyur kyang bu zhes smras te/

phams lha la mchod sbyin byas nas slar lagasta/ rangagi khyim du phyin nas bu 'chi ba'i dus byas pa mthong ngo// de nas pha ma de gnyis sdug bsngal zhing yimug pa chen pos snying la mya ngan gyi thug rdus zug
ste yi chad par gyur nas de nyid du 'chi b.redus byas pa de bzhin du sman gyi sde mi dge ba'i grogs po dang bstan pa mi bya'o// gsal po/ bcom ldan 'dus sems can de dag gang du skyes pa zhu'o/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde kha rog da lam 'dri zhig/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das zhu'o/ (bde bar gshegs pa zhu'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
sman gyi sde de la man sems canadamyal ba chen po ngu'abod du skyas sa// phasems can dmyal ba chen po bsdus gzhom du skyes so// bu nas mas tsan dmyal ba chen po tsha b.raskyes so// lha ban ni
sams can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mi ma nongs pa de gang du skyes/ de'i tshe slad ma gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde
'di la mi mnyes pa de nisum nu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis mi desum cu rtsagasum gyi lha rnams dang skal//
bamanyam par skyes/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa sman gyi sde nyon cig/ mi de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa la sems dad pas/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lazhes lan cig smras te/

sman gyi sde dag ba'i nub des bskal pa drug curibaradusum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi bde ba myong bar 'gyur ) bskal pa brgyad bcu'i bar du skyabar tsherabs dran par 'gyur ro// skye ba dang skya ba'amya ngan gyi thug
rdu thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// skyes ma thag tu sdug bsngal thams cad zlog par byed do// sa mas can de dag thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla b.rani mi nus so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das ji ltar sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar rngo thog pa lags ]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das brtson 'grus brtsam pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde nyon cig/ brtson 'grus shes bya ba ni 'bras bu rnams ston pa'o// 'ad lta ste/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i

'bras bu zhes bya ba'i brtson 'grus kyi gnas so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus kyi gnas so// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus kyi gnas so// dgra/
bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu dang/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu 'gag pa zhes bya ba ni brtsen 'grus kyi gnasas// rangasangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu dang rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu'i shes pa zhes bya ba ni/
brtson 'grus kyi gnas so// byang chub sems dpa'i 'bras bu dang/ byang chub kyi gnas shes bya ba nibartson 'grus kyi gnas te/ sman gyi sde 'di dgan brtson 'grus kyi gnas shes bya'o//
gsal pa[） ]bcom ldan 'das rgyun tu zhugs pa dang/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ji ltar bstan par bgyi ! bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa: 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi 'al zhig gis

shing zhig bskyod na/ de nyid kyi nyin mo shingade ri rtsa ba thug nas/ de de kyi nyin mo rtsa ba de dpag tshad tsam gyi 'og tu song ngo mi gzhan zhig gis kyang de bzhin du shing bskyod pa dang/ de nyid kyi nyin mo
rlung gyis bskyod de/ shing de'i rtsa ba ma bruganas/ de nas mi des gnas de nas shing de phyung ba dang/ mi gcig shes kyis ci'i phyir nga'i sa brkos shes 'thab 'phrog tshud par gyur nas/ de'i
tshe rgyal pos mi de gnyis rathab 'bras rtse da par gyur to zhes thos nas rgyal po des pho 'a btang ste/ song la mi de gnyis khrid deshegangashig/ lha de ltar 'tshal le zhes ma de ranges pa'i gzugs
su brgyugs nas/ mi de gnyis la 'di skad ces/ khyed la rgyal po rabod du zhes smras pa dang/ de nas mi gcig ni 'jigs skrag go/ ma gcig ni 'jigs shing sgrug pa med par rgyal po ga la ba der
@#/ khrid de// khrid nas rgyal po'i mdun du 'khod do// de nas rgyal pos mi de gnyis la 'di skad ces smras so// kye khyed ci zhig gi phyir 'thab cing rtsod par 'gyur/ de nasami de
gnyis langs te rgyal bo la 'di skad ces smras s// rgyal bo chen po gsan du gsol ) bdag cag la ni sa phyogs ltung byed kyang mamachi sa kyi/ sa gsar po zhig la bshade bskyod pa las/ rang gis

b+hU bskyor nas rtsa ba yang ma thug/ lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu yang ma byung ste rgyal po chen po de'i rtsa ba dpag tshad tsam gyi 'og tu yang m mchis pa dang/ khyod kyis ltase so zhes mi 'dis bdagalo
pa 'thab mo brgal du bas kyi bdag gis ni ma nongs na/ lha de la bdag gis srung thadakyang ma nongs par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ de nas rgyal po des blon po bye ba phrag sum cu bkug ste/
bsogs nas 'di skad ces smra'o// khyed cag smyos shig/ blon po rnams kyis gsol pa/ ji skad smra bar gyi/ gang gi nyin mang shing bskyad pa de nyid kyi nyin mo rtsa ba zuganas/ le ma dang me
tog dang/ 'bras bu 'byung ba khyod kyis gang yang mthong ngas gros sam/ khyed kyi zhag bdun nam/ zla ba byed kyis 'du bye phrag spyad par gyis shig/ de nas thon pa na de dag stan las la ngas te

rgyal 'di 'di skadaces gsol to// rgyal po chen po bdag cag gis 'ad bye brag phyed par bgyir mi rung ngo// 'di bye brag phyed pa'i rngomi thog go/ rgya la po chen po 'di ni ngo mtshar te/ reshigami 'di nyid

[c/]la skya bar bgyi'o// kye skyes bu gang smras pa'i don de bden nam/ smras shib/ smras pa/ rgyal po chen po don de mang du// rgyal bos smras pa// gang gi nyin mo shing skyed pa de yi nyin mo rtsa thug
cir 'dab ma me tog 'bras byung zhes// de nyid nyin ma sma ba ni// khyod kyi tshig 'digatang par kar ]/'di 'dra mthong ba 'am thos ba mad// de nas mi de thalamo sbyar te// rgyal po de la 'di skad

smras// gshegs la nyid kyis shing bskyed de// rtsa ba zug la gathigs su gsol// de nas rgyal po de blon po bya pa phrag sum cu dang nyin cig phyi rol tu byung nas// mi de gnyis kyang btson rar bcug go/

de nas rgyal po de nyid kyi shing bskyed pa dang/ shing de rtsa ba yang ma thug/ lam dang/ me tog dang 'bras bu yangs byung nas de nas/ rgyal bo de bros te 'di skad ces/ khyed myur du dung la shing pashug

pa'i sta re rnams lang shig ces smras nas/ blangs pa dang/ de nas gangami des bskyang pa'i ngashing del khrod nas shing de'i lo ma dang/ ma tog dang ) 'bras bu byung ba rnams bcad de/ shing gcig po de

bcad pa dang/ shing bcu gnyis byung ngo// shing bcu gnyis po bcad pa dang/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rtsa ba dang bcas/ lam dang bcas/ myu gu du dang bcas pa nyi shu rtsa ba'i byung ngo// denas shingati

shu rtsa bzhi po de dag las bya gsar gyi ze ba can gser gyi mchu can rin po che sna bdun gyi radab ma cananyi shu rtsa bzhi byung ngo// de nas rgyal po de khro ba'i srol gyis gnon nas/ rang gi lag gis lta re blangs te
@#/ shing de la gtsabs pa dang/ shing gtsabs pa de las bdud rtsi ri chu byung ngo// de nas rgya kha po de yid mi bde nas/ song la mi de gnyis btson ra nas phung shig ces ra sgo ba da nga lha de ltar

bo'atshal lo zhes de'i mod la rab tu brgyugs te/ mi de gnyis btson ra nas phyung shinge ga la ba der khrid pa dang/ rgyal pos smras pa/ shing gcig bcad pa gnyis gyur du 'phel te/ nyi shu rtsa bzhir gyurar
de byed kyis bskyed dam/ ngas bskyed par shing ni rtsa ba dang/ lo ma dang/ ma tog dang/ 'bras bu yang ma skyes so// de nas mi des gsol pa/ rgyal po chen po bdag gi bsod nams ci 'dra ba de 'dra
ba'i bsod nams khyod la mi mnga'o// de nas blon po bye ba phrag sum cus dus mo'i lce ngaganyis sa la btsugs nas/ mi de la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po lngam 'di mi rung gis/ khyed kyis rgyal
po bya dgos so// de nas mi des blon po de dag la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rgyal po 'brangs spyod bdag mi dgos// nor dang 'bru yang dgos pa med// sangs rgyas rnams la bdag dad
pas rkang gnyis ngag gi mchog tu shog/ zhi ba mya ngan 'das pa'i dbyings// gangan de bzhin gshegs par grags// mya ngan 'das khyim ragro 'gyur ba// chos 'di khyed la bshad par bya//
skyil mo krung ni bcas nas su// de nas yi dam rab bcas so// bdag gistan byas las rnams kyis// rgyal po'i btson raraphyin par gyur// smon lam 'di ni btab pas na// bdag gis las

bza ni brad par gyur// de nas bya bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhis/ rdo rje'i mchus sil snyan rnams dkrol to// de nas de'i tshe de'i dus na// khang pa brtsegs pa sum khri nyis stong byung ste khang pa brtsegs pa re re'i tshad

kyang dpag tshad nyi shu rtsa lnga lnga bar gyur te// khang pa brtsegs pa re re las kyang bya gsar gyi ze ba can/ gsar gyi mchu can/ gser gyi gdong can bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga lnga byung ste/ dedag gis mi'i skad
dusmas ra rgyal po khyod kyis legs ma byas// khyod kyis shing dbacad pas//bye ba brgya yi shing rnams las// kigurtsa bzhib/nas par gyur// sems can gang gis shing bskyang 'di// ci 'dra shes
bam yin pa// sdig b.ri lasakyis phyin chad kyang// mi sdug 'bras bu myong bgar gyur// rgya la pos smras pa/ bdag gis don 'dimi shes kyis// dka' thub chen po lung ston cig/ bya rnams
kyis smras pa/ 'dini 'jig rten snang byed de// rnam par 'drenababa'agyur ba yin// 'khor b.risrid pa'i btson gnas// sems can thams cad thar byed pa'o// rgyal bos smras pa/ gang gi shing ni ma
skyes pa// skyes bu gnyis pa de gang yin// des ni sdig ba'i las gang byas// gnyis skyes rnams nim bar byos// bya rnams kyis smras po/ gang gishing ma skyes pa// denalha sbyin glan pa ste//

dag ba cung zad ma byas na// de yishingani ji ltar skye// de nas de ri tshe de'i dus na/ blon po bya ba phrag sum cu po rnams kyis/ chos kyi mgras 'di thos nas// thams cad kyang sa bcu rab tu bganas te/mngon
par shes pa so sar thob par gyur te// rgyal po de yang sa bcu la gnas nas/ dge ba'i chos mngon par rtogs pa rjes su grub bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rjes 'di skadaces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis blon po bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa gsum bo rnams nganu la gnas te/ mngon par shes pa so sor theb bas
gyur : bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde nyon cig dang lung bstan par bya'o// de nas de'i tshobcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'dasakyi zhal gyi sgo nas

N+NaM 'od zer kha dog du ma/ kha dog sna tshogs/ kha dog brgya stong phrag dum 'di lta ste/ spen pa dang/ ser bo dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar po dang le brgan dang/ shel dang dngul gyi kha dog lta bu brgyad khri bzhi stong
byunganas/ de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mthar yas mu med pa snang bar byas te/ suraleganas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ nga com ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo//
de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde stan 'dres langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig du bathar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de
logs su thal ma sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzo gas pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu ma ]
mchis rgyan ma mchis pa ra 'dzum pa mimadzad na/ 'jug pa mdzad pa'i rgya gang la gas/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa pa/ sman gyi sde phyogs bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi//
khams kun nas skye bo mang po'i tshogs pa'i gan du 'ong ba mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das demathong ngo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde de'i phyir skye bo'i tshogs la rnam
rar rtogs te rjes shi ga/denas byang chub sems dpa' sems dang la chen po sman gyi sdus rnam par bltas pa dang/ shar phyogs nasangashing dpag tshad bdun stong pa cig byung nas/ de'i phyogs gcig na//

skye bo'i tshogs bya ba stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'dus te/ de dag me : ]mi zer/ mi brjod/ mi tha/ mi ldang/ mi rachag// cang mi smra bar 'khod pa dang/ lho phyogs nas shong dpag tshad bdun stong pa gcig

khyung nas// de la skye bo'i tshogs bya ba stong phrag nyi shu rtsal 'dus te/ de dag kyang mi ther/ mi sma/ kun rtami slu/ yongs su gi rjed/ mi ldang/ mi 'chag ste/ cang mi smra bar 'khod pa dang/ nub phyogs nas/

shing dpag tshad bdun stong pa gcig byung nas/ de la skye bo'i tshogs bya ba stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga'adus te/ de dag kyang mi zer/ mi m+ma kun tum smra/ yongs su mi rjod/ mi ldang/ mi 'chag ste/ cangam

sna par 'bod pa dang/ byang phyogs nas ngashingadapag tshad bdun stong pa gcig byung nas/ de la skye bo'i tshogs bye ba stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'dus te/ dadag kyang mi ser/ mi smra/ kun tumi smra/ yongs sumi
brjod mi ldang/ mi 'chagaste/ sung mi smra bar 'khod pa dang/ 'og gi phyogs nas shingadapag tshad bdun stong pa gcig byung nas/ de la skye bo'i tshogs bye ba stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga
'dus te/ de dag kyang mi ther/mi smra/ kun tu mi/ yongs sum brjod/ mi ldang/ mi 'chag ste/ cang mi smra bar 'khod pa dang/ stong gi phyogs nas shing dang ga tshad bdun stong rig pa gcig byung nas/

de la skye bo'i tshogs bye ba stong phraganyi shu rtsa lnga 'dus te/ de dag kyang mi ther/mi smra/ kun tu mi tsA yongs su mi brjod/ mi ldang/ mi 'chag ste/ cang mi smra ba'akhod nga mthong ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'ad/
la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad dubcom ldan 'das kyis bdag 'a skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'dres
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// diskad ces gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen
pa sman gyi sa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sman gyi sde ci dang ci 'dod pa dris)shig dang/ dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas ngas khyed kyisoms rangs par bya'o// deskad ces bka' stsal
pa dang bcom ldan 'das la byang nubasaMms dparasems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'adas ci'i slad du phyogs bzhi'i 'jig rten nas skye bo'i tshogs mang ngo/
lha gas shing gnas pa nas/ 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi bar nas/skye ba'i tshogs bye ba stong phrag lnga bcu lhags te gnas par gyur pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/
bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde khyod songal 'di dag 'jig rten gyi khams gang nas lhags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la khyed nyid kyis zhus shig/ gsol pa/ su'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs
bskyed bas mngar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal nga sman gyi sde rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pas song zhig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chon po sman/
gyi sdes bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ denyid mi snang bar gyur nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams bya ba stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug 'das te/ 'jig rten gyi khams smra ba'i sgronam zhes
bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas blab can gyi zhing zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dang 'a byi ba stong phrag brgyad cus yongs su bskor cing/ mdun
gyis bltas nas chos ston pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der phyinato// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po sman gyi sde/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba can gyi zhing de'i sbyin
sngar 'duganas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de legs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyu gang gis mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi
khamasasu/ shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sun sngar/ skya bo'i tshogs phyogs bcu nas 'dus shing lhags pa dag/ de nas maNis par tshe ni mthong la 'dun mchis ba'i
chen mi mthong bar gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dra/sman gyi sde de nyidan rgyu zhing gnas so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das yang ji lta bu lags/ de nas byang chub sems dang las las
dpa' chen po sman gyi sa/ de bzhin gshegs pa glu ba can gyi zhing ga la ba der song nas phyin nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i spyan sngar 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug 'das temachis pa nA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de dag tu sems can ji sAdamathung ba desAngani gang nayang
ma mthong ngo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ sems can de dag ni sems pa med pa ri shing las byung ngo// gsolang bcom ldan 'das gang sems ma mchis ba'i shing
las mi byung pa sus mthong dus thog/ bcom ldan 'dusakyis bka' stsal pa// snyan gyi sde gangasams pa med pa'i khrirjod las mi 'byung ba khyod kyis ma mthongam thos sam/ gsol ba/ bcom
ldan 'das bdag gis ma mthong ma thos so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bko' la pa/ sman gyi sde khyod mthong bar 'dod na/ de sa bostan par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'tshale//

bde bar gshegs pa 'tshal lo// denas de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba can gyi zhing gis phyag brkyang pa dang/ phyag de las skye ba'i tshigs bye ba stong phrag brgya byung sta/skya ba'i tshigs re res kyang lag pa
brgya brgya brkyang nas/ gros dang/ thung ba dang/ byug pa sna tshogs de bzhin gshegs pa la gtor ba dang/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/sman gyi sde khyod kyis skye bo'i tshogs 'dris de bzhin
gshegs pa la spros dang/ brab dang/ byug pa gtor bamathong ngam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mthongalags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkarastsal

ba skya pa'i tshogs byung ba 'di dganasems pa mang pa'o// mi 'di dag nisams pa med pa'o// den mi bye ba stong phrag brgya po de dag rer shingayang gang lag pa brgya brgya yod pa de dag thams cad lhung ngo//
de nas byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo sman gyi sde de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'dici zhig la gas/ bde bar gshegs pa
'dici zhig lags/ gang mi rnams kyi lag pa brgyu ba yang yud tsam gyis ltung ste/ bcom ldan 'das gal te lag ba brgya pa yang grol bar mi 'gyuran/ lag pa gnyis pa'i mi lta smos kyang ratshal/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde de bzhin du sems can rnams nisams pamed par skye'o// sems pamed par 'gag go/ sman gyi sde nga'i lus kyang sems pa med par gyur par
@#/ shes par bya'o/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gangasems can de dag la gzhon pa gang lags/ rgan po gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde sems
can gzhon pa yang yod do// gon pa yang yod dogasol ba/ bcom ldan 'das gnon pa gang lags/rgan pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ gang dag da ltar lhung ba de dag ni rgyun
tsho pa'o// gang dag shing rnams las skyes pa de dgan gzhon pa'o// gsol ra/ bcom ldan 'das sems can gzhon nu rnams mthong bar 'tshal lo// de nas de bzhagashegs pa blob can gyi zhing gis

phyag g.yas pa'i thal brkyang pa dang/ de nas phyogs bcu nas skye bo'i tshigs bye ba stong phrag brgya brgyu reng ngo// 'og rang steng gi phyogs nas skye bo'i tshogs bya ba phrag lnga banu lnga bcu rong ste/skyaborAtshogs
dungag lhags nus kyang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas dpazhin gshegs pa lami s+sa/ kun tum smra zhing tsang mi sna bar 'khod do// denas bcom ldan 'dras la byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sngas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du sems can de dag de bzhin gshegs pa lami kun tu mi sa zhinganang mimatshibamams/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde khyod kyis mi shes sam/ sa phyogs ni sems pa modad/ mi// kun tu mi smra zhing/ chos kyi phung po yang mi shes so// de ci'i phyir nan/sman gyi sde

02 'di la sems can gzhan na kha cig ni mthong yang skya ba mishes 'gag pa dang/ na ba dang/ na ba dang/ mya ngan dang/ stsa sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug pa dang bral ba dang/ mi sdug pa dang phrad pa dang/mdzar

ba dang du ba dang/ 'chi ba dang/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang sdugabasngalami babrad pa de dag thams cad mi shes te/ mthong yang yid 'byung bar mi 'gyuranu/ shesarab lta ga la 'gyur te/sman gyi sde de
rag yang dang yang bslab par bya'o// denas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dang 'asems dpa' chen po sman gyi sngas 'diskyid ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang chos ma ratshul nga'i
sems can gzhon nu dedag gang nas mchis gang nas 'chi 'pho zhing gang du skye bar 'gyur/ ba com ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ sman gyi sde nyon cig/ mi'i lus yongs su 'dzin pa de dag
ni dngul mgar gyis kyang ma byas/ zas mkhan gyis kyang m byas/ shing mkhan gyis kyang ma byas/ rdza mkhan gyis kyang ma byas te/ rgyal po'i 'jigs pas kyang m skyes kyi/ gzhan du na skyes
ba dang bud mad 'dus pa dang sdig pa'i las dang ldan pa las byungang// sems can de dag kyang yang dung yang ba zerilas rnams sub pas/ de dag gi sdugakhasngalami bzad pa'atha' yas pa

dang/ tshor ba mi bzad pa 'byung ste/ derade dag sngon sdeg ba mi dge ba'i las byas pa'i rnam par smin pa myang ngo// sman gyi sde 'di nyid du gang sems can gzhon nu lhags pa mi ldang ba 'di dag ni 'di
@# /'dra ba ri sdug bsngal gyi tshor myong bar 'gyur te/sman gyi sde de ri phyir mi smra kun tu mi smra 'o// sman gyi sdo/ de ltaran sems can la gzhenazhu de dag ni/ dge ba yang mi shes/skye ba
[“ ]yang mi shes/'gag pa yang mi shes te// de dag mi lus kyang ba pa rami 'gyu ba 'di dag kyang sman gyi sde/ sems na gzhon nu rnams shes bya'o// gsol ba/bcom ldan 'das sams
can gzhon nu rnams ji ltar skye/ ji ltar 'gag bcom ldan 'das kyis pakarastsal pa// sman gyi snga 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi la la zhig gis ma langashing gis rig pa byas pa dang shing de
shul mthar gyis ma ngar ba de bzhin dusman gyi sde/ thog ma'i lus su skya'o// skyes nas bgaded tshor dmyong ngo// gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das su zhig 'dir mngon par sku skyas nas su
zhig yongs su mya ngan las 'das/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal nga/ sman gyi sde/ sangs rgyasanyid skyes so// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// 'di lta ste/
dperanA/ rgya la ngos mi la la zhig bcings te/ khang pa mun pa mun gnag gi nang du btson rar bcug pa dang/ mi de khang pamun gnag der zhugs nas/ khang pa mun nag la khang pa mun nag du mthong ngo/
denas mi gzhanasngon sdug bsngal gyi tshor ngas reg ba zhig gis mthong nas/mi de ni mi rung bar gyurato// sngon sdug bsngalam myong bas 'tshob/srogachad par 'gyur ro// snyam bsam nas des de ma khyer

[d/ ]te 'os nas/ khyim deri nang dum cung zadacig bor ba dang/ mi btson rar bcug ba des ma de mthong// mthong nas kyang de dbugs phyin par gyur to// spro bskyas so// me de yang rgyu gang gis 'bar bar mi rab dra ba/

des khyim de kun tu 'bar bar gyur nas/mi de yang de nyid du tshig pa dang/ de tshig ge zhes rgyu la ngos gyes nas/ mi dgar ste de 'disAm du phyin chad ni bdag gi yul du sams can gang yang btson rarami gzhug
ga snyam du sems so// de nas rgyal bo des rang gi yul na ba/ nas nga risams can rnams la/kye sams can khyed rnamasam 'jigs shig/ ma skrag cig/ khyed cag 'jigs par ma gyur cig/ phyin chad
nga'i yul du chad pas gcad pa 'am/ btson rar gzhug par mi bya'o// sams can gang yang srog dngadapral bar mi bya/ kyasems can byed rnams ma 'jigs shig ces/ de ltar dbugs phyung ba de bzhin du
sman gyi sde/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni nyin mos pa thams cad bsregs pa nad thams cad rab tu zhi bgro/ ltari ma tshig nas mi nyid kyi lus kyang tshig ste/ sams can rnams kyi don dang/ sku
pa dang/ bde ba'i phyir zhugs nas sems can bcings pa yang ng cis pa las yos su thar par byed pa de bzhin du/ da bzhinagashegs pa yang 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdangadang/ gti mug gi drim spangs te/
sems can thams cad lasgron ma bzhin du 'jig rten du byung nas sems can rnams sams can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro dang/ yi dgas dang/ lha ma yin gyilus rnams las yongs su thar par
mdzad cing/ sems can gzhananu dang/ rgan po rnams kyang yongs su thar par madzad do// dunas stang gi bar snang las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dug byung ngo// rgyal b.lishing ni/

[© ]ngomatshar zhing/ ni bzang mngonang ra'adus byas pa/ de sa bon btab pa ni// rnam par chud zar mi gyur ro// rgyal ba'i zhing na dag pa'i zhing/ sangs rgyas bstan pa bsngags pa ste// sams can thams cad

gzung ba'i phyi'i/ ston pas kyang ni thabs mdzad do// mya ngan 'dus pa'i dbyings gnas kyang// sa yi sta ngan kun tu snang// rtag tu 'jig rten zhi byas n// sangs rgyas sbyin pa ri gnas rnams srung// sams/
gzhon nu thar bar byed// rgan po rnams kyang thar par byed// sems can thams cad khams gsum las// mthar gyis yongs su thar par byas// sems can dmyal ba'i sgo bcad de// dud 'gro mi dgas/
thar par byas// 'jig rten 'di yang zhing byas nas// 'jig rten pha rol bde bar byed// danas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad nas bka' stsal pa/ legs pa rnams mthong na legs// sangs
rgyas rnams kyang mathongan legs// dam chos yon tan zhing yang legs// dge 'dun 'dus ba mthong nalegs// zung bstan pa yang legrwapa ste// sdig pa rnam par 'jig pa legs// de nas byang chub sems
ngas sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sda/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de lags su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsal to// bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang
(lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyed kyis sems can gzhon nu 'di dag mthongangam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bde bar gshegs
pa mthong lag sa so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde 'di dag thams cad ni deng nyid du sa ban la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// denas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ngam/
gyisde/ dang ga tshad brgyad khri srid kyi steng gi nam mkha' la gnas pa dang/ lha bye ba stong phrag brgyad nu/ bcom ldan 'das la ma tog gi char rab tu 'bebs so// sems can gzhanan de dag kyang thal
mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpar chen po sman gyi sdes/ bar snang la gnas bzhin du tshig 'di skad ces smras te/ des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
gyi khams sgras gang bar gyur pa dang/ sems can dmyal ba chenapo sum cu rtsa gnyis su skyes pa'isams can rnams sgra de la kun to// lha'i ris sum cu rtsa gnyis sgra de la nyan to// stong gsum gyi

stong chen po ri 'jig rten gyi khams kyang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// rgya mtsho chen po nang gi klung brgyad khri bzhi stongayang 'khrugs so// srin po bya ba stongaphrag sum cu yang 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir lhags

so// yi dgas dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po bya bstong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga yang lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor nas lhags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dus pa chen po kun tu 'dus so// de nas
[rg]@#/// bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can gzhon nu de dag la chos bstan pa dang/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas/ byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpar chen po// bye ba
stong phrag brgyud rang rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyis lhags so/// bam po bzhi pa ste tha ma'o// de nas byang chub sems dang rasams dbalatshan pa sman
gyi sngas/ bcom ldan 'adas ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btudanas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dang ra 'dus shing mchis pa
mang ngo bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo// bcom ldan 'das lha dang klu 'dus shing mchis pa yang mang ngo// srin po bye ba phrag dum zhig kyang lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor nas lhags te 'dus nas
mchis par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub soms dpa' sems dpa' chenapo sman gyi sde la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu mar shog/ de nas byang chu sems dpa'
sems dpa'achon po sman gyi sde rdzu 'phrul gyi stabs kyis babs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te// bcom ldan

'das chos kyi phung po chos kyi phung po zhes bgyi ba bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na chos kyi phung po zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu chos kyi phung po lhas phyogs pa ni/ gong tshangs par spyad/
ba yongs su tshol zhing/ gang tshangs par spyod pa yongs su btsal nas kyang sdig pa thams cad srong b.ro// rigs kyi bu sems can gzhen ru mi tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa snga sa nas/gdonami za/
bar ga zungs rab tu 'tho ba par 'gyur zhing chos thams cang dang yang ldan pa 'gyur ba de dag mthong ngam gso pa/ bcom ldan 'das thabs gang gis sams can mang po zhig 'dus shing chos kyi

chung nga nyan/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dang sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde 'baka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde gang dag skya ba nyid sdug bsngal du mi 3nan banyid sdug bsngal du mi nyan/nad nyi'i

sdug bsngal dang mya ngan sdug bsngal dang/ skyesngagla 'don pa sdug bsngal dang sdug pa dang bral sdug bsngal dang mi sdug pa dang phradapa sdug bsngal du mi nyan pa'isams can yang phal cher yod do// 'bad sdug bsngal
thams cad kyi phyir lus dngasrog 'phrog pa yin te/ sman gyi snga 'dan sdu bsngal thams cad ces bya'o// des sems can gnon nu de dag gis bstan pa 'di thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de
logs su thalamo sbyar babatud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skadaces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang 'gum par 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyadadang sems/
can thams cad kyang mchi'o// da dag gis gso la ba/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar rang de rings kyis non par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag 'chi ba'i dus// rnam
0/ @#// par shes pa tham la/ rnam par shes pa 'gag par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung dang/ rnam par shes pa rnam par 'khrul par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung dang/ rnam par shes ba
po 'khrugs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung dang/ rigs kyi bu rlung gsum po 'di dag gis/ 'chib dus kyi tshe rnam par shes pa tham la gleng bar 'gyur/ 'khrug par 'gyur/ 'khrug pa skyed par 'gyur
ra[$]dadag gis gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/ rnam par shes pa 'gag pa na/ lus 'dzom par bgyid pa'i rlung gsum po gang lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa 3 grogs po dag mtshon ces bya ba dang/ skul ba zhes bya ba dang/ sred pa zhes bya bas lus 'jom par byed do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lus shes bgyi ba ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal pa/ grags pa dag kun tu 'bar ba zhes kyang bya/ tshig pa zhes kyang bya/ ngar lcabs zhes kyang bya/ sgegrwa pa zhes kyang bya/ durakhrod pa nas kyang bya/ ngan pa'i bzhes kyang bya/ bur lci

ba zhes kyang bya/ skya bas yongs su gzir ba zhes kyang bya/ skyabs kun tu dkrugs pa zhes kyang bya 3 srog yos su gdung ba zhes kyang bya/ 'a ba dang/ sdug pa dang bral bar byed pa zhes kyang bya sdu/ grags
bdag 'di rnams ni lus shes bya'o// de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar 'gum/ ji ltar ratsho// bcom ldan 'angs kyis bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba/

ra che ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa bsod nams zhes bya ba na ra ba'o// grogs po dag lus shes bya ba ni rab ste rgyus pa bye bas ni dkris spu'i khung bu brgyad khri bzhi stong dang ni ldan/ yan la bag khri nyis
stang gis ni spra la/ rus pa sum brgya drug cus ni brtan/ lus kyi nang na srin bu'i rigs brgyad cu rtsa bzhin gnas to/ srog chags de dag thams cad la yang 'chib yang yod/ ratshib 'gag pa yang
yod de nam mi de ra chi ba dan/ srog chags de dag thams cad re thag chad par 'gyur te/ denasrog chags thams cad gcig la gcig za bas rlung ra phyug cing g.yo bar 'gyur ro// denade dag sdug/

bsngal gyi tshor ba myongang// la la ni bu'i phyir mya ngan byed/ la la ni bu mo'i phyi mya ngan byed/ la la ni gnyen gyi phyir mya ngan byed de/ de dag thams cad mya ngan gyi zug rngus thug go/ gcig la gcig za bar
brtsa mas nas/ de ngag gcig gis gcig bris te// srog chags gnyis shig las pa na/ de gnyis kyang zhag bdun gyi bar du 'grabs/ zhag bdun 'das pa dang/ srog chags gcig ni
bcom mo// gcig ni thar ro// tshe dang ldan pa chos shes bya ba gang zhe na/ 'diji sAm du sams/ ji ltar srog chags rnams gcig la gcig mi mthun pa byas nas/ 'chi bar 'gyur ba de
bzhin du/ byis pa so so'i skye bo'i sems can rnams kyang phan tshun gcig la gcig mi mthun pa byed de/ skye bas mi 'jigs/ rga bas ma 'jigs/ nad kyis mi 'jigs 'chi bsami
'jigs so// ji ltar srog chags gnyis 'thab pa bzhin du byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyang phan tshun 'thab bo// de nas 'chi ba'i dusan/ nyes du dge ba

[>> rnams kyis smas pa/ skyes bu khyod nizhig la yid rton/ ci khyod kyis nyes pa cung zad kyang ma mthong ngam/ skya banyis pa mamathong ngamo/ rga ba dang na ba'inyis pa ma mthong ngam/'chib nyes pa/
ma mthong ngam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa bdag gis skye ba'i nyes pa yang mthong nga/ rga ba dang na ba'i nyes pa yang mathongang// thams cad kyi thamar 'chi ba'inyis pa yang mthong nga// sa bag
ci'i phyir gang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi bya bam byas/ ci'i phyir 'jig rten gnyis gar bde ba 'phel ba'i chos kyi phungapo ri dge ba'i rtsa ba rnamasam byas/ grogs pa dag gnyis su yang dri'o// khyed

ci'i phyir gangaskye ba dang/ 'chib las yongs su thar pa'i dge ba'i tshogs ma byas/ khyod kyis ci'i phyir tshul bzhin yid la byed pas sor brtag pa ma byas/ ji ltar dpyad kyis sa la gaN+Di rdung ba'i sgra
ma thos/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing la dge ba'i sa bon skrun cing sos sam/ phreng ba 'am/ ma ma sbyin pa byin pa ma mthong ngo// de bzhin gshegs pa la bza' ba dang bcar ba 'bul ba dang//
mkhar bzhin tshim par byas pa yang ma mthong/ dge slongadang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge bstan dang/ dge bsnyen ma bstan pa lamangon par dad bdag ni'akhor bzhi'o// de ltar de la phan pa'i phyir skya/

te nga sAd pa dang/ lha cung zad kyang ma bgyis go/ mi byed kyis ni radzam bu'i gling du 'ongs nas/ mi dge ba byas so// de'i tshe mi shi ba de la chos kyi rgya la pos rjes su bstan pa 'i tshigs su bcad pa smas pa//
de bzhin gshegs pa 'khyung mthong zhing// gaN+Di rdung ba thos gyur la// mya ngan 'das pa nir 'gro ba'i// tshes bstan thos kyang ma byas so/ denasami res sa smras pa bang gni byis pa'i bar gyur te//
sdig pa'i grogs kyi dbadasong nas// 'dad pas 'khrul nga 'isoms kyis su// bdag gis sdig nga'i las byas so// 'dod ba dpag kyang bstan pa dang// bdag gis srog chagasa rnams kyang gsang// dge
'duna rnams kyi chud gsan pas// mi bzad de yi 'bras bu 'ong// gnod par sems pa'i yid kyis su// bdag gis mchod rten bshig pa byas// tshig ngana rnams kyang rab tu smas: bdag gis
ma yang brdung bar byas// bdag gi lus kyis gang byas pa/ nyes pa dag kyang rab tungashes// sems can dmyal ba ngu 'bod du// ngan dumi bzad skye ba mthong/ bsdus gzhom du yang tshor ba myong// de zhin
rab tu tsha ba dang/ mnar mang chen po mi bzad par// tshor pa rjesasu myong bar 'gyur// pad+ma lta bu r cher gas pa'i// sems can dmyal bar sdug bsngal du// jiganag btab pa 'jigs chenadu:/ lan
brgya'i b.radu skye bar 'gyur// sems dmul sems can bsad nas su// phyis kyang 'jigs pa de mthong ste// dpag tshad brgya la ni yang dang ya nga// 'jigs pa chen por ltang bar 'gyur// da dag/
[f]@#// sgo sAdami 'gyur te// phyis kyang bum par rab tu ltung// spu gri zhes bya sems dam la du// spu gri stong yang 'byung bar 'gyur// bye ba stong phrag khri rnams kyi// spu gri mdun du/
[>>'byung 'gyur te// bdag gis nyes pa'i las byas pas/// ded ba/sa ni des gtubs// rlung ri khrugs chen po mi thad pas// lus de thams cad 'jig par byed// rtag tu 'di 'dra'i sems
dmyal du// bdag gis sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur// lus ni rab tu sdug bsngal rab// sams can kun gyis bdag mthongang// khyinas bya phyir gzhan dag gi/ nor yang bdag gis rab tu byas
bdag gis bu pho du ma dang// dbazhin thu nu sring mo dang// bdag gi pha ma rang do bzhin te// mdza' ba gnyen bshes mang po dang// bran dang las byed rnams dang ni// de bzhin ba dang phyags dngugayog/
dgos pa ngan la bdag 'khrul te// gser dang dngul gyi snod rnams dang// de bzhin phra rab gos rnams dang// khyim byedabacug pas rakhrul pa ste// khyim yang shin du bkra byas nas// skyes pa bud
mad lang long dang// pi we ngasemasnyan 'khrol ba la// bdag yidem dul dag par gyur// sos chudag gis lus bkrus kyang// da dung byas pa gzo bamed// lus drod soms pa med pa
ste nga khyod kyi chedal 'khrul// byin chadagams can 'ga' tsam mang// bdag la skyob par ragyur ba med// rlung 'khrug chen po mibabud par// lus ni yongs su gdung ba na// ro dang ldan pa
[4 zhin bris te// lces kyang sna tshogs de bzhin no// phrengal sna tshogs bzang mdzes nga// ra tumang bo mgo la pa runges// mig ni bag thugs kyis ra khru la byas te// mig gi skyabs ni yod ma yin//
pa dag gis mdzeng nas gang byas pa// sdig ba rnams niyig gi rgyu// lag pa rdo rjes bcad pani// bdag gi rna ba'i rgyu yin no// lag pa gnyis la bo gdu bu btags// sor mo masal sor gdub/
bcug ma shul dumu tigs ma do// rkang pa gnyis kyang rab tu brgyan// de la dra ba byas pa dang// de la gsar mang gnas par byas/ lus la rin chen sna tshogs dang// gser gyi gdu bu 'ong de
bzhin no// lengs spyod chen pos rab brtses nas// yid kyang shin tut+tag par gyur// rab tu 'jam la bdag reg nas// shin tu sred pas deng ston to// gding ba sna tshogs yul cha yis//
bdag gis lus ni rtsar bcug go/ spos chu bgrang ngos khrus byas te// sos rnams kyis kyang rab tu bskus// lha rdzas ga bur tsan dan gyi// bdug pa rnams kyis rab tu bdugs// kha dol pabang bo
byas nas kyang// gla rtsi ldan bas rab tu bsgos// lana'abrumar dringag dang// snam tsam ba ka la sogs// bskus nas mo ka shi ba// dkar po'i gos kyang rab tu bgos// glang po'i rgyab
nas babs nas su// rta yi rgyab tungonapar zhon// bdag ni rgyal bo yin snyam sems// skya bo dag nimadunan rgyug/ glu gar shin tu bsubs pa yi// sras rnams kyang narib tu shes/
ri dgas rnams ni ma nyes par// bdag gsamadas kyang ri dgas bsad// 'jig rten phyi ma ma shes pas// bdag gis 'di 'dra'i sdug byas shing// bdag
gis gzhan gyis sha bros pas// de phyir bdag kha sdug bsngal 'di/ mi bgrad 'ong bar 'gyur ba yi// 'chi ba bdag gis ma shes te// bdagazhi byas pa'i bor gyurangs// bdag gis lus
kyang gs ba byas// dengani bdag la 'chi'i na/ skyabs byed pa nisu yang med// gnyena rnams khyed cag thams cad kyang// nga yi gdongang ba ltar ci yod/ ci zhig phyir ni gas 'dra zhing//

ci phyir du zhing sngags 'don// ci phyi'i skra rnams rab 'jig cing// ci phyir khrag kyang 'byin par byed// ci byarim go la rdul 'dzem zhing// brang yang rab tu rdung bar byed// bdang ga pa son tshan sde bag nga
rnams // nga bar bya rigs khyed ci gdung// bdag gi lus n spyang ki dang// khyi dang wa dang bya rog dang/ bya rnams kyis kyang bgrang bar rigyur// lus 'dir dgos pa med pa rab gses// 'chib resba'
dang ldan gyur nas// mi nirtag tu skye bar 'gyur// 'jigs pa 'di las grol 'gyur ba// de lta bu yi snyan rnams bsnyag// bdag la sman ngas gang ba// snyan de dgos pa ma yin no// nyon mos sgal lan

tharabyed pa// de ltar chos kyi sman rnamasani// rachi kharab ngag la sbyin par byos// nyani nga lamasbyin cig/ lus 'di gso ba byas kyang ni// gdonami bra bar 'jig par 'gyur// gang phyi'i sdul bsngal sbyin
'gyur ba// sdig ga phung po ci'i phyi'i blos// lus radangashinatu gsas byas kyang/ bu bam rus byedapar 'gyur// budang bum zhig phyir// la mig gis lta bar byed// na ba 'di las nga skyobs shig/

ratshad par nici'i phyir du// khu dang bumo byed cag dang// nganami rung ma byed cig/ khyed cag gso brgya ba'i phyir/ ngas ni gzhan gyi narayang phrogs// nganir che dus bab pa na// re thag chad kyis ci zhig byed/
skye rangangan 'gros rab tu 'jigs// 'chibs kyang ni yongs su gar// tshor ba 'du shes 'du byed dang// regang shin tutshorab 'o/ )srid pas byis pa rnams kyang 'khyam// mi bzad bras bu
rnams kyang thub// nganapa'i rigs su skye ba na// derayang ma nganabacings par 'gyur// bdag las bsod nams chung shes nas// sgyu nga la gzhan dag mya ngan byed// sbyin dang tshul khrims yongs su
nyams chos la yang ni rgya bkyis ngogs// yang skye banimi shes pas// nyon mongs sprul gyis nyonamos ba// ma rigs pas nibs bas rnams // ganganithar ngo mad par b tsam// thor pa'i
don nimi shes nas// 'khrul pas sdig pa rnams kyang byed// nyon mongs rnams kyis phyis ri 'khyam// yade ni rtag tu rnam par 'khrugs// bcing ba sna tshogs lta nu'u sal// chos du 'bar zhing
tshig (gangan bde ba mdab dor// lus nirnam bar 'khrul pas 'khyam// gang las shin tu bde 'byung la// bde ba de mi shes te// sangs rgyas zhing bde ba phyin// chos kyi lo khor me sman gyi
ka@#/ mchog tshul khrims bden pa'i tshul khrims so// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i de byangs/ denas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems da pa 'asams dpa' chen po/
[>>sman gyi sa la bka' stsal pa// sman gyi sams can dag 'chiba'i dus kyi tshi de ltasmra sngagasaradon kyang/ legs bar byed pa'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin gtogs par de dgagi skyob par
b+hU 'gyur ba su yang mad do zhes bka' de skad ces stsal nas/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang gasungs so// sdig pa'i las ni byas pas na// sems can dmyal ba rnams su lhung// bsrags pa'i
gos ni gyonabar gyug/ skom du lcags lu 'thung bar gyur// lus rnams la nimam dag rab ng// tshig nas rab tu mi bzad du// sems canadamyal ba 'jigs chen// de yi lus 'batu
tshig bde ba dag ni mi shes shing// chos kyang rnam par mi shes te// chos ma yin pas byis pa 'khyam/ bdeng cung zad redamo 'gyur// dadadang tshul khrims phun sum tshogs// shes
rab ldan zhing dkar thub che// dge ba'i bshes gnyin bastan pasani// de bzhin gshegs par myur du 'gyur// 'jig rten sangs rgyas 'byuba'i phyir// brtson 'grus kyi ni marag rtsoms/
sams canathams cad yongs su bzung// dge ba las kyi chos ston cig/ byams pa'i sems dang de bzhin du// tshangs spyod mchog la snyoms par zhugs// smanasdod skad thos nas kyang//
mchog tu bsgrub par 'gyur bar bya// rnam grolamathong dang sangs rgyas dang// sgra bsgrags rnam par 'dren pa dang// 'jig rten gyini pha dngam// danibyang chub sems shes bya// rajig rten du ni/
chos 'di gang ston pa// dge ba'i bshes gnyen mchog tu rab rnyed dka'// sangs rgyas bstan la gang dug gusanyan pa// de dag bya mad sangs rgyas bde gshegs 'gyur// zhi ba sangs rgyas sras
rnams la// gang dag gus dang bcas 'gyurang// dengag kyang nasems can kun// tharabyed 'jig rtanamagon du 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'dasal/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang ba chen po na
gyi sngas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'adas ci'i slad du dag sa 'di dag g.yo/ rab tu g.yo// deskad ces gsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
sman gyi sde la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sman gyi sde cing mthongam ltas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sngas bltas pa dang/ phyogs bzhi nas gas pa mthong ngo// sa

gas pas sa gas pa'i phrag nas/ mi bye ba phrag nyi shu byung ba dang/ 'og gi phyogs nas mi bya ba phrag nyi shu byung pa dang/ stangagi phyogs nasami bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga byung bamathongang// danas sems can
gzhen mude dag gis rnam par bltas nas/ bcom ldan M'adas la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan das 'dir sudag skyas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// khyad cag skya ba'i tshogs
'di dagal ltos/ de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthang lags sa// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skye ba'i rigs 'di dganakhyed la bde ba'i
[>>phyi'i skyasago// gsa' la/ sems can 'di dag kyang 'gum par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyus bkarastsal pa/ grogs po dag de bzhin te/ sems canathams cad kyang 'chi bar gyur ro//
denas sems can gzhon nusnga ma gang dag thog ma nyid ngaskyes pa de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de legs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di/da ces gsal te// bcas ldan
pad+ma 'das bdag cagani/ yang skyo ba dang/ 'gum pa la blta bar mi spro'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkar stsal pa/ 'anabartson 'grus kyi stobs med par sngo ram/ de dag gis gsol pa// de bzhin gshegs
pa mngon sum du blta bar bgyi'o// de nas chos gangamanyan pa zhus te/ yid du 'ong ba mnyan par bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'dus pa la blta bar bgyi'o// byang chub sems
dpar rdzu 'phrul ma'adzemathu chab rnams la blta bar bgyi sku/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu lapa'i/ skye ba dang 'gum pa la nilta bar mi spro'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi

sde rdzu ragrul gyi stobs kyis byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya po de dag dang lhan cig du stan las la ngas nas/ de dag thams cad rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gi bar snang la 'gro zhing skyil mo krung bcas nas/ bsam gtan byedade/

dedag thams cad kyi lus las seng ge rnams byung ngo// stag rnams byung ngo// sprul rnams byung// glang po chu rnams byung nga// rdzu 'phrul chen po rnam par 'phrul pa stan to// ril yang skyil mo krung bcas te/

rakhong ngo// snang du dang ga tshad kyi bri sring du yang 'gro/ zla ba dang nyin bye ba stong phrag bcu yang 'bub par byed do/ de nas baaldan 'angos la/ sems canag zhin na de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to//
bcom ldan 'das 'od srar chen ba gangar ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul chen ba rnam par 'phrul pa 'jig rten du byung ba'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu
byed zla ba dang len byung ba 'di la ltos/ ded gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'dres mthong lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags sa// bcom ldan 'dus kyis nga ka' stsal pa// 'di ni byang chub

sems dpa' rang gi lus lasa'od zer snang ba dang rdzu tshul kho la sun ba lta ) bstan nas kyang skye bo mang po la phan pa dang/ skya bo mang po la bde ba dang/ 'jig rtena' snying brtse ba dang/ skyabaratshigs
chen po dang lha rnams dang/ mi rnams kyi danadang/ phan pa dang/ bde ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston te/ dedag 'dir mi'i lus dang/ stobs dang/ brtson 'grus bstananas/ 'di 'dra ba'i
stobs nye bar ston to// gsal la/ bcom ldan 'das 'od zer snang ba 'byung bar gyi ba'i slad du chos bstan tu gsal/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
sems dbang chen po sman gyi sde la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te/ sman gyi sde byad kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po ri 'jig rten gyi khams rnam ba drug tshu games pa mthong ngam/ gsol
[>>pa bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bde ba gshegs pa gang lags so// des 'disAm bsams te/ gang bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di zhu'o// snyam bsams pa dang//
zlo bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sdatsadang ci 'dodapa dris shig dang/ ngas dris ba dadang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sams ras bar bya'o// bstan par bya'o// rnam par dbye bar
byar/ sman gyi sde gang 'dus pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i dus rnams kyid thams cad bstan par bya'o// gso' nga/ bcom ldan 'das de tsam bgal ba'i nad du nga snyan du gsol/ bcom ldan

'das bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i bu stong phrag brgyadanu rtsi bzhis bskor ba dang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis bskorab dang/ klu'irgyal po byang stong phrag bcu gnyis

kyis bskorab dang/ 'byung po bye ba stong phrag bco brgyad kyis bskor ba dang/ yi dwags dang/ sha za bye ba stong khrab zhishu rtsa lngas bskor ba mthong ngo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/smanagyi
sde sems can 'di dganas nyan pa'i phyir/ 'khor 'dir nga'i gan du 'dus shing 'khod goras chagaste/ sman gyi sde 'di dagazhidi kho narar khor ba bsnyel bar 'gyuraro// sems can thams
cad la phan par 'dod pas/ deng dus bcu rab tu 'thob par 'gyur/ sa bcu la rab tu gnas na mya ngan las 'das nga 'i dbyings rjes su thub pa 'gyurar// rgadang 'chi
las thar bya'i phyir// las byas nga deb thob byed cing// nyon mongs zhags pa 'pham byas nas// sangs rgyas bstan nga thob par 'gyur// gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can
gyi gnas mang bo/ (las sna tshogs kyis 'byung ba ra soraM slad du/ bcom ldan 'das la bskor cing gnas// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sman gyi snga nyon cig/ sams tshan
rmos pani ngeshes pa// thar pa ragyurab ga la yod// sems cana gzhon nu mang po dag/ de ringagazungs rnams thob par 'gyur// sa bcu dag ni rathob pariphyir// chos kun rab tu
shes par 'gyur// sa bcu dag kyang rathob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas bya ba byed par 'gyur// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar ragyur// chos char rab tu 'babs par 'gyur// ji ltar
sams can 'dus pasan// yi bstan pa dga' ba'o// lha dang klu dang yi dgas dag/ lhaman shin tu mi bzad pa// sa bcu la ni ba gnas te// sa kyi sgra yang sgrogs par 'gyur//
chos kyi sngayang rdung bar 'gyu// chos kyi dung yang rab tu 'bud/ sams can gzhonanu radi dag kyang// brtson 'grus mthu dang ldan par 'gyur// dbazhin gshegs pas thob pa bzhi// de
dag deng ni ches thob 'gyur// de nasasams cana gzhonanalnga stong tsam stan las langs nas// bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thalamospu rab btud de/ bcom ldan 'das
'disnyad ces gsol to// gangaphyi'i mtha'am 'tshal ba// 'khor banani 'chi ba ste// luani khur lci bcom ldan 'das// 'jigs pa chen pomi bzad pa// lamanarnam par m 'tshal te// lam
ts+tshA nyid kyang mi gdarangs// mgon por dag cag rjes 'gyuran// bdag cag rnams nibasdu brngagasol// dbal bdag cag gso' ba ratshal// 'drenangs sazhibashad du gsol// bdag
tsag shes rab chung ngur skyes// bde ba mngon pa'am 'tshal to// bdag cag lan tshos bshadogasol// sdug bsngal mi bzad grol bar mdzod// gungadang gang du sa b.rayang// bdag cags sa
rgyas mthong gyur cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde/ sems cana gzhon nu rnamos ga la ba der song ste phyin nas 'di skad ces smasaso// khyed cag rnamasani sras gro zhig/
rlud du byung ba'i ro yang 'thung// rajigs pa med par gyur nas su// phyis gdod 'jigasamang mos nyon cig/ smras pa// btsun pa gnas brtan khyod su zhig/ bdag cag rnams kyis khyomi
shes/ dpyad rab tu mdzes par mthong// gzugs ni'i zhing grags pa che// yi dgas 'jig rten 'jigs chen dang// sems dmyal dud 'gro rnams las thar// ji ltar 'gro ba'amadzesapa
[]bzhin/ khyod kyi sdig pa thams cad ni// khyod kyi lab na snod yod pa// rin chenasna bdun ldan pa dang// lus la rinatsen srad budang// gasribarjid phung pos brgyan pa mtho// zhi ba khyod kyis/
tshig smras pa// bdag cag lan 'debasami nus so/ bdag cag la ni bas rnams dang// zhim po'i skom yang mi dgos te// rdzas las gshadra ba 'byung bar 'gyur// de bzhinaom yang gacin du
'gyur// khu ba rnams las brag tu 'gyur// de bzhin khrag lasangashar 'gyur bas// sras dang skam rab spur ba yang// bdag cag rnams la dgas ma yin// dar dang sAm busgyur ba dang// phumi'i
gsakyang dgos pamed// gas gyigadu bum dgos te// mu tig 'phrangabadagos ma yin// sor gdub dag kyang mi dgos te// de kun mi rtag chos can no// bdag cag ngan par 'agro rnamasasu// 'gro
ba mi 'gyur srog tshol lo// lha rnams kyi ni bang ba dang// chos kyi sbyin pa don du gnyer// ngag ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dgos te// 'khor los sgyur rgyal ma yin no// rab tu bzang ba'i gling bor
nas 'khor las sbyar ba ri bar 'gyur// bu yang phyi bzhin mi 'brangs// chung ma bu mo rnams kyang min// ngan sna bdun phyin las// phyi bzhina'aphreng ba ma yin no// skya bo mang po 'dus pa yang//
phying zhina'agro ma yin te// mdun du rgyug par ngam yin no// de ltar phyi chadami 'gyuraro// tshegacig gi zhi rgyal po las// mi rtagangs ni khyam gyur te// sdig pa'i las rnams mang byas pas//
[zet ]@#// de dag sems dmyal du 'bod ltung// rin chen sna bdun rdzu 'phrulaches// phyogs bzhi kun tu bskor ba las// gang tshabu rabod smin par tshe// rdzu 'phral du gang dusang/ sa gang
[>dag na yod min pa// shi nas 'phrul byed minus// gnas brtan bdag cag rnams la gson// gang na de bzhin gshegs par bazhud// pha dngam ni ji lta bar// de ni mthong bar rab tu 'dod// bdag

cag la yang mad// pha med phun rnams kyang mad// 'jig rten gtso bo dbazhin gshegs de nyid pa dang ma yi gnod nyid tim khrub ste//bde ba'i lam re ba ston pa 'o//gang phyin byin chad mi skyo ba'/de la bor ba
tharamadzad ba'o// nyonams chub 'jigs chen dang// chub sgrol ba'i gru de khro// de yis sems can rab bsgral te// phyin chad slar nimi ldog go/ byang chub mchog ni rab ston pa// dam pa'i
chos kyang da babashad do// bdag cag rnams la zas mi dgos// rgyal srid 'bras bum 'dod do// sems can dmyal bas 'jigs bani// lha yi'ajig rten 'gro ma bye// mi yi na dab
ste na thams cad mkhyen pa snang// rang gi las ni sa byas pas// tshe thung rnams ni 'byam pa yin// de dag 'tshibamishes kyi// 'dod pa'i lengs spyod rgyal srid shes// skya drang 'gag pas
bslus pa rnams // shes pamed cing 'jigs ba mad// mi rtag pasanisams 'khrul rnams // khra ba'i chos rnams mi shes te// phra b.re dgas pa mi byed 'go/ zhi bo'i dbyings kyang ma shes so// 'di

rabo la ni skyo med pa// yang dang yang du skye bar 'gyur// yun ring sdug bsngal rab gathar cing// rtag du dbyug pas brdegs byas nas// gzhan dag gi mnga'aphrog byed de// de bzhin bcing shing bas dub byas//
sngon gyi sdog pas bskul bas na// de dag bsring ba lngas bcings so// re thag kyang ni chad par 'gyur// mya ngan zug rdus thug par gyur// rnam par shes ba 'gag ban// snying rdzab ni:sngagag
'don// bdag gi skyob par 'gyurang la/ gser dngadangul dngashag dug dang// longs spyod thams cad bdag gisadabul// bdagagi bran du rang 'gyur bar bya/ bran gyi tshul dugang gyur pa/ las
rnams thams cad rab tu bya// rgyal srid longs spyod bdag mi dgos// nor dang 'bru ya ma yin no// rang gi lus nibadag la dgos/ sdige ba byed pa mi 'grol te// de ltas gnas brtan
bdag cag la// babab dgos bam yin no// gang dag kha zas zhim zes pa// rgyal bo rnams kyang 'chibar 'gyur// btung bamchogani 'thungs pa yi// lha yi bu rnams 'chingar 'gyur//
chom chodagu lo ldan pa// sras dang skom ni rab bshams te// rgyal po'imadun dbyungs nas su// kha zas lanilces reganas// rgyal bo rnams ni go chags// sdig pami chung rnams kyang byed//
gang la snying po med pa gi/ mi rtag rol chags pa byed// bdag cag rnams la skom mi dgos// bza' ba dag kyang dgos ma yin// bdag cag sdug bsngal gang grol ba// chos nyid de 'dra dgos pa
sred pa'i nyon mongs rnam thar te// bcings pa kun las rab grol ba'i// sas rgyas de la skyabs su dong// drang srong chen po 'jig/
mgon la// bdag cag rnams ni skyabs su dang// sems can rnams kyis mthongadagar la// phyag 'tshal phyi ni bdag cag 'dong// khyod kyi mtshananim 'tshal kyis// snyan pa'i mtshan pa stan tugasol/

skyu smanagyi stos smras pa/ khyed dang skya bo thams cad kyang/ de bzhin mingan thos pa 'dong// sems can gzhen zhu byeb phrug/ stong gis de bzhin gshegs pa bskor// de dag gis smras pa// khyodani sangs/
rgyas nyan thos te// mnge nibab par grab gas pa yin// skye bo kun kyang de bzhin du// khyod kyi mnge ni thos par 'dong// sAs pa nga yi ming na sman gyi sna/ ngan sems can rnams kyisan//
smana rnams kun gyi dam pa na// khyed cag rnams la bshad bar bya// nad kun gyis btab skya bo yi// nad rnams thams cad zhi bar byed// 'dod chags nad ni nad po che// 'jig rten 'jig byed
badrad pa// mgang gis byamadA'akhyam pa yi/ )gdimug nad nim zhing drag/ sems dmyal dbazhin dud 'gro dang// yi dgas rnams su sranas can 'gro// byis pa 'di dag zhe sdang ni// de dag ji
ltar zhi bar 'gyur// dedag gis smras pa/ dge ba'ichos ni 'di thos pas// bdag cag sdug bsngal kun las grol// byise pa blo nomoshis pa// sdugabasngal kun las grol nas kyang// sdig pa'i
lasanarnag smras te// bdag cag chos kyi sbyin nga nyan// sdig pa thams cad rnam spangs nas// 'jigs pa mi bzad rnams kyang spungs// nad rnams thams cad zhibyed pa// sman gyi rgyal po sman/
bste// sdug bsngal ba rnams gso byed pa// yang dag sangs rgyas myur du lta// de bzhin gshegs la phyag bya phyir// gnas brtan khyod ni myur du zhud// phyag byas bdag cag rnams kyi tshogi/ 'jig
rten rnam par 'dren la gsungs// nada'adir rab tu zhi bar mdzod// lus 'dithams cad rab 'bar te// chig cing zhib mad pa yi// ma bzadem ni zhi bar mdzod// lus kyi khurani khur po cha// shin
tumi babrad rnaba'i khur// sdug bsngal gzir babadag cag la// brtul zhugs dam pa thugs rjemadzod// skye bo rtag tu zhe sdang dang// gtimuganorapa'i khur khyerate// khur las thar pa mi
pa de dag yang dang yabakhur phyir// tharapa'ilamanamo shes shing// thar parilam mamatho rnams // 'tshib rnam pa shes mod kyi// 'on kyang 'jigs pa ma skyod do// bdag cag lainam
du yang// 'chib med snyam bdebar gnas// kun tu 'khrul pas mngashi ba// mthong yang rnam par mi shes so// de dag pha yang mi dran te// nad kyis kyang ni rtag gzigs cing// nyon mongs las
kyis rab dkrugs na// ji ltar kha bla tha bar 'gyur// sdug bsngalanyam thag mi shes te// bdag cag ngal ba donamang ngo// khyod kyi sdug bsngal 'di 'dra ba// ma rig gzhi las skyes pa'o// 'du
'bya// shes 'du byedatshor ba rnams // 'jigs chen rtswa ba khur yin no// gang chos rnam par mi shes pa// byis pa srid ngas rab tu 'khyam// lus kyi khur gyis bskor ba'i//
'jig rtan du ang donamarag/ gos gtsangangashin tu bzang ba dang// khrus dang byug pa dgos pa'o// lus la gang yid 'ong ba yi// kha zas zhim po dgos pa ste// yid du 'ong b.resil snyan rdzad/
de bzhin rna bas tshol bar byed// rin chen bdun las byung ba yi// gzugs la mig gas chags par byed// zhim pa'i ro rnams thams cad ni// lcesakyang tshol bar byed pa yi// 'jam zhing phra ba'i
res nga yang// lus kyis rtag tu chol bar byed// lus kyis su nangasha gnyis pa 'o// dga' bar yang nibasgrubs pa las// gams pa med pa'i lus 'di skyes// de la dga' ba su zhig rnyed//
da nabadag rkang dgar byed/ lham ni rab tu babang gyon yang// 'bara'agyur tshe gos rnams dang// byug pa skyabs sum 'gyur te// lus kyang skyabs su 'gyuraminan// gos dang byug pa
smos ci dgos// mi zhes bya ba lus yin to// dbugs dang stabs chen redapar 'gyur// so sorartog pa rnaba'i stobs// de ni lus la yon tan chu// sngon chad rta dang glang po yis// kun tu bskoranas rtse
zhing 'khyam// thar nga ri chos ni shes nas// bdag ni sdig pa'i las 'a dgar// 'jig rten pha rol mashas nas// brtse bas sdig pa byed du bcug/ bdag ni yang dang yang skyes pa// shib
00/bdag la yang 'os sa// yang dang yang dumya nganamathong// sngags 'don pas rab tu bcings// rnams kyang ri shi bamagrong// ba rnamasangashi dang gnyen dag ru// srin mo dang 'bu dag dang//
chung ma rnams kyang shi bamathong// mngon par 'du byedakun ston// sems dang bcas pa su zhig chags// 'dod pas zin pa'i srims kyis su// bdag gis yadebartan rung ba shes//
zhi ba'i sazhim dmigs te// 'chi ba lanamangon dgaramang// de phyira'adod pas bsgribs sams kyis// bdag gis sbyin pa ma sbyin// de bas 'dod dang mnyam sdig mad// dand dung mi ldeg
ge kun tu nor pas bdag cag skyes// 'gro ba mtha' dag kun tu nor// kun tunor pa'i sgra yang nyun// dam chos ma yin yongasasu 'dzin// thar ba dang ning ma ga tanabatsal// lus ni khur du bkug
mi bya 'jig rten don du 'gro ba'agu0f00/ sas rgyus ston pa rnams su shagro/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten pa dang ma// sas rgyus lam ni rab ston pa// 'dzam bu'i gling ni kun tu yang// zhiman
char ba rab tu 'bebs// chos kyid sdu btsa'adra ba// sems can blun pos mishes te// byang chub tunasems bsngos nas// chos kyi bsdu ba thob par 'gyur// 'du byed thams cad stong pa ste/ de bzhin
longs spyod nor yang stong// bdag kyang stongaparamathongabs na// mthong nas reb mdapar 'gyur// gnas brtanasman gyi sde khyod kyis// bdag cag rnams kyi tshigs gson cig/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
[l/ ag]// kyi phyir// khyodazhi po nyarab zhud 'tshal lo// 'khor ba'i nyes pa rnams drananus// byang chub sems dba'askyo ba mang// brtson 'grus ldan zhing dka' thub che// yo tan kun tu sdud/
par byed// stan de ga la bzhugs par bazhud// ston pa bde b.rarab sang nas// rgyal btsung thad mi skyo bar// bdag cag slad du zhu ba mdzad// khyed kyis bdudamigazhan pa dang// stobs dang bcasar
pham par byas// sems can thams cad yos 'dzin pa'i// chos kyang myur du 'bar bar byas// gang gis sangs rgyas 'gyur ba yi// chos ni bdag cag ma thos kyis// bdag cag rnams la
pan pa'i phyir// gnas ba rtan myur du bzhud du gsol// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' ba'i// de bzhin gshegs pa ma mthong ba// desrid bdag cag mi rgal zhes// thams cad gus dang

bcas par gnas// sman gyi sdes smyos nga/ khyed cig da lta'adra zhig mthong// ra zhig gyen du blta bar byos// de dag gyen dubaltas pa dang/ khang pa brtsegs pa sum stong dang// lnga brgya tham par tshab
ba zhig/ kun tu yang ni gnas par gyur// rin chen bdun gyis shin tu spras// rin nadran pas legs par brgyan// dbus na ma tog rab tu rgyas// lha rdzas spos kyang rab tu 'bab// de nas gnas brtan/

sa pa ni// khang brtse gas rin chenang ba dang// pad+ma ze ba kun gnas par// 'din snang ba 'di ci zhig/ sman gyi sras smras pa// gnasa'adi dag khyed kyis// sangs rgyas lta ba'i phyiredang shig/ 'jig na
'das gtso gang yin pa// 'jig rten snang byed de la 'dud// de dag gis snas nga/ de yi lam yang ma ratshal te// de bzhinagashegs par ng ma mthang na// gangan lam yang ma ratshal bas// phyag 'tshal ni

gang du mchi// sman gyi rjes smras pa nam mkharamatharayas jibazhin du// rig par rung ba ma yin ngas// bdud rtsi rab sbyin ston pa la// phyag 'tshal phying na 'gro mi bya// ji ltar ri rab gnas pa ltar// ston pa
de yang gnas na bzhugs// ri bgazhal du rung ba yin// rgya mtshorenang gting tshad zin// stongagasum rdul phran dpag tu rung// sangs rgyas ruphyang g shes ma yin// byang chub sems dpa' phyogs
bcu nas// 'jig rten snang bar mdzad la 'dang// smras pa/ 'jig rgyun mgon po bdag cag gzigs// bdag cag bsam pa rdzogs par mdzod// bdag cagasams kyisaston pa la// phyag
bgyis de nas 'bras bu thob// sman gyi sngas smras pa/ ston pa de la mi chags te// 'phrong bam yan byugapamin// gang gis 'dus byas grol 'gyurab// sems can rnams kyi rgyu 'dzin to// gang gas
yid nib tul byas shing/ sangs rgyas la yang skyabs su song// de la bdud ni mi bzad/chog/ 'thab mo rgol bar mi byed do// 'chiba'idabang du mi 'gro yi// gzungs nimyur durnyed par gyur/ de
sams rab tu dang byas nas// de nas ston pamathong bar 'gyur// denas bcom ldan 'das dbazhin gshegs ba ka la bang+ka'isgra skad yid du 'ong ba 'dzum pa mdzadod// danas byang chub sems
dpa' sems duba' chenapo sman gyi snga stan las lasanas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de legs su thal mo sbyar ba btung de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsal te//
[>bcos ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas/ red zerab rgyad bri bzhi stong byung ste/ 'od zer dngag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i steng gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyab pa gyur// sems

can dmyal ba chen po sum cu rtsa gnyis po thams cad kyang khyab par gyur/ lha'i gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang snang bar gyur/ rod zur de dag kyang kha dog sna tshogs shastag la 'di lta ste// sngon po dang/
sarapo dang/ dmar po dang/ dkarapo dang/ le brgan dang/ shel dang/ dngul gyi kha dog lta bu ste// 'od zer de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas byung nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
rten gyi khams kyi sams can rnams la bde bar sbyar ba thams cad bgyis nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan bdunabaskor ba bgyis nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tonub
