par gyur pa'i 'dzum pa mdzad pa rirgyu gang lags kyishagang lags/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'adas la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdus 'di skad ces gsal tu// bcom
ldan 'das gal te bdag la skabs dbye bar gnang na/bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagashegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isas rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// de skad ces
gso'ang dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sman gyis khyod nyid 'dod pa dris shig dang/ ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung
bstan pas khyed kyi sems ras par bya'o/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sams na gzhon nu bye ba stong phrag sum cu byung ba de dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos phra ba bstan pa rtogs nas/sogs

na rgan po rnams la sems can rgan po byang rnams ni chos ming shes pa ro// rtag tu chos ma yin pa dang mi dag ba la chags pa lo nas phra mo rnamasami sAnapamache zhing yos su brjod la gnod pa bgyidan/bcom ldan
'das de tsarisod du tshig snyan pa yid du'ongang rang dag smras/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi ba de dag ri phyir/ tshig 'di skad smra bami shasasan/dedag zhi dbazhin gshegs pa la 'dzum

zhing shin tu snyan pa smra ste/ chos kyang thos pas/ sman gyi sde de'i phyir ches dedag thams cad kyi don khong duchud par 'gyuraro// yon tan thams cad dang ldan par gyur/dedag thams cad gsungs rtags bar

'gyur/ dang phyin chadas bcu la gnas par 'gyur/ dwang chos kyi rnga chenapo sgra 'byin par 'gyur/ deng chos chen pa ri rnam pa dang ldan par gyur ro// sman gyi sde khang bu brtse gas pa 'di dagamathang ngam/ gsal
pa bcom ldan 'dasamathong lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mthongalags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ snyan gyi snga deng nyid sems can gzhan nu 'di dag khang pa brtsegs pa dedag gi nang du
[g2] ]/zhugs nas/ sa mngon par rtogs pa thob par 'gyur ro// deng nyid dge ba'i sa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par budang ra'agyur ro// dang chos kyi rdza na ngo rdung ba 'gyurata/
[>lta'i sa dum zhig deng chos mngon par rtogs pa thob par byed pa pa'agyur ro// sems can dmyal ba paresams canaleg par ltung ba la gnas pa mang pa dag kyang de bzhin ga shags pa'i yo shes bstan pa

thas nas/ 'khor ba bsnyil te rgyal bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshesams can rgan po bya bstong phrag dgu bcu thamasacad kyis rgyun du zhugs pa'i rubras bu thob ste/ de dag thams cad kyang ches dung ldan par 'gyur ro//

snyan gyi sna dadag thams cad ni sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su spangs par 'gyur ro// sman gyi sde de dag thams cad kyis nid bzhin gshegs pa mthong bsgrub pa 'gyur ro// sman gyi sde de dag thams cung ches
chen po ri sgra dang ldan par 'gyur ro// sman gyi sde phyogs bzhir ltos shig/ byang chub sems dparasems dpa' chen po sman gyi sngas phyogs bawI kun tubaltos pa dang/ shar phyogasanas byang chub sems

dpar gang+gAri klung bye ba phrag lnga bcu'i byed snyad 'ong lha phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung bye ba phrag drug curabyemasUdarang nub phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' gang+gArIkrung bya ba phrag

bdunanu'i bye ma snyed long// byang phyogs nas byang chu bsams dpar gang+gArIkrungabye ba phrag brgyad cu'atham snyad 'ong// log gi phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa'i gang+gA klung bye ba phrag dgu bcu'i byam

ka shud 'ong// steng gi phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' gang+gAri klung bye ba phrag brgyaribem snyada'ong ste/ dadag lhags nas// bcom ldan 'das kyi spro na sngar phyags gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod
pa dang bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa'asamasaM dang ra chen nga sman gyi gos 'di skadaces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dasam maba' bar snang la gzugs nag po dang/ gzugs dam por
gda'ab ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ sman gyis gang bar snangal gzugs nag po dang gzugasadamar po mthong ba 'di ni yin mi shesasam/ de bzhinagashegs pas nim khyen te smanagyi
sda 'dazhi bdud yin// sman gyi sdomathong 'dod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'tshal lo// bde bar gshegs pa 'tshal le// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde byang
chub sems dpa' gadz+hAriklung bye ba phrag brgya'i bye ma dang mnyam pa 'di lta bu lhags sa// gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpar 'di dag lhags pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags
bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde sams can gzhon nu rnams kyi rkyen gyis te/ dasams can thams cad bsam gtan gyi chos dang ldan par 'gyur// ]sman gyi sda khyod kyis semasacanagazugs sna
tshags 'dir lhags pa dang rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis byinagyi rlabs sna tshogs kyis 'dir lhags pa dag mthong ngam/ gsol pa// bdag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung bu baphrag ]
brgya'i bye ma snyad dang/ byang chub sems dang/'gang+garing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi byamasnyadacig rdzu raphrulagyi mthus gnas te/ gzugasasna tshogs pa/kha dog
sna tshogs ba/ dbyibs sna tshogs pa dag gnas la byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'phags pa'i chos kyi gnas la gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa' dedag 'khor dang datsasazhas/chos
wA kyi gnas la gnas par mthong ngo// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sam/sa dang 'a sems dpa' chenapo kun tungapa'ab dang/ byang chub samasu dba' sems
dpar chen po snya nagyi sde dang/ byang chub sems dpa' gsarasnying de dag kun dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang/ lha dang/mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri bar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yibs te/
bcon ldan 'das kyis gsus ru la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa thung gi mdo ri chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs so kha/ rgyagagyi mkhan po dzin mi tra dang/
dan khIl dang/ zhu chen gyi latsa ba ban d+he yengashes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsaracud kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//[.]

Ar+ya a dab+hu ta d+harmaparlayanam/bod skad du/'phags pa rmad du byung ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs/ sas rgyas dang byang chub semasadapa' thams cad 'khyag ratshala'// 'di skad bdag gis thos bA
dus gcigan/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ 'od ma'itshal bya ka lan taka gnas pa na bzhugs s// denas tshodang ldan pa kun daga' bo snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/chos gas dang shamakhrubs/

bgos te/lhung bzed thogs nas// rgyal parikhab tu bsod snyoms kyi phyi'i zhugs te/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo rgyal de'i khab kyi grong khyer du mthar chags su bsod snyoms spyod pa 'i tshe/ phyogs shig na
khang pa brtsegos pa sgo brgyad cu yod la/byug pas byugs pa/ gdugs dang lamtshan dang/ bdun pa sbrangs/ dar gyi lda ldan ng bo byas pa zhib/ma thang nas ( de'adisAm dusams te/ gas[©]bu/
ran rigs kyi bu'odod pa gang ral zhig gis/bang po brtsegs pa 'di lta bu byas te/ phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dag gi 'dun la phul ba dang/gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas yongs sumya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten 'jim pa las skya ru ra'i 'bras bu tsam byas la/ khab tsam gyi srog shing btsugs te/ rgya shug gi lo ma tsam gyigadugs gsol nas/nas 'bru
tsan gyi sku gzugs byas la/yungs 'bru tsam gyi ring bsrel bcug na/ deganyisaM las bsod nams shin tu chab gang yin snyamamo// de ya'adisnyam du sems te/ ston pa ni bdag gi mngon sum du gyur bdebar
gshegs pa ni bdag gi mngonasum du rgyu ra kyis/ bcom ldan 'dasal bdag gis don 'dinyid gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la ji skad bstan pa bzhin du gzung bar bu'o snyam mo/
de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo rgyal ngo li khab tubasodasnyoms blangs te/ rdzas kyi bya ba byas nas bsod snyoms kyi khrus phyim spangs te/sa gas dang lhung bzed bzhag nas rkang ba/
[>>bkrus te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba des nganas phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs lamagabos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs g.yig tu'adug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang bcom ldan das
zlal tshudang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag 'dir snga dro'i dus kyi []chos gos dang sham thabs dwagos lhung bzed thogs te/ rgyal de 'o khab tu bsod snyam kyi skad du
zhugs te/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer dmatharachags subasodasnyoms spyod pa'i tshe phyogs shig na dbang pa brtsegs pa chab sgo brgyad cumachis labyug pas byugs pa/gdugs dang rgya'amtshan
dang ba dan bsgreng ba/ dar gyi lda lde mang po myangs pa dag mthong nas 'di snyam du bsams te/ rigs kyingu 'am/ rigs kyi mdadapa galazhig gis khong da brtsa gas nga 'a bu bgyis te/ thugs
bzhi ri dge slongadage 'dun la phul ba dang/ gang gis dbazhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten 'jim pa las skya ru ra'i 'bras bu tsam
bgyis la/ khatsam gyi srog shing btsugs te/ rgya shug gi lem tsam gyi gdugs gsol nas/nas kyi 'bru tsam gyi sku gzugs bgyis la/yungs 'bru tsam gyi ring bal stsalan/ deganyis las bsod
mas shin tu tshe gang la gas snyamam// bdag gis yang 'di snyam dubasams te/ ston pa ni bdagagi mngonasum dugyur/bdab gshegs pa ni bdag mngon sum dugyuras/bcom ldan radus la bdag
gis don de nyid gsol te/bcom ldanuradus kyis bdag la ji skadabastan pa bzhin du gzung bar bgyi snyam nas/bcom ldan 'das la bdag donadi nyid zhu lags na/thugs brtse banye bar bzung
lta bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la don 'di nyid legs par bastan du gsol/doskad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' grol 'di skadatsamakhakar

stsal to// kun dga' bo khyod skye bo mngal la phanam dang/ skya ba mang ngo la bad ba dang/'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i phyir zhugs nas// lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir khyod de
bzhinagashegs pa la don 'di de 'dri bar sems pa nilegs so legasas// kun dagar ba de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang/ bshadudo// kun dga' bo 'dzamabu'i gling gi
gling ni mchuradapag ched dunasong/ rgyar yang dpag tshad bdunasong byang du kha tshon che ba/u0f8bnasogs kar 'dugang/ derigs kyi bu 'am/rigasakyi bumo dadar gang la la zhig gas/ po sna
bdunagyi rang bzhin du byas te/ rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams dang 'anacig phyira'ong ba rnams dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang/ dgra bcom pa rnams dang/ rangasangs rgyas rnams dang/phyogs bzhi'i dag
slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba bas/ gang gas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya nganalas 'das pa'i mchod rten 'jim
[>pa lasaskyara'i 'bras bum byal/ khab tsam gyisrog btsugs te/ rgya shug ga lenatsam gyigadugs gsol nas/nas kyi 'bru tsamAgyi sku gzugs byas la/ yuga'adratsam gyi ring
bsu la bcugan/de nidebs khasonams che'ozhas ngastsalo// kun dga' bo radzam bu'i gling lta zhog gi/kun dga' boshar gyi lus 'phags zhes bya ba'i gling yod dmachuradang bag tshad brgyud/

stong rgyar yang dang ga tshadabargya stong ste/ kun nas zla gam lta bu r grub pa de/ rigs kyi bu ram/rigs kyi bu mo dad pa gang la la zhig gis rin po chasna bdun gyirang bzhin du byas te/ rgyun du zhugs pa
rnams dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang/ dgrabcom pa rnams dang/ rang sangs rgyas rnams dang/ phyogs bzhi'i dag slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba bas// gang gis de
( bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'imachodan 'dzom pa las skya ru ra'i 'bras bu tsan dus la bab tsan gyisrog shing btsugs ta
rgya shag gi lan tsam gyi gdugs gsolas/nas kyi 'bru tsam gyi sku gzugs byas la/ yungs 'bru tsam gyi ring bsrel bzhugan/ da ni de bas ches bsod nams che'o zhes nga smra'o/ kun dga' bo/

can/ 'dzam bu'i gling lta 'ang zhog// shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling lta rang zhog ste// kun dgar bonub kyi ba lang spyod ces bya pa'i gling na yod du/churan dang gatshad dgu stong/ zheng yang dpag tshad dbu stong sku//
kun nas zla ba ba lta bu grub pa de rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bumo dad pa gang la la zhig gis rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byas te/ rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang/lan cig phyir rengab rnams
dang phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang/ dgra bcom pa rnams dang/ rangasangs rgyas rnams dang/ phyogs bzhi'i dag myong dge 'dun la phul ba bas gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
dpa' rdzogs ra risangs rgyas yongs su mya nganalas 'das nga rim med na 'jim pa las skya ru ra'i 'bras bu tsam byas la//khab tsam gyi srog shingabatsugs te/ rgya shug gi lamatsam ga dugs
gsa' nas/nas 'bru tsam gyi sku gzugs byas la/ yungs 'bru tsam gyi ring bsralabacugan/ da ni de bas ches bsod nams che'o zhes snya'o// kun dga' ngo 'dzam bu'i gling la yang shog/shar gyi lug

ra rigs kyi gling lta yang zhog/ nub kyi ba glang spyang kyi gling lta 'ang zhog ste[:]kun dga' bo byang gi sgra mi snyan ces bya ba'i gling yodad/ chub n deng ga tshad khri/ rgyur yang dpag tshad khri sta/ kun nas gruba'i
lham pa grub pa darigs kyi bu lon/rigs kyi bu mo dadab gang la la zhig gis rin po che sna bdun gyi rangabazhin du byas te/ rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang/ lan cig phyir 'ongab rnams dang/ phyir mi/
'ong ba rnams dang/ dgra bcom pa rnams dang/ rang sangs rgyas rnams dang/phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba bsagang gis de bzhin grashegs pa dgra bcom pa/
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs sumu ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten 'dzamel 'as skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu tsam byas laM)/ bdatsamagyi srog shing btsugs te/ rgyu shug ba lem tsam gyi
gdugs gso' nas/nasakyi 'bru tsam gyi sku gzugs byas la/ ungs 'bru tsamagyi ringabasral parubon/ dadi bas rgyas bsod nams chung smra'o// kun dga' bo'adzam bu'i sgo nga lta yapanog/ la

gyi lus 'phags kyi gling lta yapozhig/ nub kyi ba lang spyodakyi blo lta yang zhog/ byang sgra mi snyan gyi gling lnga ya nog ste/ kun dga' bo lha'i dbang bo brgya byin gyi khang bsrangs nam par rgyal
byung dus bya ba yodado// de rigasakyi bu ram/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa gang la la zhig gas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin tu byas te/ rgyun tu zhugs pa rnamasadang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dad
lcaphyi'i ma rong ba rnams dang/ dgra bcom kha rnams dang/ rangs sa rgyus rnams dang/ phyogs bzhi'i dge slongago dag 'dun la phul ba bas gang gas de bzhin gags pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rtona'ajim b.las skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu tsam byas la khab tsam gyi sog pashing btsugs te/rgya shugag ga le ma tsam gyi ga dus gang
gsol nas/ nas kyi 'bratsam gyi sku gzugs byas la/ yungs 'bru tsam gyi ring bsrel bzhugs// deni de bas chesabasod namasazhe'o zhes nga smra'o// kun dga' bo 'dzam bu'i gling lta yang 'og/ shar gyi

lu sa 'phags kyi cha gling lta yang zhog// nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi glu lta yang zhog/ bung sgra mi snyan gyi glidalta yang zhog/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi babacas rnam par rgyal byedaces bya ba lta yang zhag ste/ kun
dga' bo steng gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de rigs kyi bu ran/rigs kyi bum dad pa gang la la zhig gis// zhi pomasnabadun rang bzhin du byas te/ rgyun du zhugs ba rnam
dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang/ dgra bcom pa rnams dang/ rang sangs rgyus rnams dang/ phyogs bzhi'i dag slong ba dag 'dun la phul babs/ ]ga ngagis de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pari sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rtan 'jim pa las skyaru ra ri 'bras du ma byas la/ khang tsam gyi srog shing btsugs te/
rgya shug ga le ma tsam gyi gdugs gsol nas/nas kyi 'bru tsam gyi sku gzugs byas la yungs 'bru tsam gyi ring bsrel bcugan/ dani de bas bsod nams che'o zhes nga skya'o// de ci'i phyir zhan kun
ngagar bo dbazhin gshegs pa ni yi shes kyis dang ga tu mdor// tshul khrims kyis dang ga dumad pa ]bzed ngas dang gtu med pa//brtson 'grus kyis dpag tumang nga/ bsam gtan gyis dpag tu
@#/ med pa/ shes rab kyis dpag tu med pa byams pas rab tumed pa/ snying rjes dang ga dumed pa/ dga' bas dang kha gtumadang// btang snyoms kyis dpag tu med pa/sas rgyag
kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang/ stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pam 'dres pa gsum dang/ snying rje chen pos dpag tumed pa ste/ kun dga' po
dbazhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa rgyas yon tanadapagatumad pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// deskad ces bkAstsal pa dang/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom
b+hU ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ sa kyi rnam grangs 'di ni ngomatshar lags so// babagshegs pa ngomatsharalagragasro// a kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ma
lags/'dijaltar gzungabar bgyi/bka' stsal pa/kun dgabo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dar byung ba'i chos kyi rnam gras shes bya bar thugazhig/ dbas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni rmad
byung ba'i chos kyi rnams shes bya ba'i tshig bla dgas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nasaM/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' yi res te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
raphags pa rmad du byung ba zhes byapa'i chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzinam tra dang/ su renadra bo dz+ha dang/ zhu chen gyi 'bab
@#/khanad+he e shes sdes zhus tegatan la phab pa/// rgyagar skad du/ Ar+yabraoMnAyAnAnAmamahAyAn sUtra/bodaskad du/'phags pamaram
dbul ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i med// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lego/ 'daskadabadag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'dasaman
go dan rgyal bu rgyal byed tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshodang ldan pa shAri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shAri'ibu dpag tu med pa bzhi
ngo 'di dag nilegs par yongs su sbyangs parechos rnams dang ldan pa/rnam par smin pa dpag tu med pa/ snang bdwang bag tu med pa/ bsod nams la yang dag par gzhol ba dang pag tu mad ra gzug
dang bag tu med pa bdeb la yang dag bar gzhol ba dbag tumed pa ragaste/ de dag ni tshul khrims la 'jug pa dang/ tingang 'dzin dang/ shes rab dang/ rnam par grol ba dang rnam par grol ba'i yang+kabo/
mthong ba la 'jug pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa dang/ len pa med par brag pa zad par 'gyur bdag go/ bzhi gang zhen/ shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dbazhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag nga ra rdzogs pa'osangs rgyas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tuphyinang b.ros pas/ bsam gtan par gyur pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pas/ shes rab dpag tu med pa dang
ldan pa: shes rab angs pa dang ldan pa/ sa par 'byed pa'i shes bab dang ldan ng/ jilta ba bzhin gyi shes rab dang ldan pa// grasamad pa'i shes rab dang ldan brnam par
[>sa pa ri shes rab dang ldan pa/rnam par nges pa gzigs pa// mchog tu rnam par gro'agazhid shin tu ma bar grol ba'i thugs dang ldan pa/g.yo ba med ba rishugs dang ldan pa/'khrug pa med pa'i
smA thugs dang ldan ng/ 'phrin las legs par mdzad pa'i thugs dang ldan pa dang/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa risangs rgyas ni mi dag pa'i chos thams cad sngasang

dge ba'i ngos thams cad dung ldan pa/spyod pa phunasum tshogs pa/ yid la mdzad pa dang ma bral ba/bden pa ston ba bden pa gany+dzigs pa snang bar gyur pa/dungag tumadab tshogs dpag tu med pa// zil gyis

pa31/ gnon pa/ zil gyis mnon pari tshul khrims dang/ ting ngeradzin dang/ shesarab dang/ rnam par grol ba dang/ rnam ba'agrol khareye shes gathogs pa'i stobs bskyid pa brnyes pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs bskyang

pa brnyes pa/mi 'jigs pa re stobs bskyadab b.ras pa/ sa sa rgyas kyi chos kyi stobs bskyod pa brnyes pa// byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen po'i stobs bskyed pas/ so so yang dag par rig pa'i stobs

bskyed pa brnyes pa/ sngon gyi bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa/ sngon yongs su sbyong bamadzod ba/shes rab nango tshadang ldan ng/ brtson pamabor ba/ brtson 'grus dpag tu med pa// mya ngan dang gnod pa dang dra lab//
yongs su 'dzin pa'i mnga' ba thams cad gabrigs bya cang ma khyen ba/ glang po che dpag tumedal/jung pomim bab/bsod nams kyi zhing ba med pa dang/shA ri'i bu de la dbazhin pa gshegs pa dgra bam/
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa risas rgyusabaskal pa bye ba phrag khrig 'bum phrag dumar/dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsgrubs nga/ rig pa gsum dang ldan pa/bsod nams zhing gi dbazhin gshegs pa'i
mchod rten la/ dag slong ngam/ dge slongam 'am/dgabastaganam/ dab bstanamasems dang/ bsod nams don duganyerlab/bsod nams la dmigs pa// bsod nams de byad dupyadang/ bsod nams
'dod nga/ rnal 'byaradang 'thun parirjes su dran pa yid la byed pa/sngon gyi bya ba phun sum tshogs pa: thazhana' ma'i snying bo chung ngu ram ngan pa zhib// 'brom gyis ba skus sam/mar gyis bskus te
'bul 'chags par 'bul lam/yosasu 'bul lam/rardzog b.rakhyod nga dang/ dge ba don tug nyarabs de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcomi ldan
'das phyimangamatha'askya ba'imathara'akhoraspas pa da lta byub na tshul khrims rung/ ting nge 'dzinadang/ shes rab dang/ rnam par grol ba dang/ rnam par grol ba'i yang shas ma gzigs pa bsrung pa ti
yade'abyedadam de las yon tan gang yang rung ba zhig yid l byedadam/de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyir dang/ gzhi de las de bzhin gangashegs pa yid la byed cing de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom bgang
dag par rdzogs parisangs rgyas nyid kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'amachod ba bya bsemasabaskyad du/mam 'di rab rab r bya rab tu 'bar bar bya/ dbul bar bya/yongs/
dbul bar bya/rab tugazhag kha'abya'o snyam pa 'gasamasakyi rgyud dngob gyurapas/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pa/mimarkam pa dngamanyam pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan ng/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra kha lo/
b+hU pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpag tu med de// bso namasamang po mnga' ba'-idabazhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la bstan bkur byed de/datsam mam/ cungabradatsamamam/chung ngu zhig gam na/
ngon tsam zhigab ma/gsog tsam zhig la/ma/ than glog gi rgyunatsam zhig kyang bar byed dam/ thunadzem skas kyi gzhigacig gasnang b.rapyad na yang/ shA'abuda' rnam banangan/canathosa rnams
kyis sam/rangasangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan painusas// shA ri'i bu ba gzhan yang lan lami razhing/ dad pa dang/ da rab dang/ dngangs yongasasu ba gnang ba'i rnam par sun pa bsod namasakyi
rnam par sminapadan dbazhinagashegs pas ston pa spyod do// shA ri'i bu gzhanayang dad ba dang ldan pa gus par gnas shingagayoned laskyug dang gsang rgyus kyi yon tanal nges par sems pa'i
rigasakyi bu'am/rigs kyi bumo dge ba'i bsam pa skyesazhas/maramacung bdatsam mam/ chung du tsam zhig kyang snang bar byas te/ mar me sna b.rangs ba gang gis/ dbazhin gshags pa'i tshod na/
dar ba na them skas tsam snangangam/bskoras tsam snang ngam/smadadam/gdugasasam/thams cad snangam/dzan bskabs gangayang rung ba zhig snang bzhin med/mdamyur du shi/rlungagisabaskyod
nga sas ma/charapasasam/ mar bdamasasagasIng bo zad ngas la/ ri'i bu 'dilta dparan/ klus dkrugs pa nasprin stug po 'dre ba la brigs pa las/ nam mapor lasaM glog khyunganas nuban gA
ra'i bu myur du byung ba'i rjes su 'brang ba demathongabs/ sams canarnamasakyi gi thabs shes byedapa da tsam du/ shA ri'i bu dbazhin gshegs pa'i mchodartag lam 'bul ba'i dge slong ngam dge
slongama'am/dab bstan nam/ dge bsnyanam 'am/de'as gzhanab bamasacanabaslab pa'i gzhim bangs pa/dge ba'i nang don zhugazhi ba/ sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun la mngon
par dad pa/ bdag nyid bskyab par bya ba la gnas babasad nams 'dod pa rnams kyis jitsam du chung ba ma phul ba'ibaso danams kyi phungaboji tsamadudapag tumad pa yongs su bzung bar gyur
pa'i rnam bar sbyin pa ni/ de bzhinagashegs pas mkhyen te// shA ri bumaram dbul nga cungarbad gcig pu'i bas/ mtham phul ba las mngon par grub pa'i bsod nams kyi phung bo de'i rnam
bkasmin pa ni/ shAri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogasang sangs rgyasamagatogs par lha dang bcas/tshas pa dngabacas pa ri'ajig rtenadod/dgasbyong dang bram ra/
nga cas pa 'iskye dgus bstanang ram nus so// shA ri'i busangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul nibasam gyis ma khyabs/ shA ri'i bumam dbul ba riyongs su phul ba
des bsod nams kyi phung po jitsamadu dang ga dumang gras modab yongs su bzung bar grub rinadabazhin gshegs ngang sam khyenate/ ri'i bu Aram de cin du chung du phul ba'im pa basmin pa yang
wA dpag tumedan 1gang gis dengazhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ridi bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mchod pa khyad par can byed dam/byed du 'jug ste/ spros sam/ma tog 'phreng dam/
gdugs sam/ ba dana rnams sam)gangayang ngaba'i maa ri'aphrang ba rnam pamang bas mchod pa khyad pa can byed dam/ byed du 'jug la ltasmos kyang ci dgos/ ka'i bu gzhan yang sa 'di ba'i rgyud
bas rtogs par bya ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhen/ sangs rgyas kyi sa rnams ni dpag tumad dasnyam dudad pas rtogs par ng ba dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dziltar chung ngu'i rnam par smin pa ang dpang/ dumed par

glu 'gyur tha dad pas rtogs par grub dang/ dkon mchog gsum la dad pa'a'os mngon par 'du byedapa'i rnam par smin pa gang yin pa dastanang mthong ba nyan thus khyad kyis kyang rnam pa thams cadubasamang
lan yongs su bsam pas minus na/'bags ba'i rigs lami gnas pa gzhan rnams kyis las kyi rnam par smin bamangon sum du shes pa 'am// khong du chudabaranus pa lta ci smos te/de ni gnasamad
da gzhanadun de ni dad pas rtogs par bya ba yin pa dang/ shA 'bu nyan thos rnams kyis sems can thams cad kyi lasakyinam par smin pa bsam pa ma/shes par mi nus te/ shA ri'i bu khyed rnams
gnas 'di la bsam pa dang bral ba gyis shig/ de phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i busams can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa bsam gyisami khyabago zhes de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i phyir//
shA ri'i bu nang bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'is ngas rgyas rnams kyis kyang sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam pa smin pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo zhes gsungs so//
shA ri'i bu na rongs pa'i de bzhinagashegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogasab 'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam pa sminapa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid do zhes
stonepar ragyur ro// shA ri'ibasams can gyi bsam pa dang/ sems dang lhag mthong yang bsam gyis mi khyabs/dad pas rtogs par bya ba yin no// shA'i du 'phags pa'i rigs la gnas pa/
khyed cag nyidadang/ sems can thams cad kyi shes pa de la/ mag dngamakhas pa'ashes pa mi 'jugan/sems ma dul ba/ tshul khrims dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ shesa'ab dang rnam par grol
ba dang/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang bral ba/ brjed ngas pa/ ma rig pa'i mun pas mig bsgribs pa gzhan gang dag/ bdag ci zhig/ bdag su zhig/ bdag 'dra ba zhig/ bdag
gang nas/ bdag jitsam zhig/ bdag ji lta bu zhi'i// bdag ldan pa 'ingang tshul can nam/ bdag mi ldan pa'i ngang la gzhag/ bdag brjed ngas pa 'am/ bdag dran pa)
bganas pa ram/ bdagam/bas pa'i byed pa 'am/ bdag dus pa'i las byed ram/ bdag gang nas 'os/ bdag gang du 'gro nas/ rang gi chos la shes pa 'jug ba yang med pa rnams lta ci
smos shA redu byis ba so so'i skye bo nibadag la shes pa 'jug pa yang men/ phyi'i leg ga lta bcas de las kyi rnam par smin ba shes par lta ba la 'gyur te/ den gemasamed de// de'i
sa bu de bzhin gshegs pa nitshul khrims dang bral bam yin/ ting nge 'dzin dang bral ba ma yin/ shes rab dang bral ba ma yin/ rnamapar grol ba dang bral ba ma yane/ rnam par gro'aba'iyi
shesamathong ba dang dul bam yin/ rig pa dang bral bas yin// shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas tshul khrims dpagatumed pa'o//
tshul khrims chags bamed pa'o// tshul khrims bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// tshul khrims gzhal dumed pa'o// tshul khrims rdzogs pa'o// tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'o// de ba las
dang las[”]rnam par smin pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab mkhyen to// shA ri'i bu ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa los dang las kyi rnam par smin pa mang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
mkhyen cenaka' ri'i bu 'di la dbazhin gshegs pa 'di ltar rab tum kun te/ sems can 'di ni dge ba'i chos rnams yongs su zadacingam dgu ba'i rkyes rnams kyis gang ba'o// sems can 'di/
ni dge ba'i chos nems 'byung b.ra'agyur zhing mi dge ba'i chos rnams 'gag par 'gyur ro/ sams can 'diname dge ba'i chos rnams skye bar 'gyur zhing/ dge ba'i chosa rnams 'gag/
par 'gyur ba'o zhes/ shA ri'i bu 'jug ba 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa sems can de dang de dag gis las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa sna tshogs rjes su 'jug pa rab tumakhyen to// sha
bu de lasems can rnams nun pa yodacing mad pas pa mad du mkhyan pa du lta bu dang ldan pa mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pas/ sems can las kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa bsam gyi
mi khyab pa lung ston to// shA ri'i bu de la gang dag dad pa dadabani yid ches pa 'gyur la/ gang dgam dad cing bstan pa 'di las nyanas pa de dag ni dpur 'gyur zhing rtsod par 'gyur
tu den de dag la yun ring porami phan pa dang/ donamed pa dang/sdug bsngal ba dang/ log par ltung bar 'gyuro// shA ra'i bu de la sems can gangadabazhinagashegs pa'i mchodazha kha ra
me 'bul ba des yongs su phul bo dang/ nges pa'athu la ba dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa ri las mngonapar 'dus byas pa dang/ rnam pasmanapa'i 'bras bu bde ba 'dod pa dang/
@#// dga' bdang/ mchog tudaga' bo dang ldan pa dang/ dad pas yongs su phul bsagasapas/tshe 'di nyidalasams kyi nges par sems pa gsum 'thob ste/ gsum gang
[>>zhen do'asAm dusems te/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lamachod pa byas te/lus thob pa snying pa dang/ snying bo ma A pa rilus shes par

byas la/ sAng pasbyin par bya'osnyam nas longs spyodununas la nyes dmigs can du shes te/snying po med pa ril ngas spyod rnams la snying po sbyin par byed pa 'din/ shA'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod na 'a
mchod pa byas pa sems kyi yig par sems pa dang po'// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'disAm dusams te/bdag gis 'danams kyi zhid bsamad ra'i yon gnas/ sprin pa ri markyag lenang ngol mchod
pa byas pas/bdag 'a sems can dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi 'jigs pa ram/ ga shin rje'i'ajig rten gyi 'jigs pa mad do// bdag gi 'gro bde ba ni ltasta/ mtho ris
'thob pa'am mi 'thob pa 'am/ gzugs 'thob pa 'am/longs spyod 'thob pa 'am/ byang chub 'thob par snyam pa de ni/ ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs parimachod rtenal mchod pabyas pa'i
sems kyi nges pa ra sems pa 'thob pa gnyis pa'o// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rimachod rten la mam dbule ba yongs su phul ba la yang dag par gnas pa gang yin pa de/
gal te bdag gis sbyin pa byin na// bdag gis bsod nams dag kyang byas te// bdag gis sa snga sna sngangs so snyam du de ltarab tu shes shing de 'dasAm du sems te/ bdag ni smi ba ba yin/
badrag gis kyang sbyin pa byin nosam du/ de ltarasams shAng gtangab 'kha yongs su gdung ba med/ brnyas pa med de/ shA ri'i bu de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rgyun lamachod pa byas pa sems
kyi nges pa rasams pa 'thob pa gsum par// shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod sman la mar ma dbul phul bas/'chiba'i dus kyi tshe/snang ba gsum 'thob
ste gsum gang zhe na dge legs byas pa mngon du 'gyur te/ dran pa 'thob cing dge ba rnams brjod par mi 'gyur ta/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar 'ched 'i dus kyi tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag ba'i rtsa ba
bskyad pa rnams rjes su dran pa 'di snang ba dang po'o// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten mchod pa byas pa'i sams cad 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe dran par 'gyur te/ bdag
gis sangs rgyas lamachod pa byas so zhes mchog tu dga' ba 'thob ste/ shari'i bu 'di ltar sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang bcas pa'i sems pa skya da pa 'di ni snying gnyis pa'o// ka' 'bu
gzhan yang sems canade 'chiba'i dus kyi tshe/ sems can gzhan sbyin pa gtong bemathongon/de 'di snyam dusams te/ bdagagis mar me dbul ba phul lo// phyis kyang sbyin pa sbyin nasAm du/ degatong ba'i
sems skyes shing sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba rnams kyis ma 'khragasal/de la chos rjes su dran pa 'di lta bu r byung ste/ ri'i bu 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta ba bzhin du yid la byed pa 'di'i
[>snang ba thob pa gsum pa yi// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang rigs kyi bu ra// rigs kyi bumo de nga zhin gshegs pa rimachod rten lamaram dbul ba phul bas de 'chiba'i dus kyi tshesnyakhrab bzhi'athob
bzhi gang zhe na/mdunani ma dkyil 'khor 'char ba mthong ba dang/ mdunan blu btaba'i dkyil rakhor 'char ba mthong ba dang/ lha'i 'khor gnas ba mthong ba dang/ de bzhinagashel dag bcom
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'i sangs rgyas byang chub kyi sAng nga la bzhugs shing/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa sangs rgyus pa mthong ste/ de la bdag nyid dus bar byed pa la gnas shing thal mo sbyar
ba byas par mthong ba ste/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rgyun lamalam dbul ba phul bas rA bo'i tshe snangab 'dibazhi 'thob par 'agyurar// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
stsal te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas de bzhin du ston nga sa gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// mtha' yas chos bdag drangasrong chen po yi// mchod rten rnams mkhas
ba gang zhig gis// mam phul byas pa'i las de yis// bde dang don dang redabamatha' yas 'thob// de 'chokar dran nyams mi 'gyug/ marag phul ba'ang bdag nyidamathong ba'agyur// zang

bring med pa'idaga' bu pa'i yang 'thob// 'chi ba'i dus tshe rmongs pa med par gyur// kun nas snang ba dag kyang de shes te/ mdang ni zla ba'ang mthong bar 'gyur// bye ba khrag khrig lha rnams desamathong/
'gyur/ rmo sa bamed bar sas rgyas chos kyang sla ]/de la pha ma bu dang rtswa lag dang// 'khong rnams kun gyis soras na yang// de rnams la nim ngon du de ni phyogs// de nam yang dranab
nyams mi 'gyur// de yis mdun gzhalatshad khangamatshog mthong// 'jigasamad lha yi bum rnams kyang mthong// skyed mos tshal bzhi shinatubargyan sdug cing// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ldan mthong bar
'gyur// thub pa'i skyes mchog rnams la mchod byasu dzas// desanubyang chub snying po bde gshegs dang// des nibadag kyang thal mo sbyar byas shing// lha klu rnamin rnams kyisamadun bdaramathong
gusudang bcas par 'jig rten 'dren pamathong// deder phyin bde bar gshegs mthong nas// dga' bas dra tshespyan yang 'dren par bye// de yis gdugs tshod myur la gnang par mdzad/
sas rnyed pa'i bde bas tshim gyur nas// 'dus byas che sdug bsngal des mi myong// byang chub dam pa mchog lasams kyang raga'/dal chiba'i 'jigs chen 'byung mi 'gyur// maram yul
ba'i rnam smin 'di yin te// 'dus byed tshe dran pa nyams ma 'gyuraM// de la phyogs rnams snang bar gyur par 'gyur// sngon chad ma mthong gzugs bcangs rnams kyang mthong// de ni'i nas mtho ris zhes
'gro zhing// lha yi stan la de lus 'dug par shes// rgyal ba nimachod pa byed pa'i tshe// desani kun nas lha mo rnams kyang mthong// shari'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i

[>mchodartana' mam dbul ba phul bas/sum cu rtsa gsum du skyes nas// lha'i bu de rnam pa lnga yongs su dag pa dang ldan b.laragyur ro// shA ri'i bulha'i bu dernam pa lnga yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ji lta bu zhen

de'ilus yos su dag par 'gyur dang/ de lha mthu chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang/ de'i dran pa dang shes rab yos su dag par 'gyur ba dang/ de'i bar sgrasnyan pa thos par 'gyur ba dang de ri 'khor yid
bde ba mang ba dang ldan par 'gyur ba'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/ de bzhin du ston pas gzhan yang 'dis sa bka' stsal to//

drang srongaachod rtanama'am phul bsani// de yi las ni rab tu'od gsal zhing// gzhan gyisam tshugs dpal dang ldan pa dang/ lha stong gi nigatso bor de 'gyuraro// lha ya sa dbyangs snyan cing yid 'ong shes

ji ltaralha gzhan de bzhin 'di yang mchog/ dran dang blo mchog dang ldan pa dang// 'boramchog phun sum tshogs pa rang thob par gyur// gang du lha bu de ni 'gro ba der// de'agro ba ni lha kun 'adodapar byed//

gang gis de lus 'di ltara'od 'bar ba// sngon gyi las kyi 'bras bu de 'dralo/ skyedamos tshal gyi gzhin shing gi ming// zla mchog ces bya gzhal med khang gis brgyan// bla badziltar kun nas gsal ba ltar// da
mishing rnams de bzhin gsalab yin// mar me rab 'bar jibazhinanams gsalal// mda'od dring phyogasa rnams gang byed ba// che rtog bsal ba 'di'i ming ci zhes// lha rnams mtsha gsed 'ji
par 'gyur// de yi 'khor tshogs me tog de dag gis// brgyanapa byas pas de dus mdzes par 'gyur// bye ba khrag khrig lha yin na de// ma shar ba bzhin du rnam par madzes// shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs
pa'i mchod rten la mar ma dbul ba phul bas/ sum curtsa gsum gyi lhan ng du skyasanas lha'i bu de dag yun ji sridicigan/'chi'aphro'i 'os su gyurlabu bdag nyid kyis shes te/ lha'i bu de 'chinarang gi
'khor dang lha'i bugazhan dag kyang/ chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag pa dga' ba byas/ gang dag nga la 'dzin tur tug sa gnas de nas shar ngos te/ 'thos nas kyang log par ltung bar 'gran
mi 'gyur te/ saMro'ajig rtenaduskyes na yang rigasamchog tubatsunapa/ dadapa dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang ldan par bar 'gyur ro//gal tasangs rgyasami 'byung ba zhig baban yang
dusdig pa'i lta btsanam yin zhing Angamtshan duradzin pa dang bral ba'i rigs sa skyabar 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' mal ta/bdabar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas
dbazhin du ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha yi sridaparab daga'i yun ring du// gnas par 'gyur zhes de yi de shes 'di 'ji'i// lhagatso da yis de la nga rang tungashes// gang
pa'i dus 'bab 'gyurab// de mtshanam lnga dag 'byung 'gyur te// byeb phrag mang lha dag der 'du zhing// de dag mngon sum de ni sa kyang n// bdag ni 'dinas ring por mithog
'chi srid pa thams cad m rtog bde ba med// gzhan dag 'chi zhing gzhan dag skye bar 'gyur// kyem badrag na 'chib mi 'gyur ro zhes// da ni dbus 'dug shin tuAkhazadas// de mngag khog zhug
rnams kyang de bzhinadu// lha gzhan dunasdug bsngal nyam thug go/ denas bdag gis ltasaniwemathong nas// don rang gi stan la dga' po 'thob// gnas denas langs te'agro bar byed// gzhal med khang
gi gnas su rang dga' mi skyod// bdag cag 'dimathud tham dang yinazhes// dbazhinalha mang dum mya ngan byed// deyastanamchog dam pa gang yin pa// dazhi lha yi buchosarlangs te 'dug gnad

mthonganas de na reng stan lag/ dga' ba thob pa'i rim gyur de nas shi/ lha yi dbang po lha gnas shi 'phos nas// ma yo ra jig rten du ni mngon par 'gro// de yis rang la yod pa'i dreg mi shugs// der yang
bde bar 'gyur gyi sdug bsngal yin// skyes nas tshe rabs rab tu dran gyur te// skyes ma thag tusngon gyi srid pa shes// nyon mongs rnams kyis bdag la gnod 'gyur zhes// shAn du sdugabasngal der
yang dgarag med// lho yi 'jig rten thob pa'i dpal dran las// mi yi 'jib rtog lan bdemi rnyen/ mthos sdug bsngal mi de su la smos ci dgos// srid pa thams cad gong po med cing g.yo//
gang dang nga tsholus stobs nyams gyur pa// de tsher rab tu 'byung bar nges// 'di yang de yi rnam smin 'gyur ba ste// rnam rtogaspyod b.ranam yang mi 'gyur ro// ni de iname phul ba'i 'bras//
de dang de ni tshe rabs des dran 'gyur// bya ba'i 'os min lasazhi rim spyodra// gdom bu ba dan khyim nas 'a byung// 'dab mo 'gyur zha bo mi 'gyur ro// da ma gnamed par 'gyur ma ga//
nad can yin 'jigs rung sgra ldan min// blun por mi 'gyur mi shes mi 'gyuraro// mib med par ninam yang mi 'gyurazhing// de yi migazhin bar 'gyur ma yin// mig gcig ma yin bag leb/
mi ma yin// de'amig la mi gsal med por 'gyur// mig rong zhing gnag la rnam par gsal// srid bar du yo mig dag par 'gyur/ nor bu red babung lta'adag zhib rtogs//
bskal pa grangasamud dag tu mas kyang de'i/ dag yig yongs su shums mi 'gyur// de lamig nadad gzhi mi 'byung snya/ maram tshul nga 'i rnams smin de yin no/ dubazhin lag cig
gzugs dang rtog ge rnams // rtogs par bo ru babro ldan 'jigs pa med// mdzangs la blo dang ldan par 'gyur// blo ni shin tu phra don dam mthong// srid pa dag la byed pamed palta// rgyal
ba'i bstan la snang ba thob par 'gyur//de bzhin 'jig rten 'dren pa sangs rgyas mthong// mthong nas dad pas mchod pa rab tu byed// gzugs kyi dngos po babang dang mdzes bar 'gyur// mdza'abashes
dang ni rtsa lag skye bo dga'// phyug ri stobs ldan namang bar 'gyu/ me khyad phalor ni phun sum tshogs 'thob//ji ltaramams nun pa bsal su// kun la 'od
kyis snang ba khyab ba ltayaM/ debazhan kun snang byas nas lhangaparo// mun pa'i dbang du nges pa 'demi 'gro/ sangs rgyasamachod rten lazhi ma gang gis// sems ni dang pa dmar sa 'phreng ba 'bul// mam
phul bas sems ninamadug cing// ngani'ajig rtanarig pa'i mchog tu 'gyur// bstan sdug cing rab tumadzes par 'gyur/'jig rten kun gyi dga' ba skya b.ra'agyur/ ltadamani 'dod bkra shis
'dod ma yig/ g.yon phyogs lam la de ni stonami 'gyur// dan 'jig rten lag lta gang dag dang// lam gro'akha nga dag yin pa dmanos rgyal dran tsam gyis chog par de'adzinacing// su dang yang
ni 'thab tu ragromi byed// tshegs 'byungamacing mya ngan med par 'gyur//de yi sems la yongs su yid madu// de ba yid mches par mi 'gyur// bsam po na dang gnod pa byed khamad// rgyal po'
pho brang gang du de sgrub// rgyal po dang ni rgyal 'khor grags par 'gyur// skya rbaband kyis nyams kyang de mi thebs// thamangam 'gyur zhing 'gyur ma yin// legs par gnas shing bdudang ldan
'gyural// dayi lus la nad rnams 'byung mi 'gyur/ da lam du ni sdig pa mi rmi lo// des na ji ltar ston pa de tsheshes// des ni yang dang yang dugater red de// bdagashegasamatshod rtenamachodapas de/
ltar 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs bar mchod rten la na'ame dbul ba phul ba'i hams na renu'adun babanir shribasabazhi gang zhen/ lus kyi 'dun pa dang/ 'angs spyod kyi 'dun pa dang/ rigs
btsun par skye ba yi 'dun pa dang shes rub 'thob pa sa 'a'i bu debanagashegs pa'atshodon pham ma dngu' ba phul bas/'dun pa bzhi bo de dag 'thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das/
kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/de bzhin dug pas gzhan yang 'disaabaka' stsal to// drang srong chen po'i mchod rtenamaratsha dul/
de yi lus rdzogs pa dang stobs cher 'gyur// de ni mas kyang rtsod pa spyanami byed// dbang phyug tshugs ngamad pa phyogs bcur spyod// drasrong chen po'i mchodatanamaram cul// rnam par grags pa'i
longs spyod ldan pa dang// yon tamchog ldan rab mchog khyim du skye// skyobs tsherabs dran pa nyid du 'gyur// g.yog 'khor donasum tshogs pa mchog ldan 'gyur/ srog chags rnams la rtag
dusId rtso byed/ rtag dug 'tshoshig tu nges par gyur// rnam sbyong 'gro ba'i khyim du dems/ shA'i budabani gshagasang mchod rten lamam dbul ba phul 'ag/gosasu dag kha
bzhi'athob ste/ bzhigang na lus yongs su dag ba dang/ ngago yongs su dag pa dang/ yid yongs su dag pa dang/ mdza' bshes yongs su dag pa'o// shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am
bzhag @#// rigs kyi bu mo daskye ba'i gnas de dang/ de dag tu skyes pa na/srog gcod pa spong bar 'gyur te/srog gcod pa mi byed do// mkhyin pa mi lego/ 'dod pa la leg par g.yem/

ba sbyong bar 'gyur te/rang gi chungam la yang ldog par mi ston to// 'bru'i chang dang bcos pa'i chang bdudrang srong bar byedado// sems canag gang 'ayang dadrug pa 'am/mtshon nam bong ba la// khu tshugs/
mtshon gyurang gang rung bas rnam par 'tshe bar mi byed/ desdig pomidage ba'i rjes rnams las ldog par 'gyur/ shAri'i bu de dag ni lus kyi yongs su dag pa zhag bya'o/ de' dag gi yongs
su dag pa ba dang zhen/ dbardzun du smra ba spangs paAn te// dem mthong ba'amam thos pa rjodang ramusrid 'a//mthong ba dang gros pa dris pa ang dus ma yin par smra bar mi byed de/demathong ba'am/thos
ba yin yang dag par smra bar byad/ dbadag gi donanam/ gzhan gyi don du yang rung ste/ leg par mi sna'o// gzhan dag gug brdzun du skyab bcol ba'i tsha ngedag pa shasan bden pa srung bar
byadadengag g.yosasu ma dag padedag spangabarakhyod do// dadadag dbyiba'iphyiro'adunas thos pa pha gir mi bshad/ de dag dbye ba'i phyiri la gnas thos pa 'di ni bsnyad de/ 'thun ba
rnams nag nugs par byed nga/bya ba rnams lan sdumakhyadado// dngag rtsa ba ngo spangs ba yin te/ngagagang zher 'debs pa b.rung ba/ gzhan la rtsub pa/ gzhan la mibade ba/ mi sduge ba/ mi
na/ bde ba/ mi dag rab[） ]yid du mi 'ong ba/ gzhan la gnod pa/ khon du 'dzin pa'i ngag de lta bu spangs nas/ ngagamanyen pa/'jal ba/ yid 'ong ba/ bden pa/ rnar snyan pa/ snying du sdug pa
mdzar b.ra'agyurab )skye bamang po mgu ba/ skye bamang po 'dod pa/ dgarab/ yidedu 'ong ba/ dgra thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa de lta bu r ngag smra'o// detshig kyal pa spangs pa yin te/
despang bar byab gzhan dang mi zla ba min/ de gzhan gyi lag rtsis dang brda sprad par byed do// dmangadu smra bar byed/ dus ma yin pas bar mi byedal/ mya ngan las 'das pa dang mi ldan pa'i
tshig mi snaste/ dalta'ade ngag ge zhes yongs su ma dag pa spong ba 'di ni shA ri'i bu ngag gi las yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o// de yi dkyi sa yongs sum dag pa klongab yin te/deng ba
sams su mo byed cing dgazhan gyi nor dang/ gzhan gyi rdzas dang/ bzhan gyi yo byed ragal brnab sems mi skyed do// de gnodasems gi bdad/ gnod sems slongab yin no// log par lta ba yang
slong ste/ sdig pa'i lta pa can ma yin no// de ltar yid kyi las yongs su ma dag pa spong ba 'di ni yid kyi las yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o// mdza' bshes yongs su dag ba yang 'thob ste/gang dag

brdzun du smra ba dang/ 'bru'i chang dang bcos pa ricangabatungab slas pa dang/ tshub pa dang/ mi brlang ba dang/ legs par sdom pa dang/ yang dag pa'i lta ba can de dag la sten cing gong du yang sangs rgyas
tsa'/ @#// bam ldan 'das rnams dang/byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang/ rangasangs rgyas dang/nyanas rnams 'aangasanacingabastanabakur byed de/ bu'i bu 'don yongs su dag pa//
banang ste/ mdza' bshes mos su dag pa zhes bya'o/ ba'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchodartel maremadabul ba phul bas/ yongasatu dag pa bzhi po de dag thob pa'i 'gyuro// bcom ldan 'das
kyis de skad ces bka' stsal/ bde bar gshegs pas)skad gsungs nas/ de bzhin dustonapasagazhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal te// rnam par spang phyir bde gshegs gsungs pa la// lus dang
bany+tsa ngag dang yid kyis shin tu bsdam// lta ngam red tshul khrims rnam par dug/ de yilegani yid las byung pa yin// tibazhin phyogs rnams su nishin dugasal// dayis zag pa zad ba myur du shes//
ra yiblo ni rje'aphrulatshe bar 'gyur// lha mig rdul dang bral zhing bag pamed// blo ldan de yis 'jig rten sems rnams dang// lha yi mngonashes so so rig pa shes// 'dod na nyan thos byang chub rAdami
dka' mar mo phul ba'i rnam smin dayin no// nga srong chen po rimachod rten mar me phul// gal te sangs rgyas byang chug 'dang na'angs// blo ldan ra la gsumatsharams pa med// shes rab mig ldan
Sha ngasasud chenapor 'gyur// shApa'i bu thog ba na po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am// rigs kyi bu mas dbazhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten lamaram dbul ba phulan/skyo ba'i gnas 6
0/ de dang dudag tu/ 'dun bar 'gyur chos kyi mchog brgyada'athob ste/brgyadagangazhan/ shamig mchog 'brug pa dang/ dran pa ba ltar imathengab 'thob pa dang/ bsgros pa yongs su rdzogs pas nges/
par 'byed pa'i tshadang 'thun pa'i mig mchoga'athobar dang/ shes rab yongs su rdzogasakhas tshul khrims nyamasang med pa 'thob pa dang/ sngon bsod nams byas pas mdzes 'thob pa dang
bsod nams legs par byas pas dul ba zhusum gas kha 'thob ba dang/ shams can thams cad kyi mig tugyur pas sangs rgyas 'khyungabamanyes ra 'byed pa dang/hari'i bu'i gegs kyi bu'am
rigs kyi masam na phulapa'idag pa'i rtsa bdag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid 'thob ste/ de la yang 'gres pa med ra 'i yidi dang ldan zhing/ mchog tu bltan sdug par 'gyur ba 'am/
b+ha'i bung bo brgya byin rdzu 'phrul bzod cingamigastongar ldan pa'athob par 'gyurab m/tshangs pa'i gnas lam khas pa'itshas par yang 'gyur te/grags pa'i bsam gi sha 'thob par 'gyur
dga' 'i tsa ba byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pas 'dun pa ragyur ba'i chos kyi mchog brgyad po ded 'thob bo// gzhan yang chos brgyudar thob ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/sangs rgyas kyi spun
dpag tuyod pa'athob pa dang/ sangs rgyasakyismobs pa dpag tuyod pa 'thob pa dang/sangs rgyas kyirdzu 'phrul dbagatumed pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims dang/ tumed pa dang sog
rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin dpag tu med pa dang sangs rgyas kyi shes rab dpag tumed pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyirnam par grol ba dpag tu med pa dang/ sems can gyi sems dang/
po gsum pa dpag tumad pa la 'jugapa 'thobalta/ shA ri'i bumar me phul bas delngar rnam par smin pa dpag tu med pa yongs su bzung ba yinan// shA re'i bu gzhanayasams can gang dag de bzhin
gshegs pa chosAratshad pa na/ kyi ama'o chos 'chad do// kyaa ma chos rab tustonato zhes/ ma'am dbul ba radul ba'imar ma dro/ pa'e gyimar mar rjes su bzung bas chos kyisaram rdzas sa 'dzin/
par byed do// dma'am dul ba'idagab rtsa ba des tshogs dpag tumed pa brgyud rathob sta/ brgyudagang zhe na/ dran pa'i tshogs dpag tumed pa 'thob pa/ de bzhin du srung te/ blo gros kyi tshogs dang/
dad pa'i tshogs dang/ brtson 'grus kyi tshogs dang/ shes rab kyi tshogs dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs dang/ spobs pa'itshogs dang/ bsod nams kyi tshogs dang ga tu med pa 'thob ste/ tshogs
ka dpag tu med pa brgyad po dadag 'thob par 'gyur// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yang 'thob ste/ rigs kyis thams cad makhyen pa'i yushesakyi bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro// shA ra'i bu/
gzhan yang dbazhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa sangs rgyas la/ dedang bsams kyis thalamo skurab byas pa'i dgakha'i rtsa ba dag/ chogamchogatubyung ba brgyud
'thob ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/gzugs mchog tu byung ba 'thob pa dang/ g.yog 'khor mchog tu byung ba 'thob pa dang/ tshul khrims mchog tu byung ba dang/ lha dang mi rnams su skye ba mchog
du byung ba dang/ dadapa mchog dubyung ba dang/ spobs pa mchog du byung ba dang kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i 'phags pa'i 'om 'thob pa dang/ blon mud pa yang dag par byang chub mngon
pa'i rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba// shA ra'i bu deci'i phyir dpag tumadapa zhes bya zhen/ debazhi gshegs ral samachodapagiradrag budapag tu med pa phyir te phan yon dpag tu/
mad pa yin no/ de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du/ brtsam byas mangon par 'byung bar gyis// sangs rgyas bstan la brtson par byos// 'dam bu'i
khyim la glang chenabazhin// 'badag sde rnams gzhom par gyis// zhes ched dub rjod pa de ched du brjod pa mdzad do// denas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshedang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal
pa shA ri'i bu chos lnga po 'di dagamchog turedang radakurabs/ lnga gang zhe na/mir skye ba 'thob pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ba dang/ del yang mag par dga' ba/
dang tshul khrims yosu rdzogs pa dang/ zag pa zad pa ste/ 'bu chos lnga po de dag sems can thams cad kyisamchog tu red par dga' ba yin te/ de dag ni khyod rnams kyis thob bishano//
bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/ bde bar gshegs pas deskad gsungs nas/ drang zhin du ston pas gzhanamang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byang chub don/
phyire sams can phan 'dod pas// bde gshegs mchod rten dbul ba 'di phul nas// mkhas pa de yis byas pa'i las des ni// tshe rabs kun tu khyad par can du gyur// 'di nas shi 'a bos lhagis
bsngags pa yis// yang sded dam pa de ni thob par 'gyur// rir bu bzhin dud nam g.yo la// 'od zer dag gis phyogs kun snang zhingamadzes// lha tshogs rnams kyis mthong nas gus dang bcas// mchog
tu gus pas de la dga' b spyod// bstod pa byed cing de la mchod pa byed// yang dang yang dub lta bas rdzogs pa mad// bsod nams mtshan byas ni lhas mchod 'os/ sa pa'i gnas tshangs panadzes pa
'dra yolas shig nges par des bstan// gang gis de yi lu ni shin tu mdzes// 'dun bsod namasami dod su zhig yod// 'phags pa tshul khrims mkhas pa su zhe na// thug pa mthongabalta bsam//
ngoms te// chos thos nas ni su zhig bgam byed// mi yi 'jig rtan gnas tshadayis ni// bdagashegs mchod rtenamaras phul byas shing// bde bar gshegs kyi bstan la gnas byas pas//
'din lhamchog rnyed pa legs par red/ mi yi lus n bdag gis thob gyucing// rgyal ba'i stan la dad pa'atshol/thob shog/ gal te ba gamed gyur na lus 'don gyi// chos kyi dam pa 'dor
bar yong mi 'gyur// ma lus dba'adaka' ba thob gyur na// blun zhus ci phyir rangag don mi byed/ bdagashegasabastunal gnod byed sems ldazhun// nas g.yang sa chen por ltung bar 'gyur/ dgi rgyu
'byor pa rgyal chen lhas thos nas// skyo ba skyes te smon lam 'debs byedapa/ ma i lus nibadag thob gyur cig/ legs nagyuranas tshangs sbyodabadag ston shog/ 'chil ri dus byed tshayang de bzhin du
chos la phan zhisams lags l gyur cig/ lha stong byeb lha mor bcas pa yis// de nibadag gi yin zhes dgar bar byed/ lha yi bu mo yid 'ong brgyan pa rnams // skyed mos tshal bzhir dran byed
'dzug/ yid du 'ong ba'ims yod kun nas ldang// glu dbyangs snyan pa'i sgra yang thos par 'gyur// bsngags pa'i lha dag las gar 'gro ba// de dang der ni gzugs bzang rnams kyang m pheng// mi
sdug gzugs nan nus kyang mi mtholta/ rgyal ba'i mchod rtanamarag phul bas 'gyur// dunas 'das mi srid pa 'dir// dran dang ldan zhingam yi galan gnas// btsas nas
gang nas shi 'phos tshorab sadran// 'phags pa'iye shes stobs las nyams mi 'gyur// bde gshegs mchod rtenana'an phul byas pas// de yis las byas bdad kyis// 'khor los sgyur
b.rim bdag stobs chen ldan// yid 'ong gzugs bathobaltanadaga' bar gyur// de yis las byas pa des tshering 'gyur// gcigatshudagab nyid kyis nga de dang ldan// de yi lus nyid kyis mi
ka da mo ngas// mar ma phul ba'irnamasmin de yin no// bdabadagashegs mkhamasamachudabs pas// kun pa riganyer mad rgya la po'i skyed pa med// gshadamamad cing ma'i phyi pa
mad[;]den sakyisanamasakyang/ tsesam 'gyur// bad zhing la 'gas gang du 'jigs bamed// rtag tu'abyoracing legs 'byor nor dra ldan// deyi skyed mos tshal mchog 'phreng ba dang// tshal dang
shing phranalam sna tshogs brgyan// de yis 'jig rten gtso bo sangs rgyasamathong// mthong nas kyang ni mchog tu dgar 'gyur te// dedag rnams la gus pa'adem chog byed// rgyal srid spangs nas
dge slong nyid lasnyen// bsngags ram thar yus gathogs ngamathar yasashing// mtha' yas blo ldan bde gshegasamachod rten la/ man ju' bas mtha' yas blo ldan 'gyur/ ma'am
bzhin du phyogs rnams kun tugasal/ maram chen ngos skyes mchog thub pa yi// mchod rten gas la byas rnamadrag mig gis ni// byang chub rdul bral bug pa med thub nas// de phyogs kun gar
ma bzhin dugasal// bde gshigs mchod nama'am phu'athasan// rnam grol zlumangal stobs bcu rnams ldan zhing// de bzhinama'aphros chos kyi pha rol byon// kun nas sbyin ldan bdebar gshegA
par 'gyur// phyogs rnams dag na bgrang byas 'jig rten khams// gang dag ji snyed yod pa ma lus pa// mdog lta bu ma yi rgyu yis ni// ma lus pa dag rtag tusnang byas 'gyog/ bdag nyid rtsa lamar
ka ma phul ba las// mthu rabyung gang yin de nid yin no// ma'am 'dra ba dag la sems can kun// lhag pas gal temathu chenAdon dam mthong// rang rgyala rnams su gyur la dmachod phyir// gcig rags
am 'bar ba'abyas gyural// maramasnying po rib tsam byas shing// de yis 'jig rten ma lus snang byed la/ rnam pa de 'dras mtshar yas phyogs kun tu// ga' ag dbu 'khaba' byed gyur la
rang rgyal byang chub tu nasmonasams kyis// bskul pa brgya phrag mtha' yas 'bar byedapas// gang zhig byang chub phyir ni smanasams kyis// mchod naAchog khartswa nas gsal byedun// de bas
mchog tu 'bras bu chos zhes// don dam gajigs pa sas rgyas rnams gsung ngo// phyogasabacu'iskya bgangadag dpag med nga// rang gas rgyas nyidachu ngon par 'dod pa'i ru'i/ (re sa dang zhin
mar ma rnams phul zhing// bskal pa grangs med dedag 'bar byed la// 'jig rtan chad dungade gshegs nyid 'dad cing// gang zhig 'jig rtanadam pa'i mchod rten la// maram 'bul lam lan cigaphyag
'tshan// debs 'di bsod 'bras bu khyad par 'phags// sangs rgyas spyod lamathong dka' bsam mi khyab// thos nas dad dang dga' ba skyed pa 'byed// dadaud chos mgam thos byis ba rnams //
zhum zhum po nishin tu byed par 'gyur// daphyir 'jig rtenakun magon gang yin pa// dam chos spyod yulatsanams red dka'angs// thub rnams spyan sngarashin tu dngasams kyis// sangs rgyas nyidakyi chedad
ka @#// smon lam thob// com ldan 'das kyis daskadatsas bkarusal nas// tshadang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'a khoradudagarang/ lhadang/ midang/ lha ma yin dang/ bris
bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste/bcos ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngonaparab stod do/// 'phags pa'am dbulab zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mi do rdzogs so//
rgya gar gyi mkhan po pra dzA bu ram dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban d+he ya shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
gangaskad du/ Ar+ya karma A ba rinapra tis ba d+hinAmamahAyAn sUtra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen b.lamado// sangs rgyas dang byang chub
samasadapa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal 'go 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcigan/bcom ldan 'das mnyan yodan rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgonamadabrasasbyin gyi kun dag 'a ban/ dge slong stong
nyis brgya lnga bcu'idage slong gi dge 'dun nabo dang/ byang chub sems dpa'abadun bri dang thabs gcib dubazhugs te/ donus sangs rgyus kyimathus/ dad ldan pa shA ri'i bus stan las
langs sa/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tugazarate/busamo g.yas pa'i lhas labatsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thalamo sbyar ba btud de/bcom ldan 'das la 'askyed mas gsol te/
[8) ]bcos ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos kyithig pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/rasas rgyasakyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa/
ram sems can gzhanadag kyang rung// bla med pa angadag par rdzogs parubyang chub mngon par rdzogasalara'atshang rgyabararal bas las kyi sgrib pa rnams ji ltar so sor bshags par bgyi/daskar
ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skadaces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu 'di'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bumo nyan thosakyithig pa la yang dag par zhugs pa sa
rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am//sems can gzhan dgakyang rung ste/ banamadapa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub madren par
rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/na'anagasumamtshanalan gsumadu/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzural/pus mo g.yas pa'ilha ngas la btsugs te/ tha'amosgyur ba btud nas tshig 'di skadadu/

skya mang bo lasmanang dang/ skyabamang po la bde ba dang/ 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang/ skya bo phalapochadang/ lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang/ snyan pa dang/ bde ba'iskrudadu/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'os gang dag da lta phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtenan/ thanamad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mangonabar rdzogs pa sangs rgyas nas// a kyi 'khor lo rab duskorab/ chos kyi'akholal

ka/ @#/ tuston pa/ chos kyi tshul rab tu 'dzin pa/ chos kyi sbyin pa mdzad pa// chos kyi sgron ma 'barab ramadzad pa// chos kyi char rab tu 'bebs ba/ chos kyi rdza chub tu chung ba/ chos kyi sdeb che rab tu

rdung// chos kyi drung rab tu 'budapa/chos kyisrog shing sgong ba/ sems can thams cad la chos kyi spyin nga sa tshim par mdzad pa/nyam bag tu spyod du 'dzud pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la phyag

tsho'atshal lo// sangs rgyas bcomaldan 'adasumachod pa'i gnas/ phyag bgyi ba'i gnas/ rim bgyi ba'i gnas// mkhyen pa grub/smyan du gyur nga/ dpang du gyur pa/ tshad mar gyur pa// mkhyenapa dang ldan pa/

@#/ gabri gas nga dang ldan pa dedag la bdagamago dang/ ngag dang/ yid kyis phyag 'tshal lo// thog ma dang thamamamachis parer khorab ma'akhor ba'i tshe/ bdag 'dod chags kyis gzir ba 'am: zhe sdang gis gzir
ba/ gtimug gis gabri ba'i lus dang/ ngag dang yid kyis las kyi sgrib pa grang mngon par 'dus bgyis pa// sangs rgyas su ma 'tshal ba du/ chos sum 'tshal ba dung dag 'dunadu ma 'tshal
ba dang dge ba dang mi dge bar ma ratshal ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan//mas kyis khrag phyung ba dang/ chos spangs pa dang dgra 'dun gyi dbyinabagyis pa dang/ dag slong dgra bcom pa bkum
pa dang pham bkum pa dang/ lus kyi rnam gsum/ ngag gi rnam bzhi/ yid kyirnam gsum ste/ mi de gab bcu'i las kyi lamabagyis pa dang/ bgyid dustsal ba dang/ bgyid pa la rjes su yi rangab
[/]dang sams cag khacig la ngag rtsub po smras pa dang/ skur pa btab pa dang/ srang la g.yo bgyis pa dang/ gzhal bal g.yo bgyis pa dang/ 'grab drug tu rabor b.ra'agrab n pham mi dgar bar bgyis pa/
dang gang brag gi 'am/ mchod rten gyi lam/ dge 'dun gyi ram/ phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi nor brkus pa dang/ jiltar bslab pa rigazhi bcas pa rnams kyi 'dul ba dang 'gal ba bgyis pa dang/

mkhan po dang slob dpon gyis bsgo bamamanyan ba drang/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am rang sas rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ theg pa chenang la yang dag par zhugs pa
ram dalas gzhan pa'isims can rnams lamisnyan par bgyis pa dang/ sbos pa drang brdegs pa dang/ de dag la tha ba dngazhesdang bskyed pa dang/ phrog ngo dang ser sna las byung ba'i sems kyis/sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la tshig rtsub pa smras pa dang/ chos la chos ma lags zhes bgyis pa dang/ sam lags pa la chos lugs zhes bgyis pa de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mkhyen bar gyurang/

phran du gyur pa// dpang dugyur pa/tshadamarlagyur pa/ mkhyen pa dang ldan pa/ gzigs pa dang ldan pa// dadag gi spyan sngaso sor 'chags so// 'thopalo// 'chab bo// slan chad kyang mi bgyid do// bdag 'aukyi
sgrub pa gang gis bsgribs te/ sems can dmyal ba dang/ dung 'grol gnas dang/ yi dgas kyi yul dang/ lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyinang dumachibar 'gyu dbu dang/ sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang dga' dunamanyes
kha bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang/ mi khom pa rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba'i las de lus 'di nyid la rnam par smin te/gzhan dum myong bar shog cig/ de yangs ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'dasamakhyen

par gyur/ spyan du gyurapa/ dpang du gyur pa/ tshad mar gyurapa/mkhyen pa dang ldan pa/ gzigs pa dang ldan pa de dag gi spyan sngar so sor 'chags so// 'thob// mi 'chab bo// chad kyang mi bgyid do// ji
lta sngon gyi byang chub sems dpasams dpa' chen po dadug sngonabyang chub kyi phya spyod pa na/las kyi sgrib parnamasas bshugs pa dang/ ma brgyabs pa de bzhin du bdag kyang las[”]sgrib pa rnams so/
sara'achags so// ragrol la// mi 'chab bo// man chad kyang mibagyid do// jiltar ma 'ongs ba'i dus kyi byang chub sems dang sems dpa' chenang de dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyadangan/ las kyi
lco sgrib b rnams so sorarags par 'gyur ba dang/ mi rub pa de bzhin du/ bdag kyang las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor 'chags so// 'brel la// mi chab bo// mud chad kyang mi bgyidad// jiltard

kyi ltaraphyogs bcu'i 'jig rten/byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen padag byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa nu/ las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor 'chags pa dang/ mar rgyab pa de bzhin du (bdag kyang las kyi sgrib
de pa rnams so sor rachags so// 'thol lo// mi'aba'o// slan chadami bgyid do// ji ltar 'das padang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ daltarubyung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byang chub samag dpe'
[/]sems dpa'i spyad pa spyodang na/ las kyisgrib pa rnams so sor bshags pa dang/ saser shurlags pa dang/ sosor 'chags par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ bdag kyang las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor 'gas/
so 3'thol lo// mi 'chab bo// slan chadami bgyid do zhes brjod par bya'o// shA ri'i bu de lta bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bayotshes thams cad la sgrub pamadapa rnam par dag pa thob par 'dodabs/
'dibazhinadulas kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags par bya'o// mi 'chab pa 'bya'o// phyin chad kyang mkhyero/ su rgyal rigs kyi rigs shingasA la chen po lta bu dag pa/nor chebadales spyod chab/ sa le
sbram dang/ nor dang/ yo byadamangab/ shin tu skyid pa/ bzhonapa chen po la zhon pa rnams kyinang duskyabar 'dod pa des kyang/ 'di bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa rnams sasor bshags par bya'o// ma' ba
pabya'o// phyin chad kyang mi bya'o// subram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams dang// byim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu phyug pa// nor bu/ longs spyod cha ba/ sa le sbram dang/
nar dang/ yo byad mang ba/ shin tu skyid pa// bzhon pa chenapo la zhenapa rnams kyi nang du su bar 'dod pa des kyang/ 'bazhin du las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags par bya'o// mi 'chab par
byango phyin chad kyang mi bya'o// su rgyalachen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi brtul zhugs dngamatshungs par skye bar 'dod pa des kyang/ 'di bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags par bya'o//
mi bcab par bya'o// phyi'i chad kyang ma bya'o/ susum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyibartul zhugs dang mtshungs par sku b.ra'adod pa des kyang 'di bzhin dulas kyi sgrib pa/
bo rnamasasogo bshags pa bya'o// mi bcub pa bya'o// yi dkyang mi bya'o// de bzhin du rathab bral dang/ dga' ldan drang/ 'phrul dga' dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byedudang/ tshangs ris dang/
glu/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang/ tshas 'khoradang/ tshas nadang/ 'od rlung dang tshangamed 'od dang/ 'od gsal dang/ dge chung dang tshad med dge dang/ dge rgyasaM dang/ sngonemadadang/ bsod nams

sgyur skyes dang/ 'bras bu che dang/ sems can 'du shes med pa dang/ gya nom snang dang/ shin tumathong dang/ mi chab dang/ mi gdung bdang/ rogamin gyi lha rnams kyi brtul zhugs dang mtshungs par skye bar 'dod pa
des kyang/ 'di bzhin dulas kyi sgrib pa rnams sosor bshags par bya'o// mabacab par bya'o// phyin chad kyang bya'o// su gzugasamad pa nam mkhar mthar yas skye mched du b.ra'agropa rnams dang rna/

shes mtha' yas sku mchod du bar 'gro ba rnams dung datsayong med pa'i skye mched du bar 'gro ba rnams dang/ 'du shes med 'du shes mdaman skyaached du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams kyi brtul zhugs dang mtshung

par skye bar 'dod pa des kyang/ 'di bzhin du las kyisgrib pa rnams so sorab shags par bya'o// ma btab par bya'o// phyin chad kyang mo byero// su rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang

phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byedapar 'dod pa des kyang/ 'dibazhin du las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags par bya'o// mi bcab par bya'o// phyin chad kyang mi bya'o// sug la/
gsum mam/mngon par shes pa drug gam/ stobs rnamasasam/ dbang po rnams sam/nyan thos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ram/nyan thos dbang bar grags pa'am/rangabyang chub mngon sum du byed par 'dod
pa des kyang/ 'di bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags par bya'o// mi bsub par bya'o// phyin chad kyang mi bya'o// su thamasacad akhyen pa'i ye shes dang/ rnam par dag pa'i yo shes dang bsam

gyis mi khyab pa'i ya shes dang/ mtshungs pa med pa 'i ye shes dang/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas kyi yashesamangon par sgrub par 'dod pa des kyang/ 'dape zhin du lus kyi sgrib ba rnamasago gor
bshags par bya'o// mi bcang par bya'o// phyin chad kyang mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zhes gsus pa'i phyir te/
rgyu dang rkyen gzhan dang gzhan gyis gzhan skya'o/ ]gzhan 'gag go/ del 'dus pa'i ngos gang yin pa de dag 'gags pa/ rdudang/ bral ba/ rnam par gyur pa ste/ de dag la yang las kyi sgrib pa chung

byed kyaadad// da ltar dubyed pa gangayin pa rnams kyang med pa las byung bsta/ dadag la yang las kyi sgrib pa chung thadakyang mad do// de ci'i phyir zhan/ shari'i bu dang zhinagashegs pas chos thams cad ni stongab/
sems can med pa/srogamadar/ gang bragamadapa/ ma skyes ba ]ma 'gags pa/'dusum byas pa zhes gsungs pa'i re so// shA ri'i bu chos thams cad bdag las byungayang ba dag kyang

[– ]yod pa ma yin no// shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu ram/rigasakyi bum gangal zhig 'di ltaste/ semasacanamadapa'i 'thus kyi tshul 'dil rajug pa 'din/ las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcod pa zhes bya// sha ri'i bu 'di
so sor bshags pa'o// denas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshadang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dus rigs kyi bu ram/ rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos kyi theg pa la
yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs ba'am/ theg pa chen po la yang dag bar zhugs pa 'am/ sems can gzhan dag kyang rung ste ! bla namang pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'ibyang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshangargyabar ratshal bas/ ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la rjes su yi rang bgyi/de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/
la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shAri'i bu 'di la rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos nyin lanagasumamtshanalanagasum du bla g.yu brag pa ba/ga tu gzaral/ dus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te

galamo sbyar nas tshig 'di skadad/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtan nasams can gangasu dag sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba ridangos po dang/ tshul khrims las byung ba dang/ bsgom pa las byung ba'i god

nams bgyi ba'i dngos pomangonapara'adus bgyis pad dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang ba'imchog gis rjes su yi rang// rjes su yi rang ba dam pa dang/ gtso bo dang/ khyad par can dang/ rab dang/ phul dang/
gya nom pa dang/ blam dang/ bla namad pa dang/ ltag named pa dang mnyam pa med pa dang/ mi mnyam pa dngamanyam pas rjesagu yi rang ngo// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sems can gangasu dag sbyin pa las byung
ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po dang/ tshul khrims las byung ba dang/ bsgom pa las byung ba'i nga sod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po mngon par 'du bgyid par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad la rjes su yi
rang rimchog gis rjes su yi rang ba nas/ rjes su yi rang bami mnyam ba dang mnyam pa'i bar gyis rjes su yi rangang// phyogs bcu'i rajig rtazhan sems can gang dag sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams

bgyi ba'i dngos po dang/ tshul khrims las byung ba dang bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i drangos po mngon par 'du bgyid pa de dag thams cad la yang rjes su yi rang ba'imchog gis rjes su yi'ang
ba nas/ rdzas su yi rung ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar gyis rjes su yi rang ngo// byang chub sems dpa' gang dag da ltanas mas dang pobaskyod pa de dag gis dang po byang chub dusanus bskyod pa
dang ldan pa'idag ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa brgyas byungab rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po gangalags ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'amoskyabaris la bgrod
)/ pa thob pa rnams kyi phung po gangalags pa dang/ phyir mi ldog pa rnamasakyi bsod nams kyi phungab gang lags pa dang/ byang chusems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thags pa rnams

po kyi bsod nams kyi phung po gang lags pa dedag thams cad la yangs su yirang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang banas/ rjes su yi rang ba mamanyam pa dngamanyam pa'i bar gyis rjes su yi rang ngo// byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa ri dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'dus bgyis pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad la yang
rjes su yi rang ba'imchog gis rjes su yi rang ngo// rjes su yi rangab dam pa dang/ gtsebadang ! khyadapar can dang/ rab dang/ phul dang/ gya nom pa dang/ bla ma dang/ bla na med pa dang/ lta gan
mad pa dang/ mnyam bamed pa dang/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas rjes su yi rang// ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi byeng chub sems dpa'asams dpa' chen po de dag byung chub kyi phyi phyogasadangan/ pha rol tu phyin

tsho pa drug dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po mngon par 'du bgyid par ragyur ba gang lags pa dedag thams cad la yang rjes su yi rang ba'imchog gis rjes su yi rang// rjes su yi rang ba dam pa dang/ gtso
bodang/ khyadapar can dang ba dang/ phul dang/ gya nom pa dang/ bla ma dang/ bla named pa dang ltaganamed pa dang/ mnyam pa med pa dang/ mimanyam po dngamanyam pas rjes su yirangango// byang chub

sems dang 'a sems dbang chen po gang dag da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ byang chub kyi phyi'i bod pa de ga pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i bsad nams kyi phung po mngonapar 'du bgyid bgang lags pa de dag/
thams cad la yang rjes su yi rang ba'imchog gis rjes su yi rangang// rjesasu yi rang ba dam pa dang/ gtso bo dang/ khyad pa canadang/ rab dang/ phul dang/ gya nom pa dang blam dang/ banamed pa dang/

ltaganamadang dang/ mnyam pamed pa dang mimanyam pa dngamanyam pas rjes su yi rangang// skya bo mngang lasman ba dang/ skyo bsangapo la bdebadang/ 'jig rten la thugs rtsa bdang/ skya bo ba'ango tshadang/

lha dang/ mi rnams kyidanadang/ sman pa dang/ bde ba'i slad du/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis/ dran med pa yang dag par rdzogal ba'i byang chub
mngon par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskorab/ chos kyi bar la rlab tshubastan bya/ chos kyi tshul rab tubazungang chos kyi chararub tur ba pa/ chos kyi char rab tub bab/

chos kyi rab tubardungs pa/ sa kyi rnga bo che rab tu brdzus pa// chos kyi dung rab tubusang// chos kyi srog shing bsgros pa/ tshos kyi sgronam robangabaramadzad pa/ sams can thams cad la chos kyi sbyin bas
tshim par mdzad pa/ nyam bag tu spyod dubatsud pa gang lags pa dang/ de lanyan thos kyi theg pa pa ram/ rang sengs rgyas kyi theg pa de 'as/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa 'am/ de las gzhon pa'i
semasu na rnams e dge ba'i rtsa ba spyod pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad la yang rjes su yi'i nga ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang ba nas/ rjes su yi ring ba mimanyam padama'

pa'i dar gyi rjes su yi rangang// sgrubo nang po la nub dang/ skya bonangapo'abad ba dang/ 'jig rten la thugs pa rtsung dang/ skye bo phal po chedang/ lha dang/ minams kyi don dang/ sman pa dang/ bde ba'i
slad du/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dedag blanamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chung mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ chos kyi 'khor bskor bar 'gyur ba'i 'dag
gang lags pa dang/ de'anyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa 'an/ de'as gzhanar ris gus can dag dug ba'i rtsa bskyed par 'gyur

bu gang lags pa dudagathams cad 'du angs su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjesasu yi rang ba nas/ rjes su yi rangab mi mnyam pa dngamanyam nga 'i b.ragyis rjes su yi rang ngo// skya bo mang po la sman pa dang/
skabamang pa la bdeb dang/ 'jig rten la thugs b.rub dang/ skya bo phal po chadang/ lha dang/ mi rnams kyi don dang/ sman pa dang/ bde ba'i slad du/ da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtazhan sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skorab/ tshis kyi'akhor lo rab tu ston pa/ chos kyi tshul

rab tu 'dzin pa/ chos kyi chara'ab tu 'bebs pa// chos kyi rarab tugatong ba/ chos kyi spyin ba mdzad pa// ches kyi sgron ma 'bar bar mdzad pa// chos kyi rnga rdung ba/ chos kyi rnga bo chadzung ba/ sa kyi dung
'bud pa// chos kyi srog shing sgrung ba/ sems can thams cad la chos kyi spyin pas tshim par mdzad pa/ 1ma bag tu spyod du 'dzud pa gang lags pa dang/ de la nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/
rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa ram/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa 'amo/ de'asu gzhan nga risams nun dag doge ba'i rtsa bskyed pa gang lags pa dedag thams cad la rjes su yi
pa'i mchog gis rjes su yi rangang nas/ rjes su yi rangabazhim kun pa dang mnyam pa'i bar gyi rjes su yi rangang nas brjod par bya'o// shAri'i bu 'dan rjes su yi rang ba rebasad nams kyi phung
pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'amaM/ rigs kyi bu mo rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po 'dis rjes su yi rangs nas// bsod nams kyi phung po grangs med dang ga dus da nga skyed de// ba'i bu stong
gsum gyi stong chen pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sams cananas/ 'jig rten gyi khamasagang+gA'i klungagi byem sad kyisams can sAd pa de dag thams cad dgra bcom pa zug pa zad par gyur la/
rigs kyi bu ras/ rigasakyi bume la la zhig gis de dag la jisrid 'tsho'i bar du gos dang/ bsadang/ na ba'i gsos sman dang/ yi byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa bas/ gang zhig rjes su
rgya@#/ yi rang ba 'dis rjes su yi rang na/ de na de bas bsod nams ches mang dugrangs med dbag tu med pa skyed do// shA Ti'i bu debs na rigs kyi bu las/ rigs kyi bu mo bla na med/

po pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub n ngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod ngas/ rjes su yi rang ba 'dis rjes su yi rang bar bya'o// bumang spyas nga 'i dbang de thob par 'dudatsang budamed kyi dbang
po brdzabara'adod pas kyang rjes su yi rung ba 'dis rjes su yi rang bar bya'o// deskad ces bkangs la pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//
bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i byung bsams dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la snang ba bgyis pa 'gyu ba dang/ da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa skyed par 'gyur ba'i
sku 'ba' phung po bshad du gsol/ skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shAri'i bu 'dil rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bum

nyan thos kyi dreg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ rangasangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa 'ame/ sams canag zhon dag kyang rung sta/ ban gdab

yang dag par rdzogs pa re byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshangargya bar 'dod pas/ nyin lan gsum ma chen lan gsum du bla gos phragang gcig tugatharal/ pusamo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ tha la

po sngar nas tshig 'di skad du/ sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da lta na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ dun mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de dag la/

phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la phyag 'tshal nas/ chos kyi 'khor rab tu bsarab bskul gyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis skya bamang bo la sman pa dang/skyabamang gol ba

bdang 'jig rten la thugs brtsi ba dang/ skye ba phal po che dang/ lha dang/ mi rnams kyi don dang/ snyanang dang/ bde ba'in da du/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tungaskor du gsol/ chos kyi 'khor la rab tu bstan du gsol
chos kyi tshul rab tu gzung du gsal/ chos kyi spyin pamadzadapagazung du gsal/ chos kyi sgrom 'bar bar mdzad du gsol/ chos kyi ra dbab tu gsol// chos kyi bzung dugasal/ chos kyi rngape tshe brdung du

gsol/ chos kyi dung 'budangugasol/ tshes kyi srog shing bsgrung du gsol/ zhes brjod par bya'o// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo nyanashes kyi thag pa la yang dag bur zhugs pa 'am//
rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ sems can gzhan dag kyang rang ste/ nyin lan gsumamtshan lan gsum du bla gos phrag pa gcig
tu gzar la/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas lo btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas tshig 'di skad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltan phyogs bcu'i'ajig rten tshe'i 'du byedam gtang b.resangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dadag la phyag 'tshal nas gsol ba 'debs kyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag sku benang
[>posan pa dang/ skye bosang ba la dad pa dang/ 'jig la thugs brtse ba dang skabo phal kho tshadang/ lha dang/ mi gas kyi don dang/ sman pa dang/ bde ba'i slad du/ chos kyi 'khor lan btub//

shu chos kyi sgron mni 'baru bur mdzad/ chos kyi charanarab turabebs/ chos kyi rani ba gtong/ chos kyi rnganorab tu brdung/ chos kyi bo ni rab tu brdung/ chos kyi dungani rab tu 'bu da/ nyis kyi srog shingani
rab tu bsgreng/ chos kyi sgomani ched pa'amadzad ) sems canams cad la chos kyi spyin ngas ni tshim par mdzad nyam thag tu spyong du ni'ajug rung razhig bzhugs su gsol/ gsol ba btab pa'i phung po/

'di yang named pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'ibyang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/ ji ltar blon med pa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su snga ba de bzhin du/ 'di yang yongs su bsnga'o zhes brjod pa bya'o
gshA ri'i bu 'di ni gsa'ab gdab pa'i phung po ste/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyagud gsol ba gdab pa'i phung po 'dis gsol ba 'debason/ bsong nams mang po grangs mad dpag tu med pa skyed do//
shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu ram/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis stongagasum gyi stong chenapa'i 'jig rten gyi khams jid pa dengag rinapo chesna bdun gyis bkang ste/ dbazhin gshegs pa rnams la dbul
ba phul ba bas/ gung gis da bzhin gshegs pa de dag la chos kyi 'bag la bskor bar skul na/ ni rebs ches bsad nams mang du grangs med dpag tu mang ba spyad// shA ri'i bustong gsum gyi//
stongangan ngo/ri 'jig rten gyi khams ltazhegs/ shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gI'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa jisad pa de ngag rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gas rin po
sna bdun gyis bkang ste/ dbazhin gshegs pa rnams la dbul ba phul ba bas/ gong gos de bzhin gshegs pa de dag 'bagasol ba btab na/ da nid bas bsod nams ches mang du grangs lar
dpag dunang pa skyang d// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shAri bu ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la chos kyi 'khor la skor bar gsal ba btab sa/ dge ba'i rtsa
bangasan ngal lha'i dbad po brgya byin dang/ mimajed kyi bdag po tshangs pas/ bcom ldan 'das skye bomang ba la sman pa dang/ skya ba mang po la bad ba dang/ 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang
skya ba phal po che dang/ lha dang/ mi rnams kyi dan rung/ snyan pa dang/ bde ba'i slad du/ chos kyi 'khor le nub khubaskor bar gsol zhes/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bsar ba' gsal/ babatab bo//
shA ri'i bu ngas sngon byang chub kyi phyir sdod pan/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la ring dubazhugs pa gsol te dag ba'i rtsa ba desan nga mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ dbazhin gshegs pa'i stobs
[g) ]/banu dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres ba bco brgyad dang soso yang dag par rig ba bzhidang byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen po dang/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa
[>bstanga'i dam ra'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas par 'gyur// de skadaces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan ngashagi bus 'di skadaces gsol to// bcom ldan
'das rigs kyi bu rag/ rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/rangasangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa las/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs
pa 'am: sams canagazhanadag kyang rung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon rardzogs ra raratshang rgyabar 'tshal ngas/ thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur dga' bgyi ba'i slad
du dag ba'i rtsa ba rnams ji ltar yongs su bsdu ba' bgyi/ deskad ces gsal pa dang/ btsem ldan 'das kyis/ tshodang ldan pa 'di'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu 'di la
rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa ma/ radasangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am// theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa
'amasems can gzhan dag kyang rung ste/ branamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'atshang rgya bar 'dod pas/nyin lan gsumamtshan lan gsum du tshig 'di skad
0 ces thogam dang tham ma mchis pa nas/ 'khor ba'a'akhob cho/ bdag gisangage ba'i rtsa ba mngonapar 'du bgyis par gyur pa/sangs rgyas sam/ sasam/dge 'dun nam/ gang brag gam/
than dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song b rnams sam/ sems can gzhan dag la yang rung ste/ ban tshangagacig tsam stsal bar gyur pa gang lags pa dang/ 'chags par/ngalagras pa dang/ gsol ba
