gdang ba gang lags pa dang/ skyabs su mtshib gang lags pa dang/ bslab pa rigazhi dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang/ so sor 'jags pa dang ldan pa'i dgaba'i rtsa ba gang lags
pa dang/ rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po gang lags pa dang/ gsol ba gdab pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus/gzhal/
bskrums tesams dul zhing rnam par grol ba dang/ gabyung pa ma mchis pas sems can thams cud la stsal to// ji ltaradag ba'i rtsa ba rnams sams can thams cad la gtong bar bgyi ba/ sangs rgyud

btsis ldan rangs rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi ya shas chags pa mi mnga' bas/ ji ltar mkhyen pa de lta bu s bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba du btang ngo// sams can thams cad lag na rin po che dang ldan bar gyur cig
nas akha'i mdzod dang du'angs spyod zad mi shes pa dang/ bsod nams zad mi shes pa dang/ chos bdamishecu nga dang/ shis bad mi shes pa dang/ spobs pa brang mi shes pa dang/ bla med yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang nubaanganang ra rdzogs pa byang chug pa dang/ thams cad mkhyenang re ya shog thob par gyur cig/ bdag gsadagaba'i rtsa bsams can thams cad la skul las byung ba'i
[>>bsod nams gangayin pa de dag thams cad gacig tubasdus/ gzhal ! bzlums te bla na mdab yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdagadangasems can thams

cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'atshing rgya bar gyur cig/ thams cad mkhyenang 'i ye shes kyang thob par gyur cig/ ji ltar sngon gyi byang chub se nangs dupa' sems

dpa' nabo dag gis byang rtsub kyi phyir spyad pa de/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su khasos pa de bzhin du/ bdag gis kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur

yi bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ dag ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngo'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag dngasams nuphams cad bla namad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar

sgyu gyur cig/ thumasacad makhyen pa yi shes kyang thob par gyuracug/ ji ltam 'ongs pa'i dus kyi byunganubasanas dba'asems dpa' chenapo de dag byang chub kyi phyi spyod pan/thams cad s khyenang nyidadu
'gyu bar bgyi ba'i sladadu/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su sngo bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ bdag gis kyang thams cad mkhyen ng nyid du 'gyur bar bgyi ba slad du/ dag ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su
bsngo'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag dungasams can thams cad bla naman pa yang dag par rdzogasA pa byang rlubanangon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bgyur cig/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i yi shes kyang

thob nga gyur cig/ ji ltar da lta nad lta byung ba'ibyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po da drag kyang byang chub kyi phyir spyod pan/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ dge ba'i
rtsa ba rnams yongs su sngopa de bzhin du// bdag gis kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gal bar bgyi ba'i slad du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su sdudo// dag ba'irtsi ba 'dis bdag dang sems can
thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byungunubamangonupar rdzogs par 'atshang rgya bar gyur cig/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i yang shes kyang thob par gyur cig// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das debazhi/
gshegs pashAkyathub pa des byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi teng nge 'dzinabasam gyisami khyab pa) drimad nga/ shin du dkarab la bzhugs nas/ bdud sdig can
bcom sU/ shes pa ri bgyi budang blta b.robagyi ba dang/ rtag par bgyi ba dang/ mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bgyi ba gang ci yang rung ste/ thams cad nam gyi tho rangs skya rengasaM 'char
skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bdud rtsi bas de'ai med pa ra 'gro ba'i lamamangon nga rardzogs pa'as sa rgyas pa de bzhin du/ bdag ngangasams can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par
[7 ]@#// rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig/ thams cad mkhyenang riye shes kyang thub par gyug/ jiltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa/
[>>'ad dang gnad dang/ 'damchog dang/ 'ad dag dang/ bsod nams 'od dang/ 'khrugs ba dang seng ge dang/ 'dabre brgya pa dang/ 'od bram dzadang/ 'od dra ba can dang/ nan
( 'od 'phro dang/ 'od b.radang/ snangaba'i rgyal po dang/ shin tu brgyan dang/ nachen tog dang/ chos kyi rgyalamtshanadang/ yanalagamchog de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag bar
ra rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'adas dedag dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhanadag gis banamad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs nga rasangs rgyasanas/
jitsam du skye bo mang po la sman pa dang/ skya bo mang bo labadeb dang/ 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang/ skye bo phal po chedang/ lha dang/ mi rnams kyi don dang ! sman pa dang/ bdeba'i slad
du sa kyi 'khoral bu du bskorab dbazhin du/ bdag dang semasacan thams cad kyang bla namad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas// skye
mang gol sman pa dang/ skye bo mang po la bdab dang/ 'jig rtenal thugs brtse ba dang/ skye bo phal po chedang/ lha dang/ mi rnams kyi don dang/ snyanang dang/ bdaba'i slad du/ chos kyi
'khor lo rab tu bskor ba 'gog cig ces brjod par bya'o// shA ri'i bu 'di ni yongs su bsngo pa'i phung po ste bsod nams kyi phung po snga mas/ yongs su bsngo ba'i phung bo 'di'i brgyu'i char//
yang rtsub mi 'gro banas/ dpo'ibar du yang mi bzod do// shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bumo gang la la zhig mdo dilen tam/ kun chub par byedadam/ 'dzin tan/
klogagam/ gzhan dag la yung rgya cher yang dag par du tu ston na/ da bsod nams kyi phung pa dengs ches mang du grangs medadabag tu med pa bskyed da shAri'adu stong gsum gyi

stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyisams kyisams canAjisnyadang de dag thams cad snga phyitshad pa rami'i lus thob pa ru gyural/ snga phyi me/dang ra mi lus thob nas kyang rang byang chub thob par gyur te/ de
dag la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis bsti stang dang phu dud bya ba'i phyir/ gas dung/ sras dang/ ma' dang/ na ba'i gsos smanadang/ yo byad rnams kyis ji sridam tsha'i
bar dung snyan bkur byas te/ rim gro bya ba la lan cig kyang rin po che'i phung po ri rab tsam gyi rin po chenams yongs su khyad par byas la/ yongasan mang na 'ga'adas nas kyang/ de dag gi mtsho
sharin ngo tshasna bdunate/ gsaradang/ dngul dang/ mu tig dang/ ba zhurlu dang/ shel dang/ sprug dang/ mu tig dmarapa 'as 'phang du dang ga tshad bcu pa byas te/ de dag lagadugs
dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ bdan dang/ bdan phra mo rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas/ shA ri'i bu 'diji sAm du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bum/
gzhi dalas bsad nams mang du skyed dam/ gsolang/ bcom ldan 'das mang lags so// bdebur gshegs nga na nga 'gas so// brtson ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
'i bu rigs kyibu ran/ rigs kyi bu mo gang mdo 'di 'dzin tan/ kun chub par byed dam/ 'donang drabyad dag klog gam/ skya bo mang po' yang dag par rab tu snyan tan//
bu nand pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'ibyang chub tu snyan lam radangs na/ dand bas bsod nams ches mang du spyad de/ bsadanams kyi phung po snga mas bde/dunams kyi phung bo 'di'i
brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro banas/ dpodribar du yang mi badrodad// deci'i phyir zhan/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar rigs kyi bu ram )rigs kyi bum ba sgrub pa de gnas/
spyi nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul ba'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bu spun ba rnams kyi nang
na 'di lta ste/ chos kyi spyin ba mchog ces ngas bshad do// de nas 'khor de las srog chags khri ste las langs te/ so so nas bla gos phrag ba gcig tu
[/]gzanas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de lags su thalam sdur ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol to//
bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis mdo sde 'di gasrung dgrwa bgyi'o// gzhan dag la yang rgya cherayang dag par bastan par bgyi'o// bsgrub pa la gnas par bgyi'o// deci'i slad
du 'a na/ bcom ldan 'das de dag cag ni dram nga 'i chosadalta bu dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal zhing danadu gnyer ba
lags so// denas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das dang/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la lha'i ma tog maN+Dar bus mngon par gtor te// mngon par ma/ tor
nas kyang/ tshig 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba skrun pa dang/ las kyi sgrib pa rgyun
gcod paN+Digacus sprasabagyid pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dadabazhinan/ kadu gi ka dad bzhin te/ de'i phyir zhan/ lha'i dbang pangos
mngon pa shes de/ 'di nas bskal pa grangs mad ra riyang ches gro ngamad ba'agyur ba na/ dbazhinagashegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer
[/, ]bya// gyi phung pa chen po zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa// bdabar gshegs ba/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ sa bu 'dul ba'i kha la spur ba/ bla na
mad pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du 'byung ngo// lha'i dbang bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs//
pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer gyi phung po chen po'i tshar tshad ni lo byab phrag drug cu thub par gyur to/ de'i nyan thos thog ma 'dus pa na bye ba phrag 'bum yodade/ nas cad kyang dgra
bcom pa thag pa zad pa sha stag go/ de'i nyan thos 'dus pa gnyis pa ni bye ba brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad yod de/ thamasacad kyang dagu datsam pa drug pa brad pa sha stag ga
'i nyan thos 'dudas ngad gsum pa ni bya brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu yod de/ mas cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag ba zad pa sha stag ga/ lha'i dbang po dbus de bzhin gangshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od bra gyo phung po chen po de/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rtenAdang tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang/ dug srung dang bram ze'abacas pa'i
skye dgu'i don gyi phyi'i rgyur// lha'i dbang po de ri tsho bud med gang+gA'i lha mo zhes bya ba zhig 'khor 'dus pa'i de nyid kyinang du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des sa kyi rnam grangs 'di//
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi phung po chen po 'a samangon sumaju bzung/ kun chub pa byas/ blangs nas skye bo mang po la yang dag pa bstan ta/ brazhand pa/
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs par gyur to// da de nas shi 'phos nas bud med kyi lus spangs te/ rgyas pa'i dbang po thob nas/ rtag nga ra
lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ lan brgyad khri bzhi stong du 'khor 'as gla ra ba rirgyal pabyas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa ren chen 'od 'dra zhes bya bar gyur to/ de ka'i
shi ka 'di nas shar phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing bya bstong phrag brgya nangos ston te ngas da lta na yang mathong ngo// ka shika sudag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegag ra
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs parjes su rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro de'i ming thos pa de dag brams cad ya sa su mya ngan las 'das ra ra ngas par 'gyur ro// budamad gang la
zhig gis/ dbazhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro dang tshing thos sam/ 'chikar yang mngonaun du byedan/ denyidabud
med de'i 'us kyi tha ma yin no// lha'i dbang po de ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub sa/mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bsgrub pa dang
las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcod pa'i gces spras byed pa yin no// denas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha'i dbang ba brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsal/
[>>te bcom ldan 'dras chos kyi rnamaM grangs 'di'i mnganilags/ 'di ji ltaragazung bar bgyi dro sku da ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/
lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'disad ces bka' stsal to// ko'u shi ka du'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangos 'di las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcod pa zhes bya bar byung zhig 'di ni khyang chub
sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya bar yang thung zhig/ 'di som nyi gcodapa zhes bya bar yang thung zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ lha'i dbang bo/
ba rgya byinadang/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri brar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis gsungs
zla pa lamangon par bstod do// 'phags bu las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mad rdzogs so// 1 rgya gar gyi mkhan po dag/
la sogs pa dang/ zhun gyi lo tsab gnad+ha ye shes sdes bsgyur cing gtan la phabang// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yad+hame/
tsa0 dung dza pa ri pIts+tshanAm ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa chos kyi rgya phamtshan gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba thegapachen nga 'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub
soms dang 'a thams cad la phyagaN+Ditsalal// 'diskang bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed tshal mgonamod bres sprinagyi
kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de'i tsho'abor dur byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'dug pa stan las langs te bcas ldan 'das la 'di skad kyis
gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dba' chos du ma dang ldan namyur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur lags bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa// byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu dang ldan n na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa ri sangs rgyus su 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na/ 'dir byang
chub sems dpa' dud pa rangaldan par bya ba dang/ byang chub kyi sams dang ldan par bya ba dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su mi gtong ba dang/ dgon pa/
brtanatsong 'du 'dzi spangs pa dang/ bla ma dang mkhan po'i gdon ngag yongs subatsal ba dang/ snying rje dang ldan pa dang/ mad du thos pa dang/ ting nge 'dzi
par bstod do/
tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang/ brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pas don sgrub pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal mtshan dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khar da dogabcom ldan 'dod kyis gsungs pa la mngon
'phags pa chos kyi rgyalamtshan gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba thog bachon po'i nad rdzogs so
mdospyi
